133b2(chi): bka' stsal to// ma g.yos rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// de la bdag rol ye shes mchog/ gnyis med chos sku bde ba che// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas pas// ma bcos
133b3(chi): thig le nyid kyis brgyan// longs spyod rdzogs sku mi zad gter// rdzu 'phrul thabs kyi 'od zer gyis// nyes pa 'joms shing legs pa skyob// yongs la khyab cing dog pa med//
133b4(chi): bye brag sna tshogs cir yang snang // sprul pa'i sku ste kun khyab pa'o// de yang dus gsum 'dus ma byas// mi 'gyur mi shig rdo rje ste// rang bzhin med pas 'dus ma byas//
133b5(chi): dmigs med brtan pas rdo rje'i sku'o// g.yos pa med pa'i chos nyid la// rang snang ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs// bcos med thig le chen por snang // mngon par byang chub sku
133b6(chi): bstan pa'o// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin la// gnyis su 'byed cing phyogs char 'dzin// bya ba med pas las rnams byed// nges don bsgrubs la log par mthong //
133b7(chi): srog dam bka' don las kyis nyams// mtshan ma mnyam dang 'dod par 'gyur// nyams pa'i mtshan nyid bdun po ste// nams kyang ngan song 'gro bas na// de dag don gyis
134a1(chi): ma bsgral na// nyams pa chen po'i rgyur 'gyur te// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bsgral// don dam spong len thig
134a2(chi): ler bsgral// don du spyi dang khyad par gnyis// lhag pa'i dam tshig gsum du bsrung // spyi yi dam tshig rtogs par bya// khyad par dam tshig bsrung bar bya// lhag pa'i
134a3(chi): dam tshig gsum po dang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lngar bsrung // don dam gnyis med stong pa'i sgrol ma la// lha log rngan sems rku 'phrog brdeg la sogs// ngan du smra zhing
134a4(chi): gnod pa dngos mi bgyid// de dag dngos su byas nas dmyal bar skye'o// bzlas brjod sngags dang snying po bar mi gcod// gsung gi dam tshig nyams na dmyal bar skye'o// don
134a5(chi): dam gnyis med gzhan la spel mi bya// rang gis thabs kyis chod na mi rtog pas// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin no// sbyor sgrol ma byin len dang tshig brla 'dzun//
134a6(chi): nyon mongs rang kar spyad pas ngan song rgyu'o// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi ngo bo la// ma rig log par mthong na spang bar bya// mi yang dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin no// dri chen dri chu
134a7(chi): dmar chen mangs sems// so so'i rnam rtog ma 'byongs te// nyon mongs las la chags pa'i ngo bor bshad// gnyis med don dang 'gal bas de bzhin no// phung po'i 'byung
134b1(chi): pa kha dog dbang po'i yul// gnyis med lta ba ngan pas so sor brtag/ ye shes lnga yi don dang ma 'gal bas// gnyis med don dang 'gal bas de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje'i
134b2(chi): rigs dang pad+ma las// rigs kyi khyad par ye shes lngar snang na// ye shes dmigs med don de ma rtogs pas// grub pa'i 'bras bu med pas dmyal bar bshad// spyi yi dam
134b3(chi): tshig de dag gzhung bsrungs na// sa gzhi chen po 'dra ste kun gyi rten// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ste 'dod pa skong // gcan gzan seng ge bzhin du zil gyis gnon// don gyi rtsa ba don
134b4(chi): gyi mkhar bzhin bsrungs// 'bras bu yang dag nges par gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang khyad par dam tshig rnam mang yang // mdo dang don du nyi shu'i don dang bsnun// gcan gzan
134b5(chi): rgyal po seng ge gsod mi bya// za ma tog tu ngan pa'i drug mi spyod// rin po che yi lcug ma rtsar mi bcad// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma yong mi btung // pad+ma rgyas pa'i ze 'bru la mi dbye/
134b6(chi): bug brdol can gyi snod du bcur mi blug/ ma brtags pa yi nor dang zas mi bsrel// shel sgong dkar po rdzob tu bsnun mi bya// snod ngan nang du seng ge'i zho ma bzho// yid bzhin
134b7(chi): nor bu thab tu mi bsreg bya// bya yi rgyal po khyung gi gshog mi bcag/ gnam lcags brjer mo sa la brdab mi bya// stag gzigs rol pa'i zas kyi lhag mi bza'// rdo rje
135a1(chi): gtams pa'i brag rnams yongs mi gshig/ rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'i go mi thal// mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma yongs mi gsod// rdo rje chu bo'i
135a2(chi): 'ol ga gcad mi bya// rgyal po stug gi phyag rgya sbyin mi bya// rdo rje mkhar rdzongs snyams pa'i rmang mi zlog/ rgyal mtshan rtser brtags nor bu rin po che// 'dod par gyur pa'i
135a3(chi): mtshan mas dbog mi bya// gnyis med don gyi mya ngan 'das mod kyang // log par btags pa'i dbang gis so sor snang // khyad par bstan pa'i dam tshig don rnams te//
135a4(chi): dngos su nyams na ljon shing mes tshig 'dra// zur gyis nyams kyang bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu ring // kun tu nyams na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// gzhung du bsrungs na rang
135a5(chi): snang 'bras bu 'char// rgyun du bsrings na don dang man ngag 'grub// lhag pa'i dam tshig don gyi bzhi ru sbyar// spyad pa rgyun dang rang bzhin lta ba gnyis// gal te nyes pa
135a6(chi): lta ba nyams brod bzhi'o// spyod pa rgyud la dam tshig bzhir snang ngo // gnyis kyi sgra yang myos 'gyur dgra yang gzhom mo// gsang ba'i brda srungs le lo'i dgra spang ngo //
135a7(chi): rang bzhin lta ba'i dam tshig bzhir snang ngo // srid gsum yongs sbrul khams gsum zhing du blta// dug gsum rtsir 'gyur 'khor ba gnas bsgyur blta'o// gal med
135b1(chi): nyes pa'i dam tshig gsum du snang // ma khrel tshul dang ma nyams pa'i mdo// mthar phyin rtags dang gsum du bstan// ma nyams pa'i mdo la bzhi ru snang // rtsa ba
135b2(chi): yan lag bla ma zhar gyis nyams pa bzhi'o// mthar phyin rtags kyang de dag bzhi ru snang // dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang // byin rlabs che zhing rig pa chags pa
135b3(chi): gnyis/ yid 'ong 'byung zhing 'dod pa 'grub pa dang // mang pos bkur zhing drag po thob pa bzhi'o// lta ba nyams drod dam tshig rnam pa bzhi// brdal ba chos nyid kyi lha
135b4(chi): ba ye 'byam du'o// rig pa ye shes kyi lta ba ye gsal du'o// sprul pa phyag rgya'i lta ba ye gnas su'o// khyab pa snying rje'i lta ba kun khyab pa'o// lhag pa'i dam tshig
135b5(chi): don la ma gnas na// ji ltar bsnyen cing bsgrubs kyang tshig chad pas// gnyis med don gyi ngo bor rtogs par bya'o// don dam bsgrub pa'i don du ma yengs srungs// dam
135b6(chi): tshig ma nyams gzhung yod na// 'di dag grub par gyur pa ni// dpal chen khro bo'i rgyal por bshad// nyams par gyur pas mi 'grub ste// slar yang ngan sems
135b7(chi): brlab par 'gyur// zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / sprul pa dang / yang sbrul du bcas pa thams cad dam tshig dbye ba med par phur bu
136a1(chi): mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub cing gnas par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig
136a2(chi): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang 'gro ba ma lus pa yang dag par bsgral ba dang / phyin ci log tu 'khyams pa rnams thugs rjes gzung
136a3(chi): ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// srog dam bka' don ngas kyis nyams// mtshan ma nyams
136a4(chi): dang 'dod par 'gyur// nyams pa'i mtshan nyid bdun po 'di// skye gnas gcig cing rgyu 'thun yang // nyon mongs sems kyis log par khrid// bya ru mi rung las rnams
136a5(chi): byed/ lta ba gnyen po phyal bar gtang // spyod pa zab mo tho cor spyod// stan 'gan 'phrin las tshol bar byas// tshig ni mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brangs// dam tshig gzu
136a6(chi): lums ras chod byed// spyi khyal lhag pa'i dam las 'das// myur bar mnar med par lhung bas// thugs rjes sgral ba'i dus la bab// don dam gnyis med ngang ru bsgral//
136a7(chi): phung po yab la 'byung ba yum// mi dge log lta yab yum bcu// yan lag thar pa sgo ba'i ngang // rnam shes dbang po dus dang yul// ko'u ri sing nga'i tshogs su bsgral//
136b1(chi): phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgyar bsgral ba'i dus la bab// dngos po mtshan ma rdzas dang rten// dngos med bsgral ba'i dus la bab// kha dog dbyibs dang grangs
136b2(chi): dang ming // brjod med bsgral ba'i dus la bab// dbang po yab la yul gzugs yum// mya ngan 'das par shin tu bsgral// dmigs med bsgral ba'i dus la bab// gzhan
136b3(chi): yang brdeg pa'i dus bstan pa// mnga' 'phen zla ba mar ngo la// mig dmar phur bu gza' lag gsum// dar ma'i rus su dus la bab// nya nas mar gyi ngo la 'jug/ gzhung
136b4(chi): dang 'thun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun sum tshogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// rdzas dang lag cha sngon sogs la// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gzhung bzhin du// gnas shing bsgoms te
136b5(chi): bri bar bya'o// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi tshang byas nas// 'dzab grangs bsnyen pa mthun du gdon// pho nya phyogs snyan thabs kyis dgye// shin tu gsal zhing khugs par 'gyur//
136b6(chi): 'bring gis ling+ga 'gul bar nus// 'phar dang ldeg dang 'tshegs dang 'khrog/ tha mas nyams dang rtags 'ong ste// de tshe brdeg pa'i dus la bab// de med bar du dus tshod
136b7(chi): med/ cho ga tshang bar gyur pa dang // rtags de mngon par byung ba dang // dus la bab par bstan pa yin// zhes brjod pas/ don gnyis su med par dus/ ma rig
137a1(chi): pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba rnams/ gnyis su med par bskal ba dang / kun rdzob tu yid ches par byas nas/ nges pa'i don gcig tu go bar gyur
137a2(chi): zur brgya na las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dus dang / dus tshang bstan pa'i le'u bcugaci bya'o// / de nas yang don thams
137a3(chi): cad gnyis su med cing brjod pa las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir/ thams cad mya ngan las 'das te/ nges pa'i don gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings kyi lta ba 'di skad ces
137a4(chi): gsol to// rnam par dag pa yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs kyi sku// rig pa'i rgyal por rang byung bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdus// thabs kyi bdag
137a5(chi): por bdag gnas pas// 'gro kun bla med gnas su sgrol// chos kun rtsa ba sems yin pas// brtags shing don du rang sems bzang // sems kyi rtsa ba'i don rtogs
137a6(chi): shing // 'gyur med glong du don nyams dang // gsung shing brjod pa bsnyen pa la// gnyis med don gsal ting 'dzin te// lus kyis sbrul bskyod phyag rgya'o// phur pa
137a7(chi): byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i gdar sha bcad// byang chub sems kyi phur ba yis// ma btab bzhin du lhun
137b1(chi): gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal po rig pas gdab// phur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med pas/
137b2(chi): gnyis med ma bcos chos nyid la// rang gi byang chub sems kyis gdab// phur bu 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dngos las 'das// dngos
137b3(chi): po kun bral phur pa yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// don la gnyis med mya ngan 'das// gdab dang mi gadrab gnyis las 'das// phur pa skye ba med
137b4(chi): ba'i don// ma skyes brdal ba'i phur pa yis// dbyings la btab pa'i rig pa shar// sems las gtab pa'i don dam rtogs// khyab rdal rang bzhin phur pa yis//
137b5(chi): snang srid kun la khyab par gdab// de ltar rtogs pas thebs pa yin// mngon du gyur na rtogs pa yin// tshig las 'das pas sangs rgyas yin// grangs las 'das pas
137b6(chi): brjod du med// rang bzhin phur pa'i don nyid ni// phur pa bla na med pa'i don// phur pa dbyings kyi dbyings zhes bya// phur pa rig pa'i ye shes so// sku ni skye ba med pa'i
137b7(chi): dbyings// pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i don// gnyis su med pas mya ngan 'das// thabs kyi rgyal po phur pa yin// pa ni shes rab dag pa'i don// gnyis med mnyam
138a1(chi): pas rdo rje'i sku// phur ba kun khyab nam mkha' 'dra// phur pa khyab gsal nyi zla 'dra// kun la snyoms pas ngo bor snang // chos kyi
138a2(chi): chos nyid phur pa yin// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid phur pa yin// sems kyi sems nyid thur pa yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi bla// man ngag nges pa'i don yang yin/
138a3(chi): gnyis med gsal ba'i bskyed pa yin// pho nya mang pos 'jig rten bkang // 'phral la bkang ba ma yin te// ye nyid nas ni gang bar gnas// gsal bar bsgom pas
138a4(chi): skye ba yin// nyams 'og chung na sgral ba yin// gnyis su med na sbyar ba yin// lhangs kyis rtogs na theg pa yin// zhes brjod pas/ ji ltar srid pas bsdus pa
138a5(chi): thams cad/ phur pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang du sangs rgyas par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba chos nyid mya ngan las 'das par
138a6(chi): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la/ bar du 'byung ba byung srid na/ dmigs pa bcad lnga bsgrub
138a7(chi): dgos pa'i phyir/ rdzas kyi ngo bo 'di dag bsag par gsungs so// sngags pa rgyan gyi chas kyi rdzas// glang chen ko rlon zhing gi shun// stag gi sham bu sbrur gyi chu ni/
138b1(chi): bra la chen zhag tu rag tas brgyan// drag po las kyi rdzas bsags pa// gzhung las byung ba'i phur bu ni// lcags sam shing bu tsher ma can// nag po'i rigs
138b2(chi): kyis bya bar shis// dgra bgegs dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// bya phur bya rgod gshog ru grags// rgyab rten dpung dang bral phyir ro// skyer bu mnan pa'i phur bu drag
138b3(chi): rnam bzhi 'phrin las bya phyir ro// mngag pa'i phur bu mchog phur drag/ 'dren cing 'gug par byed phyir ro// gdab pa snang lngar lcags phug drog/ nyon mongs mngon du
138b4(chi): bsgral phyir ro// drag po sgrub pa'i rdzas su bsags// dug dang gu gul nyungs kar gsum// gsur chen ra khyi khrag dang gsum// phur bu bdug pa'i rdzas su bsag
138b5(chi): rabs chad mon gyi thod pa dang // ra khyi dre'i mdze mon gyi thod pa dang // mnan pa bya ba'i rdzas su bsags// grog mkhar sa dang mi phung sa// gangs kyi dum bu ru tse phug/ ra thug
138b6(chi): lug thug gcin gyis spu// ling+ga bya ba'i rdzas su bsags// shun chen gro ga shog shog gsum// ming rus bya ba'i rdzas su bsag/ sman dang smra ba tsag cha gsum// rkyen bzlog
138b7(chi): sman gyi rdzas su bsag/ ban d+ha gtor ma rag ta gsum// mchod pa stobs pa'i rdzas su bsag/ dz+ha gad tshe dang tshim byed gsum// kun tu rgyu dang gal phyi lnga// ka ta ri dang
139a1(chi): zla tshe bdun// zla 'phrom zla rgyas ma ra gsum// bsgrub pa tshogs kyi rdzas su bsags// dmar gyi rag ta zo ba gang // ma mo mkha' 'gro snyan pa'i rdzas//
139a2(chi): shes rab can gyis bsags pa'i rdzas// mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams tshogs pa dang // gzhung dang 'thun pa'i gnas dag tu// gnyis med don rtogs sgrub pa pos// bka' bzhin
139a3(chi): bsgrub la tshul bzhin bya// gzhung las 'byung ba de byas nas// rab kyis zla ba gcig gis 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig bar gyis 'grub// tha mas lo gsum tshun chad kyis/
139a4(chi): gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po nyams la sogs// 'brum bu lhog pa rgyu gzer dag/ ji ltar dmigs pa de bzhin 'ong // gzhan yang shwa dang ser ba dang //
139a5(chi): mi nad phyugs nad yams de bzhin no// zhe brjod pas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas/ las kyi bya ba'i rdzas dang / rtags la mgo ma rmongs shing / las kyi bya ba las sten
139a6(chi): yod par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rdzas dang / rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang
139a7(chi): bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la yas/ rgyal bas sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces brjod do// mi 'gyur chos nyid phyag rgya
139b1(chi): las ma rtsal lhun rdzogs gsal ba'i rgyun// khro rgyal yab yub rol pa yis// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// 'dod pa'i spyi bor rgya mtsho dkyil// spro zhing
139b2(chi): bsdus la dkyil 'khor bsgyur// 'dod pa'i rna bar gzhal yas khang // rat+na kI la dbus su'o// khro bo yab yum 'khor gyis bskor// traM rat+na rat+na kI la yas//
139b3(chi): kI la ya yi tshogs mchog las// rat+na kI la 'khor bcas spros// bsdus pas don gyi gnas su thim// traM/ gsang ba mchog gi mya ngan 'das// de la sogs te gsang ba
139b4(chi): kun/ don du brtag cing mnyan pa las// kun la bsgrags par bya ba min// 'dod pa'i snying kar de bzhin no// badz+ra kI la ya'i ngo bo nyid// 'bar ba hUM gi tshogs mchog
139b5(chi): las khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// hUM rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa zung // 'jigs byed khro rgyal mnyes mchod
139b6(chi): la/ gnyis med khro rgyal kun dang sbyor// 'dod pa'i lag pa de bzhin te// karma kI la ya'i ngo bo nyid// ha yi 'bar ba'i tshogs mchog las// karma dkyil 'khor
139b7(chi): gsal spro thim// hA khyod ni las rab kI la yin// rnam bzhi 'phrin las kun byos shig/ 'dod pa'i lce la de bzhin no// pad+ma khrag 'thung kI la ya// 'bar ba hri
140a1(chi): yi tshogs mchog las// hrI yi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// hri bye ba brgyad cu sgra dbyangs kyis// gang 'dod skyes bu tshim par gyis/
140a2(chi): 1shes rab don gyi dmigs dang sbyar// che chung don gyis so sor bsgrags// yongs la gsal bar bsgrags ma yin// 'dod pa'i yan lag rnam lnga las// 'jigs byed
140a3(chi): gzhal yas de bzhin te// rigs kyi khro bo'i ngo bo nyid// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las// khrag 'thung lnga dang khro 'phreng bsgoms// hUM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
140a4(chi): dus kun tu// sku gsung thugs kyi zur bu bzung // phur bu'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa bor// thams cad kun la dbang rnams byin/
140a5(chi): bdud rtsi lnga dang phyag mtshan lnga// zhing chen bla re thal chen dang // rag ta zhags pa stag gi sham// rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya'o// ye shes phur pa bya gsum pos/
140a6(chi): / phyogs mtshams bgegs ni 'dul ba yi// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya a bi Shin+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM hUM kA ra a bi shin+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kun d+ha li a
140a7(chi): bi Shi n+ya hUM phaT/ dri za grul bum bden bral dang // chu lha gnod sbyin dbang ldan dang // nyi zla sa bdag phyogs mtshams bcu// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du thul// rta dang ma he
140b1(chi): khyu mchog dang // gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lor bcas// slob dpon mnyes phyir gzhon pa dbul// pan tsa li ka'i gos kyi mchog/ gcan gzan dar men gser
140b2(chi): dngul mchod // bya sgyogs mang po gzi dang g.yu// yul mkhar bu dang chung ma dang // lus dang srog la ma chags par// bla ma de la dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang dbu rgyan
140b3(chi): / cod pan 'phreng // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bza' btung bum pa dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus de phan chad rdo rje'i sras// gnyen par gyur
140b4(chi): pas rtsal 'chang na// nyon mongs ngan song med pa dang // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// dpal chen khro rgyal la sogs pa'i// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// lus
140b5(chi): sam phung por bcas pa yis// rigs 'dzin sa la bzhag par 'gyur// rigs 'dzin sa la gnas pa yis// bla med khro rgyal chen por 'gyur// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs la sogs
140b6(chi): pa'ang // nyid kyi byin gyis brlab par 'gyur// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// dpal chen bka' bzhin las rnams byed// bla ma mnyes par ma byas sam// dbang gi rim pa ma
140b7(chi): thob par// nyan dang 'chang cing las rnams byed// ngan song gsum du log par ltung // rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa'i don// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo la// rang snang lhun
141a1(chi): rdzogs ye gnas pa'i// thabs kyi rgyal por don rtogs na// dbang gi rgyal por bdag nyid rdzogs// chos rnams mya ngan 'das par rdzogs//
141a2(chi): gnyis med phur bu byang chub sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// bcos pa med par chos nyid las// g.yos pa med pa'i chos nyid shar// gnyis med rgyal po
141a3(chi): dbang mchog thob// ces brjod pas/ thams cad dbang gi rgyal por gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
141a4(chi): / de nas yang rang bzhin dang lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor don/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mnyam pa
141a5(chi): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// dam pa'i don gyis mnyam sbyor phyir// mya ngan 'das par bsgom par bya// byang chub sems ni
141a6(chi): mngon sum gnas// mtshon du med pa'i zhing khams la// mnyam rdzogs chen por lhun sgom zhing // bde chen byang chub bstan par bzung // bya ba med las las byed pa//
141a7(chi): mi gnas gnas la gnas par sgom// chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyis// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang // dngos po med
141b1(chi): dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// ma rig ma ni ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/
141b2(chi): thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges pa'i don bkrol bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge hUM bcur
141b3(chi): 'dus hUM nyid a oM hUM dang gsum du bsdus// gsum po de yang hUM ste thig ler 'dus// thig le spros med chos dbyings dang du thim// mi dmigs stong pa
141b4(chi): nyid kyang brjod las 'das// mi gnas de bzhin nyid kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes chos kyi dbyings kyang brjod las 'das// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni
141b5(chi): skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med gnas pa'ang med// thugs rje'i byin brlab rnam par 'phros// dbyings las dbyings phyung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/
141b6(chi): thothabs las dbyings phyung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings lus dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang /
141b7(chi): don dam gcig las ma g.yos kyang // don gyi gzhal yas dkyil 'khor gnyis// don nyid ma g.yos drang bar zad// gzhal yas rang bzhin bzhi ru gsal//
142a1(chi): chos nyid rang bzhin gzhal yas dang // gnyis med yum gyi gzhal yas dang // yid bzhin lha yi gzhal yas dang // 'jigs
142a2(chi): byed 'bar ba'i gzhal yas so// ji ltar snang ba'i rdzas rnams rten// yi ge raM gyi 'phro 'du las// raM gyis bsregs la yaM gyis gtor// ye shes 'bar ba'i
142a3(chi): logs bkrus// rang bzhin nos nyi drung du dag/ 'byung ba shes rab sum b+hi dbyings// rang bzhin dus bzhin 'dus ma byas// rlung bzhin chos dbyings
142a4(chi): gzhal g.yas so// rAM yaM khaM/ e ni mi dmigs don gyi kho// yaM las stan pA'i so bonA byung // baM las chu rgyun mra ma kI/ su las rin chen bye ba yas// laM
142a5(chi): las rin chen sna tshogs gling // bruM las rin chen gzhal yas khang // ta la'i skyes shing tshong tshong 'khril// yid bzhin rin chen grA na gsal// lnga ldi 'ja'
142a6(chi): tshon sprin rum yas// rin chen gyis ni shin tu spras// chun 'phyang dril bu za ra tshags// bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan dang gdugs// rin chen gser gyi khri rkang
142a7(chi): bzhi/ ma chags pad+ma kha stong rgyas// dri med 'od gsal nyi zlas brdal// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang // 'phrin las la sogs 'dus ma byas//
142b1(chi): dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu 'tsher// dbyibs dang kha dog dpag las 'das// phyi dang nang med phyogs dang bral// dmigs par snang yang dmigs su med//
142b2(chi): gzhal yas yid bzhin lhun gyis grub// yid bzhin lha yi gzhal yAsa? so// e yaM baM suM b+h+yAM byaM sha bi shud de/ mthing nag gru gsum e yi dang // rlung nug
142b3(chi): chub ma rda rje'i brag/ rag ti rgya mtsho zhing chen rnams// sha chen sa gzhi zhing chen byeng // ting rus ri rab khras nag cu// ban d+ha 'bar bas kha ta li/
142b4(chi): smug nag shin tu 'bar// dbang po'i gseb nas sbrul nag rgyu// sbrul gyi lce las me chen 'bar// dkar dmar sngo ba de bzhin rgyu// mchog chen rkang gdung zhing
142b5(chi): chen phyam// gnam lcags thog gzer rgyan rnams rdzogs// ma he glang rgod stag dang gzig/ gtum pa dom gyis sbar ba'o// nyi zla'i 'od kyis brgyan pa de//
142b6(chi): 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzhal yas so// a karma ragra sha ra rag ta dz+wa la/ baM tig sna dzA la/ kIng ni ri dz+wa la/ b+h+yAM kha ta li byi bruM/ r-i A mA hri sti ra baM/ 'byung chen lnga
142b7(chi): nyid yum lnga'i ngang // rang bzhin 'dus ma byas pas yum gyi klong // sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i rang bzhin lnga// yumo chen lnga ste rang bzhin gnyis su med// gnyis med
143a1(chi): yum gyis gzhal yas rjod las 'das// des ni rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang // lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor sten// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gdodan
143a2(chi): nas dag/ yid bzhin dkyil 'khor dbus la gsal// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang // yum gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med// yang na dkyil 'khor
143a3(chi): dngos su med// ma rig rmongs la brten phyir ro// sems nyid drag po'i dkyil 'khor de// phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// mtho gang sor bzhi gang rung tshad// byas
143a4(chi): la dam rdzas chag chag gdab// mtshon rtsi brlab cing sras bus gdab// bri zhing phur bu rims bzhin dgod// yang na sa gzhi rab bsnyams la// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
143a5(chi): bo de/ sor ba'i 'dom gang tshad du bya// byin brlabs TIg gang ba de bzhin de// so so'i gzhung dang mthun par bri// glu gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar po'i zhal/
143a6(chi): mtha' ma rdo rje brag dang 'khor los bskor// bar khyams gnyis dang sgo khyud ldan par bri// phur bu ban d+ha gsal byed gtor ma bcas// so so'i gzhung dang 'thun pa
143a7(chi): bzhin du dgod// hUM/ gru gsum mthi nga nag gzhal yas khang // zla kham dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gru bzhi rgyas pa ste/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
143b1(chi): 'khrugs// dmar ser dbang rgyas mngon par bstan// sgo rigs mthing nag mi 'gyur rtags// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad nyid kyi gzhal yas khang du sangs rgyas te//
143b2(chi): mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// rdo rje phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor drug gi don nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// /
143b3(chi): / de nas dpal kI la yas// tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas 'di skad ces brjod do// mya ngan 'das la rtag bsdus te// tshe dbang chen po'i gnas drag ni//
143b4(chi): 'khor lo ga nam la pad+ma sa// dbyibs 'dra'i sa gzhir rab tu brtags// ri bo chen po rab dben par// yid 'ong me tog brgyan par bsgrubs// yang na sdod cig mi
143b5(chi): reg par// lung gsum mdo dang dur khrod gnas// 'bab chu chen po'i ngos su bsgrub// lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang // gdon rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // srid rtse'i nyes
143b6(chi): dmigs bsal ba'i phyir// phyi yi gtor ma btang nas ni// rab tu gsang ste dam rdzas bsags// dur khrod bdag po ma tang ni// brjid pa'i stabs kyis mnan par bya'o//
143b7(chi): b+ha ga e yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i brag gis rab tu bsnams// zla kham bzhi dang 'khor lo brgyad// gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan par bya// mchog chen phur ba rab bsngag te//
144a1(chi): sgo bzhi dag tu re re gzugs// khro bo'i phur pa mang po kun// grwa yi phyogs su spangs la gzhag/ yang na rdzas dang phur pa kun// snang ba 'od
144a2(chi): dang bcas par dgod// tid 'dzin ye shes gsal bya byir// dmigs pa'i rkyen yang mngon par bzhag/ gzhan yang 'bru lnga snying po la// mngar gsum dkar gsum
144a3(chi): nyungs kar bsogs// rin chen bum par bsags te bzhag/ lta ba spyod pa mthar phyin cing // lung dang man ngag tshad mas brgyan// dad pas mi ldog dam tshig gnas//
144a4(chi): byang chub sems la rab gzhol cing // byams dang snying rje ldan pas bsgrub// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog rtog las 'das// de ni mi 'gyur byang chub
144a5(chi): sems/ mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku'o// e yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka'o// che ba'i ye shes khyad par las// pad+ma badz+ra b+hu d+hA'i
144a6(chi): 'khor/ rat+na karma 'khor dang bcas// gzhal yas bum pa'i nang du bskyed// pad+ma kI la yA aM/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM/ bud+d+ha kI la yA au/ rat+na kI la ya swa/ karma kI
144a7(chi): la ya hA ra/ gzhan gyis mi thub gshin rje gshed// ha ya gri ba 'dod pa'i rgyal// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang stobs po che// mi g.yo mgon dang rnam par rgyal// hUM mdzad
144b1(chi): khams gsum rgyal bar bstan// hUM badz+ra kI li kI la yA/ sarba big nan baM hUM/ tig ta tsag kra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra ga ra rdza gar rdza hUM phaT/ birdza ya ha na
144b2(chi): ha na hUM phaT/ ni la tan tra dA ha da ha phaT/ ya man ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ Ar+ya a tsa la ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM pa ra tsi ta ti sta ti sta hUM phaT/
144b3(chi): a mr-i ta kun d+ha li ts+tshi na d+ha tsIn d+ha phaT/ trai lo kya bi dza ya bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ ma hA pa la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ e ka dza Ti gsang ba'i yum// ya mtshan byin rlabs chen po las/
144b4(chi): snyems ma rtag dang bya rgod mgo/ ma lus 'khor bcas 'bar bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs las// pho nya'i dpung tshogs nyi shu ste// gcig la'ang
144b5(chi): gsum gsum drug cur bstan// thams cad 'dzin cing len par byed// de ni rab tu sngags bya'o// sme sha can gyi mthu che ste// bu mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i
144b6(chi): dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// rnam gsum dag tu nan tan bya// rin chen sna lnga'i bum pa la// dzaHhUM baM ho bzhis bkug la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/
144b7(chi): lus ngag yid la bstim par bya'o// Ni nyid dngos dang yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yis// tshe gzhan nas ni de yin te// yang nas yang du bkug byas
145a1(chi): nas/ mngon su smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su slu bar bya'o// rdo rje go chas srung ba yis// brten zhing 'khor los gdab par bya'o//
145a2(chi): snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par sgom// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis
145a3(chi): brgyan/ yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba dang // za ma tog dang rin chen rgyal// bum pa bzang po la sogs pa yis// gzhan la 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab
145a4(chi): mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bstod nas ni// thams
145a5(chi): cad ma lus thal bar bya// tshe dpag med pa'i dbang du bsgrubs// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe bsgrub dang ni sgrub chen po// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis//
145a6(chi): ci 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phror 'gyur// phyag na rin chen gang yin pa// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir
145a7(chi): yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no// de las phan pa'i nus mthu med// yi ge bzlas
145b1(chi): ba'i 'phrul chen ni// rnam gsum tshul gyis mnga' 'khrugs par// sngags bzlas cho ga par mi gcad// 'dris bsal bstan pa'i mchog gis bya// oM au oM oM
145b2(chi): au hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ swa swa swa swa sra/ aM aM aM ai aM/ haM haM haM haM haM/ b+huM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+yAM b+h+yAM/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+hA/ dzA dzA dzA dzA dzA/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu yu/ she she she she
145b3(chi): / shehUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ A A A A A/ oM/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na/ bder gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu
145b4(chi): nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sangs rgyas tshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga'i tshe rnams dbang du bsdus// gshol dang
145b5(chi): gtun shing phyag rgya yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas rnams tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag gi 'khor lo chen po
145b6(chi): yis/ steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs te/ bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba la// bri tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'bru la
145b7(chi): bsti ma nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de// ni'i gnas lngar bstim par bya'o// oM oM badz+ra ka pa tsa/ badz+ra ra ga hUM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta hri ta ya/ a ti sta badz+ra swA hA/
146a1(chi): phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim// a yid bzhin bum pa
146a2(chi): rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen 'phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lnga spos lnga nyungs kar lnga// sngags mkhan rab ldan blo bstan pas// yan
146a3(chi): lag ma nyams sngags bzlas sgom// rgyan cha lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog ste// yo byad ma lus
146a4(chi): ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par bya// 'dod na byang chub snying po la// rnam rtog las kyis 'khor ba rnams//
146a5(chi): rnal 'byor dbang phyug thabs mkhas pas// 'khor ba'i dra bas dkris nas ni// yab yum gnyis med mkha' la bsgral// bsgrub pa po yi las su ni// brtul zhugs
146a6(chi): bskyed de sbyor sgrol brtsam// de dag sngags kyi dam tshig ste// ming gi mi sbyar mi rung ngo // gal te byas na ltung bar 'gyur// ma byas na yang ltung bar 'gyur// rang
146a7(chi): brtags bsgoms te bya bar gsungs// rab bskyed spyan drangs mchod byas nas// bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin brtson par bya'o// bdun nam bdun 'bum bzlas nas ni//
146b1(chi): ma stang bzhin du legs rnams 'grub// nyin mtshan gung la rab bsngags nas// gzugs la phab ste bcings la bzhag/ bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs tshang ba dang /
146b2(chi): mtshan ma bzang po byung ba na// ting nge 'dzin dper te rab tu gdab// mgo dang tsit+ta lte ba dang // gsang gnas yan lag bzhi la gdab// bden pa bdar nas yang nas
146b3(chi): yang / gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// bcu gcig dang ni rtsa gcig gis// mnan cing gzir ba'ang de bzhin no// de nas rab tu dngos grub blangs// gtor ma tsha
146b4(chi): gsum gnas su skye// bsdu dang bsrung ba de bzhin te// rigs mi nub par bskyed par bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ bsgral bas rtag chang gnyis su med pa'i ngang du
146b5(chi): sangs rgyas nas mya ngan las 'das te/ skye med tshe'i ngo bor gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshe sgrub cing gdon sgral ba'i le'u ste bcu drug
146b6(chi): pa'o// de nas yang badz+ra kI la yar/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po bstan pa las/ khro bo rngam pa'i tshogs su bsgral nas 'di skad ces brjod
146b7(chi): do// mya ngan 'das pa'i snying po 'di// mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyis// dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal por sgom pa yis// mya ngan 'das 'di
147a1(chi): rnyed par 'gyur// drag po gtum po bsgrubs pa ni// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bsgral ba'i phyir// gzhung dang 'thun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun
147a2(chi): sum tshogs pa'i slob dpon gyis// byams dang snying rje sngon btang nas// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis phur bu'i rgyud dag las// ring thung mgo mjug
147a3(chi): tshad bskams te// rkeng pa rgya mdud drag po las// rtse mo chu srin kha nas byung // bcu gcig bdun gsum rtsa gcig pos// mkhas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
147a4(chi): grogong ma de dang tshad cig ste// mi brjed gzugs la gdags par bya'o// drag po'i bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor yum gyi dbyibs 'dra la// zla kham gsum
147a5(chi): gyis mtha' bskor te// rdzas la sogs pa dgram par bya'o// dbang drag 'dren pa'i gzugs can la// byin brlabs dbang bskur gzi bskyed par// gdan la
147a6(chi): bzhugs su gsol ba gdab// bsnyen pa bya phyir snyed pa dbul// mi rtog kun snang rgyu bsgoms te// sems kyi dkyil 'khor chags 'gyur bas// mthing ka hUM gi 'phro
147a7(chi): 'du las// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// mi bzang 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i sku// phur bu khro bo 'khor gyis bskor// b+ha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag/ mtshan ma ming du
147b1(chi): bcas par bzhag/ khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung // lan gsum lan bdun rtag sgom zhing // mngon du byung ba'i rtags 'bar der// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ltar gyur
147b2(chi): te/ ma bskyod dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // khams gsum gdug pa bsgral pa'i phyir// mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku phyung nas//
147b3(chi): traM la sogs bsgral bar bya'o// rdo rje'i ba spu re re las// khro bo bye ba 'bum phyung nas// zhal nas drag po'i 'dzab kyang zlos// phyag na dbang drag phur bu 'dril// zhabs
147b4(chi): kyang drag po'i tshul du bzhugs// pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// yang spu la mang pos mngag par mgyogs// rol pas dgra bgegs dbang du sdud// de ni
147b5(chi): dpal gyi pho nya ste// sku la sngo zhing rig la sgrog/ rgyal khams phung bar byed pa dang // gnod sems log par lta ba rnams// bdun rgyud bcad par the tsom med// hUM
147b6(chi): gris bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phangs// zhal gyis rang sngags khri 'bum ru// rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su// 'gro lnga'i sems can thams cad kun// dbang med zhal du
147b7(chi): thim par 'gyur// ya ma ye yang lhag par 'jebs// sku mdog dud ka la sogs dang // mche gtsigs khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur// zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba
148a1(chi): dang / gang la goms pa bsgom par bya// bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags gdon// mngon par
148a2(chi): dbang pos ltar yod par// ri lung bsdus nas dbyings su mchod// the tsom med par 'grub par nges// dam pa'i chos 'jigs ma rings pa// dpa' bos dgos pa
148a3(chi): yod pa'i phyir// kun la phan byas bya bar shis// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dza yis drangs shing phaT kyis bstim// drod tshad rtags la phebs pa dang //
148a4(chi): mtshan dang ldan pa'i gtum po yis// rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsar byas nas// drag po'i phyag rgya bcas nas kyang // bdun gsum bcad pa'i rtsa gcig pos// sked
148a5(chi): nas bskyor zhing gnas su gdab// khro rgyal mang po'i pho brang gdab// gzugs kyi phung po lhag ma la// ma mo pho nya sgrol zhing rol// sprul pa'i 'phra men za zhing ldag/
148a6(chi): lhun gzugs phral te zos bsams nas// mtshan ma'i ming du bsdus pa yang // ji ltar sngon gyis de bzhin du// smon pa'i byang chub lam du bzhugs// mtshan
148a7(chi): ma'i bag chags der sbyangs so// dbyings la spro zhing a la bstim// ho zhes brjod pas/ thams cad khro bo'i rang bzhin du gyur pas/ gdug pa can thams cad
148b1(chi): mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo gsang ba nye bar bsgrubs pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa'o// /
148b2(chi): / de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas/ lta ba byang chub kyi sems kyi chos nyid// byang chub sems kyi phur bu mya ngan las 'das shing // rang dang gzhan byang chub
148b3(chi): sems su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces brjod do// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// 'dzin rtogs med
148b4(chi): pa'i phur pa la// dbyibs dang kha dog mi gnas na// gzugs dang kha dog so sor grags// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// gnyis med don du byang chub
148b5(chi): sems/ 'pho 'gyur med pa phur pa'i don// mi dmigs nam mkha'i klong du bsgrubs// ma bcos ma nor dbyings las byung // de ni rang bzhin lhun grub gnas//
148b6(chi): de las sems kyi 'bras bu ni// rgyu mchog 'bras bu yi ge hUM// gnyis med mtshon pa'i lam bzang po// srid pa gsum du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum kun
148b7(chi): la 'das par bsam// de nas bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa gcig/ byang chub sems ni mngon du
149a1(chi): bstan// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems// de yi rgyu 'bras ma 'gags chos// bsgrub pa'i ye shes mtshon gang po// gsang ba'i
149a2(chi): sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// sku dang ldan pa'i rab brgyan cing // khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzod// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// sku yi tshogs kyi
149a3(chi): rab bskyed de// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang bzhugs// dbu la rdzogs pa'i rigs lnga srung // khro bo mang pos gzir mnan nas// lus ni rnam par sgrol ba'i
149a4(chi): thugs// srid pa'i phur bur rtogs pa'i ngang // srid pa gsum yang thebs zhes bya'o// de nas phur bu byang chub sems// rang 'byung gzugs med kun khyab pas//
149a5(chi): rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// khams gsum ye shes bskyed nas ni// rang 'byung ye shes che ba'i rtags// phur bu ye shes shar ba'i phyir// khams gsum
149a6(chi): dbang du yang dag grub// khams gsum gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// dga' ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos par// 'tshams rngam gzi byin glog ltar 'gyur// khams gsum
149a7(chi): rtsa thag gcod pa'i phyir// me dpung gsum gyis khams sreg cing // lhan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol dbyer med bstim// nyes
149b1(chi): byed gsum gyi khams bsregs nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i 'phrin las bskul// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur ba// rang byung sku ru rnam dag cing // rab tu
149b2(chi): / srog gi gor shar nas// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gsal// dus gcig le brgan 'bar bar smin// snying ka rtse stengs
149b3(chi): spyi bo nas// yi ge 'bru gsum 'phro 'du las// sku gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs bskul// hUM aM au/ rnam par shes pa ye shes tshogs// rang byung phur bu mya ngan
149b4(chi): 'das/ srog dang dbugs kyi byin rlabs ni// nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nyid las// gnyis med don gyi sku phyung ba// byang chub sems kyi phur pA las// snang srid
149b5(chi): chos kyi dbyings nyid du// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis grub// snang srid phur bur shar ba'i phyir// bdag dang lhag gi mchog rnams la// gnyis med dbyings su
149b6(chi): sbyor ba'i phyir// yum bzhi'i phyag rgyar byin brlabs te// lan du blangs nas dril nas kyang // khams gsum snang ba'i dug rnams te// dag pa'i dbyings su bsgral
149b7(chi): bo'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'dra yis// phur bu'i ri rab phyag rgya ste// rdo rje bzhon nu sku gsung thugs// rang byung phur bur byin gyis brlabs// rab tu
150a1(chi): sdug bsngal gsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje rab tu kI la ya/ dngos po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// drag tu gsor te dril nas kyang // chos
150a2(chi): kun ye shes shar ba'i phyir// sems kyi yul ni rnam bsgral te// ye shes sku yi khyab brdal nas// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu// snang skyid phur bur shar
150a3(chi): bas na/ mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// chos dbyings thig ler gsal ba'i phyir// ma lus phur pa thebs zhes bya'o// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo la// rdzogs
150a4(chi): nas dud khar gsal phyir ro// byang chub sems kyi khyad par gyis// nyon mongs dug lnga bsgral ba'i phyir// khams gsum gsor bas bsgral bar bya'o// nyon
150a5(chi): mongs ye shes gnas gyur cing // srid gsum dbyings su bkru ba'i phyir// ye nas a nas rnam par dag/ srid pa gsum po gsal 'tsher nas// bdag dang phur bu
150a6(chi): byang chub sems// sems can lus la bstim byas te// spro zhing bsdus pas khrus byas nas// 'khor ba gsum gyi mya ngan 'das// des na yul sems gnyis
150a7(chi): su med// gnyis med don gyi nges pa las// bskyod pa med pa'i ri rab kyi// dmigs pa med pa'i chos dbyings la// mkha'i gtung khung ba der gshegs
150b1(chi): granas/ gting dpag med pa'i dbyings dkyil du// g.yos pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// lha dang btung ste bsgral byas na// srid gsum phur pa thebs zhes byo'o// snang
150b2(chi): srid skye 'gro phur pa'i gzugs// thon nas gcig tu gyur pa na// ho zhes rab tu dga' ba yis// shin tu snying po 'di brjod do// hUM rang byung mchog sems gsal phyir
150b3(chi): du// mnyam nyid rtsa la la bdag nyid sgrol// de bzhin hUM gis drangs nas kyang // phur bu gzi ldan thob gyur cig/ gnyis med chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// yul de'i sems ni
150b4(chi): hUM du snang // 'od dang 'od zer phur bu las// bdag la 'dus pas tshe ru thim// gnyis med don gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// bdag ni rnam shes tshogs brgyad nas//
150b5(chi): gang zhig gsal ba'i tshogs rnams la// rdo rje phur bu ma shar bas// de yi tshogs brgyad dag par spyad// khams gsum tshogs gnyis gdar bcad mir// khro mo 'bar
150b6(chi): ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bar ba'i gtun tshogs kyis// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar 'gyur// rtog 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug
150b7(chi): des// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos dpag par bsgral// shin tu gsol nas dgyes par bstan// za byed kun la stobs par mdzod// ha ha bgyis pas dgyes par rol//
151a1(chi): hUM hUM bgyis pas dbang du bsdus// kha kha bgyis pas lhag ma bzhes// bdag dang gsum du ldan nas kyang // byang chub sems kyis dbang
151a2(chi): 'phros pas// phung po rdul du bshig nas kyang // sha khrag khams gsum gang bar dmigs// hUM gis rab tu nam mkha' gang // phaT kyis kun tu gtor byas te//
151a3(chi): rdo rje ye shes mtshon gang gis// khams gsum byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro ba ma lus ron bya'i phyir// ljang khu lus kyi sa bon te// dmar po srog gi sa bon yin/
151a4(chi): mthing ka he ru ka yi thugs// spros pas nam mkha' thig les khyab// thams cad 'dus pas shin tu brjid// grub nas sems kyi phung po 'tshol// khams gsum
151a5(chi): dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bsgral ba'i phyir// srid pa gdar sha bcad nas kyang // spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// byang chub sems kyi gol sa
151a6(chi): bcad/ grub mtha' 'di la 'jigs mthu' med// de ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das nas rtag pa po// sgrib pa med pas mthar phyin te// btsal du
151a7(chi): med pas ye nas grub// snang srid dang ni 'dzin rtog rnams// bsam pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// 'dzin dang rtog dang rnam
151b1(chi): spangs pa'i// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// lhan ne bor yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyan// mi nub pa'i rtags bcas shing // rdo rje
151b2(chi): sems dpa'i mkha' la nub// nub mtha' med pas shin tu spangs// yi ni chos nyid mya ngan 'das// rnam shes hUM du mya ngan 'das// hUM nyid byang chub sems kyi gzhi//
151b3(chi): byang chub sems kyi phur pa ru// srid gsum ma lus mya ngan 'das// zhes brjod pas/ snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad ye nas phur pa byang chub sems kyi
151b4(chi): sems su lhun gyis grub cing // mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phur bu byang chub sems su bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco
151b5(chi): brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas/ bsgrub pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ mngag pa las kyi pho nya 'di dag gsungs so// dbu dgu
151b6(chi): khrag 'thung za byed pa// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor du// dgug dang bcing dang sdom la brtson// nyid kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las// ci bgyis bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs//
151b7(chi): gang la bsngags pa grub par byed// dbyings nas bkug la mkha' la bstim// hUM gis bsdus la mkha' la gzhag/ yaM gis bteg la phaT kyis phaT// de yang dpal gyi
152a1(chi): pho nya ste// sngags kyi dbyings nas bsam bya ste// thugs kyi yon tan dpag med kyang // don gyi pho nya dbyings la 'gyed// yab kyi pho nya yum la
152a2(chi): 'gyed/ sprul pa'i pho nya las la 'gyed// de yang bskul tshig drag po yis// gnyis med don gyis bsngags par bya'o// hUM chen sgra 'byin phag dang snyigs bur bcas//
152a3(chi): rnam rgyal ba snyems ma stag dang bya rgod bcas// dbyug sngon sder mo g.yag dang bya rog bcas// gshin rje dur khrod sha ba 'ug par bcas// mi g.yo gtun khung gzig dang
152a4(chi): mgor bcas// rta mgrin gtum mo byi la pu shud bcas// gzhan gyis mi thub mda' snyems spyang ki khra ru bcas// bdud rtsi rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang bcas// khams
152a5(chi): gsum gsod ma dom dang sre mor bcas// ma hA ba la bskyod ma dred dang byi lar bcas// nyes byed ma lus mkha' la ston// gti mug mun khang gtan nas 'joms//
152a6(chi): zhe sdang rtsa me rum du gsod// 'dod chag rgya mtsho gting nas skoms// phrag dog tshub ma gtan rgyun chod// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum gyis// bskal pa brgyad khri mer
152a7(chi): spar te// stong khams rngams pa'i zhal gdangs pa'i// dug gsum sgrol mdzad 'phrin las kyis// gdug pa'i tshogs dang gnod sbyin cha lugs can// rdo rje srin po'i
152b1(chi): zhal gyis mtshan ma'i dngos po kun// dbang po kun phyung don snying zhal du 'dren// 'gal byed tshogs kyi snying la rngam pa'i phyir// drag po'i 'phrin las btang snyoms
152b2(chi): yal bar mi gtang ngo // drag po bdud dpung 'joms shing tshar gcod dang // bdud dang mu stegs gtan la dbab pa dang // gang zhig log par bltas pa'i dgra bo dang /
152b3(chi): gnod sbyin 'byung po gtan nas tshar gcod phyir// log par sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba rnams// 'phrin las drag po'i thugs rjes gtang mi bya'o// bdag nyid zhe sdang
152b4(chi): khro bo rgyal po'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na brjid pa'i sku bzhugs// mthing nag gcer bu ral pa 'bar
152b5(chi): ba can/ zhal gsum phyogs bzhir gzigs pa'i thugs ka nas// hUM hUM hUM zhes sgrogs 'phros pas/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'bar ba'i thugs// bdag gis
152b6(chi): byang chub sems gnyis sngon gtan pas// phyi nang med par nag por gyur pa las// thugs ka'i hUM las hUM gsum rab 'phros pas// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum
152b7(chi): bsgoms byas te/ de yi thugs rje rdo rje drag pa des// dgra bgegs de yi lus dang byangad bzhin rnams// mngon sum sa le gsal bar dmigs pa'i// rkang pa'i
153a1(chi): mthil du yi ge ti nag bsams la// lcags kyi gze ma rkang pa'i mthil du btsugs pas// mkhal ma 'tsher ba gling ba snying rgyus nas// rmyi
153a2(chi): po'i gtsug tu thal gyis byung bar bsams// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum gyis// ngos gsum du ni hUM gsum gzhag/ bur gsum du ni phaT gsum bzhag/ rtse
153a3(chi): gsum la ti gsum bsam// rtse gsum rim par 'jug par bsams// dgra bgegs zil gyis mnan nas kyang // dug gsum rtsad nas gcod par bsam/
153a4(chi): / lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum ste// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo ste// sku ni bud+d+ha he ru ka/ gsung ni pad+ma he ru ka/ thugs ni badz+ra he ru ka/ gze ma'i dbus su dur khrod
153a5(chi): kyi/ gzhal yas khang cig bsam par bya'o// de yi nang du dgra bo'i gzugs byas te// sa le gsal bar bsam pa las// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum las//
153a6(chi): re re la yang gze ma gsum gsum dgus// 'chor dgos med pa dgug par bsam// hUM/ lcags kyi ma mo mgo dgu po// mgo dgu rkang gsum stong khams
153a7(chi): gang / shin tu mi bzang 'jigs su rung // 'khrug byed 'bar ba'i nga ro sgrogs// zhal mdog gcig tu ma nges te// khro rgyal 'jigs byed hUM sgra can// phyag
153b1(chi): mtshan 'jigs pa'i char phab nas// ha la phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing // khams gsum gdug pa ma lus bsregs// gnod byed dgra bgegs 'ching bar byed// dgra
153b2(chi): dang 'byung po sregs pa'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo las// lcags kyi gze ma dgu dgur sprul// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og nas// dmigs
153b3(chi): pa bzhin du dgra bags khug/ dam bcas bzhin du dgra bo sgrol// bcol ba bzhin du thod khro spyos// dul phran bzhin du nga lhogs shig/ dang po gnod pa'i dgra bo ra//
153b4(chi): ming dang rus dang gzugs bris la// rtsig pa'i logs la dgram par bya'o// lha phyag stong tsam dgra bo yi// ming nas phyung la btsal lo zhes// byas la phyag gyis mnan skur ro//
153b5(chi): de nas dril la da cings// tshig gi dbang yang gzugs par bya'o// gzugs kyi mtha' ma hUM gis bskor// mal 'og zhag gsum gzhug par bya'o// sngags ni ming nas phyung
153b6(chi): la gdon// ki la yang dang sum pa ni// byas la brdungs dang rmi lam dang // ltas ngan zlogs shing 'bebs par 'gyur// gzugs dang ming rus der phyur la// dgra bo de yi
153b7(chi): bshang gci'am// bub pas rkang rjes bor ba'i sar// brdabs na btab bsnol sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// yang na de nas sa blangs la// ra khyi khrag gis smras pa las// dgra
154a1(chi): yi gzugs bya ming rus bris// gzugs gnyis byas la lho sbyar te// tshon gyis bcings la rabs chad dang / mdze can dag gi thod nang du// dug
154a2(chi): dang khyi lung gu gul dang // nyungs kar ske tshe mu zi drug/ de nas srog gi snying po dang // dgra bo'i ming gnyis bsres la gdon// dgra bo nI ma ra yaM/ ni sha ku tu yaM/ kha so dbang
154a3(chi): tItri yaM thod khrag spyos shig/ tsa ti gu lu na Na/ snying khrag spyos shig/ tsakra raM/ rnam shes spyos sho na raM/ 'dod chags spyos shig/ sU tri kha raM/ gzugs phung shig cig/ su nr-i
154a4(chi): tri/ yan lag chings shig/ dzi li nr-i tri dza/ de skad ces brjod gzugs la bsdu// de nas mo nyes dbang btsugs la// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhe bcad do// ngan sor gtan srid
154a5(chi): 'khyams pa'i sdug bsngal tshogs// thog ma'i dus na ngan song 'khor bar lhung // mi dge sdig pa'i las la rmongs pa'i phyir// shes ldan ye shes btsal nas yongs ma gyur//
154a6(chi): mnyam nyid dang las g.yo ba med pa ru// dug gsum rmongs pa'i log rtog rang las byung // rgyu med thabs la mkhas pa'i thugs rje drang // rjes su spos pa'i smon lam mthu stobs
154a7(chi): kyis// sku gsung thugs su lus ngag bstan pa'i phyir// shed las skyes pa'i shed bu rigs ngan khyod// gtan srid nyes pa'i rtsa ba gcig pu bas// ma rig rang sems bdag tu
154b1(chi): bzung bas nongs// srid par phan thogs khyod kyi dpal mgon du// thar pa'i lam du 'dren pa nga yin pas// dga' dang gus pa'i sems kyis gus byos la// gnod sems
154b2(chi): snga phyi yod pa dag gyis la// tshe srog lus bor da ltar so sor skum// rnam shes nyes pa yod pa dran byos la// nyes pa gtsor zhog gdung ba'i chu mas gdungs// sbyin pa'i
154b3(chi): zabs ldan mnga' bar bcad pa'i bka'// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir// khyod kyi ma rig dur sa btsal ba ni// zhe sdang dbang gis chags pa'i skyon spangs kyang //
154b4(chi): gzugs 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i lam ma rnyed// btsal bas rnyed med yon tan rmongs pa'i dur// zhe sdang dbang gis bdag gzhan gnyis su mthong // bdag med bla med thar
154b5(chi): lam ma rnyed de// tsha grang dmyal ba'i gnas su zab pa'i phyir// thar par mi 'gyur zhes te khyod rang nyes// ngan song gsum por khyod kyang mi gtang gis// lus sems gnyis
154b6(chi): 'brol 'di la ma chags shig/ lha dang mgon brtson kun dang dpral ba'i phyir// gu gul nyungs kar mu zi ldong ros dang // sha chen snum chen ga pur dud pa dang // sdig can
154b7(chi): ma gtogs kha 'khor nyon mongs pa// sngon gyi las ngan mi bzang de spyad pas// dus zad tshe 'phos de la ma chags par// sdug bsngal mi bzad nyon mongs shes par
155a1(chi): byos/ khro rgyal mi bzad rgyal po hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i mtshon cha char ltar phab pa yis// rang dbang med par rig pa 'jigs par 'gyur//
155a2(chi): de bas sdig can 'di la ma 'khor bar// ngas smras skyes bu nga yi tshig la nyon// rang gi gnas su tshol bag ldan par byos// de ltar rten dang bral nas kyang // mda'
155a3(chi): 'phen zla ba mar ro la// nag po'i chas su rab zhugs la// sngar shi'i ro gos khrag can la// chas gos bya ba'i rgyu ru shis// nag po'i rgyun chas lnga gon la// byang chub sems
155a4(chi): ni sngon gtang la// drag po'i 'phrin las bdun btud de// de nas lcags kyi gze ma nyid// snga nas don dang 'thun pa ru// mi rta bsad pa'i mtshon rtse la// phur bu sor brgyad
155a5(chi): cig byas la// gong bzhin byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// gzhan yang zur bu rtsa tshogs la// snying po so sor bzlas shing d+hIs// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas 'thun 'phrul bya/
155a6(chi): ming rus gzugs sbal sngags bzlas so// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum gyis// sngags 'di rab tu drag tu bzlas// oM swa rtsa hUM/ ka te pu ra ba te swA hA/ pri nAn+da/ tsa ra
155a7(chi): nan/ he ru me lo/ kung ka ra ri/ swA hA/ he ru srid sU ka s+yA/ mi skye s+ya swA hA/ e ar+ya lig shi ka/ shig he ri hig/ pra ma li shan te sa/ re lig shan/ li shi shi b+h+yo/
155b1(chi): bruM re lig swA hA/ sha shi skyo thum/ sngags de re re btab pas su// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum de// ci ni phyed zlar mi ldog go/ rtse gcig sems kyi rang bzhin no//
155b2(chi): brgyad kyis rnam shes tshogs brgyad dgag/ dbang po yul dus gnyis med don// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su bsgral// byang chub ma bkag yan du khye// don dang mthun
155b3(chi): pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rigs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// skal bar ldan pa'i sems can la// dbang po lnga yi gnas lnga ru// dbang po 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las//
155b4(chi): nyon mongs lnga yi ngo bo la// ye shes lnga yi 'phra bkod pas// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du nub// don gyi 'bras bu thig ler gsal// log rtog rgyu 'bras thal bar rlog/
155b5(chi): chags sdang dngos po gtan nas blangs// gzugs 'dzin gnyis ni 'chor med gzung // phyogs rigs sa mtshams dbyings sa dag/ pho nya mang pos stong gsum bkang //
155b6(chi): ma spos sems su ye nas dgang // 'gugs byed mang po gcig tu dril// 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang du dril// pho nya'i tshogs de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang du// ye
155b7(chi): nas yin don de bzhin du// mya ngan las 'das so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ pho nyas ye shes rnam shes sbyang zhing / bsngags pa bya ba'i thabs
156a1(chi): su bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas/ don chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par/
156a2(chi): sgra yang shin tu nag po mi zad pa'i skur thon nas/ dregs pa'i gnod sbyin gdug pa can drag po'i 'phrin las kyis bsgral la/ phung po 'dod pa'i longs spyod du bsgrub pa'i rtsa
156a3(chi): ba'i byang chub sems kyi sngon du btang ste/ 'di skad ces brjod do// skye med sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rang bzhin med pas bsgral ba'i zhing // mtshon ma med pas bsad
156a4(chi): pa'i rigs// dngos po med pas btub pa'i rtsa// rang bzhin don la bcos med gzhag/ dngos po gzung 'dzin dngos po bsgral// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog raM gyis
156a5(chi): sregs/ gti mug mun khang e yis sbyangs// 'dod chags srid rtsi khaM gyis bkrus// nga rgyal drag po laM gyis gzhig/ phrag dog tshub ma yaM gyis bud// dngos gzhi dug
156a6(chi): gsum rtsa dra nas bcad// gong du bstan pa'i gnas dag tu// rdzas dang gtor ma de bzhin du// phyi mtshams bcad cing las rnams bcol// dkyil 'khor 'dom
156a7(chi): gang gru bzhi la// chag chag gdab cing sa tshon brlab// thig gdab bri zhing tshon phye dge/ dkyil 'khor yum gyi dbyibs 'dra la// dbus su mthing nag gru gsum la//
156b1(chi): mtha' ma zla gam dmar pos bskor// rdo rje brag gis yongs su bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar bas bskor// de yi phyi rim
156b2(chi): thor ba'i mthar// gru chang bzhi dang bar khyams gsum// sgo khyud bzhi dang nag pos bskor// rgyan gyi bye brag tshang bas brgyan// lcags sam gdug pa'i shing rnams
156b3(chi): la/ phur bu tshad dang ldan pa rnams// de bzhin byin gyis brlabs par bya// bdug brdegs byug cing cod pan gdags// b+ha d+ha dum bu gsum po la// yum chen
156b4(chi): rgyal 'debs bzhugs gnas bsham// sprul pa'i phur bu mang po kun// dbus nas dgod cing grwa ru srung // rdzas rnams tshogs nas rims bzhin dgod//
156b5(chi): hUM/ dbus nas dpal chen 'bor ba'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la 'khril// bde chen sangs rgyas
156b6(chi): sku la brgyan// khrag 'thung rol pa thugs las sprul// sprul pa'i 'phra men phyogs bcur 'gyed// phyogs kyi gdon tshogs zhabs kyis gnon// nyon mongs
156b7(chi): gdug pa mkha' la sgrol// drag po'i 'phrin las dus la ba ba// 'bar ba'i gdan la rim pas bzhugs// hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ hUM hUM/ ha ha/
157a1(chi): ha ha tAha ha/ ha ha/ he he/ he he/ he he/ he he/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ de bzhin rdzas kyi ngo bor dgod// chos rnams dag pa'i rang
157a2(chi): bzhin yang // ting 'dzin sbyang phyir rnam gsum sgom// chos rnams ma bcos rang bzhin dang // dmigs med don dam byang chub sems// don dam gnyis med brjod
157a3(chi): las 'das// brjod med spos med chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos dang las ma g.yos kyang // dpag med ye shes chen po ni// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba ltar// rang
157a4(chi): bzhin klong du sa legs la// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dngas pa las// yon tan khyad par snang ba ltar// nam mkha'i dkyil nas shigs pa shar// sems kyi rang bzhin hUM
157a5(chi): du bsgom// e karma rarAk+Sha ta baM keng ha raM/ b+h+yAM kha ta li sbyo/ b+h+yAM a mA hri/ dza ti ra b+haM/ hUM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ sarba big nan baM hUM/ ti ba ta tsakra/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/
157a6(chi): oM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje rlung nag rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang // sha chen sa gzhi keng rus ri rab steng // 'byung chen lnga las grub pa'i gzhal
157a7(chi): yas ni/ dbyings dang mtshan nyid so sor ma 'dres kyang // ye nas ma bcos yum chen lnga yi dang // brjod med spros bral 'khor lo rgyas 'debs klong // mkha' mnyam
157b1(chi): rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu khyab// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// phyogs bcu'i rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med
157b2(chi): kun tu snang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// zhing chen bcal bkram rmad du byas// b+han d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// mnam lcags gser 'dab rgyan rnams
157b3(chi): / rdzogs// gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gru bzhi rgyas pa ste// 'od zer dmar sdug stong khams gang // 'bar ba'i dkyil
157b4(chi): 'khor chen po ru// ma hA de ba sde bsnol kha// dri za grul bum klu gdon dang // gnod sbyin la sogs phyogs skyong bcu// 'jigs byed gdan du sne bsnol la// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM/
157b5(chi): ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM/ kA bya b+hu hUM phaT/ badz+ra mu ka ra he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT+Ta/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ti la se kaM hUM phaT/ badz+ra bya kri mu ke he/ badz+ra kro d+harmA
157b6(chi): ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni la nan+t+ra hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tra ti dA hUM phaT/ badz+ra tsa sa ra mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya man+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa ba tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ti sta na pa Ni
157b7(chi): hUM phaTabadz+ra swa ri mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ti mu ha la he hUM phaT/ badz+ra bya ki mu ka he/ badz+ra ba ti la mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya r+tha
158a1(chi): / ba hUMhu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i ti dza ya ti hUM phaT/ badz+ra dza la mu ka he/ badz+ra pa sha mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi ta hUM/ sti ta sti ta hUM phaT/
158a2(chi): oM badz+ra kro ti kA ya ya ti hUM phaT/ badz+ra sho na mu ka he/ badz+ra tsan+da la mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha amr-i ta da li hUM/ tshin+ta tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi bi ya be hU~M phaT/ badz+ra si nga mra
158a3(chi): kha he.oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ra gnya' ni hUM phaT/ badz+ra ta sha mu kA he/ badz+ra nA ku la mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la hUM/ s+pho ta
158a4(chi): s+pho ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tsu na te hUM phaT/ badz+ra shri ri ki mu ka he/ oM badz+ra sing ka mu ka he/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ oM AHhUM/ srog gi go ru shar ba dang // snying gi
158a5(chi): dkyil du bsgom par bya'o// 'bra gsum ngo bos byin brlabs la// ye shes lnga yis dbang ba skar ro// oM badz+ra pa sha de hUM phaT/ badz+ra ba ra be hUM phaT/ badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM phaT/
158a6(chi): badz+ra ma ra na hUM phaT/ dbang bskur byin brlabs de bzhin no// ma bcos gdod nas dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// ma g.yos rang bzhin gsal ba'i ye shes shar// gnyis med/
158a7(chi): khyad par che bas sku ru bstan// dus gsum skye shi med pas rdo rje de// dus gsum 'dus ma byas shing skye shi med// de nyid spros med 'khor lo rgyas 'debs klong // gnyis
158b1(chi): med byang chub sems kyi sa bon la// bsgril ma hUM gi 'od zer tshogs bcas nas// yum gyi mkha' la spro zhing 'dus pa las// phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur cing hUM brjod pas/
158b2(chi): sku gsung thugs kyi khro bos phyogs mtshams gang // yab yum sprul par byas te de bzhin te// hUM chen dbu ga sum dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal// rdo rje tho ba mda' gzhu spu gri
158b3(chi): bsnams// rnam rgyal dbu gsum sngo ser dkar ba'i zhal// rdo rje tri shul dung chen 'khor lo bsnams// dbyug sngon dbu gsum ljang dmar sngo ba'i zhal// rdo rje dbyug tau
158b4(chi): rin chen sti ra bsnams// gshin rje dbu gsum ljang nag sngo ba'i zhal// thod dbyug 'khor lo rdo rje stir bsnams// mi g.yo dbu gsum ldang sngo sdug pa'i zhal// rdo rje
158b5(chi): zhags pa gshol dang gtun shing bsnams// rta mgrin dbu gsum dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// sbrul zhags rdo rje spu gri sti ra bsnams// gzhan gyi mi thub dmar ljang ser ba'i zhal//
158b6(chi): rdo rje sti ra ban d+ha rdul yab bsnams// bdud rtsi dbu gsum dkar sngo sdug pa'i zhal// rdo rje rgya gram dbyug to spu gri bsnams// khams gsum rnam rgyal dbu gsum dkar sngo
158b7(chi): ljang dang ser ba'i zhal// rdo rje mnga' gzhu rung dmar sta ri bsnams// stobs chen dung ka rabu gsum dmar nag dud ka'i zhal// rdo rje zhags pa gshol dang gtun shing
159a1(chi): bsnams// sgra 'byin mnga' bsnyems rdo rje sder mo gsum// dur khrod gtun khung rdo rje gtum mo drug/ mnga' bsnyems rlung 'byin rdo rje gsod byed
159a2(chi): dgu bskyod chen la sogs rgyan rnams de bzhin te// zhal mdog de bzhin g.yas na dril bu bsnams// g.yon gyi de bzhin dung chen slob par mdzad// bag dang smig bu
159a3(chi): stag dang bya rgod dang // g.yag dang bya rog sha ba 'ug pa dang // gzig dang khwa dang byi la bu shud dang // spyang mo khwa dang seng ge pha wang dang // dred dang sre mo dom dang byi bar
159a4(chi): bcas/ rgyan dang mdog ni yab kyi ngo bo ste// phyag mtshan yab kyis nyid kyi rtags su ster// sprul pa'i don gyis rtags kyi ngo bor bsnams// gtso bo'i thugs kyis ye shes
159a5(chi): rnam bzhi yis// ma rig rmongs pas bcings pa'i sems can rnams// don dam gnyis med dang du bsgrub pa dang // skye shi rtsa gcod phyir na hUM ka ra// 'khor lo rgyas
159a6(chi): 'debs rang bzhin 'dus ma byas// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin las// gnyis med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// skye shi med pa'i don 'byin sgra 'byin ma//
159a7(chi): bskyed pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab bskyed pas mtha' gnyis spangs// de phyir hUM
159b1(chi): mdzad kA bya ti// hUM chen ya ba yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// sprul pa yang sprul tshogs bcas de bzhin no// lhag mthong ye shes chos dbyings rlan gyis rgyal//
159b2(chi): thugs rje smon lam 'khor bar mthar gtug rmongs// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang rme med par rol// de phyir mos byed 'phra men mu ka ra he// 'jug par rang dbang med
159b3(chi): par gnyid log nas// bsam dang mi mthun log lha mos byed dang // bstan pa'i chos sgrogs lo lha mos byed pa// thams cad myos byed 'phra men k+Sha mu ka he// khro rgyal
159b4(chi): ye shes me long lta bu yis// chos rnams rang bzhin med par ye nas rtogs// mtha' gnyis ma spangs rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs// de dag don las rgyal bas rnam par
159b5(chi): / rgyal/ ye shes thugs rjes zin pas bsam mi khyab// thugs rjes ye shes zin pas srid las 'das// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar snang / 'dod pa'i rgyal
159b6(chi): po mnyes byed la se ke/ sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod lngas 'das pa// yal bar mi gtong brtson 'grus shugs kyis gtum// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba
159b7(chi): mthar thug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed spyang ki ma// yid g.yo las can sems kyi 'gyur ba ni// ye shes dbang gis 'gro la thugs rjes g.yos// don mdzad
160a1(chi): / ye shes 'od 'byung dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir khrims ldan mo'i kri ta ma// khro ba dag thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// 'khor ba'i bag chags nye 'brel
160a2(chi): chen po 'joms par byed// nga rgyal dregs pas zhen pas nan mongs des// 'gyur med dang las g.yos pa med pas na// de phyir ye shes dbyed med dbyug skyon can// rig pa'i rje
160a3(chi): chen chos kyi dbyings nyid zin// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'khor bar mi gtong zhing // shes rab thabs ldan lcags kyus 'dzin par byed// gtso bo dbyung sngon mnyes mdzad tra ti byA/
160a4(chi): sngasdang mig thugs rjes mi 'gyur zhe la gnon// mthu rtsal rngam brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung 'joms// 'tshams la ral gsig gdang sgras 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir 'gyur ming
160a5(chi): 'phra men rtsa sa ra// bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni// dbyings nyid mnyam pas ye shes mkhyen pas za// thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba'i bag chags za// de phyir/
160a6(chi): za byed tra ti mu ka he// khro ba dag ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyal po yis// 'chi bdag bdud 'joms gshin rje tshar gcod cing // de yi rang bzhin de nyid yin pa'i phyir// de phyir
160a7(chi): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje khrod 'gyur zhing // sprul pas 'gro sgrol sku dang ye shes 'byung // shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa ste//
160b1(chi): khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes mdzad stan ma// rtogs pa'i sgra spangs dran pa'i dgongs pa'i gnas// 'khrul skyon rdzi ma shes bzhin rdzis tshor yang // 'gro don dus la bab na
160b2(chi): thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug byed ha ri mu ka he// dmigs pa sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs 'grangs pas nyin mo la// 'gro ljongs rmongs
160b3(chi): la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldang // ye shes thugs rjes 'grangs pa'i hu lu ka/ khro ba dag thugs kyi ye shes mtha' mi g.yo// de yi rang bzhin gang yin dbyer med pas// dngos por
160b4(chi): ma 'phros rang bzhin don gyis mkhyen// kun la khyab pa'i phyir na mi g.yo mgon// mtshan ma thabs kyi tho bas dbyings su sdud// thugs rjes sems can 'phrin las mtshan la
160b5(chi): 'joms// rmongs pas ye shes snying rjes mi gtong bas// mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la// chos dbyings gnas la rtogs pa'i skyon med cing // thugs rje'i sprul
160b6(chi): pa bsam mi khyab// dug gsum zad phyir sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad bya kri ma// gnag pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin bsgyur// mnyam
160b7(chi): nyid mthu rtsa la dbyings la mi g.yo bas// rtogs pa'i spyod yul bral bas ma mthong ste// de phyir 'phra men mgyogs byed pe ta la// khro ba dag rnam par mi rtog ye shes
161a1(chi): kyis/ de nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos thams cad// de yi rang bzhin ma 'dres par 'dus pas//
161a2(chi): de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin dpal// rdo rje gtum mos mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes rngam tshul srid pa thal bar klog/ de nyid mi rtog mtha' bral dbu mar
161a3(chi): sdigs/ ha ya gr-i ba mnyes mdzad dza yA ti// yang bag zon can 'gro don thabs dang ldan// mi 'dul zil thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus las mi 'da'
161a4(chi): brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i dza la ma ka he// las 'bras bden la yid ches dang pa'i 'gyur// mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes
161a5(chi): thugs kyis mgyogs// zhi gnas don gyis lhag mthong gtso gtsigs chung // de phyir mgyogs byed 'phra men pa shi mu ka/ khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes tshad med pas//
161a6(chi): dbyings kyi don la mtshan mas yong mi thub// thugs rjes 'gro don rnam par mdzad pa la// bdud dang srin pos shin tu thub dka' ste// rang bzhin gang yin gzhan gyis mi
161a7(chi): thub pa'o// 'phra bas dbyings nyid 'bigs pa'i ye shes mkhyen// dbyings la ye shes rtag tu thugs rjes rdeg/ ma rmongs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa// gzhan gyis mi thub
161b1(chi): mnyes mdzad krA ya ti// dbyings la ye shes zhugs pas shes bya za// dbyings nyid shes pa zhugs pas nyon mongs za// gnyis med ye shes thugs rjes 'khor ba za//
161b2(chi): de phyir za byed sho na mu ka he// ye shes thugs rjes chos kyi dbyings la 'dzin// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings la mnyam 'gyur 'dzin// zhi gnas che bas 'dzin pas mi 'phrog
161b3(chi): te/ de phyir 'dzin pa'i 'phra men tsan d+ha mu ka ma// khro ba dag thugs kyi ye shes ye nas grub// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes chos dbyings su// 'khor ba'i chos can bdud dang
161b4(chi): 'dra ba la// ye shes thugs rje sman gyi rtsi gtong zhing / ye shes kun la khyab pa'i dbyings su 'khyil// de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po bdud
161b5(chi): rtsi 'khyil// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings rtogs rig pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rigs shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra// de la bstan pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsi 'khyin/
161b6(chi): ba mnyes mdzad pa ya be// rigs btsun mnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// 'phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// stong nyid sgra sgrogs mu stegs wa
161b7(chi): tshogs 'joms// de phyir rtsal 'joms pa'i si ta ma// 'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par 'gyur// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam nyid ma brjed dran// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag
162a1(chi): lhag mthong so sor gsal// de phyir sgra yi 'phra men ti ti la// khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// dus gsum mi 'gyur sems kyi rang
162a2(chi): bzhin ni// gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su rab rtogs pas// khams gsum mya ngan 'das pa'i ngang du rgyal// de phyir khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bstan/
162a3(chi): bdag tu lta ba'i mtshan ma kun 'joms shing // za byed mche bas skye shi rtsad nas gcod// skye dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pas// khams gsum rnam rgyal mnyes mdzad
162a4(chi): sti ra ma// dbyings las ye shes shar cing thugs rje rmi// lcing nag chen pos drag po'i skur ston pa// thugs rje'i mnga' ba dag mgyogs ma dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed
162a5(chi): 'phra men ta sha mu// chos rnams byed pa med par bsgyur bar ni// mnyam dang mi mthun log lha mos byed cing // rig pa bskyed phyir sems nyid the tsom gcod// de phyir gsod
162a6(chi): byed 'phra men na ku la// khro ba dag thugs kyi ye shes rnam par dag/ thams cad dbyer med dbyings kyi ngang du stabs// mtha' gnyis zil gyis gnon pas brjod du med// gnyis
162a7(chi): med don gyi ngo bo stobs po che// thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis med chos dbul dbu ma'i
162b1(chi): dgyes pa ston// ma hA ba la mnyes mdzad tsun d+he hUM// lhag mthong ye shes stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tsham ngam ral gsigs gdung sgras stong gsum 'gengs//
162b2(chi): las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan// de phyir stobs ldan 'phra men ri shi ka/ gsum dang bcas pas rig par gyur pa ni// 'phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad kyang //
162b3(chi): phyag rgya bzhi ni ma skyes dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir 'phrog byed chen po so ka mu// 'khor ba rdo rjes bskyod pas mya ngan 'das// brjod med brjod bral don gyi tshogs dang ldan//
162b4(chi): de phyir brjod med badz+ra paka sha ta// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa sreg/ phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud
162b5(chi): 'joms// de phyir don la brjod med be ra ba// 'chi med bdud rtsi lus sems skye 'gag med// de nyid don rtogs ye shes thugs rje 'byung // gnyis med bdud rtsis 'gro ba'i
162b6(chi): sdug bsngal sel// de phyir rtsi mchog ye shes a mr-i ta// ye shes spros med yon tan rgya mtshor 'grub// thugs rjes 'phrog cing 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes
162b7(chi): thugs rjes mnyam nyid dbyings su sdud// de phyir 'phra man rlan byed ma ra na// cho ga rnam gsum las kyi 'phro 'du las// sku bskyed gsol gdab byin brlabs dbang bskur bya//
163a1(chi): don gyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi rgyan du bstan// snang srid don gyi nga du rab gnas pas// snang sbrid las kyi dkyil 'khor ba dag gis bskyed
163a2(chi): ces brjod pas/ ji ltar snang zhing srid pa thams cad dpal khrag 'thung gi rang bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing / che ba'i yon
163a3(chi): tan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ las kyi dkyil 'khor du bdug bya ba'i phyir/ drag po'i 'khor 'phrin
163a4(chi): las su bdag bya zhing / dngos grub nod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhis 'gro ba ma rig pa'i don du/ drag po gtum po'i 'phrin las kyi don du ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs nas/
163a5(chi): 'di skad ces brjod do// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rjer grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs
163a6(chi): rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mo bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/
163a7(chi): yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag gyur cig/ phyag rgya chen por bdag skyed cig/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba la// thabs kyi gcod pas 'gro don du/
163b1(chi): byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsol cig/ srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa kun// thugs
163b2(chi): kyi ye shes phur bu yis// khams gsum gdar sha bcad pa dang // srid pa sbur bur bsgrubs pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ma bcos thig le chos
163b3(chi): dbyings las// 'gyur med sku cig gnas pa de// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs gdug pa sprul pa'i phyir/
163b4(chi): ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen gyis// 'phro 'du las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rtags dang mtshan ma
163b5(chi): bstan pa dang // nyon mongs phung po bsgral ba dang // rnam shes hUM ru gdon pa'i phyir// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// gnod
163b6(chi): gdug rnam gnyis bsgral ba'i phyir// gong gi pho nya mang po des// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// gang dmigs gnas nas dgug par bsam// dpal chen
163b7(chi): kI la ya'i spyan snga ru// rnal 'byor kun gyi las bya'o// khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bag// phyag
164a1(chi): brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// mthu rtsa la 'byung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung
164a2(chi): 'chab cing // gnyis med don du bsgrub pa ni// rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang ni// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/
164a3(chi): khro bo pho nya'i byin rlabs las// lcags kyi gzer rgod skar ltar 'khrug/ sprul pa'i phyag brnyan glog bzhin 'gyur// ma mo mkha' 'gro khra ltar 'dzum// khro bo mang po
164a4(chi): thog ltar 'bebs// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug ltar ldir// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba
164a5(chi): dang / lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang // rnam shes hUM bu rab bskyed cing // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du las// gnas
164a6(chi): nas khug la zil gyis gnon// oM laM hUM laM/ stam pa nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ ba ga ba na/ shi kri big kri/ shri badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyis bkug pa
164a7(chi): de/ ri rab 'og tu zil gyis gnon// ming dang mtshan ma ra bcas pa de// khrag 'thung yab yum zhal du bstab// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las//
164b1(chi): hUM chen po dang sras mchog bskyed// de yi ri rab sbyinas mnan// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bya// badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM/ badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ phyag rgya chen po rnam bzhi
164b2(chi): yis/ dgug cing bcings la dam du bsdam// sems ma 'khrugs par dbang du bsdu// hUM gis bsdus la phaT kyis gtor// hUM ka ra dang kI la ya// dkyil 'khor
164b3(chi): gnyis kyis dbang bsdus la// chos nyid a yi nang du sbyar// dzaHhUM baM ho sarba big nan/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra hUM hUM ka ra hUM AM/ khro bo'i tshogs kyi dkyil
164b4(chi): 'khor der// phaT kyis spros la dgra la bstim// gzi bkran dbang rnams mngon du dbrog/ tsar gyis phyung ste a la bsdu// bdag nyid thugs kar dbang bskur bas//
164b5(chi): / skye med tshe yi dngos grub thob// phaT a/ de ni ting 'dzin phaT pa ste// rtse gcig ma yengs 'grus kyis gdab// ting 'dzin lta bas ma khrol na// dngos su bsgral bas
164b6(chi): don mi 'grub// ron gyi 'bras bu ngan song rgyu// don nyid gnyis med dbyings su bsgral// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// ces brjod pas 'jigs byed khro
164b7(chi): bo'i tshogs kyis/ thams cad dmigs su med par mya ngan las bsgral lo// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bdag nyid chen po'i nga rgyal bskyed dbang nod pa dang /
165a1(chi): ting 'dzin gyi phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po'i 'phrin las kyis/ dmigs
165a2(chi): pa'i dgra de mngon sum du bsgral ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa'i gzugs la/ pho nyas dbang po mngon sum dus/ gzugs la bsdu ba 'di skad brjod do// skal ngan las kyis mnar ba des// /
165a3(chi): rnal 'byor don la bar gcod byas// gnyis med bsgral bas mi 'dul bas// mngon spyod sbal ba'i las byas na// gong gi gzugs la ming rus bri// gshin rje'i phyogs su las
165a4(chi): rnams bya// khru gang brkos la rgya sol gdab// thod gang brkos la thod pa mda' gzhu zhags pa dang // rtsang dang dug rdzas tshang bar bskor// ma nyes zhal che kun la bcol//
165a5(chi): bsnyen pa rdzogs nas las 'di byas so// bdag nyid dbang gi rgyan gyis brgyan// dam can sten nas pho nya 'gyed// gzugs la bsdu ba'i las byung na// dam tshig chen po'i rus la
165a6(chi): bab// rnal 'byor 'don gyi dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// pho nya phyag brnyan tshogs bcas kyis// zung
165a7(chi): zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir ba gyis// las kyi pho nya mang po kun//
165b1(chi): gzugs la bsdu ba'i las byung gis// sngon chad dam bcas ji bzhin du// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// rnam shes dbang po'i
165b2(chi): gzugs la bsdu// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu phyag rgya bzhi bcas la// bsdu ba'i snying po 'di brjod do// dbang po mngon sum mthong bar bsam/
165b3(chi): shri krin a na ya hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ra ya ra na/ ha ta na hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ a be sha ya a be sha ya hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/
165b4(chi): ces brjod pas/ khrag 'thung khro bo'i tshogs kyis// nyon mongs pa'i sems gzugs la bsdus pas bdag gi dbang po mngon sum du mthong ba// rnam par shes pa'i
165b5(chi): sems mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir ro// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gzugs rnam shes dbab cing bsdu ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
165b6(chi): / de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas/ de dag drag po'i sngags dang khro bo'i tshogs kyi phur pas gdab cing bsgral ba'i phyir// sdang ba zhe la bzhag nas thugs rjes nyon
165b7(chi): mongs pa'i zhe sdang gting nas g.yos nas/ shin tu gdug pa'i nga ro dang gdangs spras drag po'i 'phrin las kyi gtum tshig tu 'di skad brjod do// hUM drag po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
166a1(chi): du gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bo las// pho nya phyag brnyan tshogs bcas kyis// rnam shes gzugs la bsdus pa des// nyon mongs 'bras bu 'phel
166a2(chi): byed pas// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i skal med kyang // dmigs kyis mngon sum bsgral bar bya'o// mthing nagacod par thar pa la// khro bo'i tshogs su de bzhin te// bdug
166a3(chi): brdeg byugs la brlab cing skur// klad pa la lan gsum sku gsung thugs// khams gsum phur pas de bzhin bsgral// dang po pho nya'i phur pas gdab// de nas sngags
166a4(chi): dang ting nge 'dzin// thabs dang dgos ched lnga ru'o// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po de bzhin te// khro bo bdag
166a5(chi): yab yum hUM ka ra// dgra 'byin ma ste yab yum bzhis// dran pa'i gnas su rims kyis phaT/ shin tu mi bzad hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kyis//
166a6(chi): dngos su btab pas zhig par bsam// don gyis btab pas mkha' la gton// yul gyi gser zhun lta bu'i sems// hUM gis bsdus la bdag la bstim// lus
166a7(chi): ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// dus gsum 'gyur med tshe'i dngos// che ba'i yon tan mthar phyin bsam// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang thob pas// don nyid kyis
166b1(chi): kyang thebs par bsam// dran pa'i gzhi la nges btab pas// nyon mongs rtsa thag des chod nas// sems nyid ye shes chen por bskyed// dbang po lnga la nges btab
166b2(chi): pas/ dran pa nyams nas dbang po phrogs// rnam shes mi gnas gnas su bsgral// don dam gnyis med mkha' la bsgral// bskyod cing 'phrin las dran por ro//
