199a5(chi): dri med rin chen char 'bab rgyun mi gcod// ho sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra oM hUM phaT/ e a tsan+d+ra au/ a nu ra ga ya mi/ zhes gsungs te/ mkha' gsang byin gyis
199a6(chi): brlabs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i glu dang gar gyis rlabs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i glu dang gar gyis stegs pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / rol pa mdzad do// /
199a7(chi): / de ltar rol pa'i thabs mchog yab kyis byang chub sems la/ chags pa gsum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyis bskul ba'i sgra 'di skad bsgrags so// a ho/ chags pa
199b1(chi): chen po dbab pa'i byang chub sems// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyi rtsa gzhi'i mchog/ dri med skyon bral pad+ma'i 'od zer las// mu tig dri med bsil ba'i 'od zer
199b2(chi): spros/ ho yang thabs mchog yab kyis byang chub sems kyis/ chags pa gsum gyi byang chub sems la bskul ba'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad bsgrags so// a ho/
199b3(chi): gsal zhing dag pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// skyon gyis ma gos rnam dag byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid de// bsil ba'i 'od zer pad+ma'i
199b4(chi): gnas su spro// ho na maHsarba ta thA gA ta ma hA bo d+hi tsat+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hai zhes spro zhing bskul lo// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/
199b5(chi): byang chub sems 'phro 'du'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde mchog bde ba yi// byang chub sems ni rab spros pas/ sangs rgyas kun
199b6(chi): gyi thugs bskul zhing // 'gro ba kun gyi rgyud sbyangs te// slar bsdus dbyings su thim pa las// byang chub sems kyi thig ler gsal// thig le 'od kyi rang bzhin las//
199b7(chi): byang chub sems kyis kun la khyab// bo d+hi tsit+ta sarba maN+Da la/ zhes gsungs te/ de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad yab yum lhag pa'i byang
200a1(chi): chub sems kyi thig ler gnas so// de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ 'phro 'du dang 'ju 'dul gyi ting nge 'dzin
200a2(chi): la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam par spros pa 'di gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems las yi ge rnam par spros pa/ ta tha da d+ha na/
200a3(chi): Ta tra Da D+ha Na/ ka kha ga g+ha dza/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha shwa sa ha k+Sha a/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad
200a4(chi): kyis/ ta yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// 'phros pas gsung bskul ngag rgyud dag/ bsdus pas chos kyi phyag rgya'i don// zhes gsungs te/ chos thams cad byang
200a5(chi): chub sems kyi yig 'brur mkhyen pas mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas yang yi ge las kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur par mdzad de// badz+ra/
200a6(chi): tsa kra rat+na/ pad+ma/ khang+ga/ badz+ra ga N+ya/ tsa kra gaN+Tha/ rat+na gaN+Tha/ pad+ma ga NA/ khang+ga ga NA/ ut+pa la pu Sh+Ta/ nA ga br-ik+Sha/ rat+na sa ma ti/ tIk+ShA khang+ga/ pad+mA da ra/ badz+ra
200a7(chi): raM ba d+harma tsakra/ rat+na bu ba ti/ dz+nyA na mu tra/ rat+na mA li/ dar me gI ta/ ni ra ti ho pha/ d+hA pa me ga sa/ pus pa mye tra/ su ga ram ba/ gan+d+he bi b+ha ga d+ha/ sa ga mu tra na d+harma e
200b1(chi): baM/ badz+ra ka b+ha ga dza/ rat+na ko Sha ya/ badz+ra raM ba khaM baM ba ti/ dz+nyA na badz+ra/ dam ma ga na d+ha d+hi/ ka pA pa ni rag da/ badz+ra tri tra/ nA ga ra ga ta/ badz+ra kar+m+ma/ badz+ra aM ku shra dza/
200b2(chi): hUM pA sha hUM/ baM s+pho Ta baM/ ho gar+b+ha ho/ rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang // rin chen pad+ma rgya gram ste// shes rab don ston dril bu lnga// ut+pa la dang ni klu shing dang // rin chen
200b3(chi): myu gu ral gri ste// pad+ma dkar dang rdo rje dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes me long rin chen 'phreng // chos kyi bi baM gar mchog ste// bdug pa'i
200b4(chi): mchog dang me tog 'phreng // mar me dang ni byug pa ste// gseg shang dang ni pi wa nga dang // go cha dang ni po ti dang // rin chen sgrom dang me chur bstan// thabs mchog rdo rje
200b5(chi): radang ni shes rab dril bu bstan// thod pa nor 'go gdengs pa dang // rdo rje dang ni sbrul chen dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang /
200b6(chi): lcags sgrogs dril bu la sogs pa'o// e ma'o bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// rtogs par dka' ba'i snying po'i don// bde gshegs thugs bskul 'gro ba'i
200b7(chi): shes pa bkrol// dam tshig thugs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ chos thams cad phyag rgya'i ngang du mkhyen to// de nas yang gsang
201a1(chi): ba mchog gi bdag pos sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'khor
201a2(chi): lo sgyur// rin chen ma dang pad+mo 'chang // sna tshogs las la sogs pa rnams// spyan snga nyid dang phyogs bzhi bzhugs// bzang mo spyan dang ma ma na bza' sgrol//
201a3(chi): rang rang gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul// sa yi snying po dang ni nam mkha'i snying // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug na rdo rje dang // byams pa me tI sgrib pa rnam par sel// kun
201a4(chi): tu bzang po 'jam dpal bzhon nu rnams// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo dag la 'god// lA s+ya mA le gI ti ni ra ti dang // d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ki/ gan+d+he ma la sogs pa rnams//
201a5(chi): rang rang sems dpa' dag la 'khril// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// brgya byin dang ni theg bzangs ris// shAkya thubA pa shAkya seng
201a6(chi): ge dang / ga shin rje rgyal dang kha 'bar ma// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dag la 'khod// gshin rje gshed dang stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi// phyogs
201a7(chi): kyi sgo bzhi dag la'o// rta gdong phag gdong sbrul gdong seng gdong rnams// rang rang khro bo dag la 'khril// mthing kha dkar dang ser le brgan// ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs
201b1(chi): mdog mnyen lkugs 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs
201b2(chi): pa'i 'od// sku mdog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// e mra ba de gshegs kun gyi sku// sangs rgyas sku mnyes lus kyi nyes pa dag/ mtshan gyi sku la dpe byad
201b3(chi): 'bru chags te// sku mchog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sku gsung thugs phyag rgya'i dkyil
201b4(chi): 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ de ltar bstan
201b5(chi): pa'i dkyil 'khor de// 'byung khungs dngos gzhi las dang yon tan+da gang // bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
201b6(chi): stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// chos kun nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // me long ye shes dang la thugs mchog tshul 'dzin cing // bde ba'i ye shes lnga
201b7(chi): don thugs chud pas// rnam shes bag chags sbyong mdzad rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyid sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // stong pa'i rang las sku mchog tshul
202a1(chi): 'dzin cing // bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// gzugs kyi mtshan ma sbyong mdzad 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang
202a2(chi): las ma g.yos kyang // mnyam nyid ye shes dang las yon tan tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen dbyig ltar kun gyi ra ba skong // tshor ba gnas su dag mdzad rin chen 'dzin pa'i
202a3(chi): sku/ chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes ngang las pad+ma 'chang ba'i sku// 'dam skyes pad ltar nyon mongs skyon ma gos//
202a4(chi): 'du shes gnas su dag pa pad+mo 'chang ba'i sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / bya ba nan tan ye shes dang las rgya gram 'dzin pa'i sku// bdag dang gzhan
202a5(chi): gyi 'phrin las don mdzad dpal// 'du byed gnas su dag pa'i sna tshogs 'chang ba'i sku// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // nam mkha'i spyan gyis sku mchog
202a6(chi): shes rab tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i byin rlabs sdud mdzad de// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i dbyings// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //
202a7(chi): sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku mchog bsam gtan tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i byin rlabs bskyed mdzad de// sa yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas spyan// skye med chos kyi
202b1(chi): dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mA ma ki yi sku mchog sbyin pa'i tshul// nyon mongs tha ba rlan gyis spangs par mdzad// chu yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur mA ma ki/ skye med
202b2(chi): chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // na bza' dkar gyi sku mchog bzod pa'i tshul// nyon mongs bag chags thams cad sred mdzad ma// me yi 'byung ba gnas
202b3(chi): 'gyur na bza' dkar// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // dam tshig sgrol ma'i sku mchog brtson 'grus tshul// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags 'thor
202b4(chi): mdzad ma// rlung gi 'byung ba dbang gyur dam tshig sgrol// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku sa yi snying po sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bla med
202b5(chi): byang chub 'bras bu smin mdzad de// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur sa yi snying po kun// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku nam mkha'i snying pos sems
202b6(chi): dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i dra ba gcod mdzad de// yid kyi rnam shes gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i snying po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// /
202b7(chi): gzugs sku spyan ras gzigs kyi sku mchog sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa// 'khor ba'i bag chags skyon gyis ma gos te// nyon mongs yid shes gnas 'gyur spyan ras
203a1(chi): gzigs dbang sku// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku phyag na rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// mtha'
203a2(chi): gnyis nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms mdzad pa// lus kyi rnam shes gnas 'gyur phyag na rdo rje'i sku// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku byams
203a3(chi): ba mai tri sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// che ba'i yon tan ma lus sku la rdzogs// mig gi rnam shes gnas 'gyur byams pa me tI'i sku// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don
203a4(chi): rtogs te// gzugs sku sgrib pa rnam sel sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'gro ba rnams la gsung gi chos kyang ston// rna ba'i rnam shes gnas 'gyur sgrib pa rnam sel
203a5(chi): sku/ ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku kun tu bzang po sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bla med byang chub 'bras bu smin mdzad de// sna yi rnam
203a6(chi): shes gnas 'gyur kun tu bzang po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyis chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku 'jam dpal gzhon nu sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// nyon mongs
203a7(chi): bag chags tha ba 'joms par byed// lce yi rnam shes gnas 'gyur 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo la
203b1(chi): s+ya sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// skye med chos kyi dbyings la mnga' brnyes te// kun gzhi yul la snang ba gnas 'gyur lA s+yA ma// skye med chos dbyings don dang thugs
203b2(chi): chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo mA l-i sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// chos nyid rig pa nyid la gsal mdzad de// yid kyi yul du gnas 'gyur mA le ma// skye med chos
203b3(chi): dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo gI ti sems ma'i tshul du bstan// rnam drag grol la gsung gi sgra sgrogs ma// nyon mongs yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur/
203b4(chi): gI ti mA// skye med chos dbyings don dang thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo ni ra ti sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// dmigs med bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad de//
203b5(chi): lus kyi yul du snang 'gyur ni ra ti ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo d+hU pe sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// gsal ba'i rig pas bde
203b6(chi): gshegs tshogs rnams tshim par byed// mig gi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur d+hU pe ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs skra lha mo puSh+pe sems
203b7(chi): ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// mkhyen pa'i rig pas dus gsum sangs rgyas mnyes// rna ba'i yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur puSh+pe ma// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud
204a1(chi): nas/ gzugs sku lha mo A lo ki ste sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba'i ma rik+ka mun pa sel bar mdzad// sna yi yul du snang ba gnas
204a2(chi): 'gyur A lo ki/ skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo gan d+he sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// bag chags nyon mongs sgrib pa dag mdzad de/
204a3(chi): lce yi yul dang snang ba gnas 'gyur gaun+te ma// ye shes thugs kyis chos dbyings don rtogs te// gzugs sku kun tu bzang po phyag rgya'i tshul 'dzin pa// 'khor ba'i gnas
204a4(chi): 'dren pa de gshegs kun bskyed yab// byed pa po ni gnas 'gyur kun bzangs bdag nyid yab// chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med kyang // gzugs sku 'gro ba'i
204a5(chi): don du yum gyi tshul 'dzin ma// 'das dang da ltar ma byon kun bskyed yum// bya ba mo ni gnas 'gyur kun bzang bdag nyid yum// spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos
204a6(chi): kyang / sprul sku brgya byin thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// brtson 'grus chos ston 'phang lhung sel bar mdzad// le lo gnas 'gyur lha yi thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i
204a7(chi): don las mi g.yos kyang // sprul sku thag bzangs rigs te thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// yon tan tshul khrims chos ston 'thab rtsod rnam par sel// nga rgyal gnas 'gyur/
204b1(chi): lha min thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // sprul sku shAkya thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// bsam gtan chos ston brel 'phongs sdug bsngal sel/
204b2(chi): 'dod chags gnas 'gyur mi yi thub pa mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // sprul sku drang srong shAkya seng ge thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// shes rab chos
204b3(chi): ston gti mug sdug bsngal sel// gti mug gnas 'gyur byol song thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // sprul skya rakra glang mgo thub pa'i
204b4(chi): tshul 'dzin pa// bsad pa'i chos sgron mi bzad sdug bsngal sel// zhe sdang gnas 'gyur dmyal ba'i thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang //
204b5(chi): sprul sku ded dpon kha 'bar thub pa'i tshul// sbyin pa'i chos ston bkres skom sdug bsngal sel// ser sna gnas 'gyur yi dgas thub pa'i mchog/ thugs rjes
204b6(chi): zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i sku mchog gshin rje gshed du bstan// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i thabs kyis 'dul mdzad cing // reg pa gnas 'gyur
204b7(chi): gshin rje gshed po'i sku// thugs nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i sku mchog stobs po che ru bstan// gdos bcas phung po'i bdud rnams
205a1(chi): 'joms par mdzad// reg bya gnas 'gyur stobs po che yi sku// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i sku
205a2(chi): mchog rta mchog dpal du bstan// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs bdud dpung rlag par byed// reg byed gnas 'gyur rta mchog dpal gyi sku ru bstan// thugs mchog zhi ba'i
205a3(chi): dang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i sku mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bstan// lha bdud chen po'i tshogs ni 'joms mdzad pa// reg shes gnas 'gyur bdud
205a4(chi): rtsi 'khyil ba'i sku// mtshan ma med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma med pa'i sku mchog snying rje'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba'i sems can bla med gnas su
205a5(chi): 'dren mdzad ma// rtag pa gnas 'gyur rta gra dong ma yi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma med pa'i sku mchog byams ma'i tshul 'dzin
205a6(chi): ma 'khor ba'i bag chags ma lus 'ching bar mdzad// chad pa gnas 'gyur lha mo phag gdong ma yi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //
205a7(chi): mtshan ma'i sku mchog dga' ba'i tshul 'dzin ma// sdig pa mi dge las rnams 'joms mdzad ma// bdag tu 'dzin pa gnas 'gyur lha mo nyi zla spyan gyi sku//
205b1(chi): mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i sku mchog btang snyoms tshul 'dzin ma// gsung snyan bde gshegs dgyes pa dgyes mdzad ma// mtshan mar
205b2(chi): 'dzin pa gnas 'gyur lha mo thal byed ma yi sku// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha rnams kyi yon tan dang / las dang / 'byung khungs dngos
205b3(chi): gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang ba mchog gi sku// sangs rgyas
205b4(chi): yab 'gyur dam pa'i bdag/ bde gshegs kun gyi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// kun mkhyen khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ thugs su chud de/ sngags dang
205b5(chi): phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// spyir na rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yid kyis bsams pa
205b6(chi): ting 'dzin te// ngag tu brjod pa snying po'i mchog/ bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya ste// spyod yul kun tu dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// de ltar rtogs na 'di mi
205b7(chi): dgos/ ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pas// phyag rgya bcas dang snying po zlos// gsang ba'i don du 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khyod nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sngags
206a1(chi): nI 'di yin no// hUM badz+ra d+h+ri ka hUM/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// lag g.yon pang par mnyam gzhag nas// g.yas pas rdo rje sa gzhi
206a2(chi): gnon// rdo rje 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sngags dang phyug rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags patsun po yang // rab tu 'bar zhing skrag 'gyur na// bdudu rnams tshar
206a3(chi): gcod zlos ci dgos// gzhan yang 'khor lo sgyur rgyal gyis// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// oM dzi na dzi ka oM/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcas pa las// g.yon pa'i
206a4(chi): mdzub mo bsgrengs pa las// rtse mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi// bzung ba'i rtse la 'khor lo 'bar// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas
206a5(chi): sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu dgyes shing mnyes par 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za'o// gzhan yang rin chen 'dzin nyid kyis// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no//
206a6(chi): sA rat+na d+h+ri ka sA/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// g.yon pa rin chen 'dzin pa'i tshul// g.yas pa rin chen mchod spyod mdzad// rin chen 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste//
206a7(chi): sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde ba'i mchog rnams sbyin byed pas// bag dga' ba yang 'gengs byed cing // bkren nas phyug par ji bzhin smos// gzhan yang pad+ma 'chad
206b1(chi): ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// oM A ro lika oM/ phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las// lag gnyis rtse bsnol pang du gzhag/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya pad+mo'i rten// pad+ma
206b2(chi): 'chang ba'i phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang // dbang du 'gyur te gdon mi za// khams gsum skye bo smos ci dgos//
206b3(chi): gzhan yang sna tshogs 'chang ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka ha/ phyag rgya gong ma nyid las ni// rgya gram gdengs pa'i tshul byas te// mi 'jigs
206b4(chi): sbyin par byed pa ni// sna tshogs 'chang ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// mu d+hA tA shwa ri/ thal mo khong stong
206b5(chi): sbyor ba las// mdzub gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te// mthe bong sen mo mig gi tshul// gung mo'i rtse la dril bu 'bar// rdo rje dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag
206b6(chi): rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// las rnams thams cad grub pa dang // shi ba sos pa gdon mi za// lam de sha ra ti/ lag pa thal
206b7(chi): mo khong stong sbyar// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag byas te// thal mo'i rtse las 'khor lo rin chen 'bar// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya
207a1(chi): 'di yis ni// drag po gtum po lhan ner 'byung // zhi ba'i las la the tsom med// maM mo hA ra ti/ lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las//
207a2(chi): gung gnyis bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par// mdzub gnyis bcag pa rdo rje tshul// rtse la rin chen dril bu 'bar// rin chen dbyings phyag phrag rgya ste// sngags dang
207a3(chi): phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bsrung ba'i las kun byed pa ste// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs so// byaM pa ra ga ti/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las//
207a4(chi): pad+ma kha phye'i tshul byas te// dkyil na pad+mo'i dril bus mdzes// pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
207a5(chi): pa/ chos spyod chen po thob par 'gyur// taM badz+ra ra ti/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mdzub mo bkug pa'i sen mo yis// sor mo gung mo'i rtse mo mnan// rtsa la rgya grum
207a6(chi): dril chen 'bar// las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun// dbang du 'gyur ba the tsom med// shi hi
207a7(chi): ra tsa ya hUM/ thal mo khong stong sbyar byas las// gung gnyis sgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par// mthe bong mdzub mo sen mo bsnol// srin lag mthe'u chung nang bcug ste//
207b1(chi): ts+tshan m+bu nas du/ drug tu yon// thugs dung phyug 'di sbyi na// sa da/ ga rna / na
207b2(chi): pa'i mthe bong gis// gung mo srin lag rtse mos mnan// g.yas pa'i mtheb mos mdzub mo mnan// lhag ma gsum po g.yon pa'i nang // shugs nas phyung ba ltar
207b3(chi): byas te/ ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni// nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyas pa'i las la shin tu che// hri hUM pad+ma gar b+ha ma/
207b4(chi): rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung gnyis bshibs te tshigs chen gcig/ pad+mo'i tshul du rab mdzes pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di
207b5(chi): yis ni/ dbang gi las la the tsom med// dzi ma ku ru pa na ha/ rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol te// gung mo gnyis sgreng snying po la// mthe bong srin lag drang brkyang ste// mdzub
207b6(chi): mo mthe'u chung rA'i tshul// rdo rje rtse lnga'i tshul byas pa// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// drag po'i las la the tsom med// me da ra ye
207b7(chi): swA hA/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mthe bong gnyis 'khyud dbus gzhag snying po'i tshul// sor mo ut+pa la skyes pa'i tshul// byams pa mai tI'i phyag rgya yin/
208a1(chi): sngags dang phyag rgya 'dri yis ni// mtshan dang dpe byad sku yang 'thob// b+hI lIng sa raM ba ya/ thal mo rgyab bsnol sdor mo so sor 'khyud//
208a2(chi): mthe ba gnyis steng gi dkyil du gzhag/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul// sgrib pa sel ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyu 'bras chos
208a3(chi): rnams ma lus rtogs// hUM sA ra tsa ya/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// lag pa'i rting pa dam sbyar te// rdo rje sor mo drang brkyang ste// rin chen nyi ma'i
208a4(chi): tshul du bya// kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sems can sangs rgyas sa la rab tu smin// muM sha ri ra ga mA ya/ lag pa gnyis
208a5(chi): kyi rgyab sbyar te// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor 'khyud// rtsa ba dam sbyar co do dgye// klu shing yal ga gyes pa'i tshul// 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i phyag rgya yin// sngags
208a6(chi): dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dge ba'i lo tog smin par mdzad// oM badz+ra lA s+yA s+thAm/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcas te// mthen sbyin drang po gyen du sgreng // sen mo me
208a7(chi): long tshul du bya// lA s+yA ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rig pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings la gsal// oM rat+na mA le sa ma ya ho/ rdo rje khu tshur
208b1(chi): gnyis bcas te// mdzub gnyis bsgrangs pa g.yas g.yon 'gyed// smin mtshams 'phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul// mA le ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni//
208b2(chi): mi brjed pa yi gzungs kyang thob// hri gI ti ra ho haM/ g.yon brkyang mthe bong srin lag mnan te pi wa nga 'dzin// g.yas kyi srin mtheb gnyis kyis rdeb pa'i tshul//
208b3(chi): pad+ma gI ti'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// 'gro rnams kun la chos kyi sbyin pa 'gyed// a nir ti ra ga ya mi/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las//
208b4(chi): rdo rje rol pa chen po'i gar gyi tshul// las kyi nir ti phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs kun dgyes spyan yang mnyes// oM badz+ra d+hU pe d+hA// rdo rje
208b5(chi): thal mo brkyang ba las// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi sbyin mtheb kyis// spos khang yu ba 'dzin pa'i tshul// badz+ra d+hU pe ma'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni//
208b6(chi): snying rje'i don mthun 'gro don byed par 'gyur// oM rat+na puSh+pe pus/ rdo rje thal mo phyir bskyed de// mthe ba gnyis so sor 'khyud byas te// me tog 'thor ba'i tshul
208b7(chi): byas te/ badz+ra puSh+pe'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// byams pa'i mchod sbyin thob par 'gyur// pad+ma A lo ki hri/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing te//
209a1(chi): mthen sbyin bsgreng ba mar me'i tshul// A lo ki yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dga' ba'i mchog gis don spyod 'gyur/
209a2(chi): oM badz+ra gan+d+he ga na/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo 'gyed// mtheb kyis mdzub mnan dung por dbyibs// g.yas kyi sbom po dbang mos 'thor ba'i tshul// dri chab ma yi
209a3(chi): phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// btang snyoms don gyi sgra snyan sgrogs// hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje thal mo nang du bsnol// srin lag
209a4(chi): gnyis sbrang rtse mo ste// mthe bong mtheb chung mdzub mo gung mo 'khyud// rdo rje rtse lnga'i tshul du bya// kun bzangs bdag nyid yab kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya
209a5(chi): 'di yis ni// dngos po kun sbyangs ye shes dang du mkhyen par mdzad// a a a badz+ra sa tra sa ma ya a/ sor mo drang brkyang lag rting 'gyed// gung mo gnyis kyi
209a6(chi): rtse mo sgreng // dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul byas pa// kun bzangs bdag nyid ma'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mtshan ma kun sbyong chos kyi dbyings nyid
209a7(chi): gsal bar byed// oM mu ne kring swA hA/ g.yas g.yon sor mo drang brkyang ste// srin mtheb pi wa nga rdebs pa'i tshul// lha dbang brgya byin phyag rgya yin// sngags dang
209b1(chi): phyag rgya 'di yis ni// le lo brtson 'grus sa la 'god// oM mu ne hUM druM swA hA/ rdo rje sor mo phan tshun bsnol// mtheb gnyis mdzub mo tshogs la sbrel// rdo rje
209b2(chi): cha'i tshul byas pa// blag pazangs ris kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang na bzungs na mtshon mi tshugs// mu ni srung sA hA/ rdo rje thal mo'i rting bsnol te// mtheb gnyis
209b3(chi): dkyil gzhag srog shing la// sror mo gsag shang bum pa'i tshul// shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun sbyong dge tshogs 'phel
209b4(chi): bar mdzad// oM mu ne sha ma swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung mo srin lag brkyang sbyar te// glegs bam tshul du byas pa ni// shAkya seng ge'i phyag rgya yin//
209b5(chi): sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rtag tu chos lnga longs spyod 'gyur// oM mu ne bruM swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo khong stong las// rtse sprad tshigs zur sgrom bu'i tshul// kha 'bar
209b6(chi): ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur// oM mu na ye swA hA/ g.yas sor gdengs pa'i mi ri ste//
209b7(chi): g.yon gyi snyim pa'i chu yi tshul// glang mgo can gyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar// hUM ya mAn ta kr-id phaT dza/ rdo rje khu
210a1(chi): tshur nang du bsnams// mthe bong gnyis ni gyen du bteg/ thod pa nir mgo gdengs pa'i tshul// gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags
210a2(chi): dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs kun sreg par byed// pra dzAM ta kr-id hUM phaT/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// gung gnyis gshibs te rtse mor bya//
210a3(chi): mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung rwa yi dbyibs// rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni// stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'joms par
210a4(chi): byed/ pad mAn ta kr-id hri phaT/ lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar nas// mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du 'brel// mdzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// rta mchog dpal gyi phyag
210a5(chi): rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs kun dbang du sdud// oM big+h+nA na ta kr-ita ho phaT/ sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba las// gung mo gnyis ni drang
210a6(chi): por brkyang // mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse sprad phyi ru brkyang // mthe'u chung srin lag rtse sbrang nang du sdud// rdo rje rgya gram gyes pa'i tshul// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya
210a7(chi): yin/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bdud kyi tshogs kun rdul du rlog/ badz+ra da ra ma hA kro d+hi sha ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur rgyab sbyar te// mthe'u lu gu rgyud du mdud//
210b1(chi): mdzub gnyis rtse bkug lcags kyu'i tshul// rta gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs spyan 'dren snying rjes 'gro don mdzad/
210b2(chi): rat+na da ra ma hA kro d+hi sha ri dzA la ni hUM phaT/ gong gi phyag rgya de nyid las// mdzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i tshul// phag gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis
210b3(chi): ni/ sangs rgyas bzhugs su gsol ba dang // byams pa chen pos sbyin pa mdzad// pad+ma da ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM paM phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te//
210b4(chi): mthe bong mdzub mo lu gu rgyud// lcags sgrog tshul du byas pa ni// sbrul gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyal ba bstan mdzad kun kyang dga'
210b5(chi): bar byed// karma da ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM ho phaT/ rdo rje thal mo phan tshun bsnol// gung mo rtse spyad bsgreng byas te// rtse sprad dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul// seng
210b6(chi): gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes mdzad 'gro don kun la snyoms// zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi sngags dang phyag
210b7(chi): rgya'i ngo bo yon tan rnam par bshad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
211a1(chi): rdo rje 'dzin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas yab 'gyur
211a2(chi): dam pa'i dpal// bdag la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la// dbang bskur byin brlabs tshul bzhin mdzod// ces bskul bar mkhyen te// bcom ldan 'das
211a3(chi): kyis hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod de/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gzhal yas kha de nyid kyi thugs kar bsdu ba mdzad de/ rgyud dang / lam dang / gshegs bul nas yum
211a4(chi): gyi b+ha ga sti'i gnas su 'khyil pa las/ thams cad lhag pas byang chub kyi sems chen por gnas par mdzad do// de nas/ hUM hUM ma hA ga Na sa ma ya ho/ zhes pa'i
211a5(chi): sgra brjod cing / yab yum gnyis kyang chags pa chen po chos nyid byang chub sems su gnas pa las/ cho 'phrul gyi sgra hUM hUM zhes bsgrags pa las/ smon pa med pa'i
211a6(chi): gsung rtags kyi yi ge hUM hUM gnyis su gsal ba ra brjod do// yang cho 'phrul gyi rma/ badz+ra dz+nyA na gan+da/ zhes brjod pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i thugs rtags rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis su
211a7(chi): gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang cho 'phrul gyi sgrar/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsi ta hUM/ a a badz+ra pa tre sa ma ya a/ zhes brjod de/ rang bzhin med par yab yum gyi skur
211b1(chi): gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang rjes su chags pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ rdo rje dang pad+ma rgyas par mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// dz+nyA na badz+ra e/ oM hUM phaT
211b2(chi): a aus ma ya stAM/ sa ma ya ho/ a nu ra ga ya mi/ a nu ra grA ho hang / de nas yang gsang ba'i byang chub sems las/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yum gyi
211b3(chi): mkha' la gsal bA ra mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Da la hUM hUM/ de nas yang b+ha ga ga sang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor
211b4(chi): du rnam par spro ba'i snying po cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// hUM s+pha ra na phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas par mdzad do// de nas yang
211b5(chi): / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi sgrar brjod do// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/
211b6(chi): oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas yang 'khor rnams rigs lnga dang
211b7(chi): sku lnga ye shes lngas dbang bskur ba'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi sgrar brjod do// ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma koH
212a1(chi): oM ma hA pra tA be shA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA nA badz+ra s+yA b+hA ba At+ma ko&hUM/ ma hA krI ta a pu ta na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba
212a2(chi): At+ma ko&haM/ zhes gsungs te/ byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur bas/ 'khor rnams 'gro ba'i don la thogs pa med par byin brlabs dang yang ldan dbang
212a3(chi): yang thob nas/ thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la rag ma las par gnas so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
212a4(chi): dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o/
212a5(chi): rnam par dag pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog/ sna tshogs las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ rnam dag sgra chen khyod la
212a6(chi): 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// ye shes gtso mchog khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
212a7(chi): chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba'i// sangs rgyas 'khor lo khyod la 'dud// yid bzhin re ba kun skong ba'i// nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la 'dud// 'dam skyes
212b1(chi): pad ltar sku 'khrungs pa'i// pad+mo 'chang ba khyod la 'dud// 'gro ba tha dang 'dul ba'i bye brag can// sna tshogs 'chang ba khyod la 'dud// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna
212b2(chi): tshogs kyis// 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba la// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yi// thugs rje 'gro ba'i don mdzad rigs// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan
212b3(chi): 'das kyis bskul ba thugs su chung de/ la lar sku yi don mdzad pa// 'gro rnams kun la sdig spong gzugs// sprul sku so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba rnams
212b4(chi): la gshed pos 'dul// sgrib pa rnams la kha 'bar 'dul// dud 'gro rnams la seng ges 'dul// mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten du// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal lta
212b5(chi): bu'i gzugs// lha min rnams la thag bzangs ris// lha rnams la ni brgya byin gzugs// chags bral rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la
212b6(chi): bse ru'i tshul// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// 'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs
212b7(chi): ston 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs te// la lar sde snod gsum dag tu// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//
213a1(chi): la lar gsung rab bcu gnyis su// la lar stong phrag brgyad cu bzhi// la lar brgyad khri bzhi stong du// gti mug gdong pa'i gro gung
213a2(chi): la/ sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// zhe sdang can la rdo rje 'dzin// nga rgyal can la rin po che// 'dod chags can la pad+mo 'chang // phrag dog spyod
213a3(chi): pa'i las gang la// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor// 'gro ba'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de nyid sgra skad sna tshogs ston// la lar lhums su gshegs po'i
213a4(chi): tshul/ la lar lhums nas gshegs par ston// la lar khyim pa lta bur ston// la lar khab nas rab tu byung // la lar dka' thub dka' ba byed// la lar
213a5(chi): byang chub mchog sems bskyed// la lar bdud bzhi 'dul bar ston// la lar rdo rje gdan la gshegs// la lar byang chub shing dbang drung // la larwa bskul
213a6(chi): ba'i sa la gzhengs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo bskor// la lar cho 'phrul chen po ston// la lar sku gdung ring bsrel
213a7(chi): ston/ la lar chos kyi glegs bam ston// la lar phyi rol 'byung ba las// chos dang mthun pa'i sgra skad 'byung // la lar mu stegs lta bu'i tshul// la lar 'jig
213b1(chi): rten bsam gtan tshul// la lar sa bcu rims kyis 'byung // la lar spyan lnga rnam par dag/ la lar mngon shes pha rol phyin// la lar khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/
213b2(chi): la lar 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs cho 'phrul de ltar ston// zhes sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa las//
213b3(chi): 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bdag/
213b4(chi): mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// e ma'o gsang sngags ngo mtshar che// e ma ston pa cho 'phral che// e ma ho ngo mtshar cho 'phrul che// e ma 'o sngags kyis mi 'dul med//
213b5(chi): 'di ni yA mtshan ngo mtshar to// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu tshur gshegs cig/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid la// su zhig
213b6(chi): mos pa'i skyes bu des// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// mi 'grub pa yang gcig kyang med// rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang // ma byin len dang mi tshungs spyod// rdzun dang
213b7(chi): phra ma ngag rtsub dang // zas su sha dang bshang gci dang // rnag khrag dron mo 'thung ba dang // ngan zos ngan spyad thams cad kyis// gsang ba 'di nyid grub par 'gyur//
214a1(chi): pha dang phu bo mes po dang // bu dang spun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems kyis bsad byas na// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'khrungs// ma dang
214a2(chi): sring mo nu mo dang // gdol pa mo dang phyal mo dang // 'dod pa'i sems kyis sbyar byas na// pad+ma'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor byang chub sems
214a3(chi): dpa' de dag skrag dngangs te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje che
214a4(chi): la thabs mkhas pa'i bdag nyid// rtog pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag slar gsos te rtog pa bsal du gsol/ zhes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
214a5(chi): kyis bskul bar mkhyen te/ byang chub sems de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstim ste byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad pas/
214a6(chi): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dran pa slar rnyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig mi 'dzum par bltas te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
214a7(chi): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams rang rang gi 'du shes ngan pa de thong zhig/ byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de//
214b1(chi): nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// de nyid 'jig rten sna tshogs te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs chen de nyid do// chos rnams sgyu mar dbang sgyur bas// de la dngos po ga la
214b2(chi): yod/ ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang // de la dngos po yod mi 'gyur// byang chub nyid de lhung gnas med// dmyal ba'i gnas nyid bla med gnas//
214b3(chi): sdug bsngal nyid ni byang chub lam// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa nyid ni mngon sangs rgyas// byang chub spyod sgo ji snyed pa// de snyed 'bras bu de la yod//
214b4(chi): nges don de la 'dud par byos// zhes gsungs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag som nyi dang bral nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas 'khod do// de'i tshe 'gro
214b5(chi): drug sems can rnams// las kyi stobs kyis dbang sgyur ba// log lha mthu snyed ma dad pa// ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kun// sangs rgyas bstan pas dad par
214b6(chi): 'gyur/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba las ma dad pa'i rgyu 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas
214b7(chi): yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ byang chub spyod pa'i lam mchog la// 'gro ba ji
215a1(chi): snyed dad pa las// las kyi log lha ma dad pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni ji ltar lags// ma dad pa ni ci yi phyir// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs//
215a2(chi): 'bras bu smin pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dka' thub can gyi sems can de// legs pa'i rgyu las ma byung ste//
215a3(chi): nyes pa'i gzung 'dzin rtog ngan rgyu// rkyen ni chags sdang spyod la zhe na// lta ba log pa'i nyon mongs lnga// de yi lus kyi dbang btsan nas// 'bras bu ma dad rgyu ru smin//
215a4(chi): rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can te// sde ni grongal ba'i 'byung por gtogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
215a5(chi): log pa'i sems can chen po de// ci yi thabs kyis dad par 'gyur// ma dang nges na ji ltar 'gyur// btul na yon tan ji ltar thob// ma btul ma dang skyon ni ci//
215a6(chi): zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// log pa'i mthu rnyed sems can de// bden pa'i gzhung du 'dul bar bya// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan na//
215a7(chi): phyin ci log tu chos spyod pas// lha dang mi yi srid brlag ste// kha lo log par sbyar nas kyang // sangs rgyas gnyen ris sku lus la// 'khor ba'i sems can gter chags
215b1(chi): to/ don la mi dad pa'i skyon yod do// btul na yon tan dpag tu med// dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor dong spyugs// 'khor ba chos nyid chen por 'gyur// sangs rgyas
215b2(chi): zhing khams rab tu rgyus// btul bas don la dang par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma
215b3(chi): ba de gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma dad pa yi sems can de// las la bab pa'i thugs rje yis// bde ba chen po'i gzhung bkod nas// bde chen sa la
215b4(chi): dgod du gsol// zhes bskul bar bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas/ ye shes kyi sprin mgo ni dbyar gyi char sprin bzhin du gtibs/ chos nyid kyi drod chen po ni nam
215b5(chi): zla'i rlan bzhin du g.yos te/ sprul pa'i sku ni char gyi rgyun lta bu 'bab pa ni/ dpe byad kyi sku la mtshan gyi me tog chags par mdzad/ gsung chags pa med pa'i dbyangs
215b6(chi): kyis/ chos kyi bye brag sna tshogs bsgrags nas/ bden pa'i gzhung gis gdul bar gzigs nas/ ru dra nag po se gol lan cig brdabs nas/ mi 'dul ba'i mngon
215b7(chi): pa'i nga rgyal skyes te/ go'u ta ma khyod kyis bdag gdul ba ma lags te/ khyod rang rang gi gnas su dka' thub kyi bde ba la gnos cig/ ces zer te ma nyan no//
216a1(chi): rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// bden pa'i gzhung gis ma dad pa gdul bar gzigs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
216a2(chi): / de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul bar mkhyen te/ e ma ho sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// snang ngo kun tu rab tu 'dir// srid pa'i
216a3(chi): log pa'i gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po'i yi dgas te// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung // drag po rang gi
216a4(chi): dka' thub kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// drag po ru dra'i gdug dpal gyis// 'gro rnams thal rlog 'jigs byed pa// gdul bar bya ba'i 'os mchog
216a5(chi): snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus pa// sdug bsngal lam gyi rgyun gcad de// bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs// zhes gsol to// bde bar gshegs pa
216a6(chi): rnams kyis bskyal ba'i don thugs su chud de/ zhi dang bden pas mi 'dul bar dgongs nas/ 'gro ba dang tshul btul te/ gdan tshogs chen po bcas te/ 'di skad
216a7(chi): ces bka' bgro ba mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ kye ma 'das pa'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar//
216b1(chi): da ltar dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de'i tshe sems can thams cad
216b2(chi): ni/ shin tu khro drag gtum pa yis// 'o dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// mi bzang chen po'i sdug bsngal de// dug gsum sa la mngon zhen pa'i// ji lta ba yi
216b3(chi): thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das gauti mug chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams// ji ltar der dgar
216b4(chi): gzhag gyur na// bag chags ngan pa'i chu rlan gyis// bdud kyi tshogs su mngon 'phel nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyun gcod cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig
216b5(chi): pAr 'gyur// de'i tshe las kyi mun pa yis// 'gro ba ma rig 'khor bar 'khyams// drug nang rims nad 'phra men ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren nyid//
216b6(chi): srid pa gsum po 'jig byed cing // dam tshig gnyen po 'dral byed pa// ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das nga rgyal chen po'i
216b7(chi): tshogs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// las kyis gdug pa'i ru dra de/ rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar khro drag gtum pa yis//
217a1(chi): da ltar 'di tshe byung ba ste// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// 'bar 'phro 'khrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
217a2(chi): 'os/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang // khros pa'i sprin nug gti bas pa yis// mngon spyod 'bar ba'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba sgrol ba
217a3(chi): dus la bab// ces bgros so// bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par ma gyur te/
217a4(chi): shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas
217a5(chi): thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das phrag dog chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa ni// rang bzhin
217a6(chi): dag pa'i ngo bo las// log rtog phyin ci log gis bcings// dngos po rang bzhin kar zhen pa'i// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang // dam tshig la sdung rnams
217a7(chi): sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod// ces bgros so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhi bas mi 'dul bar dgongs nas/ bde bar
217b1(chi): gshegs pa rnams kyis bka'i bgro ba mdzud pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de ltar bgros pas rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa de dag
217b2(chi): dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i spyod pa can dngos po'i lam la mngon par 'chel ba/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mthu snyems nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
217b3(chi): la mngon par ma dad pas 'jig rten phung bar byed pa rnams/ zhi bas phan pa'i sa la ma bab ste/ rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar gzigs te/ thams cad
217b4(chi): dgongs pa gcig tu gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad dang
217b5(chi): gnas kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad nyid kyi thugs khar bsngo ba mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su mi snang bar mdzad nas/ chos nyid de bzhin
217b6(chi): nyid la dmigs nas gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po des/ chos kyi dbyings de kho na nyid la khros pas/ nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa dang
217b7(chi): gis gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / don de nyid kun la khyab cing gsal bar kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin/ snying rje chen po dang gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kun la khyab pa ni/
218a1(chi): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu la mngon par mdzad de/ nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa las/ mtshan ma'i rgyu yi ge'i hUM sngon po ye shes kyi 'od du
218a2(chi): 'bar ba shar te/ des rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon cing 'dzin rtog zil gyis gnon pa'i ting 'dzin to// srog gi go ru rtogs pa'i hUM de las/ snod kyi 'jig rten
218a3(chi): gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ mi rtog pa gnas pa'i hUM de las/ cho 'phrul gyi sgrar snying po 'di rnams ched du brjod do// e a ga naM dza la maN+Da la e/
218a4(chi): yaM karma rakra haM/ ra rak+ta sa mu dra maN+Da la/ su badz+ra su me hUM hUM/ ke ni ri ti ke/ raM badz+ra dz+wa la ra/ zhes bsgrags pas/ zhe sdang 'bar ba'i nam mkha' la/ phrag dog 'bar
218a5(chi): ba'i tshub mar ldan// chags pa'i rak+ta rba glong 'khyil// gti mug chen po'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal chen po'i me rI 'bar// zhes pa ste/ dbang chen yum lnga'i ngo bor
218a6(chi): shar bar mdzad pa ni/ 'byung ba yum gyi gzhal yas khang mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang / bruM las bi sha bi shud+d+he hUM/ zhes pas/ ye shes lngar ldan rin chen
218a7(chi): lnga yi brtsigs pa la// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // mdzes pa'i babs sogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// 'dod yon rin chen rol mo'i tshogs su bcas// zhes pas/
218b1(chi): rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang mngon par shar bar mdzad do// ba raM da dz+nyA na badz+ra bruM/ zhes pas/ ban+d+ha skam rlon mang po brtsegs pa la// ga nam lcags ngur mo
218b2(chi): 'bar ba'i gzer chen btab// gzungs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'phreng chen po dang // kha nas me 'bar sna nas dud pa 'thul// maM sa'i sa gzhi rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang // dri chen
218b3(chi): skyang nul dri chu'i zham chu dang // rnag dang chu ser tshom bu 'khyil// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i ka gdan la// zhing chen ka pa lha chen ka gzhu btsugs// mchog chen
218b4(chi): gdung bres mchog phran bkram// sti ra'i dri ba bkod nas// zhing chen bla re tsit+ta'i tog/ nya che na 'phran dang chu srin za ra tshags// zhing chen khog stong khog smad dam
218b5(chi): dum ras ros dang // grags grus lang ling gsur chen dud pa dang // dur khrod bya rnams ha ha ru lu'i sgra 'byin di ri ri// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i nyi zla mthong
218b6(chi): nas 'char// rnam thar chen po bzhi yi sgo bzhi na// bdud las rnam par rgyal mtshan btsugs zhes pas/ ma dad pa dang tshul bstun pa'i phyir na/ dur khrod
218b7(chi): 'bar ba'i ga zha la yas khang du shar ba ra ma dzad do// de nas yang / e baM ma ya raM badz+ra dza la r-i/ zhes pas/ gru gsum mthing nag drag po ste// zla gam dmar po
219a1(chi): dbang gi tshul// mu khyud zlum po zhi ba'i tshulnga// gru bzhi ser po rgyas pa'i tshul// smyug nag gru gsum 'bar ba lha yi bzhugs gnas te//
219a2(chi): ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// phyi ni yid bzhin rin chen te// nang ni dur khrod 'bar ba'o zhes// gdan tshogs drang 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i
219a3(chi): gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad do// de nus yang / ma a ba ru sUr+yA tsan+d+ra pad+ma 'da'/ zhes pas/ rtag pa zil gyis mnan pa'i nyi ma dang // chad pa zil
219a4(chi): gyis gnon pa'i zla ba dang // rtag chad skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma ste// zil gnon gdan du mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de las/ hUM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/
219a5(chi): zhes pas/ gdan gyi ge sar la rgyu'i hUM nyid shar te/ bcud kyi sems 'jig rten thams cad yi ge hUM hUM du shar bar mdzad do// hUM de las de bzhin gshegs pa
219a6(chi): thams cad kyi thugs kyi go ru rtogs par mdzad do// badz+ra dz+nyA na a badz+ra/ zhes pas/ ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa lte ba la hUM gis mtshan pa gcig tu mngon par
219a7(chi): 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las pa'i chos thams cad thugs mtshan rdo rjer gnas par gyur to// de nas/ dz+nyA na ska na skas ta ki la ya hUM/
219b1(chi): zhes pas/ rdo rje de nyid las sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rjes bsgral ba'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad do//
219b2(chi): lus yod na grib ma yod pa'i tshul gyis yum dam tshig yang mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe chos thams cad sku phra mo'i ngang du gsal ba las/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la yA sarba
219b3(chi): big+h+nA na baM hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra ti ba ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces cho 'phrul gyi sgrar bsgrags te/ phyag rgya chen po'i yab yum gnyis kyi skur mngon par mdzad do// de'i tshe
219b4(chi): yAbi yum phyag rgya chen por thams cad sangs rgyas par mdzad de/ de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can kyang kun rtog gi zhe sdang gis bsad cing mnan pa yin te/ b+h+rUM oM
219b5(chi): oM hUM swA hA/ badz+ra rang na tsa dra pad+ma khang+ga/ kA ya wa ka tsit+ta gu Na karma dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo dbu la
219b6(chi): rdzogs pa'i rigs lngas bsrungs pa dang dbang bskur bar mdzad do// yang oM oM hUM kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes pas dus gsum gyi chos
219b7(chi): ma lus pa'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do// hUM hUM a nr-i su tri br-i du kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ zhes pas srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i sems
220a1(chi): can thams cad kyi ngo bo byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin rnams/ bka' nan gyi tshul gyis sku la brgyan par mdzad do// de'i tshe na zag pa med
220a2(chi): pa'i sku rdo rje skams par mdzad do// de nas yang / dz+nyA na sA tra ki la ya hUM/ zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la sems pa'i ngo bo dang //
220a3(chi): badz+ra kI li ki la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ ces pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang sngags kyi ngo bo/ oM hUM hri phaT/ ces pas/ de bzhin
220a4(chi): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngag pa sgo srungs dbang gi rgyal po dang / dz+nyA na badz+ra oM oM hUM phaT e a aM/ zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha'
220a5(chi): dang gsang ba'i ngo bor mngon par 'du mdzad do// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo dang / de'i rkyen dang / de'i rtags 'byung khung dang / de'i gnas gsung pa ste/ thams cad rdo/
220a6(chi): rje gzhon nu'i rang bzhin du dgongs par mkhyen to// ma dad pa'i sems can de dag dang tshul mthun pa'i phyir na// zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dang //
220a7(chi): rol pa chen po'i phyag drug dang // brjid pa'i ngor thabs zhabs bzhi dang // sku yi bem lding che ba dang // gsung gi tsham rngam sgrogs pa dang // thugs kyi dgongs pa
220b1(chi): chen po ste// dpa' zhing shin tu brjid pa'i cha byad do// de nas dregs pa chen po de srog bcad pa'i khrag rjes yod pa de dag ni/ thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su sku la
220b2(chi): brgyan to// thal ba'i tsham tshom yod pa de dag ni// mtshan ma spros pa med pa'i don gyis nyid la brgyan to// zhag dang bcud kyi khyal khyil ni/ don dam bcud kyi rang
220b3(chi): bzhin gyis khros pa'i sku la brgyan to// dka' thub can gyi sems can de dag la bgo ba'i bye brag ni/ mun pa glang gI go shun ni stobs bcu rdzogs pa'i na bza' sku la
220b4(chi): gsol/ chags pa'i zhing chen ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i chos gos su bsnams/ zhe sdang rdzong la zhen pa'i stag lpags ni dpa' gtum gyis 'gro ba'i don la
220b5(chi): thabs mkhas pa'i sham thabs su brgyan to// yang nga rgyal gyi drod 'bar ba ni/ ye shes me'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba dang / 'phro ba dang / 'du shes sreg pa dang /
220b6(chi): glong ba 'khyil ba ma zad pa ste/ nyid kyi sku dang la gnas par mdzad/ gdug pa'i sems can de dag rtag chad kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa de/ zil gyis
220b7(chi): gnon cing spa bkong ba'i phyir/ rdo rje gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams khengs pa yang khros pa nyid las mdzes par mdzad do// thod pa skam rlon gyi 'phreng thod de
221a1(chi): dag ni/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs khros pa'i nyid kyis rgyan du byas so// gdug cing zhe sdang
221a2(chi): ba'i sbrul skems la sogs pa de dag ni/ mnyen lcug yum bzhi'i gzugs su byin gyis brlabs te/ 'phrin lngas rgya mtsho 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags kyis khros pa
221a3(chi): nyid la brgyan to// gzung 'dzin la zhen pa'i sgra shin tu 'jigs pa des yang / zil gyis mtha' gnon pa'i phyir/ nyid la 'khyil par mdzad do// 'dod pa'i yon tan
221a4(chi): dang kho'i longs spyod pa'i bye brag la 'dod pa'i yon tan la mthar phyin na/ kho'i gnas 'khor khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil pa de dag ni/ khros pa pos pad+ma rak+ta las bdud rtsi
221a5(chi): shAsna tshogs su sprul te gsol to// nyon mongs pa lnga mngon par 'tshal ba'i mi gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzab de dag ni/ dri chen las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te rol to//
221a6(chi): zhi sdang gi rdzong zhen pa'i go ro tsa na dang / keng rus kyi bcu da de dag ni byang chub sems las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te zhal du bzhes so// rnag dang chu ser gyi zham chu
221a7(chi): 'bab pa de dag ni/ rdo rje dri chu las bdud rtsir dgongs te gsol lo// sbal ba'i don la 'chel ba'i sha dang bu shin tu che ba de dag ni/ maM sa las bdud rtsir sprul te/
221b1(chi): zhal du rol lo// khros pa'i rgyal pos dregs pa'i sems can de'i gnas khang dang tshul bstan pa'i gzhal yas khang 'di ni gsal bar mdzad/ lus dang / ngag
221b2(chi): dang / rgyan rnams gdos pa dang bcas pa de dag ni sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan du don dang bstan/ zag bcas kyi longs spyod de dag ni zag med kyi bdud rtsi'i mdzad de/
221b3(chi): gdug pa de drag dang tshul bsnun te/ kho'i gdos pa de dag don dang bsnun par bzhed nas/ kho chags sdung la zhen pa'i dbang gis ma dad de/ nga rgyal gyi de'u ma tshogs
221b4(chi): gti mu ga gi 'dam las ma tha ra/ zhe sdang gi mnar sems dang ma bral/ phrag dog gi gdug rtsub ma zhi nas/ phan zhing zhi bar ma gyur to// de tshe stong gsum 'jig
221b5(chi): rten kun// thugs rje chos kyi char gyis rlan// sman dang 'bru rnams thams cad kun// 'gro ba'i gsos su byin brlabs so// rtsa ba sdong po ngar ba dang //
221b6(chi): yal ga lo ma me tog dang // snying po 'bras bur bcas pa sma ni// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod pa las// dka' thub
221b7(chi): can de bdud kyi lta ba la mngon par dad pas chags sdang gi rang bzhin sha khrag la longs spyod par dad pa las/ thams cad 'khor ba bdud dang 'dra ba'i zas rnams
222a1(chi): la thugs rje'i rtsi btang bas/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i zas la rol te spyod pa las/ dregs pa de dag nges pa kho nar dad par ma gyur to//
222a2(chi): de nas khros pa'i rgyal pos des ma dad pa'i gzung 'dzin dang rtag chad mtha' bsal ba'i phyir// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos kyi sgo mo dang // theg pa dgu po chos kyi bye brag
222a3(chi): dang // yan lag bcu gnyis rnam grangs de// drang ba'i don phyir nges don gsungs pa las// 'gro kun dad cing grol ba las// dka' thub can de nges par ma grol ma dang
222a4(chi): de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po des/ dregs pa po mo rnams kyi chags pa'i 'dod pa de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir na/ hUM hUM hUM e a ra li ru lu ru lu sa
222a5(chi): ma ya dza hUM dza/ zhes brjod pas/ dregs pa'i ma dang / sring mo dang / bu mo dang / slas mo dang / bran mo dang / chung ma rnams dang / srog gi snying po ma bzod nas//
222a6(chi): rdo rje khros pa'i thad du yud kyis rjen pa la/ gsung ma chags pa'i tshangs pa'i 'gur bzhengs/ zhal bzhad/ spyan gzigs/ smin gzigs sgyur/ rol pa'i mdzad
222a7(chi): spyod kyis rnam par stegs pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las thar nas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku mdun kun gyi thad du byin pa las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal
222b1(chi): pos ma chags pa'i thabs kyis sbyor ba kun la mdzad de/ chags pa rgyu'i sa bon te chos nyid byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du spros pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams chags pa'i
222b2(chi): 'dod chags chags pas mchog tu'ang dad pa skyes nas gnas so// de'i tshe dgyes pa byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ zhes brjod pa las/
222b3(chi): dkar mo dang ni rkun mo dang // gtum mo dang ni rmongs mo dang // thal byed sme sha ma tshogs rnams// re re la'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rang rang gi cha lugs
222b4(chi): lag cha stan dang bcas pa 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod do// yang dgyes pa byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ he he he he he he he he/ zhes brjod pa las/ seng
222b5(chi): gdong stag gdong wa gdong khyi gdong dang // bya rgod gdong dang dur bya'i gdong // bya rog gdong dang 'ug pa'i gdong // re re la'ang tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa
222b6(chi): dang / cha lugs dang / lag cha dang / stan dang bcas te 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa byang chub kyi sems las/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ ces
222b7(chi): brjod pas/ stag gdong phag gdong sbrul gdong rnams// cha lugs lag cha stan dang chas nas/ re re la'ang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa chas nas 'khod do//
223a1(chi): yang dgyes pa'i sprin las/ dzA dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza/ zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje pho nya drug cu'i tshogs gong bzhin no// yang dgyes pa'i sbyin
223a2(chi): las/ ha ha ru lu hUM/ zhes pas/ pho ging mo ging rnams kyang gong bzhin no// de nas 'dod pa zhi ba dang / ma hA rakra kro d+hi phaT/ ces pas dregs pa mo rnams
223a3(chi): rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas dregs pa chen po de shin tu'ang mi dga' ba'i 'du shes skyes nas// 'jig rten
223a4(chi): khams na bdag las khyad par 'phags pa med na/ bdag gi gnas khang dang / cha lugs dang / byed spyod dang / yo byad rnams byin nyams la/ khros pa de ni
223a5(chi): gzi byin dang ldan/ ma la sogs pa rnams kyang kho bo'i tshig mi nyan par gyur to// sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can mang po'ang gnas 'khor 'dir byung / kho bo
223a6(chi): rang lugs kyi chos la'ang khro sa pa de las bden pa'i gzhung med par smra na/ ji ltar spogs snyam pa la/ dregs pa de zhe sdang gi me chen sbar/ chags pa'i rgya mtsho ni
223a7(chi): gting nas g.yos/ mun pa'i khu rlangs ni gtibs/ phrag dog gi zug rngu ni brlang / nga rgyal gyi de'u bskyed de/ nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru lus ni sgrogs/ gdug pa'i lag
223b1(chi): cha kha T+wAM kha ni 'khrol zhing spogs par bzo ba las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ raka hri ti b+hU ya sa ma ya mu dra'i sgra bsgrags pa las/ kha T+wAM kha'i lag cha de nyid phrogs nas
223b2(chi): rgyal byed dpa' rtags kyi phyag mtshan du phyag drug g.yon gyi bar par bsnams so// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kho'i nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru lu ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
223b3(chi): snying po oM dang hUM gi ba ra du bcug ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes pas khros pas bzlas pa sa/ dregs pa de skyes bu gang dag lce bcad pa bzhin du lan blan pa'i
223b4(chi): glags med par shes pa nyams par mdzad do// de nas yang cung zhig na log pa'i sems can des/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yid la byas te/ lus ngag yid gsum shin tu
223b5(chi): yang khro zhing gtum par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par ston pa las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
223b6(chi): te/ thabs kyis ma thul ba'i sems can de drag po'i mngon spyod kyis bsgral bar dgongs nas/ bsgral ba'i don re'ang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbang mi za bar dbang
223b7(chi): dang byin rlabs nod pa'i phyir/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha sa ma ya dza/ zhes pas/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las gzugs
224a1(chi): sku 'gags pa med pa'i skur bzhengs te gnas so// de la rol pa'i tshig 'dis bskul lo// hUM srid pa'i phur bu bsgrubs pa dang /
224a2(chi): dbang dang byin brlabs blang ba'i phyir// 'gyur med sku ru gnas pa de// ye shes khros pas gshegs su gsol// dza hUM baM ho/ zhes bskul bas/ bde bar
224a3(chi): gshegs pa de dag sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la til gyi gang bu sbyin byon to// de nas/ ta thA ga ta na mA badz+ra/ zhes pas/ de bzhin
224a4(chi): gshegs pa de dag la rdo rje'i phyag mngon par mdzad do// de nas yang / ta thA ga ta ma ha/ dI paM/ d+hA paM/ pu ShAM/ su kaM/ gaM daM/ i tsi/ pA tsa sa ma ye hAM/ zhes
224a5(chi): pabs/ tshul khrims dri mchog ting 'dzin me tog dang // lhag mthong mar me'i zhi gnas chu rgyun dang / bsil mngar ar+g+haM dag pa lha'i zhal zas kyis mngon par mchod de/
224a6(chi): 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes lha mchog gshegs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal mchod bzhes thugs bskul bas// dbang dang byin rlabs sprul ba dang //
224a7(chi): rtags dang mtshan ma stsal du gsol// zhes bskul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bskul ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ thams cad rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung
224b1(chi): thugs lngas tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ni/ shin tu yang byin rlabs dang ldan par mdzad/ de bzhin rigs lnga'i ngo bo thams cad rigs ma med par thim pas ni/ sku dang
224b2(chi): ye shes rigs kyi ngo bor dbang bskur/ dregs pa dang tshul bstun pa'i phyir na/ gdol babs kyi rgyan mang pos khros pa'i sku la brgyan pa de dag las/ don dang ma bstun
224b3(chi): pas mtshan mar bstan te/ rab brjid mang la yangs pas ma lus spu bkong par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ oM dz+nyA na shri he ru kA mA hA badz+ra/
224b4(chi): zhes pas/ theg pa dgu dang rab ldan pas// sa dgu'i rtogs pa 'joms pa ste// he ru ka dgu'i rang bzhin gyis// ye shes dgu ldan rtags 'di sbyin no//
224b5(chi): zhes gsungs te/ las kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi dang por rtags kyi phyag rgyar sbyin to// yang oM dz+nyA na pany+tsa badz+ra/ zhes pas/
224b6(chi): ye shes lnga'i mchod rten btags kyi phyag rgya 'dis// dug lnga 'byongs pas gnas lnga stongs// dam skongs rigs mnyes ye shes lnga yi rtags// zhes gsus
224b7(chi): te mchod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi bar par bskur te/ dregs pa 'dul bar dbang bskur ro// de nas yang de bzhin
225a1(chi): gshegs pa de dag la/ rdo rje khros pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma'o log pa'i lam gyis mnar ba la// thabs kyis 'dul bar
225a2(chi): ma gyur te// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// ye shes khros pas 'dul bar 'gyur// de bas mngon par 'du mdzad rigs// zhes bskul bas// de bzhin
225a3(chi): gshegs pa de dag gisre bskul bar mkhyen te/ nyid kyis ye shes rigs kyi khro bor sprul te/ khros pa'i sprin phung du bzhugs so// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa dang /
225a4(chi): khros pa'i sprin de drug gis/ druM hUM trUM bi shA k+ko n+yA dz+wa lA maN+Dal phan+d+ha pAn+da paT ha la ha la/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad ze za
225a5(chi): 'chol pas lhag gis gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'khrugs/
225a6(chi): rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu 'khrugs so// tshig/ rab tu tshig go/ 'thor/ rab tu 'thor/ kun tu 'thor ro// ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu ldeg go// 'gu la/
225a7(chi): rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu yang 'gul lo// de'i tshe 'jig rten phung bar byed pa'i dregs pa de ni/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi che ba ston cing ma dul lo// de nas yang rdo rje
225b1(chi): / khros pa'i rgyal pos/ e waM ma yA badz+ra tsakrA dz+wa la raM/ zhes pas/ dregs pa rdo rje 'khor lo me 'bar ba'i dra ba ra bcug/ 'phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni lus la
225b2(chi): bkod nas gnas so// de nas/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya ra tri rakA shi krin a na ya hUM phaT/ ces gsang ba'i sngags 'thon te/ rdo rje 'khor lo la bskor nas mthu dang rdzu
225b3(chi): 'phrul thams cad rdo mtshan la chu 'dus pa bzhin bskams te gnas so// dregs pa'i sems can de nyid da rung sems kyi gya gyu dang lus kyi gzi byin che bar ston pa
225b4(chi): / las oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya ra tri ru tra rakra A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ chags byed dang snying po la lus sems rnam par bsdu bar
225b5(chi): mdzad do// khros pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi zhabs 'og tu brdzis te gnas so// de nas yang dregs pa shin tu mi bzod pa'i tshig gis/ re sha thong thong dpa' bo sgeg po rab tu/
225b6(chi): thong thugs rje'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod de 'am zer zhing phyir 'bros par gzo ba las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ oM badz+ra kI li ki lA ya ra
225b7(chi): tri ru tra sha rak+Sha shi krin a na ya hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te yan lag 'dzo bu sti gnas la/ tsha tsha dang skar mda' bzhin 'phros te/ 'khor bas lus skul
226a1(chi): skyong kun myed par rus sbrul rgya mtshor zhugs pa bzhin gnas so// de nas yang dregs pa de sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ rdo rje khros pas
226a2(chi): zhabs kyang shin tu gzir te/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya ra tri ru tA rak+Sha dz+wA la pA ya dz+wA la pa ya hUM phaT/ ces sngags 'thon te/ bsam bzhi dang drag gnas su khros
226a3(chi): shing 'khor bas/ dregs pa de sngar spyad pa'i las ngan de dag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar dran te/ ma bzod pa'i 'o dod 'bod cing / lus zhu sems
226a4(chi): nyams te gnas so// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ rdo rje phur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhugs te/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM
226a5(chi): suM hUM phaT/ ces pas/ yum dang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las/ rdo rje khro bo las kyi phur pa ste/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog mthing nag/ sku smad mun
226a6(chi): cad zur gsum la/ thong rlon sbrul nag gris brgyan pa/ dug gsum stongs pa'i kha T+wAM ka/ bgra chags 'dral ba'i sta re dang // zil gnon ri rab 'debs pa'i phur bu 'dril//
226a7(chi): ral gri'i sgra la phur bu'i so// rigs kyi dbu rgyan thugs la 'bar ba'i mchog/ sku la khros pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i mchog cig 'thon te/ bka' nod pa'i tshul gyis
226b1(chi): spyan snga na gnas so// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ zhes pas/ ye she kyi yi ge lngas gnas lngar byin brlabs dbang bskur 'od kyi b+h+rUM/
226b2(chi): oM hri phaT/ ces pas na/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs mdzad// hUM hU~M hUM phaT phaT phaT/ spro bsdu'i 'phrin las sa bon no// 'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs
226b3(chi): / rgyas rnams// de yi sku la 'jug pa'i phyir// oM badz+ra kI li ki lA ya A be sha a a/ khros pa'i phyag drug tha ma gnyis// sras mchog de yi rked nas bzung //
226b4(chi): / sor bcu rigs kyi yab yum bcus// sbyor ba'i byin brlabs spro bsdu las// de nas sku gsung thugs nyid du/ byin gyis brlab pa mchog tu mdzad// oM badz+ra kI li
226b5(chi): ki la ya dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dzA la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya sarba dus stan hri da sho da yA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya tsin+ta tsan+ta hUM phaT/ sras kyi dam pa mchog de la/
226b6(chi): mchod de thugs dam rgyu de bskul nas// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di brjod do// oM l-i hUM laM staM ba nAn/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha ga wa na shi krin rmi yin pa dz+ra ka ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/
226b7(chi): / badz+ra kI li ki lA ya dza hUM baM he/ sarba b+hi gA nan ki la ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM/ zhes pas/ dregs pa'i snying la gdag/ a nyid byang chub sems kyi khrus/
227a1(chi): bdag dang gzas pa nyis ka la'o// skrag dang gzi mdangs nyid la bstim// phur bu nyid kyang gzi byin pa skyed// 'od dang mthu dpung lhag par
227a2(chi): bskyed// de nas rgyal ba thams cad la// rdo rje'i tshig 'dis bskul te// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs
227a3(chi): 'dzin pa dag dang gzhan rnams la// gnod cing gdug sems ldan pa dang // dge ba'i bar du gcod pa rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam
227a4(chi): gyis ni de bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral nas kyang // lus ngag rdul du ba shig nas ni// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM badz+ra kI li ki la
227a5(chi): ya ra tri ru tra rak+ka tsin+da tsan+da hUM phaT/ tad+ya tha tad tha ye hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnas lnga 'khor zhing thim pas/ nyon mongs pa las grub
227a6(chi): pa'i gangos babs kyi phung po bshig par mdzad do// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku za byed du byin gyis
227a7(chi): brlabs pa'i phyir/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na dza la raM/ zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje ye shes kyi me dpal dud kha 'bar ba gcig rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yon dang por phul te/
227b1(chi): nyon mongs pa gnas su dag cing zhal du gsol bar dbang bskur ro// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kyang dregs pa de'i bag chags kun rdo rje ye shes kyi me dpal gyis
227b2(chi): bsregs te/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya ratI ru tra rak+ka b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ ces pawi sngags 'thon te/ phung po lhag rol la 'khor zhing rin po che'i mchod sdong du dgongs
227b3(chi): te zhal du gsol lo// de'i tshe dregs pa'i rgyal po de'ang rdo rje khros pa'i lho khyim na bde ba'i gnas su phyin te/ las dge sdig gi don mthong ste gnas pa las/
227b4(chi): khros pas phyag brang la bsnol nas kun rdzob sgyu ma dang tshul bstun te btsir bas/ mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho 'khyil te slar dran pa rnyed par gyur to// de nas
227b5(chi): / yang rdo rje khros pas/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las snam nas khro ba sme 'thon te/ oM badz+ra kI la kI lA ya ra tri ru tra rak+Sha/ badz+ra ya kra kro ta bi tsa ya kha'i kha'i
227b6(chi): zhes bskul te/ des mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho de dag slar rngubs pa las dran pa rnyed nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma rdo rje khros pa'i sku// shin tu bde ba'i gnas
227b7(chi): bshig nas// snam du thon pa thugs rje chung // bdag kyang rgyal ba'i bka' la thugs rje chung // zhes gsol zhing 'di skad ces sdig pa bshags so// bskal pa
228a1(chi): dpag tu med pa tshun chad nas// da lta tshe lus 'di skyes phan chad du// lha mchog khyod dang smon lan 'thun bsdebs nas// dus 'dir zhal
228a2(chi): mthong yi dam lhur gsol nas// dus tshogs 'di nas bzung nas yi dam lho// snying po byang chub mchog la mi gnas te// tshe rabs 'khor ba gar byung gar skyes
228a3(chi): gsang ba'i lha mchog khyod dang mi 'bral zhing // spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig la// mi 'da' ba dang yun du bdag bsrung gis// lhag chad 'gal
228a4(chi): 'khrul mchis na 'thol lo bshags// las kyi dbang gis bar chad ci byung yang // dpal chen khyod kyis gong bzhin zil gyis gnon// dngos grub mchog
228a5(chi): gsol shes rab lha mo'i sku// zhes bshags so// de nas yang dregs pa de shin tu dga' ba dang ba'i sems skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo khyod la
228a6(chi): rim gro bskyed pa dang // bdag gis sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// bdag gi lus 'di gdan du 'bul// e ma dpa' bo bzhes su gsol// ma sring bu mo chung ma slas kyi
228a7(chi): tshogs dpa' bo khyod la 'bangs su 'bul// 'bangs su 'bul lo bka' la thogs// 'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig/ de nas de'i ma srang chung ma bu mo
228b1(chi): slas kyi tshogs rnams kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dbus su mchis pa'i skal med kyis// dkyil 'khor mu ran mtha' la zhog/ phud la 'tshal ba'i skal
228b2(chi): med kyis// lhag ma kha chus bron la skyo la// zhes gsol te/ dregs pa chen po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis lus gdan du phul bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
228b3(chi): pa byang / rna ba chos nyid pas shes bya'i sgrib pa byang / rgyal ba'i phab phams nos pas rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor zhal mthong bas 'bras
228b4(chi): bu ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs te/ khas blangs nas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs bskyang bar yang ngam nos/ de gnas so// dregs pa chen po ma dang /
228b5(chi): chung ma dang / slas dang / bran mo rnams ni 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mu ra na la gzhag ste/ bka' la btags shing dam tshig sbyin/ mna' bsgrags shing
228b6(chi): gnas so// dregs pa chen po'i nye 'khor 'dod chags dang / phrag dog dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal las so sor dregs pa'i tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
228b7(chi): ma hA de ba dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams rang rang gi che ba ston cing khro gtum mo// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos khro zhing gtum pa de dag gdul ba'i ched du/
229a1(chi): sras mchog bud+d+ha/ rin chen/ pad+ma las kyi phur pa 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ ma chags pa'i yum la rjes su chags
229a2(chi): pa bskyed de/ rol pa'i byang chub sems las/ oM bud+d+ha kI li kI lA ya sarba b+hig nan baM oM phaT/ sA rat+na kI li kI lA ya sarba b+hi ga nan baM traM phaT/ oM pad+mA kI
229a3(chi): li kI lA ya sarba b+hi ga nan baM hrI phaT/ hra karma kI li kI lA ya sarba b+h+ri ga nan baM a phaT/ ces pas ni/ de bzhin las kyi khro bo phur pa dang / de bzhin rin chen khro bo
229a4(chi): las kyi phur pa dang / pad+ma khro bo las kyi phur pa dang / las rab khro bo las kyi phur pa rnams 'thon te/ smug nag sngo ldang ser nag dmar nag gcer bu rnams/
229a5(chi): sku stong zhal gsum phyag bzhi la// sku smad phur pa so so las kyi dbyibs// gzhi 'thun phyag mtshan bsnams// rang rang rigs kyis mtshan mar brgyan//
229a6(chi): dbu la rigs bsrungs thugs la srog kyang 'bar// thod rlon sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams// zlum 'khyil gru bzhi zla gam gru gsum gdengs pa yi/ bden
229a7(chi): la 'khod de bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas// byin brlabs dbang bskur la sogs rim par mdzad // de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i
229b1(chi): sras mchog kI la ya 'di skad ces bskul zhing / drag po sgrol ba'i las la btsud do// oM/ zlum la 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba 'phro ba'i sku
229b2(chi): bzhengs pa// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug dregs pa chen po sgral du gsol// swa gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar
229b3(chi): ba 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs pa// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal dregs pa chen po sbrul du gsol// oM/ zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil
229b4(chi): 'khor na// 'bar ba 'phro ba'i sku bzhugs pa// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas// 'dod chags dregs pa chen po sbrul du gsol// ha gru gsum
229b5(chi): gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba 'phro ba'i ske bzhugs pa// las rab 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog dregs pa chen po sgal du gsol//
229b6(chi): zhes bskul bar mkhyen te/ na ma sa many+dza nan kA ya b+hag tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM ga ga gra ta ya/ sarba dus tan ma ra ya hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/
229b7(chi): d+ha rong A~M rA ba ya ti/ kA ya wa b+ha son pa dz+ra kI la ya hU~M paT/ bung kI la la par byeng dran hU~M phaT/ rad+ha kI la la byin sbyin mar ma hU~M 9/ dz+riM/ badz+ra na
230a1(chi): lA yad+ha rod adz+nyA pa tri/ kA ya wa g+ha tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ bud+d+ha kI la ya pra ra b+hid d+ha nA hUM phaT/ rat+na kI la ya g+h+ri na g+h+ri na hUM phaT/
230a2(chi): pad+ma kI li kI lA ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ karma ki la ya b+hid d+hu hU~M phaT/ cesra pa'i sngags brjod cing rdo rje 'dus pa'i phyag gis rigs bzhi phur pa'i rked nas rim par
230a3(chi): bzung zhing / dregs pa bzhi ni sgrol bar mdzad do// dri'i tshe dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sras mchog pad+ma de la 'di skad ces bkos shing bskul
230a4(chi): bar mdzad do// 'di skad ces cho 'phrul sgra dus gcig na bsgrags so// kye ma sangs rgyas mang po'i sras// dge ba'i bar chod byed pa dang // gdug cing bar chod ldang sems
230a5(chi): ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smra ru chug/ phob cig rnam par gzir nas kyang //
230a6(chi): nga yi dbang du bsdus byas te// lus dang ngag sems rdul du bshigs nas ni// dug gsum sha khrag zhal du bsdus rngubs nas// bsgo ba'i las rnams khyod kyis grub par
230a7(chi): gyis/ zhes rnam par bskul te/ btab cing bsgral bar mdzad do// de'i don gyis 'byongs stong ma nyes rgongs 'bras bu rdzogs par mdzad do// /
230b1(chi): de nas yang dregs pa lnga'i chung ma ste/ dngos 'dzin ma dang / stag gdong ma dang / mtshan ma can dang / chad pa mo dang / rmugs mo la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi che ba
230b2(chi): ston cing / shin tu chags pa dang ldan pa las/ de nas yang khrag 'thung khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu/ gsal ba rdo rje dang / sra ba rdo rje dang / sdud pa rdo rje
230b3(chi): dang / 'bar ba rdo rje dang / g.yo ba rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang / 'khor lo 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma dang / rin chen
230b4(chi): 'khor ba rgyas 'de bas ma dang / pad+ma 'khor ba rgyas 'de bas ma dang / las rab 'khor ba rgyas 'de bas ma dang / nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yum chen mo 'khor ba
230b5(chi): rgyas 'debs ma'i sku gsung thugs yo na tan 'phrin las 'thon te/ rgyan dang / cha lugs dang / sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan rnams rigs kyi sras dang chu bstun te/
230b6(chi): dregs pa mo rnams gong bzhin du bsgral te tshar bcad nas/ sras mchog la 'khril pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas yang dregs pa'i 'khor na/
230b7(chi): 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jig rten pa'i las las grub pa'i phyogs skyong ba bcu ste/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / me lha dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / chu lha
231a1(chi): dang rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang ldan dang / sa bdag rnams dang / brnab sems dang / ma byin len pa dang / log par lta
231a2(chi): ba dang / srog gcod pa dang / phra ma dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / ngag 'khyal pa dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / gnod sems dang / tshig brlang
231a3(chi): stemi dge bcu dregs nas/ nga rgyal gyi mthu ston cing / shin tu yang bstan pa la mi dad pa'i tshul ston pa las/ de rnams gdul ba'i phyir na yang rdo rje khros pa'i
231a4(chi): sku gsung thugs gzhon nus rol pa'i stobs dang / zlog pa'i stobs dang / 'joms pa'i stobs dang / 'jigs byed kyi stobs dang / brjid pa'i stobs dang /
231a5(chi): shugs 'chang ba'i stobs dang / gzir ba'i stobs dang / gnon pa'i stobs dang / 'debs pa'i stobs dang / ma chags pa'i stobs dang / stobs bcu 'byung
231a6(chi): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ma chags pa'i yum la chags pa'i tshul du rol lo// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ khros pa'i rgyal po hUM/
231a7(chi): kar zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin rnam par rgyal ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje gsheng po dang / mi g.yo mgon po dang / rta mgrin dang / gzhan gyis
231b1(chi): mi thub pa dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo stobs po che la sogs pa rnams 'thon te/ zhal gsum phyag drug
231b2(chi): pazhabs bzhi dang ldan zhing / zhal mdog dang phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa/ 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i chu lugs su byung ste/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng
231b3(chi): 'og tu 'phros 'dus te gnas so// de la khros pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces bskul lo// rdo rje khros pa'i tshogs
231b4(chi): rnams kyis// ma dag mi dge'i las spyod cing // dge ba'i bar chad byed pa rnams// sngon cad dam bcas ji bzhin du// mngon spyod 'phrin las dus la bab//
231b5(chi): ces bskul bas dbang bskur nas ye shes kyi phur pa de khros pa'i phyag tu re res bskur nas/ dregs pa bcu sgrol bar mnga' gsol bas/ khro bo bcu bskul ba'i
231b6(chi): don du thugs su chud par mdzad de/ hUM gardza gardza badz+ra phaT/ ha na hA na badz+ra phaT/ hUM da ha da ha badz+ra phaT/ pa tsa ba tsa badz+ra phaT/ ban d+ha bran d+ha badz+ra phaT/
231b7(chi): hu lu hu lu badz+ra phaT/ ti ta tita badz+ra phaT/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha badz+ra phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha badz+ra phaT/ spo ta s+pho ta badz+ra phaT/ ces gsungs shing phyag gi phur pas dregs pa
232a1(chi): rnams rim par mngon pa bsgral lo// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ badz+ra kro d+ha ka pa la hUM/ zhes brjod de/ khro bo rnams kyi
232a2(chi): phyag g.yas g.yon dang po ru rdo rje 'bar ba dang dung chen 'joms pa'i byin te/ badz+ra kro d+ha kha'i/ zhes bskul bas/ khros pas rnams kyis mi dge ba bcu dag par
232a3(chi): bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje thod pa'i gtun du brdungs te zhal du gsol ba ni/ khro bo rnams dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha ha zhes bsgrags so// de'i tshe 'khor ba mi dge bcu las rgyal
232a4(chi): nas dbang bcu la mnga' brnyes pa'i mos pa la dbang ba dang / byang chub sems la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / tshe la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbyung
232a5(chi): dang / chos la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba la sogs pa brnyes so//
232a6(chi): de ltar mdzad pas skye ba'i rgyun bcad// nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs/ 'khor ba'i brag chags bcom/ 'chi bdag tshar bcad/
