232a7(chi): rtag chad kyi mtha' bsal/ las dge sdig shan phye/ log pa'i don la ye shes kyi mthu bstan/ 'khor ba'i bdud la ye shes kyi rtsi btang / khams gsum sku
232b1(chi): gsung thugs su ru bzlog/ che ba'i ye shes stobs kyi zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags su/ khro bo rnams kyi snam nas phyogs skyong rnams 'thon te/ rnam par shes
232b2(chi): pa ni rdo rje dang / de bzhin rin chen dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs rnams kyi zhing khams su shes bya dag nas/ chos skyong ba'i bsrung mar dbang bskur/ lus
232b3(chi): rnams ni rang rang gi khro bo rnams la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir gdan du phul/ lag cha mda' gzhu dang / rdo rje dang / gadrong po dang / me dpung 'bar ba
232b4(chi): dang dbyug tho/ spu gri dang zhags pa// ban d+ha dang dbyug to// kha trong dang bum pa rnams ni rgyal byed dpa' rtags kyi phyag mtshan du rang rang gi khro bo la phyag tu phul te gnas so//
232b5(chi): de nas yang phyogs skyong rnams kyi rim pa ste/ tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / brgya byin gyi chung ma dang / me lha'i chung ma dang / gshin rje'i chung ma dang / srin po'i chung ma dang /
232b6(chi): chu lha'i chung ma dang / rlung lha'i chung ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi chung ma dang / dbang ldan gyi chung ma dang / sa bdag gi chung ma rnams skyon bcu la bag chags ltas pa ni/
232b7(chi): ma rig pa'i skyon dang / zhen pa'i skyon dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa'i skyon dang / g.yeng ba'i skyon dang / 'chal pa'i skyon dang / le lo'i skyon dang / rmongs pa'i
233a1(chi): skyon dang / bskur pa'i skyon dang / khong khro ba'i skyon dang / rtsod pa la dga' ba'i skyon dang / rgyu'i tshogs ma bsags pa'i skyon no//
233a2(chi): re lta bu'i skyon gyis 'chel pos/ bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag gdul ba'i phyir nA/ ye shes khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i don la
233a3(chi): mnyam par gzhag ste/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
233a4(chi): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha
233a5(chi): rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / g.yos pa'i tshul gyis ma g.yos pa'i yum la rol te/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/
233a6(chi): zhes pas/ khro mo rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang / khro mo rdo rje rnam snyems ma dang / khro mo rdo rje sder mo dang / khro mo rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag po dang / khro mo rdo rje gtun khung ma dang /
233a7(chi): khro mo rdo rje gtum mo dang / khro mo rdo rje mda' snyems ma dang / khro mo rdo rje rlung 'byin ma dang / khro mo rdo rje gsod ma dang / khro mo rdo rje bskyod ma rnams 'thon te/ stong
233b1(chi): nyid dbyings las chos dbyings sgra bsgrags/ skye ba med pa'i dbyings la don skems/ rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings las thugs rjes bzung / mi dmigs pa'i dbyings
233b2(chi): su mtshan ma'i dngos po bsdus/ mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom/ chos dag pa'i dbyings su 'gro ba'i don la brtson/ dag pa'i
233b3(chi): dbyings kyis nyon mongs pa'i gnas su rdeg/ gsal zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings nas bag chags kyi dngos po sun phyung / rtog med sgrol ba'i dbyings su sgrib pa'i ba ga
233b4(chi): chags bsad// g.yos dang chen po'i dbyings kyis mi dge ba'i skyon bskyod de gnas so// de nas dregs pa'i bu pho de sems can gyi lus
233b5(chi): la phag dang / stag dang / g.yag dang / sha ba dang / gzig dang / byi la dang / spyang ki dang / seng ge dang / dom dang / dred kyi mgo rtags rnams/ rmugs
233b6(chi): pa dang rnam smin med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang / shin tu chags pa dang / gnya'i ga ma yin pa dang / ngan sems kyi g.yo ba dang / tshul khrims
233b7(chi): nyams pa dang / mtshan mas nyams pa dang / las log pa dang / mos pa'i las gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / shes rab ma
234a1(chi): / yin pa dang / bde ba ma yin pa dang / gsal ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa ma bdar ba dang / don ma rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus
234a2(chi): dang mi ldan pa dang / kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa dang / rang bzhin med par mi shes pa dang / gnyid dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa la sogs pa la spyod pa'o// de nas
234a3(chi): sbyang zhing gdul ba'i phyir na yang / rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ rtog 'joms dang / dpa' gtum dang / ji tshar dang / dus 'jug dang / spyod rdzogs dang /
234a4(chi): thabs mkhas dang / za byed dang / rigs btsun dang / gsod byed dang / myos byed la sogs pa de rnams dang / tshul 'thun pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag
234a5(chi): nas ma chags pa'i yul la thabs kyis rol te/ dgyes pa'i sprin las// d+ha hA hA d+ha d+ha hA hA hU d+ha d+ha/ zhes brjod pas ni/ sras 'phags pa'i lus la sems can
234a6(chi): gong dang tshul 'thun pa'i mgo btags pa bcu ste/ dregs pa'i bu pho rnams gong bzhin du btul zhing bsgral te dam la btags so// de nas yang dregs
234a7(chi): pa'i bu mo ste/ sems can gyi lus la/ smigs bu dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / pu shud dang / pha wang dang / sre mong dang / byi ba'i
234b1(chi): mgo bo btags pa rnams ni chags pa dang / yid g.yo ba dang / phrag dog pa dang / rtsod pa ldang ba dang / le lo byas pa dang / rtsod pa 'tshal ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal
234b2(chi): pa dang / 'tsho ba 'tshal ba dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa la sogs pa las byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa
234b3(chi): dang sems rgod pa dang / sems 'byed pa dang / dge la mi 'jug pa dang / tshig brlang po dang / bag med pa dang / spyod pa brlang po dang / khrel med pa dang /
234b4(chi): log pa las 'tsho ba dang / rgod pa ste sems ma zhi ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang / de rnams spyod par 'gyur te/ de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir na ni/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung
234b5(chi): thugs gzhon nus/ mi 'gyur ba dang / thogs med dang / gsal byed dang / mthong byed dang / thabs byed dang / bkra byed dang / sbyin byed dang / g.yo byed dang /
234b6(chi): sku la med dang / dku byed la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i sprin las/ he he he he he he he he he he/ zhes pas ni/
234b7(chi): yang gong gi sems can dang tshul 'thun pa'i sras 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo btags pa bcu sprul te/ gong bzhin du btul te bsgral nas dam la btag+sa
235a1(chi): so// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba'i phyir na/ don mthun don spyod dang / sbyin
235a2(chi): pa dang / snyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ma chags thabs kyis rol pa dang / dzaHhUM ba~M ho/ zhes pas lha mo pu shud kyi mgo dang / skye ka dang / srin bya rong
235a3(chi): khra la sogs pa'i mgo can bzhi 'thon te/ gzhal yas kyi sgo la 'khod de/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang ba dang / drag po la sogs pas de'i don mdzad de/
235a4(chi): snying rje dang / byams pa dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ngang du gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang ngam sri dmar po chen po bya ba/ gsang
235a5(chi): sngags la skur zhing smad pa las gyur pa zhig/ sngon gyi las kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bar chod byed cing 'tshe ba las/ sangs rgyas ma lus pas rdo rje khros pa
235a6(chi): la bka' bsgo ba mdzad do// rdo rje gsang ba'i don rtogs par dka' ba la ni/ sdig can dam sri 'da' byed pa/ stobs can khro bo chen po yis/ klad pa tshal pa brgya
235a7(chi): ru khos/ nyon cig las kyi dam sri 'di// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// ces bskul bas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gzhon nus// dam sri de la ye shes
235b1(chi): kyi mtshan gyi phur pas mgo la brgyapa ste/ mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin 'gas so// de'i de gsang ba'i snying po 'di 'thon te/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya dam sri gam b+ha ri b+han
235b2(chi): d+ha b+han d+ha hUM phaT/ ces bsgral nas/ rnam shes rgyal ba'i sras su byas/ sha rus dur khrod kyi gzhal yas/ don snying dur khrod rdzas kyi mchod pa ru rol pas/ de'i sras
235b3(chi): sring mo dang / ma dang / bu mo dang / chung ma rnams ni/ rdo rje khros pa la pad+ma'i mdangs phul te/ rgyal ba'i dam mnos/ phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskyang bar dam
235b4(chi): bcas so// de ltar dregs pa can de dag thams cad de dag sgral zhing tshar bcad pa de'i tshe na/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'di skad ces dam mnos te/
235b5(chi): dam chos gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// dngos grub bar chad byed pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// zhes gsungs te
235b6(chi): sring mo dang chas pas dam nos/ de nas bstan pa bskyang bar zhal gyis bzhes so// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kyang lung phog ste/ dam las 'das na snying po 'dis khyod nyid
235b7(chi): kyang mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrogs te/ bsgral bar dam bcas so// rdo rje khros/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sarba a na ya ta tha ya tha ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// de'i tshe dregs
236a1(chi): pa mo'i gtso mos kyang / rang gi snying po 'di bsgrubs te bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// ma ma pa shi ku ru hUM/ ma ta nya ka ra i nan ti ki hUM
236a2(chi): phaT/ ma ma karma shrI ka ka re ye/ zhes stabs phul te/ phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskyang bar byas nas/ mthu'i bdag nyid du mtshan gsol lo// de nas yang bdud nag pa
236a3(chi): bklag med kyi bu mo dang / gza' byi tI pa tra'i bu mo dang / btsan shru bo'i bu mo dang / klu 'jog po'i bu mo rnams bsgral zhing sbyor bar dgongs pa las/ rang dam srog
236a4(chi): gi snying po stabs cing phul nas/ rdo rje phur pa'i dam nos te/ e pa ra tsi ta ya/ a tsi ta d+ha ya/ dza ya bi dza ye ma ra na pra marta na ye/ zhes pa dang / phyi rabs
236a5(chi): kyi rnal 'byor gyi dam bskangs pa byas te/ gsang bdag chen mor mtshan gsol lo// de nas yang 'jig rten phung bar byed de/ lcags kyi khyi mo ral pa can dang /
236a6(chi): lcags kyi spyad mo mgo dgu dang / zangs kyi wa mo rkang gsum dang / gser gyi 'phar ma lce brgyad ma la sogs pas/ 'gro ba kun sgrol zhing za ba las/ bcom
236a7(chi): ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs pas/ bsgral bar dgongs nas/ srog snying phul te dam nos so// dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu/
236b1(chi): ru badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ zhes pa dang / pho nya sho nar mtshan gsol lo// de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams btul bsgral sbyar
236b2(chi): gnas stabs dam pa btags par mdzad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje khro bo rolnga pas ma dad pa btul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// /
236b3(chi): / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod
236b4(chi): pa bstabs te/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya kro d+ha kro d+ha hi he phaT/ di pa/ dub pa/ sus pa/ su ka/ gan+d+ha/ i ta a mr-i ta/ ba len ta/ rak+tabo d+he tsi ta ho/
236b5(chi): zhes pas phyi dag pa'i mchod pa dang / nang khyad par gyi mchod pa dang / gsang ba dga' ba'i mchod pas mngon par mchod pa'o// mdzad spyod kyi don bsdus pas//
236b6(chi): dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mngon pa bstong pa ni/ e ma'o bdud bzhi bcom nas yon tan drug dang ldan// yod med mtshan ma'i dngos po kun las 'das// don dam thugs
236b7(chi): ni 'da' dka' shin tu gsang // gsung ni gsang sngags ma lus kun gyi gtso// thams cad ma lus kun la mnga' snyems bdag po'i sku// bcom ldan gsang bdag rdo rje khros
237a1(chi): pa'i sku// gsung thugs gzhon nus thams cad mkhyen mdzad de// ston pa'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// skye med ye shes dang
237a2(chi): las kI la ya// zhe sdang 'byongs pas dmyal ba'i 'jig rten stongs// thugs kyi dam tshig skong te rdo rje rigs kyang mnyes// gsal la ma 'dres me long ye shes mnyes//
237a3(chi): / rdo rje 'dus pa 'chad pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'grag med dang las sangs rgyas kI la ya// gti mug 'byongs pas byol song 'jig rten
237a4(chi): stongs// sku yi dam tshi go skongs te de bzhin rigs kyang mnyes// dmigs su med pa'i ye shes chen po mnyes// sku mchog dam pa de lnga phyag 'tshal
237a5(chi): bstod// dmigs med ngang las rin chen kI la ya// nga rgyal 'byongs pas lha min 'jig rten stongs// spyi yi dam tshig skongs te rin chen rigs kyang
237a6(chi): mnyes// kun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid ye shes snyems// yon tan dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstong // dmigs pa med pa'i ngang las pad+ma kI la ya//
237a7(chi): 'dod chags 'byongs pas mi yi 'jig rten stongs// gsung gi dam tshig skongs te pad+ma'i rigs kyang mnyes// kun mkhyen so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mnyes//
237b1(chi): gsung mchog dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro med 'ong med ngang las las rab kI la ya// phrag dog 'byongs pas lha min 'jig rten stongs// khyad par dam skongs
237b2(chi): las kyi rigs kyang mnyes// don dam grub pa nan tan ye shes mnyes// 'phrin las dam pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma'o shes rab rang bzhin dag pa las//
237b3(chi): dbyings kyi rang bzhin gru gsum gsal bar mdzad// dbus nas byang chub sems kyis mtshan// skye med don rnams ston byed ma// shes rab dbyings ma de la phyag
237b4(chi): 'tshal bstod// dngos med dbyings na dngos po'i tshul 'dzin ma// rdo rje rigs kyi yum mchog dpal gyi yum// nam mkha'i 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin dang //
237b5(chi): chos kyi dbyings la mnga' snyems khro mo'i rgyal// rdo rje rgyal 'dreb ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtag chad dang las rtag pa'i tshul 'dzin cing // sangs rgyas rigs kyi khro
237b6(chi): mchog dpal gyi yum// sa yi rang bzhin mi dmigs rang bzhin dang // gsal ba'i dbyings la mnga' brnyes khro bo rgyal// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal
237b7(chi): bstod// mtshan med dbyings las mtshan ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// rin chen rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi yum// me yi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin dang // tsha ba'i
238a1(chi): dbyings la mnga' brnyes khro mo rgyal// rin chen 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtag chang gnyis las chad pa'i tshul 'dzin
238a2(chi): cing / pad+ma rigs kyi khro mchog dpal gyi sku// chu yi 'byung ba mi dmigs rang bzhin dang // sdud pa'i dbyings la mnga' skems khro bo rgyal// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rgyas
238a3(chi): 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rmugs byed dbyings las rmugs pa'i tshul 'dzin cing // las kyi rigs mchog khro mchog dpal gyi gzungs// rlung gi 'byung ba mi
238a4(chi): dmigs rang bzhin dang // g.yo ba'i dbyings la mnga' bsnyems khro mo rgyal// las rab 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// rol pa'i stobs las khro bo
238a5(chi): / hUM ka ra/ tshangs pa tshar bcad rnams sems dbang du sdud// skye shi rtsad bcad stong nyid ye shes bsnyems te mos la dbang // khro rgyal hUM ka ra la phyag 'tshal bstod//
238a6(chi): bzlog pa'i stobs la khro bo rnam par rgyal// brgya byin tshar gcod ma byin len pa spangs// mtha' gnyis rgyal bas me lor ye shes bsnyems te sems la dbang //
238a7(chi): khro rgyal rnam rgyal de la bstod// rdeg pa'i stobs la khro bo dbyug sngon can// me lha tshar bcad log lta dbang du sdud// 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom ste bcom pa'i
238b1(chi): ye shes bsnyems nas ye shes la yang skems// khro rgyal dbyug sngon can la bstod// 'jigs byed stobs las khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// gshin rje tshar gcod
238b2(chi): srog gcod dbang du sdud// 'chi bdag bcom ste mnyam nyid ye shes snyems te tshe la dbang // khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la bstod// gzhon tshul stobs las khro
238b3(chi): rgyal mi g.yo mgon// srin po tshar gcod phra ma dbang du sdud// rtag chad mthar ma g.yos pas mtha' bral ye shes snyems te skye la dbang // khro rgyal mi g.yo
238b4(chi): mgon la bstod// brjid pa'i stobs las khro bo rta mchog dpal// chu lha tshar ba cad log lta dbang du bsdud// rgyu 'bras rim par che ste so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
238b5(chi): bsnyems te chos la dbang // khro rgyal rta mchog dpal la bstod// shugs 'chang stobs las khro bo gzhan mi thu ba// rlung lha tshar bcad ngag rtsub dbang du bsdus//
238b6(chi): gzhan gyi mthu ba tsem ma 'dres ye shes snyems te yo byad dbang // khro rgyal gzhan gyis mi thub pa la bstod// gzir ba'i stobs las khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil//
238b7(chi): gnod sbyin tshar gcod ngag 'khyal dbang du bsdus// bdud la rtsi btang nan tan ye shes bsnyems la dbang // khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil la bstod// gnon pa'i stobs
239a1(chi): las khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'byung po tshar bcad gnod sems dbang du bsdus// khams gsum las rgyal don yod ye shes bsnyen/
239a2(chi): te smon lam dbang // khro bo khams gsum rgyal la bstod// 'debs pa'i stobs las khro bo stobs po che// sa bdag tshar bcang tshig brlung dbang du sdud// khams
239a3(chi): gsum sku gsung thugs su stobs te tshe ye shes bsnyems rdzu 'phrul dbang // khro rgyal stobs po che la bstod// ye shes pha rol phyin las khro mo sgra 'byin ma// tshangs pa'i
239a4(chi): chung ma tshar bcad ma rig skon yang sel// stong nyid dbyangs las chos dbyings sgra sgrogs te// khro mo skra 'byin de la bstod// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin las rdo rje rnam snyems
239a5(chi): mA/ brgya byin chung ma tshor bcad zhen pa'i rkyen yang sel// skye ba med pa'i dbyings las don bsnyems te// khro mo rnams snyems ma la bstod// bsam gtan pha rol
239a6(chi): phyin las rdo rje sder mo ma// me lha mo ni tshar bcar zhen bzhin ma yin skyon yang sel// skye ba med pa'i dbyings su khams gsum thugs rjes bzung // khro mo sder mo de
239a7(chi): bstod // tshul khrims pha rol phyin las rdo rje dur khrod ma// gshin rje mo ni tshar bcad g.yengs pa'i skyon yang sel// mi dmigs dbyings su mtshan ma dngos po bsdus/
239b1(chi): khro mo dur khrod mo la bstod// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la rdo rje gtun khung ma// srin mo tshar bcang 'chal pa'i skyon yang sel// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'khor
239b2(chi): ba'i bag chag snga bcom// khro mo gtun khung ma la bstod// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin las rdo rje gtum mo ste// chu lha mo ni tshar bcad le lo dbang du bsdus// chos
239b3(chi): nying dag pa'i dbyings kyis 'gro ba'i don la gtum// khro ma rdo rje gtum mo de la bstod// shes rab pha rol phyin las rdo rje mda' bsnyems ma// rlung lha mo ni tshar bcad
239b4(chi): rmongs pa sel// dag pa'i dbyings kyis nyon mongs ga nang du rdeg/ khro mo mnga' skems ma la bstod// thabs kyi pha rol phyin las rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// gnod sbyin ma ni
239b5(chi): tshar bcad skur ba'i skyon yang sel// gsal zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings kyis bag chags sun yang 'byin// khro mo rlung 'byin ma la bstod// stobs kyi pha rol phyin
239b6(chi): las rdo rje gsod ma ste// dbang ldan ma ni tshar bcad khro ba'i skyon yang sel// rtog med sgrol ba'i dbyings su sgrol ba'i bag chags bsad// khro mo gsod ma de la
239b7(chi): bstod// smon lam pha rol phyin las rdo rje bskyod ma ste// sa bdag tshar bcad rtsod la dga' ba'i skyon yang sol// g.yos pa chen pos sems kyis mi dge ba'i skyon
240a1(chi): bskyod de// khro mo bskyong ma re la bstod// rtog 'joms chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya phag gi mgo/ rmugs pa las
240a2(chi): byung tshangs pa'i bu mo dang // shes rab ma yin gsal bar byed// khro chung phag gi mgo la bstod// dpa' gtum chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phro men pho nya stag
240a3(chi): gi mgo bden med brgya byin bu dang rnam smin dge la btsud// khro chung stag gi mgo la bstod// brdzis tshor yangs pa'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya g.yag gi
240a4(chi): mgo gsal byed lha yi bu drang tshul bzhin don dang bstun// khro chung g.yag gi mgo la bstod// dus 'jug chen mo'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya sha ba'i mgo/
240a5(chi): chags las byung ba gshin rje'i bu dang // bden pa ma yin sel bar byed// khro chung sha ba'i mgo la bstod// spyod rdzogs chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men
240a6(chi): pho nya gzig gi mgo/ gnyis ka las byung ma yin srin po'i bu dang // ma rtogs pa'i yid ches las// khro chung gzigs mgo de la bstod// thabs mkhas chen po'i
240a7(chi): ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya byi lo'i mgo/ g.yos las gyur pa chu lha'i bu dang // brtson 'grus ma yin don dang ldan// khro chung byi la'i mgo la bstod// za byed
240b1(chi): chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya spyang ki'i mgo/ tshul nyams las byung rlung lha'i bu dang // kha na ma tho med par byed// khro chung spyang ki'i mgo la
240b2(chi): bstong // rigs btsun chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya seng ge'i mgo/ mi dge las byung gnod sbyin bu dang // dge 'phel ma yin ze yis rgyas par byed//
240b3(chi): khro chung seng ge'i mgo la bstod// za byed chen mo'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya dred kyi mgo/ las log las byung 'byung po'i bu dang // rang bzhin med
240b4(chi): pa'i mi shes 'bras bu che// khro chung dred mgo de la bstod// myos byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men pho nya dom gyi mgo/ myos 'gyur las byungs bdag bu
240b5(chi): dang gnyid sel te// khro chung ngom mgo de la bstod// mi 'gyur chen po'i ting 'dzin las// chags pa las byung tshangs pa'i bu mo ste// sems rgod pa ni zhi bar
240b6(chi): byed/ khro mo smigs mgo ma la bstod// thogs med chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men mA ste bya rgod mgo/ yid g.yos las byung brgya byin bu mo dang //
240b7(chi): 'du byed sems ma dbang du sdud// khro mo bya rgod mgo la bstod// gsal byed chen mo'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste bya rog mgo/ phrag dog las 'gyur me
241a1(chi): lha'i bu mo dang // dge la mi 'jug bskul bar mdzad// khro mo bya rog mgo la bstod// mthong byed chen mo'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste
241a2(chi): gro ba'i ma// rtsang bu las byung gA shin rdza bum dang // rlig brlung po ni dbang du thung bar mdzad// khro mo 'ug pa'i mgro la brjod// thams cad chen pa'i
241a3(chi): 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste khwa'i mgo/ le lo las byung srin po'i bu mo dang // bag med pa'i rjes su bskul// khro mo khwa yi mgo la bstod// bkra byed chen
241a4(chi): po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste pu shud mgo/ spyod 'chal las byung chu lha'i bu mo dang // brlang po'i spyod la dge bar sbyor// khro mo pu shud mgo la bstod//
241a5(chi): sgrisbyin byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men mA ste khra yI mgo/ tshul khrims 'chal pa las byung rlung lha'i bu mo dang // khrel med pa ni chos nyid rang du bcom//
241a6(chi): khro mo khra mgo ma la bstod// g.yo byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra me nu ma ste pha wang mgo/ 'tsho ba nyams byung ba gnod sbyin bu mo dang // log par 'tsho
241a7(chi): ba dang du len// khro mo pha wang mgo la bstod// stsal byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste sre mo'i mgo/ bdag tu 'dzin pa las byung dbang
241b1(chi): ldan bu mo dang // sems g.yeng rgod pa zhi pa ste// khro mo sre mongs mgo la bstod// sku byed chen po'i tring 'dzin las// 'phra men ma ste byi ba'i mgo/ nyon
241b2(chi): mongs mtshungs par ldan pa las byung sa bdagra bu mo dang // g.yo dang sgyu ni mi gnas te// khro mo byi la'i mgo la bstod// don 'thun las byung lha mo lcags kyu
241b3(chi): ma/ zhi bas don mdzad tshad med snying rje bsnyems// de bzhin rigs kyi mngags zhugs pu shud mgo la bstod// don spyod las byung lha mo zhags pa ma// rgyas
241b4(chi): pas don mdzad tshad med byams pa bsnyems// rin chen rigs kyi mnga' zhugs skya ka'i mgo la bstod// sbyin pa las byung lha mo lcags sgrog ma// dbang du spyod pas tshad med
241b5(chi): dga' ba snyems// pad+ma'i rigs kyi mnga' bzhugs srin bya'i mgo la bstod// bsnyem pa las byung lha mo dril 'khrol ma// drag shul spyod pas tshad med btang snyoms bsnyems/
241b6(chi): las kyi rigs kyi mnga' zhugs khwa'i mgo la bstod/ de nas yang gsang ba'i sngags kyi don gsol ba ni/ e ma'o rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon
241b7(chi): nuHmi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo de'i// gsang ba'i sngags rnams bshang du gsol// zhes gsol pa'i don thugs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung
242a1(chi): thugs gzhon nus dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gsang sngags 'di rnams ched du brjod do// hUM oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sarba b+hi ga nan baM hUM hUM phaT/
242a2(chi): hU~M badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sarba b+hi ga nan baM hUM hUM phaT/ oM bu d+d+ha kI li kI lA ya sar+b+ba b+hi ga nan baM hUM phaT/ tra rat+na kI lI kI lA ya sarba b+hi ga nan paM hUM phaT/ ha karma kI l-i kI lI
242a3(chi): ya sarba b+hi ga nan baM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tI ba ta tsa tra ha na ha na hUM/ hUM badz+ra kro d+hi ti ba ta tsakrA ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha kro d+hi ti ba ta tsakrA ha na ha na hUM phaT/ traM rat+na kro d+hi ti ba
242a4(chi): twa tsak+ka ha na ha na hUM phaT/ hri pad+ma kro d+hI ti ba ta tsakrA ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ha karma kro d+hi tI ba ta tsakrA ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hU~M/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha
242a5(chi): bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la raN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban
242a6(chi): d+ha ba na d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi d+ha hUM hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a rmaM ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tsin+da
242a7(chi): tsin+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la hUM/ s+pho ta ya s+pho ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi la se ka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
242b1(chi): kro d+hi tra twe ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sta nA pa ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi mu ha la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tri tre ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sha ya ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi pa ya ted+hi/
242b2(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma ra na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tsun d+he ma hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra a ka ra mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra bya gri mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra tsa sa ra mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra ha ri ka mu
242b3(chi): ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra byi ha gri mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra pa tsa la mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra seng kr-i mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra na gu la mu ka hUM phaT/ ha badz+ra ri ka mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra
242b4(chi): u tita ka mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra kri ta mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra kro d+ho na kha mu kha hUM phaT/ he badz+ra hu lu ka mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra ba ya ti mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra b+ha ga sha ta ha
242b5(chi): mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra tsa ta mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra ti ti la mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra ta sha ma mu ka hUM phaT/ he badz+ra ka si ka mu ka hUM phaT/ dza badz+ra ba ra te hUM phaT/
242b6(chi): hUM ba ga sha ha hUM phaT/ baM badz+ra a g+ni d+ha hUM phaT/ ho badz+ra ma ra na hUM phaT/ ces rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags dang / bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags dang /
242b7(chi): bskul ba las kyi sngags rnams ched du brjod do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor rgyas par bstan pa dang / sdud pa pos mchod cing bstod nas
243a1(chi): gsung sngags kyi don zhus pa dang / de'i lan rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang
243a2(chi): rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu la/ rmad du byung ba'i glu sna tshogs pas mngon par mchod nas
243a3(chi): ma dad pa'i sems can chen po de la/ de lta ba'i mdzad spyod bstan pa/ e maho ngo mtshar ya mtshan to// de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag dang / gnas dang //
243a4(chi): 'khor dang / phur pa'i yo byad dus tshod rnams/ dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol bas/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ gsol ba'i don thugs su
243a5(chi): chud de/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// rnal don zhus pa ya mtshan che// e ma nyon la yid la zung // gang zag bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rigs
243a6(chi): bzangs kun gyis bkur zhing kun la mdzes// dbyibs legs song ba nyon mongs chung // longs spyod ldan zhing sgo yangs spyod lam mdzes// gang gi las
243a7(chi): lam rmongs bzo ba'i bye brag phyed// phyi nang sde snod thams cad la// thos bsam bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i// las su dge bcu ldan zhing chos spyod tshad med
243b1(chi): nga la gnas// bstan pa rgya mtsho 'dul khrims sdom pa'i ngang la gnas te dam tshig bsrung // bla med theg pa rnam gsum la// bye brag grub pa'i nyams drod ldan//
243b2(chi): dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid 'phrin las bye brag phyed// ting 'dzin las su rung ba'i drod tshad rtags mthong ba'i// dbang gi rim pa ma lus rdzogs pa ni// de ltar
243b3(chi): ldan pa rdo rje bla ma yin// de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'breng // de dang mi ldan skyon du gyur pa'i bla ma ni// gsang sngags 'bras bu bla ma la bltos pas// tho tshor chod
243b4(chi): gzu lum ma yin par// thabs kyi rim pas spang bar bya'o// gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// gnod sbyin mo yi spar rjes sam// gnod sbyin mtshon cha'i bshal
243b5(chi): rjes sam// klu gdug dag gi rgyun srang ram// rten dang 'brel ba'i ya ga can// rnal 'byor chen pos spang bar bya'o// yang na dngos grub myur bar bshad//
243b6(chi): ma spangs nam phugs rang la gnod// steng 'og par snang brtags pa ni// 'khor lo gnam la pad+ma sa// phyogs mtshams kun tu rdo rje brag/ gzhu ldan bkra/
243b7(chi): shis dam pa'o// dbyibs legs lung pa ran pa dang // 'bru khungs chu shing 'tshams pa dang // gcan gzan mi rgod nyam nga med// mi rang mi min rgyun
244a1(chi): srang nyung // 'di ni yid 'ongs dam pa ste// de ni dang du blang bar bya// spang dang dang du blang ba ni// bdag gi ting 'dzin nyams dang
244a2(chi): sbyar/ ting 'dzin nyams na ngan pad+ma// ting 'dzin g.yel na bzang pad+ma// ting 'dzin drod dang ldan gyur na// ngan pa'i gnas rnams gong ma der// bsgrub
244a3(chi): po la sogs byas na yang // ngan pa'i las kyis ngan pa grub// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang // grim 'byin shugs kyis ting 'dzin gsal/
244a4(chi): bzang po'i gnas su bsgrub 'gyur na// yun du bsrings na phungs 'tshengs med// de bas gzhung dang ldan par bya'o// 'khor gyi rim pa bstan pa ni// kha cang g.yo
244a5(chi): sgyu med pa dang // re ma la nyams shed ldan pa dang // brlang po gzhan gyis slu bar lci// sgos nyan dus la rub pa dang // gang zag pho mo de lta bu// ba sgrub/
244a6(chi): po'i spyi yi 'khor du bya// rgyal 'theb stobs dang ldan pa dang / las mkhan bye brag phyed pa dang // brtul zhugs 'chang ba'i ging chen dang // drod tshad zin pa'i
244a7(chi): spyan mthong dang // gtsang sbras phyed pa'i g.yos pa ni// bsgrubs pa rtsa ba'i 'khor du bya// rigs bzhi'i 'os bzhi tshul bzhi dang // yon tan bcu gcig
244b1(chi): ldan pa yi// mtshan bzangs bkra shis yum mchog ni// dgyes skyong gsang ba'i 'khor du bya// phur pa dag gi mtshan nyid ni// phur pa'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste//
244b2(chi): dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams zhi ba'i rgyu// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams rgyas pa'i rgyu// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams dbang gi rgyu/
244b3(chi): lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams drag po'i rgyu// rmig zlum rkang la zhi ba bya// rkang leb rkang la rgyas pa bya// 'dab chags rkang la dbang yang bya/
244b4(chi): sder chags rkang la drag po bya// lo ma me tog yal ga med// shi shing nag po myu gu la// drag po las kyi phur pa bya'o// pho mo 'dod pa'i srid ma zin// skos
244b5(chi): pu ru le ba mtshan la ni// de la dbang gi phur pa bya// pho dang mo yi mtshan ma 'dod// ma ning nag po'i mtshan la ni// de la rgyas pa'i phur pa bya// bu tsha rigs
244b6(chi): rgyud srid ma zin// dre rta nag po'i mtshan la ni// de la zhi ba'i phur pa bya// 'di ni kun rdzob phur pa'i rgyu// rtogs pa'i don la mi dgos te// ma rtogs don
244b7(chi): du bstan par zad// kun gyi don ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs te// gzhan nas rgyu nyid btsal mi dgos// ba tsa la yang rgyal ba'i mi
245a1(chi): bsnyems so// phur pa'i tshad ni 'di lta ste// rang 'byung chen po'i phur pa la// sems nyid gsal ba'i tshad btang na// kun rdzob
245a2(chi): tshang 'di mi dgos te// dman pa'i don du tshad bstan to// sor bzhi pa dang sror drug dang // brgyad dang bcu gnyis yang dag bstan// rtse mo'i phyogs ni ma nor
245a3(chi): bar rtsu ba la ni rgya mdur bya// myu gu ngos su rtse mo bya// spyi bor sor gcig rgya mdud bya// rked par de bzhin bya ba ste// stod kyi dbyibs ni zur brgyad
245a4(chi): lartse mo so sor bya ba la// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam zur gsu ma ste// rtse mtshan so so'i dbyibs su ni// dbang drag gnyis ni chu srin kha nas 'byung // zhi la
245a5(chi): zur drug rgyas la brgyad// ri rab lta bur brdzi che ba// kun rdzob dbyibs su byas pa yin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs kyi ye shes la// yon tan tshang ba'i
245a6(chi): tshul lam dbyibs// de nyid rtogs na 'di mi dgos// rgyu rkyen ma bkag don shes na// rtsa ba rtse mo dbyibs med de// ma rtogs pa la de bstan no// legs
245a7(chi): pa'i yon tan dpag med do// legs na yid rang don la gsung // nyes pa'i skyon ni 'di yin te// gar dag ra byas na bka' las 'gal// ngan dgur byas
245b1(chi): na ldog par 'gyur// de bas legs shing dod par bya// yo byad dam pa byang chub sems// sems kyi stobs kyis rtsol nus na/ thams cad ma lus yo byad
245b2(chi): yin/ ta lha grangs tshangs pa'i phur pa dang // bsgrubs pa rdzas kyi phur pa dang // nyungs kar gu gul rak+Sha rnams// bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i yo byad do// phyi nang gsang
245b3(chi): ba'i mchod rdzas te// bdug pa mar me me tog bshos dang chab// gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // gtso gzungs lhags pa'i byang chub sems// mchod pa gsang
245b4(chi): ba'i yo byad ngo // dur khrod sha dang khrag la sogs// khyi spyang wa 'phar sha khrag dang // mar zhag 'o ma khrag rnams kun// ma mo sten pa'i yo byad do// rabs chad
245b5(chi): nag po'i thod pa dang // lcags sna lnga yi phur pa ni// dam sri mnan pa'i yo byad do// mdzes pa'i gtor mchod phur pa bcu// 'bar ba mtshams kyi phyogs//
245b6(chi): shun chen ko ba stag lpags dang // dar gyi snying nas phyag rgya phu rung dang // cod pan stong g.yogs smad dkris dang // thod 'phreng sbrul gyi chun po bsnams//
245b7(chi): sngags pa rgyun gyi yo byad do// sa ma pany+tsa dza gang tshe dang tshim byed dang // kun tu rgyug dang gal phyi dang // ka ta ri dang zla tshes dang // zla phrom zla rgyas a
246a1(chi): la la 'byor pa tshogs kyi yo byad do// sman dang pra ba ga tsags cha ni// nad 'joms sman gyi yo byad do// go dang phub dang mtshon cha
246a2(chi): bsnams// bar chad dgra bzlo ga yo byad do// bya nag lug nag bsgral ba'i zhing // nyams chag bskang dang rkyen zlo ga yo byad dang // de ltar bstan pa'i yo byad rnams//
246a3(chi): bsgrubs pa lo zla'i yo byad do// ma sma pa dang ma sme ba'i// 'tshogs pas 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// byang chub sems ni rgyu yin te// phyi ma rkyen gyi tshul du gnas/
246a4(chi): rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pas 'bras bu chud ma za'o// 'jug pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor grub pa'i don ldan na// dus tshod med de kun kyang dus// spyod yul kun tu
246a5(chi): bsgrub pa'i dus tshod yin// ma gtogs don du 'di bstan no// dbyar dgun ston dpyid ra ba bzhi// yar gyi ngo la 'jug pa ni// dbyar dgun ston dpyid zla dus so//
246a6(chi): stag glang rta bya'i nyi ma dang // phur pa mig dmar nyi ma pa wa sangs// rgyal stong rgyal smar bya dang lba// nyi ma skar ma gza' dus so// yo byad ma lus 'tshogs gyur na/
246a7(chi): bsgrub pa la 'jug dus tshod yin// ma 'tshogs bar du dus tshod men// zhes gsungs pas ni/ phyis rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag rnams// phun sum tshogs pa drug
246b1(chi): gi don gyis/ bsgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba la/ mgro ma chongs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phun sum tshogs pa drug gis bsgrubs pa'i gzhi
246b2(chi): bzungs pa zhus lan du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa sras mchog kI la yas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa
246b3(chi): rnams sngon du bya ba'i cho ga la mgo ma rmongs par bya ba'i phyir na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o sangs
246b4(chi): rgyas rgyal ba'i mchog/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bya ba'i las ni gang // rgyal mchog khyod kyis bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te/ bcom
246b5(chi): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni// rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro ba dang // don dam kun rdzob rnam gsum pa// don dam sngon du 'gro ba ni// 'bras bu ye shes 'dod pa'i phyir// bde ba'i stan la 'dug pa ni/
246b6(chi): bsam gtan gyi ni phyag rgya lngas// lus sems mnyam par gzhag pa ste// stong pa chen po ting 'dzin ni// dam pa don gyi byang chub sems// rgyu rkyen dag las ma
246b7(chi): byung zhing // mi 'gyur byang chub brtan par gzungs// kun rdzob sngon du 'gro ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor las// bde gshegs sras bcas spyan drangs
247a1(chi): bzhugs gsol dmigs// phyag 'tshal mchod pa ci 'byor 'bad// sdig bshags sras bcas spyan drangs yi rangs skyabs gsol te/
247a2(chi): 'gro ba ma lus don gyi phyir// snying rje mchog gi gzhi bzung ste// byams pa mchog gi phan 'dogs shing // ma tshugs dag pas don bsgrub ste// byams pas phan pa'i
247a3(chi): smon lam bya'o// las ni 'bum lnga'i bshags pa ste// sku yi dam nyams bshags pa tsha tsha 'bum// gsung gi dam nyams bshags pa gsung rab 'bum// thugs
247a4(chi): kyi dam nyams bshags pa srog 'don 'bum// khyad par dam tshig bshags pa tshogs mchod 'bum// lhag pa'i dam nyams gang la bshags pa 'bum// 'bum lnga'i
247a5(chi): bshags pas sdig pa mtshams med byang bar 'gyur// nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// 'bum klag tsha tsha gdab cing bshags shing bskang ga so rgya cher bya'o//
247a6(chi): las dang don dam kun rdzob sems bskyed gong ma bzhin// dper na ras drakar mtshon du byed pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yi nyes pa dag gyur na/ khade gshegs skur 'gyur
247a7(chi): 'di la the tsom med// ma dag rgyu yis mi 'grub ste// dper na sa bon rtsi nyams na// 'bras bu 'byung ba ga la srid// de bas nan tan cher bskyed de// sngon du 'a
247b1(chi): byas
247b2(chi): ba'i las la dad cing brtson par bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ de skad gsungs pas/ rdo rje 'dus pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ni/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor
247b3(chi): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i don zhus pa thugs su chud par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rnal 'byor sngon du bya ba'i cho ga'i don rgyas par zhus lan du
247b4(chi): brdzun pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das la yang rmad du byung ba'i mchod pas mchod de/
247b5(chi): 'di skad ces gsol to// e mra'o bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// rigs dang ye shes kun gyi 'byung gnas te// dam chos bye brag kun la mnga' bsnyems pa/
247b6(chi): ji ltar sprul kyang thugs kyi gdeng mi g.yo// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhi ba rjes su bsgrub 'dod pas// bdag nyid dang ni gnas dang 'khor//
247b7(chi): sa cho ga ste gon dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'jug dang dbang bskur phan pa'i yon tan skyon// las kyi mtha' brtul gang yin pa/ bde gshegs
247b8(chi): rgyal ba khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin la zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs
248a1(chi): so// e ma rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i don zhus ya mtshan che'o// nga yis bshad kyis khyod kyis nyon// rdo rje bla ma'i
248a2(chi): mtshan nyid ni// blo yangs rgyud la mkhas pa dang // sems kyis rnam rtog tshoms pa dang // ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang // phyi nang sde snod thams cad la//
248a3(chi): som nyi med cing the tsom med// sran thub mi ldog dad pa che// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams// snod ngan phal la mi spel ba// rdo rje rigs kyi bla mar
248a4(chi): gsungs// rkyen thub mi ldog dam tshig gnas// yid kyi sgo nas shin tu sbyangs// man ngag lung la rtags dga' zhing // sna tshogs sna tshogs ci sgo nas// bla ma'i
248a5(chi): thugs ni mnyes pur byed// rdo rje rigs kyi bu yin te// gsum mam bcu phyed mnu chad do// ri bo 'dus pa'i spyi rnams dang // ma dang dkar shar du gzhol ba
248a6(chi): dang / gangs ri rdo rje brag dkar du// rdo rje rigs kyi bsgrub gnas yin// sa yi cho ga bstan pa ni// gnas dang sa dang bar snang rnams// rdo rje gur gcal brag
248a7(chi): ris brtags// de nas pus gang tsam du brko// sa yi ro lnga gsal byas nas// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya// khengs nas lhags na dngos grub rab// khan chad
248b1(chi): nA dngos grub 'bring // ma khengs gyur na gzhan du spo// mngon du snang ba'i mi rnams la// rin chen rin nam bden pas blangs// bden nyid lha yi rnal 'byor
248b2(chi): gyis/ mchod dang gtor ma ngos thogs nas// lag gnyis 'khor los sa yi lha mo sbran// mchod la dbang rtsol bden tshig bsgo// sa bdag 'khor lo nyid la
248b3(chi): ni/ gtor ma byin te gzhan du gtang // mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pa bzhin// lto 'phye gzhung du brtags nas su// lnga tshan nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// sa bdag nyid la
248b4(chi): dbul bar bya// rgyal po rnamasA la khru bcu gnyis// blon po rnams la brgyad du bya// dmangs la de bzhin drug yin te// shin tu 'thas shing legs byas la//
248b5(chi): dmigs su med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs med ngang du dag par bya// dkyil du gtsang ma'i gdan bting ste// gdeng ldan bdag nyid mdzes byas dbus su 'dug
248b6(chi): shi sha bzhi yis phyogs bzhir gnas// dus gsum bzhugs kun spyan drangs mchod// yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa bya// de nas blo ldan bzhi po bzhis// rigs
248b7(chi): bzhi'i ngang la gnas nas su// dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig ces// sngon byung bzhin du gsol ba gdag/ de nas phyir nyid song nas ni// rdo rje'i stobs dang
249a1(chi): rdo rje rol pa'i gar// rdo rje lta ba'i kun bltas te// bar chad bgegs bskrad dkyil 'khor bsrung // gzhung las 'byung ba de byas na//
249a2(chi): de la bar chad yong mi 'gyur// gzhung dang mi ldan las byas na// la la don med che chang 'gyur// ngo bas nan tan bskyed par bya'o// sa bon rim par bstan pa
249a3(chi): ni/ rin chen bum pa brgyad nyid la// gtsung sgra dag bya dri yis byug/ phyag rgya bris nas gdan la gzhag/ bgegs bskrad gsang gtor rim par bya/
249a4(chi): stong nyid ngang las gzhalnga yas bsam// gcig ni las te gnyis pa mchod pa yin// gsum pa khams gsum rnam rgyal te// lnga pa tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor
249a5(chi): bskyed// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim// mchod pa gsum gyis nges mchod nas// lnga tshan nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// sngags dang ting 'dzin gsal rdzogs
249a6(chi): nas// kha brgyan btsugs te gzungs thag gdags// rdo rje bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad// lha rnams kun la khyab par bzlas// bum pa ma lags rgyal po lags//
249a7(chi): rgyal po sngags kyis btab nas ni// rgyal po chen por mnga' gsil gyis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus nyid du// rgyal po'i tshul du bzhugs su gsol/
249b1(chi): phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas dang // mnga' dang phur bu ral gri dang // me long dar sna bsrung skung dang // dbu rgyan snying nan phyag rgya phu rung dang // stong g.yogs smad
249b2(chi): dkris dkar por bya'o// dbang du gsol ba'i lha mo nyid// mchod nas sa gzhi nyid la bstim// pho brang dbus nas sgo bzhi ru// dri yi thig le bzhi bcu gnyis//
249b3(chi): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mdzes byas la// spyan drangs bstim mchod gsol ba rnams// rdo rje 'chang chen 'di bzhes la// nam langs gyur nas dkyil 'khor bzhi// khyed
249b4(chi): rnams la ni mchod byed dang / slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rab tu snyems te 'jug 'tshal na// sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lha mo khyod//
249b5(chi): bdag cag sgrib sbyang tshogs bskyed phyir// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// sta go na la ni bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhUM swA hA/ dz+nyA na dza ya hUM/ oM du pa ti/
249b6(chi): ho hUM rat+na ma 'da' la si ti hUM/ 'bru ba sti ga ra pa si ti hUM/ a smi d+ha a be sha a a/ oM AHhUM si d+hi ku rA A/ pany+tsa ling kr-i a be sha a/ ka pa la brig sha hUM
249b7(chi): a blo ldan khrus kyis dag byas nas// mdur ltar me tog lag thogs nas// skye rgan dang 'chi ba yi// chu srin pir sogs 'jigs byed la// 'don par mdzad pa/
250a1(chi): khyod 'ba' zhig/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// mgon po chen po bdag la stsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// dam tshig
250a2(chi): de nyid bdag la sgrol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong
250a3(chi): khyer du/ mgon po chen pos gzung du gsol// dbang ldan phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni// tshom bu lnga dang ldan par bya// bskyed spyan bstim phyag mchod bzlas te// oM
250a4(chi): bi shud+d+ha sarba hi ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ tsakrA a swa ta oM/ pad+ma swa ta hI/ badz+ra swa ta hUM/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor bas na// lus ngag yid gsum bsrungs
250a5(chi): byas te/ rnam thar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul can snod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod
250a6(chi): tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// dam tshig dam pa bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems kyang bskyed par bya// 'khor ba dag las bsgrub par bya'o//
250a7(chi): dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug par bya'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur gyis// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ bsrung ba'i don du gsung bskul
250b1(chi): la bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis gdab// slob ma'i dpung pa g.yas par bcings// lus kyi nyes pa dag pa dang // bsrung dang sta gon gnas par mdzad// dur
250b2(chi): khro da so shing dor ba nyid// rang gi nyes pa gsal ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu dor// dbang gi lhas rnams bstan du gsol// oM bi shud+d+he sarba hi ni hUM
250b3(chi): phaT/ sa ma ma sho d+ha ya/ sarba b+hi na ya hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi chen po'i chu nyid las// gsang ba'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// blud pas yid kyi nyes pa dag/ sta gon la ni
250b4(chi): gnas par mdzod// theg pa chen po gzhan la bzlog bya'i phyir// theg pa chen po'i spro ba bskyed// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// de ring mnyam nyid thob pa yin//
250b5(chi): gang gis khyed cag rgyal ba kun// sras dang bcas pa'i ston 'di la// skye bzhin pas na bdag chen gyis// thams cad yongs su 'dzin la gnas// des na khyed cag theg
250b6(chi): chen la/ rigs bzangs po ru nges par 'gro// de yi lam mchog dpal dang ldan// theg pa chen po las byung ba'i// khyed rnams kyis ni bgrod 'gyur ba//
250b7(chi): ma 'ongs pa na bde gshegs 'gyur// yod med dag las rnam par 'das// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// chos rnams kun la zab gyur cing // rab tu spros
251a1(chi): med gnas med pa// spros pa thams cad spangs pa yin// rab spros rnams kyis rab tu smos// theg pa chen po'i tshul gnas na/
251a2(chi): 'di nyid du ni chos thos 'gyur// seng ge'i nyal thubs rab tu brtags// ku sha myu gu rtse ma nyams// 'di las byung ba'i spyi bor gzugs// gzhan dag stan du
251a3(chi): gdings par bya'o// 'di ru nyol la ji lta ba'i// rmi lam mthong ba ston cig ces// de skad rjod la slob ma bsnyal// de nas sa stengs gru bzhi la// dam rdzas bdud
251a4(chi): rtsi ga dar b+ha// sbrang bu drug pa kha dog lnga// ma nAr phyogs kyuzhag mchod pa bsham// bde gshegs rigs lha'i rgyus ba la// mchod gsol ye shes thig grangs
251a5(chi): nas srad bu nyid la thim gyur nas// blo ldan yid 'ongs grogs mchog gzungs// gsal bar ldan nam byin gyis rlobs// chags bskyod sbyor ba'i brngas
251a6(chi): bskul te/ byang chub sems ni bsnol mar bstim// srad bu nyid kyis byang chub sems// de las rdo rje'i skur gyur te// dag pa tshangs pa'i thig gis ni//
251a7(chi): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal bya'o// de nas thig cha rim par dbye// mtshan ma ye shes thig tu gdab// rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma 'am// yang na 'bru sna rnam lnga ste//
251b1(chi): yang na sa dang rdo la bya'o// byin brlabs bsam rgyud nges par gzhag/ mkhas pas thogs la dkyil 'khor bri// srad bu'i tshad ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur te/
251b2(chi): sarba legs bkal dgu bsgril bas// mdzes shing gsher bar byas pa yis// dang la tshangs thig gdab bya ste// bla ma shar la blo ldan nub// tshangs thig dang po
251b3(chi): gdab par bya// bdag nyid me lha'i mtshams 'dug nas// blo ldan rlung lha'i phyogs song ste// 'grus thig dang po gdab par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje'i phyogs
251b4(chi): song nas// blo ldan gnod sbyin phyogs 'dug ste// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab par bya// bdag nyid srin po'i phyogs song nas// blo ldan byang shar nyid song ste//
251b5(chi): 'grus thig gnyis pa gdab par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gom stabs kyis// bskor nas me'i lha'i phyogs 'dug ste// shar gyi thig cha rim par dbye'o// phyogs
251b6(chi): gzhan de bzhin bsgyur te gdab// gdab pa srad bu'i thig tu gsungs// kha dog don ni rigs dang sbyar// re ga gri so blang ba ste// rdul tshon kha ba bab pa 'dra// g.yas
251b7(chi): nas bskor te rgyun mi gcad// ye shes thig la mi 'gong ste// ting 'dzin 'og nas 'dzul bar bya'o// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po 'di// rdo rje'i gzugs dang chas
252a1(chi): bA ra ni// cho ga bzhin du mdzes pas dgod// spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur dang rin chen 'byung // pad+ma 'chang dang sna
252a2(chi): tshogs las// phyogs kyi 'khor lo gdab par bya// gzungs dang chas pa ra dgod par bya'o// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// sems dpa' brgyad dang
252a3(chi): sems ma brgyad// rim par spel te dgod par bya'o// bar khyams la ni thub drug ste// sgo bzhir sgro srungs 'khor dang bcas// sku 'am gsung ste phyag rgya
252a4(chi): thugs/ ma nges par ni rgyal bas gsungs// bla re 'phan gdugs la sogs dang // sngon 'byung bzhin du rjes su 'jug/ rgyal mtshan brgyad nyid 'bar 'dri'i
252a5(chi): gzugs// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams ma lus dang // mchod dang rol mo ci 'byor 'bar// dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i rim pa'o// cho ga'i rim pa
252a6(chi): bstan pa ni// bskyed dang dbang bskur rim pa dang // sngon 'byung bzhin du rjes su 'jug/ de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan
252a7(chi): drangs mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i las byas la// mnyes nas nye bar grub pa dang // 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni// de nas slob ma gdong g.yogs
252b1(chi): te/ bgegs bskrang bsang gtor gdug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gtso bo dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab tu 'jug tu gsol// sems can don du bdag
252b2(chi): sgrol bas// bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// las dang spyod pa ci la dga'// bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du//
252b3(chi): 'jug par dang ni 'tshal lags te// bag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyangs te// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang nod par 'tshal lo//
252b4(chi): / khyed de ltar 'dod pa yin na// snod dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // dad pa chen po'i lnga ltas su// yon tan dad pa ci zhig yod// bdag gis
252b5(chi): lus srog la ma chags par// rta dang glang po nor gyi dbyig/ gser dngul bya ris gzo skyogs dang // ga yu dang byu ru man she la dang // dbyi spyang dar za ba gos kyi
252b6(chi): mchog/ 'bangs dang rkang 'gro yul 'khor dang // ma zhum pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o// dga' chen khyod cag ston pa bas// mgon po chen po bdag la
252b7(chi): stsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pas// zhi ba'i dam tshig bdag la stsol// dpa' bo chen po dbang gi lha// sdom pa bdag la bshad du gsol//
253a1(chi): sangs rgyas gur mkhan las byung ba// gsang ba chen por 'jug par 'tshal// phyir mi ldog pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang
253a2(chi): mchog bskur// gsang ba kun gyi rigs tshogs su// bdag ni ma 'ongs slob dpon shog/ de ring khyod kyi snying la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gnas//
253a3(chi): gal te tshul 'di dral gyur na// skad cig gis ni dral te gshegs// de bas dam las ma 'da' zhig/ oM badz+ra rod tra ka hUM/ de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi//
253a4(chi): phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis// nga yis smras pa thams cad kun// nges pa kho nar bya dgos te// bdag la smad par ma byed cig/ gal te smad par byas na ni/
253a5(chi): tshe yi 'du byed byas nas kyang // dam chu 'di yis rkyen byas pas// dmyal ba rdo rjer myur lhung ste// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni//
253a6(chi): lha dang bla ma spun mi spang // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// gsang ba gzhan la spel mi bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ste// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nges
253a7(chi): thub na/ dam chu 'di yis rkyen byas nas// ye shes sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// me tog 'phreng ba bzang po 'dis// dkyil 'khor gtso bor rab tu dor//
253b1(chi): 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// pra ti b+h+yo ho/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rigs pa me tog 'di
253b2(chi): dor bas// gang la bab pa rigs kyi ste// gtso bo'i rigs te bsgrubs na ni// dngoso grub rigs te the tsom med// skul ldan khyod la sbyin par bya'o// de ring phan
253b3(chi): tshong bu khyod kyi// ming ni rdo rje che ge mo zhes// rdo rje kun grags yin par nges// rdo rje mtshan gyis kun grags shog/ sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// gser gyi
253b4(chi): gtsags pu thogs nas ni// mig gi ling thog bsal ba ltar// thugs rje ye shes thabs mkhas pas// mi shes pa yi rab rib dang // ma rig mun pa
253b5(chi): gsal du gsol// ding khyod rdo rje sems nyid kyis// mig kun nges par 'byed mdzad pa'i// mig dbye ba la brtson par bya'o// rdo rje'i mig ni bla med 'gyur//
253b6(chi): badz+ra dz+nyA na tsa ka k+Shu pra be sha phaT/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi// rang bzhin drag par rnyog pa med// gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du//
253b7(chi): kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid// dad pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bgyi// khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes// sngags
254a1(chi): dang phyag rgya byin rlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// badz+ra maN+Da la pra khe ga ga ho haM/ mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje dang // nyon
254a2(chi): mongs mi spongs gos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// dbang dang bskur bar bstan pa ni// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas
254a3(chi): kyis/ chen po chen po ji ltar sbyin// bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don slad du// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag dbang bskur// rin po che yi dbang 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab
254a4(chi): gsungs te// mkhas las kun gyis phyag byas pa// gnas las 'byung ba sbyin par bya'o// traM gsang ba gsang mchog mya ngan 'das// de la sogs pa'i gsang ba kun/
254a5(chi): don du brtags shing mnyan pa las// kun las bsgrags par bya ba men// dar ma dang du ma Da la hUM/ a b+he sha a// / ci bye ba brgya bcu'i sgra dbyangs
254a6(chi): kyis/ gang 'dod skyes bu thim par byed// shes rab don gyi dmigs dang sbyar// che chung don gyis so sor bsgrags// yo la bsgrags par bya ba men// oM d+harma d+ha rngu pra be sha
254a7(chi): phaT/ ha'i 'bar ba'i tshogs mchog lags// karma'i tshogs mchog gsal 'phro thim// khyod ni las rnams byed pa yin// rnam bzhi 'phrin las kun byos shig/ e waM
254b1(chi): ma ya ma Da la pu tsa sid+d+hi hUM/ rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya gzung // gnyis med rgyal ba sa ma nyes mchod la// bde gshegs rgyal
254b2(chi): ba kun dang sbyor// sa ma si ti badz+ra ka ya badz+ra hUM/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten stong gsum du// rigs mchog rnams kyis phyag rgya zung // dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa
254b3(chi): por/ thams cad ma lus dbang rnams sbyin// oM AHhUM swA hA/ ma hA g+hu ru hUM/ glegs bam chags shing rdo rje dril bu dang // cho ga gsum ldan ma long phyag
254b4(chi): rgya lngas// rna ba lce la snying kha lag bA// mgo dang yan lag gnas lnga ru// oM AHhUM swA hA dang // rin chen pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgya gram ga zhal yas su/
254b5(chi): 'phro 'dus rigs gsal spyan drangs bstim mchod bzlas pa bya// gsol btab thim 'gyur so so'i dbang dang ldan par bsam// sbas pa ye shes shes rab ye shes
254b6(chi): dbang // gnas dang bla ma gzungs bcas te// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan bu yis me tog gtor// de nas bla ma slob dpon gyis// rdo rje rigs kyi
254b7(chi): bu mchog la// yang dag sems kyi ka tan tshigs sbyin// bus kyang ji bzhin nyams su blang // bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // snying po lnga dang phyag rgya lnga ste sku lnga
255a1(chi): dang / 'phreng ba gdugs dang go cha bza' btung dbang yang sbyin// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba'i// ji ltar bltams
255a2(chi): pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu nyid dag pa yis// dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a bi sha ki sa ma ya hUM//
255a3(chi): sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dpag tu med pa'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram khang bu lnga// ze 'phrog kha dbus dbang bskur ro//
255a4(chi): badz+ra bu d+d+ha rat+na pad+ma kha da kha ma ku ta taM taM/ cod pan 'di ni mdzes pa ste// ye shes lnga ldan cod pan 'dis// rtag chad gnyis las grol 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i
255a5(chi): nyes pa sa mi gos shing // mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra laM pa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge
255a6(chi): gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// gsung gi de nyid bsdus pa'i don// de bas snying po lnga'i dbang bskur ro// oM AHhUM swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs//
255a7(chi): rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon chen lnga// phyag rgya lnga yi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra tsak+ka rat+na pad+ma khang+ga mu dra hUM/ e ma'o bde gshegs kun gyi
255b1(chi): sku/ mtshan dang dpe byad dpag tu med// mi 'gyur mi shes rigs kyi gtso// de bas rigs lnga'i dbang bskur ro// sa twa badz+ra hUM/ bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ rat+na sa ma
255b2(chi): b+hU traM/ pad+ma a mi de bA hri/ karma a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM// / gzungs dang ting 'dzin rIn chen me tog 'phreng // sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa ste//
255b3(chi): hUM yi rgyun du gyur pa'i phyir// de bas 'phreng bas dbang bskur ro// badz+ra rat+na ma le puSh+pe ste// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i dngos po kun bcom nas// phyin ci
255b4(chi): log gi bgegs chen bsrungs// de bras go chas dbang bskur ro// badz+ra ka pa b+ha ga dza yak+Sha hUM hUM/ gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can// skyabs chen byams pa chen po
255b5(chi): ste/ nyon mongs gdungs pa sel ba'i rtags// de bas gdugs kyi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra sU r+ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa tro to/ bza' dang bca' dang btung ba'i tshogs//
255b6(chi): kha mngar sgyur rlig ro mchog ste// dza gang dzag ti zla phrom zla rgyas zla tshes dang // tshe 'dzin mchog dang mAM so kun tu rgyug/ tshim byed 'jam des zhal zas kyis// rtag tu nyin
255b7(chi): mtshan pa re legs shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza ya hUM/ gsang ba nang gi dbang bskur na// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// rdo rje bla ma slob dpon gyis// me tog
256a1(chi): phung po'i dkyil 'khor bya// rab skyes spyan drangs mchod byas te// rigs kyi bu yi zhu ba dbul// bla mas gzungs ma byin brlabs te//
256a2(chi): gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang // 'dod pa de la sbyin par bya'o// rigs bzang nyi shu log pa 'am// mtshan ldan sems phebs gang rung bzung // rigs ngan
256a3(chi): mtshan ngan sems mi phe bas// de ni spang bar bya ba yin// phan yon bstan par bya ba ni// dbang mchog bskur ba'i bu mchog ste// 'jig rten mi yis
256a4(chi): mchod cing bskur// bde gshegs rnams kyis sras su dgongs// lha mo'i tshogs kyis grogs su mthong // chos skyong bsrung mas stongs grags byed// 'gro don
256a5(chi): spyad kyang mi 'grib cing // 'khor 'dab rgyas shing bsam pa 'grub// tshe yi 'du byed byas na yang // rigs 'dzin sa la nges par 'god// byang chub mchog
256a6(chi): tu gla don mi za// gzhan yang 'jig rten 'phos pa dag/ lus kyi dbang gis gar skyes kyang // zhag grangs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshun chad du// gos sam ming la shes
256a7(chi): bstims nas// cho ga'i rim pa 'di byas na// rigs 'dzin nges pa'i sras nyid du// 'dag la rgyas btab ji bzhin du// gzhan yang yon tan dpag las
256b1(chi): 'das/ nyes pa'i skyon rnams bstan pa ni// bla ma mnyes par ma byas sam// dam med dbang rnams ma nos par// nyan 'chang bsgom pa'i las byed dang //
256b2(chi): rdo rje'i bla ma byed pa dag/ tshe thung dmyal ba'i gnas su lhung // 'jig rten 'dir yang gnod pa dang // 'khor du mi nang phyugs nang 'byung // yul du sad dang
256b3(chi): ser ba 'bebs// 'jig rten mi yi ya ga dang // de bras skyon du shes par bya// las kyi mtha' brtul bstan pa ni// gtor ma tshogs gsum gnas su
256b4(chi): gtang / gshegs dang bsdu dang gzugs brnyan zhal phyi la// lus bsrung go bgos bka' nan spyod lam bya// sbas pa nang gi dbang bskur na// gzungs ma de
256b5(chi): dang de dag las// yon dang bla ma'i phyed shas dbul// dam tshig bsrungs te dam dang ldan par bya// ma byas pa na mnar med 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud
256b6(chi): chen po las/ zhi ba rjes su bsgrubs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ phyi rabs
256b7(chi): kyi rnal 'byor pa'i don du/ drag po sa las byas pa'i dmigs pa gang la bya// 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o rdo rje khros pa'i yab// dka' thub can
257a1(chi): gyi dregs pa chen po de// mngon spyod rol pa'i bsgral ba e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o// e ma'o ya mtshan che'o// de yi rjes su spyod pa'i rnal
257a2(chi): 'byor pas// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni gang la bya// de yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i yab chen pos
257a3(chi): bka' skul pa ni/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sku// kun la bya bar gzhung las med// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing // dam tshig mi shes pa dang dam can
257a4(chi): bka' gcog dang // 'di ni bsgral ba'i zhing du gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing du gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba ni// srog don bka'
257a5(chi): dam las kyis nyams// mtshan ma 'dod pas nyams dang 'thun// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon gsod// rdo rje nang sme byed pa ni// srog las nyams pas bsgral
257a6(chi): ba'i zhing // slob dpon bka' ba sku mngon spyod dbya'i sems// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod gsang ba gzhan la spel// dam las nyams pa bsgral ba'i
257a7(chi): zhing / rnal 'byor gsang sngags tshul spyor la// sku mtshang 'dru zhing ya ga 'dogs// bka' las skur 'debs 'khor rnams log par 'khrid// rtags kyis/
257b1(chi): don bstan log par 'khrid// bka' las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // bskur ba'i gzhi byed lta ba rgyab tu bor// spyod pa log pa dang len spyod// bka'
257b2(chi): yi gzhung bor phyin ci log la mkhas// don las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // sngon chad kho na pa'i sa med par// rgol zhing bzhin bzlog gnyis ma da gzhan
257b3(chi): la gnang du 'dzums// bdag gis nyes par ma dran yang // bdag la mthu dang rtsa la 'dod pas// las kyis nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // gnyis med don la
257b4(chi): phyogs char 'dzin// lta ba sgro skur zhe gcod pa'i// skye med chos 'chad mtshan ma'i chos su bzung // lha srin bran du 'khol zhing 'du 'gran su zhig byed//
257b5(chi): nga ni dpal yin nyams su ma mo byung // zer zhing gzhon la 'gro zhing 'tshe// mtshan mas nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // shes rab rnam gsum gsal
257b6(chi): byed mthu che stsa la 'dod pas// las kyi gtso ru mtshan ma spyod byed pa// rang gi ngo gdong khrag gis byugs to mi thong zhing chen thogs// dmar gtor blo la
257b7(chi): btags nas 'jig rten ma mo sten byed pa// spyod pa'i gzhung por mi 'tshams las rnams byed// the tsho ba rlang po'i spyod pas bka' gzhung smod//
258a1(chi): rnal 'byor pa la ya gA dar bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhabs nas drangs// 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i thugs dang 'gal zhing // sha zan ma mo gzan
258a2(chi): tshogs pakram// chog shes mi ldan nor gyis snying nus nas// shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phung yang sngags 'chang rnal 'byor 'jom// gzhan cing btsun yang bas
258a3(chi): kyis smod// thob tu 'dod na gsang sngags rku byed cing // bza' ru 'dod na bsgrubs pa'i// longs spyod rkus te dug tu shes kyang za// 'dod pas nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing /
258a4(chi): 'di ni dam tshig dam pas bsgral ba ston pa'o// dam tshig mi shes dam can bka'i gcog cing // gsang sngags gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// sdang bar byed na pha yang rung // gnod
258a5(chi): par byed na ma yang rung // gnod du 'dzugs na spun yang rung // dam las log na mched kyang rung // snying rings byed na grogs kyang rung // 'di ni bka' lcogs bsgral ba'i
258a6(chi): zhing // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ de ltar bsgral ba'i zhing rnams te// bsgral ba'i yon tan ji ltar lags// ma bsgral ba yi
258a7(chi): skyon ni gang // zhes gsol pas// rdo rje khros pa'i yab kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsgral ba'i yom tan 'di lnga ste// de srir bskal ba'i rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams
258b1(chi): btul na bstan pa ga nyan// dam med bsgral na bar chad nyung // med pas gyur na bar chad nyung // nyams pa med na dkon mchog che// de bas yon tan bsam mi khyab//
258b2(chi): ma bsgral ba yi skyon bstan gang // dmyal khams 'phel la mtho ris 'grib// gzhung spyod rnal 'byor sgyid lug nas// gsang sngags theg pa'i chos sgo 'gags// dam
258b3(chi): chos spong ba'i gzhir gyur nas// don la mi phan skyon yod do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// /
258b4(chi): / de nas rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po la/ rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku// bsgral ba'i zhing rnams bstun
258b5(chi): pa dang / mngon sum bsgral ba'i thabs kyis bsgral// zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// mngon sum bsgral ba ma yin gyis// thabs kyis
258b6(chi): rim pas bsgral bar bya'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa/ thabs kyis bsgral bar gsungs pa yi// dmigs pa'i rten ni gang la bya// bka' stsal pa/
258b7(chi): dmigs pa'i rten ni ling ga'o// gsol pa/ ling+ga'i rim pa ji ltar lags// bka' stsal pa/ grog mkhar sa dang mi phung sa// gangs kyi dum bu chu rtse'i phu ba// srub ma'i
259a1(chi): lo mra'i zhing chen ras// ske tshe dang ni ldong ros dang // thal chen dang ni rak+ta dang // bshang ba dang ni gci ba ste// bcu gnyis thod pa'i nang
259a2(chi): ru brdungs// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya mut+ka ra a ko ta ya hUM phaT/ rA thug lug thug gcin gyis sgra// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sa sham+b+hi sho d+ha baM khaM hUM phaT/ dur khrod ku sha
259a3(chi): / rtsa dag la// dgra dang bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya nri tri ma ra ya ta a/ de la gong gi rdzas rnams 'jug/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya e ga ra hUM
259a4(chi): phaT/ mkhar nag skud pas ske la gdags// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya a g+hu sha dza hUM phaT/ de ni gdab pa'i rim pa yin// shing shun mtshon gang nyi shu gcig/ de la
259a5(chi): dgra bgegs gzugs brnyan bya// de ni gzir ba'i ling+ga bya// gro ga 'am ras sam shog shog la// dgra bgegs gzugs brnyan rdzogs bris te// khram gnag shing
259a6(chi): la gdags pa ni// 'di ni btab pa'i ling+ga'o// ma ning nag po'i sa la// gru gsum 'bar ba'i cha drug la// yan lag mgo dang gsang gnas bya// gru gsum rtse la
259a7(chi): 'khor lo drug/ mtha' ma mu khyud zlum pas bskor// 'khor lo drug gi cha la ni// sngags dang mchongs gnyis 'thun bsdebs par// dgra bgegs ming rus gzugs
259b1(chi): bris la/ spyi bor oM dang kI la ya// dpral bar rus la snying kar ming // g.yas su hUM la g.yon du phaT// mdoms su ma ra ya yang dgod// 'di ni mnan
259b2(chi): pa'i ling+ga'o// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dgra bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bca' ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
259b3(chi): yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas 'di skad ces gsol to// gong du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor de// mi shes rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan
259b4(chi): bca' ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga gang // rjes 'jug don du bstan du gsol// rdo rje 'dus pas bka' stsal pa// sa dang mtshams dang 'og ma yang // thig dang mtshon
259b5(chi): dang phyag rgya dgod// rgyan dang mchod rdzas phyag 'tshal ba'o// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lha mo la// spyan drangs mchod de gsol ba ni// bar chad bgegs rnams zhi ba dang //
259b6(chi): sa yi dngos grub bdag la sogs// be a kra ma si ti hUM/ phyag na rdo rje dbang gi mthus// ri rab gling bzhi phyogs bzhi nas// dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal chen bzhis//
259b7(chi): phyogs bsrungs re ba bskang ba'i phyir// bar du gcod pa mtshams chod cig/ be sha ra ma Na ye swA hA/ sti sta ra sta re swA hA/ sa ma ye hUM phaT swA hA/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i
260a1(chi): gnas chen 'dir// las kyi dbang gis bar chad byed// bka' las 'da' byed dam sri 'di// mnan cing sbyar ba'i dus la bab// kI la ya ma ra ya
260a2(chi): rak+Sha ya kA ti tse byaM/ hUM badz+ra swa ha/ dkar dmar ljang ser mthing sogs la// rigs lnga'i byin brlabs ye shes 'od// ma 'dres ra ri med pa'i mdog/ rigs rnams so/
260a3(chi): so'i kha dog gsal// kI li kI lA ya oM AHhUM swA hA/ maN+Dal sid+d+hi hUM/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin rnams// so so'i
260a4(chi): gzhung ngu byin brlabs nas// mchog tu mdzes pa'i dgram par bya'o// oM ma hA pus tsa sa ma ya hUM/ thugs las sprul pa'i khro rgyal bcu// mi dge bcu rnams
260a5(chi): tshar ga cad dang // rnam thar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// cho ga bzhin ru phur pa gdab// ma dag pa rnams mtshams bcad cing // gardza ha na da ha pa tsA
260a6(chi): ban+d+ha/ hu lu ti tha bin+d+ha/ tsit+tA/ s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig btab pas// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i
260a7(chi): bzhugs gsal ba// rdo rje thig cha rim par dbye// e maN+Dal/ badz+ra sid+d+hi nan/ gdod nas dag pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lngas// sku lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin
260b1(chi): te/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bsham pa dang // drang ba'i don phyir gzhal yas chag chag 'debs// oM AHhUM s+phu ta/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-ita
260b2(chi): maN+Da la sid+d+hi hUM/ sku 'am gsung ste phyag rgya thugs// dbus nas mtha' yi sgo bzhi ru// rdo rje srin po'i lha rnams kun// ga dan la rim pas bzhugs su gsol//
260b3(chi): sa ma ya ti sta badz+ra hU~M phaT/ zhing chen 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan dang // lnga ldi ra ros dam dum shwa rus khrag/ 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// gangos
260b4(chi): bcas don dang bsnyun phyir dgod par bya'o// ma ma ha rak+ta keng steg ta maN+Da la hUM/ rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje srin po'i rnal 'byor spun grogs rnams// ma
260b5(chi): bu'i 'du shes nyer gzhag ste// rnal 'byor spyod mchog phyag bgyi'o// oM shre badz+ra na ma/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis//
260b6(chi): so so'i gzhung du byin brlabs te// mchog tu mdzes pa dgram par bya// a ma hA pu tsa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil
260b7(chi): 'khor gzugs brnyan bca' ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das khros pa'i rgyal po la 'di
261a1(chi): skad ces gsol to// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas chen du// dregs byed rnams ni bsgral ba bzhin// rjes su bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor
261a2(chi): pas/ bsgral ba'i gnas ni glang du bya// bskal ba'i gnas nas don pa shad pa// de yang rtogs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// sems la chos nyid mi gsal zhing /
261a3(chi): nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel ba yis// bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po de'i// shar lho byang shar gang rung du// rdo rje drag po'i las bya'o// de ni nges 'grub phung
261a4(chi): 'tshengs med// dam tshig nges thub ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo// don spyod rtags kyi blo can gyis// drag po'i gnas su bya ba la// nags ri tsher ma can gyi ri// gcan
261a5(chi): gza nA ga dug pa sna tshogs yod// gnam ni gri 'dra ral gri shu bas// sa ni gru gsum me dpung 'dra// logs la dur khrod gling yod pa// tsher ma can gyi shing dag dang //
261a6(chi): dug shing gdug pa yod pa dang // brag la rang rod yod pa dang // dam pa grog po gting zab dang // stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rgyab 'dra chu srin kha//
261a7(chi): ban glang sna 'thab brag dang chu srin bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// sngon chad lha mi'i g.yul sa dang // g.yul bkye ba dang mtshon pha ba dang // bsad
261b1(chi): bcad sa dang ma rungs sa// srin po bsgral ba'i bcas gzhi dang // srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang // g.yul ngo bskos pa'i sa mkhar rnams// mang po bsad
261b2(chi): pa'i phung po'i sa// brag ni srin po ngus pa 'dra// ri ni thal phung bsnyil ba 'dra// lung pa me yis bsregs pa 'dra// shing rtsi rkang thang 'bros pa bzhin gung //
261b3(chi): the mi ro phyung ba 'dra// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung // rgya gram lam dang 'byung po yod// drag po'i las 'di bya bar shis// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur
261b4(chi): pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgral ba'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces
261b5(chi): gsol to// kye ma rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bsgral ba'i dkyil 'khor gang lags// bde gshegs khyod
261b6(chi): kyis bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa ni/ sngags mkhan dag gis yon tan ni// rigs kyi rnal 'byor gral du smos// tshul bzangs la ni shis pa des//
261b7(chi): dang po shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la yid ches nas// de nas nges pa'i dbang thob ste// theg pa mtha' dag sems la gsal// phyogs med
262a1(chi): lta ba gdeng du 'jog/ bsgrub pa gnyis med rgyal po grub/ 'phrin las phyogs med snying rje bskyed// dam tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin
262a2(chi): bsrungs// rgyud dang sgrub thabs mtha' dgu mkhaso// phyogs 'dzin spongs la mkhas pa ste na// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu 'chang // sbyor dang sgrol ba'i nyams drod
262a3(chi): ldan phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid dang la gnas// rnal 'byor rtags ldan dam pa des// las su bya ba chud mi zos// dkyil
262a4(chi): 'khor rim pa 'di skad gsungs// brub khung dang ni 'khor lo'i dbye ba'o// de la 'brub khung rim pa bstan pa ni// drag po'i gnas sam dkyil 'khor shar lho ru// 'brub/
262a5(chi): khung las kyi dkyil 'khor du// dkyil 'khor khru gang tsam du bya// gru gsum brtsegs te kha khyer la// za byed zhal dang mda' gzhur bcas// mtshon cha lnga dang rtsangs kyis
262a6(chi): bskor// mthing nag dar gyis zhal bkab pa'o// 'khor lo'i rim pa dbye ba ni// sngar shi ba'i ro gos khrag can nam// bkra mi shis pa'i zhing ras la// drag po'i
262a7(chi): las la rab brtson pas// dur khrod rkang gis smyu gu'o// khyo dgu shi ba'i mngal khrag gis// phyi dro'i dus na bri bar bya'o// rgya ru khru gang yod pa la// sgo dang bar khyams
262b1(chi): gru chad dang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// de nang rgyas shing dbang drag bri// rgyas pa lnga ni dmigs pa yi// yan lag gnyis rdzogs par bri// 'bar
262b2(chi): ba'i 'khor lo rtsibasra brgyad la// drug pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod// rtsibs mtshan brgyad kyi cha la ni// dang po sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod// yan lag mgo dang gsang
262b3(chi): gnas su// gnyis pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod// snying po dang ni tsi ta la// gsum pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod// tsi ta ha lce rtse mo ru// sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod
262b4(chi): par bya// nyonu mongs pa'i gnas lnga ru// lnga pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba dgod// gzhan yang so so'i 'phreng ba gnas rnams su// yab rnams bskul ba'i sngags kyang
262b5(chi): dgod/ 'di ni thabs kyi 'khor lo yin// phung sre nag po'i tho dra pa la// 'phrin las rnam bzhi gong bzhin du// mtha' ma gru gA sum nyi shus bskor// rgyas la
262b6(chi): dmigs pa gong bzhin du// sngags kyi rim pa gong bzhin no// yig mgo g.yon la yig zhabs phyir// dmigs pa dgod pa gong bzhin no// dang po sngags dang tha ma
262b7(chi): gnyis gru gsum dag ni cha la dgod// gzhan yang so so'i gnas rnams su// yum rnams bskul ba'i sngags kyang dgod// 'di ni shes rab 'khor lo'o//
263a1(chi): rasa? sam shog shog gro ga la// 'phrin las rnam bzhi gong bzhin no// sgo dang bar khyams gong bzhin no// 'khor lo'i cha las rin chen
263a2(chi): dbyibs// gzhan rnams rim pa gong bzhin te// dang po tha ma rin chen la'o// 'di ni nang gi 'khor lo'o// gzhan yang so so'i gnas gnas su// rtsa ba'i sngags
263a3(chi): kyis mdzes par bya// 'di ni 'khor ba'i dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sgrol byed slob dpon gzugs brnyan gyi 'khor
263a4(chi): lo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ phyi rabs bsgrubs pa'i drod dang / rtags dang / rdzas
263a5(chi): bsags pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i gtso// rjes su gzhug sgrub rnal 'byor pas// bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni ji ltar bsag
263a6(chi): bla sgrub pa'i rtags dang drod tshad ni// rgyal ba'i dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni// bsgral ba'i rdzas su bstan pa la// rgya
263a7(chi): tshi la 'dre srong ma bdud sme rdzas dang // brdab pa'i zhabs ma mnga' ba'i nyungs kar dang // mtshon gyi 'dab lnga sru pa dang // dug dang ma rungs sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang /
263b1(chi): lcags phye zangs phye grag gtor dang // sri shing hom dang mnan pa'i thod pa dang // 'di ni drag po sgrol ba'i rdzas// bsgrubs pa'i rtags ni 'di lta ste// 'phar dang
263b2(chi): 'tsheg dang 'khrog pa dang // 'gul dang ldeg dang mchong ba dang // 'od dang du ba byung ba dang // grub po nam mkha' 'gro ba dang // sa lnga mi thogs chur mi 'bying //
263b3(chi): 'di ni rtags rab bstan pa yin// mtshan ma ling ga 'gul ba dang // mig non nyams dang rtags byung na// bar gyi rtags su bstan pa yin// tha ma rmi lam ston 'gyur
263b4(chi): te/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid 'di la yang // gol sa dang ni ngo bo dang / de yi ngo bo rtag par gces// drod tshad mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// gangal ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis//
263b5(chi): chos nyid mnyam la blo gzhag pas// ci yang mi dmigs bsam las 'das// chos nyid lta ba'i drod tshad do// 'ga' na 'ching 'grol med pa dang // dam rdzas blang
263b6(chi): dor med pa dang // sta na skye shi med spyod na// 'di ni spyod pa'i drod tshad yin// dngos su snang ba skur grub cing // sgra ru grag pa gsung du ste// dngos med snang ba thugs
263b7(chi): grub na/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa'i drod tshad yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas la// bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar shes na// thams cad kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil
264a1(chi): 'khor chen po'i drod tshad yin// bya byed gnyis la thogs med cing // gang la spyod kyang bde gshegs las// byas pas mi dmigs 'phrin
264a2(chi): las te/ 'di ni 'phrin las drod tshad yin// bri nan med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// grol sa med pa'i sa la gnas// blang dor med pa'i dbang rdzogs na// 'di ni dbang
264a3(chi): gi drod tshad yin// dam pa'i gzhi nyid bde gshegs las// zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig tu shes// dam tshig dam pa mchog gi gzhi// 'di ni dam tshig drod
264a4(chi): tshad yin// de ltar rtags dang drod tshad zin pa yin// drag po'i las la brtson par bya'o// rtags dang drod tshad ma zin na// drag shul spyod kyang las mi 'grub//
264a5(chi): ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdzas dang / rtags dang / drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
264a6(chi): de nas rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos rmad du byung ba'i tshig gis gsol pa/ kye ma rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// yon tan 'phrin las kun gyi dbyer med de//
264a7(chi): kun gyi bdag nyid la yang phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma'o ya mtshan ngo mtshar zhes bstod nas ni// de yi rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgrub pa'i dus ni gang
264b1(chi): la bya/ zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal ba ni/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sku// rtags dang drod tshad mthong ba ni// drag po'i las la 'jug pa'i dus/
264b2(chi): bye ba 'am ni sa ya 'am// 'bum mam bdun 'bum bzlas pa dang // zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// lo ni gsum gyis 'grub par ni// ting 'dzin rab kyis de
264b3(chi): ltar ro// de ltar gyur na drag po'i dus// de med bar du dus tshod med// drod tshad rtags la ma bab cing // grangs kyi bsnyen pa ma tshang ngam// dus kyi lo zla yun thungs na// /
264b4(chi): drag shul spyad kyang mi 'grub ces// bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// bsgrub pa'i drag po la 'jug pa'i
264b5(chi): dus bstan pa'i le'u m+b+hi ni shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma bde gshegs bcom ldan
264b6(chi): 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi de nyid de// phyi rabs don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting
264b7(chi): 'dzin de nyid bsdus pa'i don// legs par bshad kyis yid la zung // rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon cha sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil
265a1(chi): nas thig pa shar// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya'o// oM ma hA ga shu dz+nyA d+hA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ d+harma d+hAr tu maN+DalA
265a2(chi): d+hu d+h+r-i badz+ra tsir+N+Na hUM/ e ag ne maN+Da la/ yaM kar+Na rak+Sha haM/ ra rak+Sha mAN+Da la/ su su me hUM d+h+waM/ badz+rA ts+yaid+d+hi hU~M/ e ag ne maN+Da laM/ raM dz+wa la raM/ rkeng nor-i ti rkeng /
265a3(chi): bi sha bi shud+d+ho/ b+hA wa na d+hA dz+nyA na kA pa la b+h+yAM/ e wa ma yA raM/ ra tri ru tra maN+Da la/ ma a pa sUr+ya tsatA pyA/ maN+Da la hUM/ ya ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ dz+nyA na badz+ra/
265a4(chi): s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ dz+nyA na sA ta kI l+ra hUM phaT/ kI la ya s+pha ra na phaT/ saM hA ra na hUM/ badz+ra oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba b+hi ga nAM baM hUM phaT/ badz+ra ti pa ta tsak+kA
265a5(chi): ha na ha nA hUM phaT/ snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjer dam bcas la// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer sgom// zhes pas//
265a6(chi): bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad do// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs// brdas ni so sor bskur ba las// chags pa'i ting 'dzin
265a7(chi): gsal 'gyur te// yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// mchod pa gsang ba so sor thob// byang chub sems ni lan gsum spro// dang pos brag nyid
265b1(chi): rdo rjer bsam// gnyis pas spros mchog gsal byas te// phyogs skyong dgug dang gdan bting la// gsum pas hUM hUM 'gur gsung rdzogs pa'o//
265b2(chi): de la bskul bas phyag rgya rdzogs// de las phyogs bcu khro bo khro mo rnams// sngags kyi rim pas rdzogs gsal 'gyur// khro bo khri mo rol pa las/
265b3(chi): ha dang he las 'khor rnams bskyed// de nas byang chub sems 'phros pas// snying po phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du las// lha rnams so so'i sku rdzogs pa'o// sa ma
265b4(chi): ya ho sa ma ya taM/ a nu raMg ya mi/ ma hA br-i d+hi tsi d+ha hUM/ badz+ra tang / kI lA ya mu ti dza ma a pA suR+YA pran+d+ha pad+ma maN+Da la/ hUM hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+ha/ phyogs
265b5(chi): bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdzas kyi phur pa'i ngo bo la/ byang chub sems ni spros pa la// rigs kyi sras mchog rnam lnga nyid// spyan snga nyid nas
265b6(chi): phyogs bzhir ba sam// byin brlabs la sogs sngon 'byung bzhin// gzi mdangs chags bskyed thugs bskul te// oM badz+ra ma ku la rta la pra ta la hUM phaT/ badz+ra
265b7(chi): pa lis maN+Dal hUM phaT/ badz+ra ma hA rak+ta/ maN+Da la hUM phaT/ phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ro// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/
