266a1(chi): rjes 'jug ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'babs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras
266a2(chi): mchog kI la yas/ khro bo'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag gi sgras su lha rnams bskyed pa de// sa de'i sras su bdag
266a3(chi): bya'i rim pa ji lta bu lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ 'khor ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// de la bskul bas phyag rgya
266a4(chi): rdzogs/ de las phyogs bcu khro bo khro mo rnams// sngags kyi rim gyis dbang spros pas// ye shes zer gyis lus rtog spangs// gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag las//
266a5(chi): gsum gyi byin rlabs 'od kyi 'bru// thugs ka ra thim nas sku yi dbyig/ rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkha'// chos sku byang chub sems su gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying
266a6(chi): po'i sgra// rab tu gsal ba ra brjod nas ni// byang chub sems su gsal bar thim// de las hUM zhes rab brjod pas// gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas// thugs kyi
266a7(chi): phyag rgya rab tu 'bar// de nas phra mo'i skur spro bsdu// phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs// de gnyis sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// b+ha ga nyid du lha rnams bsam//
266b1(chi): / rdzas dang phaT dang rtsa sngags kyis// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bdag dang stan la gdon// badz+ra kI lI kI lI ya phaT dz+wa/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa'i rdo
266b2(chi): rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi
266b3(chi): bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ oM AHhUM/ kA ya bgra tsit+ta dz+nyA na a be sha A/ oM AHhUM/ ma 'da' la si ti hUM/ ki li ki la ya kro d+ha ko te/ ha he phaT/
266b4(chi): saM ha na ra hUM/ me hA 'ga' na sa ma ya ho/ hUM hUM badz+ra gan+da/ badz+ra ki li ki la ya sarba big na na baM hUM hUM phaT/ ti ba ta tsa kra ha na hUM phaT/ ma hA bo ti tsit+ta ma 'da' la hUM phaT/
266b5(chi): lha rnams rtsa ba'i sngags gzhug tu// dza phaT tsos ni kun le gdags par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rjes 'jug de bzhin
266b6(chi): gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas 'di skad ces gsol to//
266b7(chi): bder gshegs rgyal bas 'khor rnams la// byin brlabs dbang bskur ji bzhin du// rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pa dang / bka' stsal ba
267a1(chi): yi ge 'bru gsum rim pas su// srog gi rta la bskyon nus su// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la// byin brlabs gsum ma nges pa ru/
267a2(chi): sngon 'byung bzhin du byin gyis brlabs// srog gi hUM las 'od 'phros pas// rigs lnga rgyal ba'i thugs bskul te// sngon 'byung bzhin du sngags brjod cing //
267a3(chi): ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra sa ma ya dza dza/ dzaHhU~M baM ho/ s+t+rI sta badz+ra/ shrI badz+ra na ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra pu tsa hUM/ thabs kyis spyod pas 'cha
267a4(chi): don du/ byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag la stso la// zhes dbang dang byin rlabs
267a5(chi): nod pa'i phyir// dus gshegs bzhugs byon rnam pa kun// rdo rje khro bo gshegs spyan drang // phyag 'tshal dga' bas mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab bo//
267a6(chi): zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byin gyis brlabs cing dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas
267a7(chi): yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// bsnyen pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags/
267b1(chi): khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// don dam dang ni kun rdzob dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen gyi// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// nges par 'di skad bka'
267b2(chi): stsal pa// chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// gsang sngags byin rlabs so// a bi tsa rgya bsgral ba'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la
267b3(chi): bya'o// don dam kun rdzob bsnyen bsgrub bzhi rdzogs nas// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba gdon mi za// rtags dang mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i drod tshad zin pa dang /
267b4(chi): bkra shis mtshan ldan pan da ka pA la// ci 'byor bza' btung snum po sa bkang byas nas// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs tshang la gsol ba gdab// thun mongs dbang
267b5(chi): gis dngos grub blang // bkra shis brjod de gsol byas nas// rigs 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur// cho ga 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// gang zhig mos pa'i dad/
267b6(chi): ldan des// dbang bcu thob nas tshad med dron dang ldan// 'phrin las thogs med dbyings dang ye shes don mthong 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba gsang
267b7(chi): ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
268a1(chi): e ma'o khros pa'i bdag nyid can// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor de// spyan drangs mchod na ji ltar bgyi// bka' sprul pa ni/ bdag
268a2(chi): nyid ting 'dzin rtags ldan pa// sa ma dza yis pa zhes gsol la// phyag rgya bzhi spyod spyan yang drang // s+t+rI k+ta badz+ra bstan byas la// dgyes pa chen pos phyag 'tshal nas/
268a3(chi): mchod pa'i rim pa sngon 'byung bzhin// des ni las rnams ma lus 'grub// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// 'gyur med ye/
268a4(chi): shes lha gnas pa// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod bzhes te// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan/
268a5(chi): pa dang / ta ki la ya yi dngos grub gsol// zhes brjod do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod pa'i le'u ste
268a6(chi): rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// 'dod chags
268a7(chi): zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog rang bzhin can// dregs pa sgrol mkhas thugs rje'i dpal mgon te// thugs rje'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje
268b1(chi): chen pos dregs pa bsgral ba bzhin// rjes bsgrubs drod tshad zin pa'i nges can des// dgra bgegs dmigs pa bsgral ba'i rim pa gang // thugs rjes bdag nyid
268b2(chi): khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol nas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ drag po sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces gsungs so//
268b3(chi): dang po gnod pa'i dgra bgegs te// lha dang rgyab rten dpung dang dpral// de nas nges par gzugs la bstim// 'gyur ldog med par byang du gzhug/ gzi byin phrogs te
268b4(chi): / skyo ru gzhug/ phur pa btab ste nges par bstim// rdul du byas te tshogs la dbul// lha rnams drug po de la yang // re la drug drug dum bu drug/ cho ga gzhung sngags
268b5(chi): dang ting 'dzin 'phyog dang rdzas dang thabs sngon 'byung rjes 'jug khong bkrar shes// de lta bu yi don ldan na// gang la dmigs pa'i gdon mi za// rdo rje brag kyang 'jig
268b6(chi): 'gyur na// sdig can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa can bsgral ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste
268b7(chi): nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa chen po 'khor bcas la// ye shes phur pa btab
269a1(chi): pa bzhin// dmigs pa'i dgra drang bgegs rnams la// rdzas kyi phur pas gdab pa'i las ni gang // bde ra gshegs rgyal ba sa bshad du
269a2(chi): gsol/ bka' stsal pa ni// dbye ba drag ste las kyi rigs// bstim pa bzhi ste de bzhin rigs// gzir ba brgya ste rin chen rigs// byang drang dbang ste pad+ma'i rigs//
269a3(chi): gdab pa drag ste rdo rje'i rigs// btab pa lha phur nyid la bya// de ni spyi yi las su bshad// gdab pa'i gnas ni du zhig yod// bka' stsal pa ni/ gnas ni nyi shu rtsa/
269a4(chi): gcig ste// sngon 'byung dregs pa lnga bsgral bas// lte ba nyid dang snying kha gsung ba dpung mgo spyi la gang ba// dregs pa chen po bsgral ba bzhin// sems nyid rtsad
269a5(chi): bcad snying la yod// dregs pa phyogs skyong bsgral ba bzhin// bsgral ba'i rnam shes brgyad la gdab// dam sri chen po bsgral ba bzhin// dgra bgegs mgo la de
269a6(chi): bzhin gdab// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs pa yis// yar dang mar gyi bdun rgyud bcad// de ni gdab pa'i lus su bshad// de nas yang rdo rje
269a7(chi): 'dus pas gsol pa/ dregs pa'i sems can chen po dang // dkyil 'khor lho yis gzir ba bzhin// rjes su gzir na ji ltar bya// bka' stsal pa ni/ rdo rje lu
269b1(chi): gu rgyud kyi las// gzir ba'i mtshan nyid 'di yis ni// dgra bgegs gzir cing mnan byas na// ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// snying la tsit+ta 'khor ba gzir
269b2(chi): cing mnan// tsit+ta sgo srungs sbyor ba yis// mgo la lang+ga'i bros gzir sbyang // khro chung gzir ba'i sbyor ba yis// lus kyi gnas bcur gzir cing sbyangs// rigs kyi yum
269b3(chi): lnga'i sbyor ba yis// sgo lnga'i rnam shes gzir cing sbyangs// sgo ma bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// yan lag bzhi yi mtshan ma sbyangs// dam la btags po'i ma tshogs kyis//
269b4(chi): ga yang gzhi shu na lpags gzir cing sbyangs// ro la pa'i pho nya tshogs pas kyis// dus gsum sha rus khrag rnams sbyangs// ye shes rol pa'i bro grA yis// ma lus kun
269b5(chi): kyang gzir bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ ye shes 'bar ba'i khro tshogs kyis// rdo rje thod pa'i tho gtun tu// dregs pa bsgral nas gsol te dgyes pa
269b6(chi): bzhin// rjes su 'jug na ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsa la pa ni/ nam mkha'i gtun khung ba der gsheg sa las// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings nyid du// srid gsum
269b7(chi): ma lus sbyar bar bya'o// mkha' thim dbyings su bsgral byas nas// hUM hUM bgyis pas dbang du bsdus// phaT kyis kun tu gtor byas nas// sha khrag khams gsum
270a1(chi): gang bar 'don// kha kha zhes pas lhag ma ba zhes// ha ha zhes pas sgra bsgrags pas// bzhes shig rol par gsol bar 'gyur// zhes
270a2(chi): gsungs so// gsol pa ni/ bder gshegs rgyal ba'i spyod mdzad de// rdo rje ye shes me dpal gyis// dregs pa'i sha rus bsregs nas rol pa bzhin// rjes su
270a3(chi): bsgrub na ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'brub khung nyid du bya ba 'am// yang na gzhung dang 'thun pa ru// me thab gru gsum sum brtsegs la/
270a4(chi): dkyil du rdo rje nag po gzhag/ dang po dkar la gnyis pa ga nag/ gsum pa dmar por bya ba ste// zla gam yang ni dmar por bya// bar khyams nag po sgo rigs sbar/
270a5(chi): dur khrod shing ngam tsher mA can// khru gang gru gsum dbyibs su brtsigs// yang na yam shing nag po rtse mo ma nor bar// rtse mo gru gsum dag tu zhol// tshe the'u rtsa rtse ma
270a6(chi): nor bar// rtsa ba nr-i'i tshil gyis byug/ sngags pa'i rgyan lnga nag po la// byang du kha bltas sa la 'greng nas 'dug/ dur khrod gnas sam ma bdun khyim// yid 'ongs me
270a7(chi): tog brgyan pa 'am// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dgang gzar gru gsum khru gang la// dkyil du a yis mtshon pa'o// blugs gzar zlum po dkyil du rdo rje mdzes//
270b1(chi): phyi nang sreg rdzas gsang ba nag por bya// shan pa'i khyim nas blangs pa'i mes// yam shing dag la spar par bya// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// raM las dam tshig
270b2(chi): me lha pa sa ma// ye shes me lha snyan gsol sman drang bstim phyag 'tshal// mchod pa'i rim dbul bstod pas dgyes byas la// 'dod don gsol bas me lha gzhal yas
270b3(chi): khang de nang dkyil 'khor lha tshogs spyan drangs bzhugs gsol mchod// bstod pa'i rgyal po don rtogs gang rung bstod// 'dod don gsol te 'phrin las bco la//
270b4(chi): bsgral ba'i ling+ka cha gcig la// dgra bgegs gzugs bstan gasngal byas la// dgug cing phur pa rab btab cing // nyungs kar brdeg cing gu gul bdug/ mtshon
270b5(chi): gyis gdab gtum skud pas dam bcings la// gtor ma gnyis kyi las byas la// bka' las 'da' ba'i sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal snying bsregs nas/
270b6(chi): dngos por gyur pa'i gnas rnams kun// mtshor ngogs med par gasreg par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsol pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod tshe//
270b7(chi): dregs pa zhabs 'og gnon pa'i tshe// rjes bsgrub mnan na ji ltar bya// bka' stsal pa ni/ shing gcig drung ngam ma rungs sa// rgya gram lam du bya ba dang // klu yi
271a1(chi): mig dang 'byung po'i srings nyid du// dkyil 'khor gru gsum rgya sol gdab// de nas mnan pa'i rdzas bcug la// dbang gi phur pa drug btab
271a2(chi): nas// dur khrod g.yam pa sngon po laM// zhing chen dag gi sngar khrag gis// nam mkha' sngon po gru gsum la// rdo rje rgya gram bzhi yis mdzes// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil
271a3(chi): 'khor ldan// yi ge lnga dang mdzes pas ni// phur pa de yis sbyinas mnan// sems ma rdo rje dam tshig bskul// sku gsung thugs kyi stobs kyis mnan// be com
271a4(chi): nyid kyang las kyis stongs// mche ba sha khrag zos par byed// nyungs kar rdeg cing gu gu la bdug/ ting 'dzin 'byung chen lnga'i ri rab bsam// de stengs las kyi lha
271a5(chi): nyid kyis// shin tu mnan pa'i mchog tu gsungs// las kyis mnar ba'i byung ngan dus zad 'di// hUM las kyi rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab
271a6(chi): 'byams kun// skad cig yud la mnan par shog/ ces gsungs so// yang gsol pa ni// dregs pa bsgral nas slar sol bzhin// dgra bgegs bsgral nas
271a7(chi): ji ltar gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bka' stsal ba ni/ rtswa na 'ga' na'i sbyor ba mdzad// drag po las kyis bsgral ba rnams// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus brngubs nas//
271b1(chi): mi ldog dbyings su phaT kyis 'phang // bla dkyil rlung gi sbyor bas bskyed// dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/ sbyar 'gyur 'od zer 'dra
271b2(chi): bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// de ltar bskyed la mi gnas te// mi g.yos dbu ma'i don dang ldan// mya ngan
271b3(chi): 'das pa'i dbyings su dag/ bde ba chen po gnas nyid du// de'i lta bu'i don dang ldan la// sgrol ba byas kyang gal med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa
271b4(chi): gsang ba'i rgyud chen po lngas/ drol gdab gzir bsta bas bsregs mnan gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje
271b5(chi): 'dus pas gsol pa ni/ ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri// thabs ni gang zhes sgrol bas ni// gru gsum zla gam mu
271b6(chi): khyud zlum// gru bzhi pa la 'khor lo brgyad// bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhir bcas// gru gsum nag la zla gam dmar// mu khyud dkar la gru bzhi ser// gong ras
271b7(chi): lding la 'khor lo ser// rtsibs mtshan dmar la 'tshams phyed dkar// gru chang ldang la bar khyams dmar// sgo ni rigs bstan rta babs mdzes par bya// dur khrod
272a1(chi): rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// dbus su bcom ldan yab yum ste// spyan snga phyogs bzhir sras mchog rnams// zla gam gru gsum rtse mo dang /
272a2(chi): mu khyud gru bzhi dag la dgod// rnam rgyal gA shed po rta mgrin dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nyid rang bzhi// rang rang gzungs dang sgras bcas te// phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i
272a3(chi): cha bskal la// dri za gshin rje klu dang gnod sbyin gyi// gdan la mkhas pas rims bzhin dgod// dbyug sngon mi g.yo gzhan mi thub// khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid
272a4(chi): dang bzhi// rang rang gzungs dang sras bcas nas// mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// me lha srin po rlung lha dang // dbang ldan gdan dang bcas par ro// mdun
272a5(chi): du hUM chen 'khor dang bcas// rgyab tu stobs chen 'khor bcas de// tshangs dang sa bdag gdan la gnas// dbus kyi sa bzhi gzhi mthun te// phyi rim gru gsum
272a6(chi): nyi shu byA/ bar khyams sgo rnams de bzhin te// dur khrod rin chen rtsi pa la// ka bA brgyad dang gdung bcu gnyis// rta babs dur khrod rin chen dbyibs// kha dog
272a7(chi): kyang ni rigs dang sbyar// yang na dmar nag nyid du bya// gru gsum rnams ni yum gyi shes rab mkha'// nyi shu rtsa gcig shes par bya// yab rnams nyi shu rtsa
272b1(chi): gcig kyang // steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma nor bar// thabs kyi ngo bor dgod par bya// sras kyi phur pa gong bzhin te// sgro ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// dbus su
272b2(chi): glu ba ba sgo can dkyil du gru gsum mdzes// mu khyud phyi rim rin chen 'bar ba brgyad// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// dkyil 'khor nyi shu las bzhi tshang bar bya// bar khyams
272b3(chi): sgo dang rgyan rnams de bzhin te// zla gam dmar la gru gsum gnag/ sgo ni mi 'gyur mthing nAg ste// sgo khyams shin tu mdzes byas la// mu khyud dkar la rin chen
272b4(chi): sngo/ zur mtshan dmar la mtha' rgyud dkar// gru chad nag la tha bzhi ser// las bzhi'i dbyibs ni gong dang 'thun// khyams dang sgo rgyan de bzhin de// dbus su
272b5(chi): bdud 'dul yab yum ste// spyan sngar rdo rje 'dus pa gzungs dang bcas// phyogs bzhi'i rin chen dag la ni// rigs bzhi sras mchog rim par dgod// mtshams la
272b6(chi): rigs kyi yum shes te// tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu la// thabs dang shes rab gong bzhin no// gzhan rnams kyang ni de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor de
272b7(chi): skad gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
273a1(chi): de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa ni/ rdo rje khros pa mi bzad pas// dregs pa chen po bsgral ba'i tshe// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rgyud bskul/
273a2(chi): zhing / drug shul rjes su spyod pa'i tshe// lha rnams bstod bskul ji ltar lags// mi bzad khros pas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ mi bzang sa
273a3(chi): pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dbus kyi khrag 'thung bdag nyid dpal// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum las// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing
273a4(chi): la/ pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang // me dpung kha dong ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdzu 'phrul chen po bzhi'i zhabs dag gis// dreg+sa pa pheM mo nyi zla'i
273a5(chi): ga dan la bzhugs// 'jigs byed sku la dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// glang chen stag dang zhing chen g.yang gzhi klubs// thod sbrul la sogs sku la brgyan cing zhags//
273a6(chi): thal chen zhag dang rak+ta'i thig les brgyan// rdo rje gshog pas srid gsum zil gyis gnon// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i glong na bzhugs// dpa' sgeg 'jigs
273a7(chi): su rung ba'i sku mnga' zhing // rgod gshe 'jigs byed gsung gi mchog/ snying rje rnga ma dang zhi byed thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag la bstod// g.yon nas yum
273b1(chi): bskyed e ka dza ti ma// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing // kha dong ut+pa la dril bu dang // ban d+ha rak+ta rdo rjes 'khrug cing gsol// ri rab phur pa 'dril
273b2(chi): zhing 'debs// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan cing // gsang ba'i yum chen nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs las sprul pa'i sras mchog kI la
273b3(chi): ya/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rang bzhin dang // rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zur gsum
273b4(chi): po/ rdo rje sta re kha dong ri rab phur pa 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril brgya byin gdan la bzhugs te las rnams ma lus mdzad// zhe sdang chen po'i 'phrin las
273b5(chi): dus la ba ba// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// smug nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zlum// 'khor lo sta re kha TAM ri rab phur pa 'dril//
273b6(chi): rigs kyi yum 'khril tshangs pa'i gdan la bzhugs te zhi ba'i 'phrin las mdzad// gti mug chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// rin che ni 'dus pa'i sras mchog
273b7(chi): kI la ya// ser nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zur bzhi ste// rin chen sta re kha T+wAM ri rab phur pa 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril ma ha de ba'i gdan la bzhugs
274a1(chi): te rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzad// nga rgyal chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dmar nag zhal
274a2(chi): gcig phyag bzhi sku smad zla gam ste// pad+ma sta re kha thong ri rab phur pa 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril khyab 'jug gdan la bzhugs nas dbang gi las rnams mdzad//
274a3(chi): 'dod chags chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// ljang nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi sgra smad zur gsum ste// rgya gram sta ri
274a4(chi): ri rab phur pa 'dril// rigs kyi yum 'khril dbang phyug chen po'i gdan la bzhugs te drag po'i 'phrin las mdzad// phrag dog chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab//
274a5(chi): steng phyogs gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// hUM mdzad dkar dmar sngo ste rdo rje dang // mda' gzhu gdengs dang ri rab phur pa 'dril// tshangs pa pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs
274a6(chi): nas rdu sgra 'byin sku 'dra 'khril sbyar rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men phag dang dmigs bu'i mgo/ rol pa chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// shar phyogs gru gsum rdo rje
274a7(chi): brag stengs nas// rnam par rgyal ba dkar dmar rdo rje dang // tri shul 'khor lo ri rab phur pa 'dril// brgya byin pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// rnams skems sku 'dra
274b1(chi): 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men stag dang bya rgod mgo/ zlog byed chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// shar lho gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// dbyug pa sngon
274b2(chi): po sngo dkar sngo skya rdo rje dang // ri rab dbyug pa me dpung ri rab phur pa 'dril// me lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// sder mo sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul
274b3(chi): pa'i 'phra me na g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ 'joms byed chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// lho phyogs gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// gshin rje gshed po sngog nag mthing
274b4(chi): ka rdo rje dang // be con dbyug pa ri rab phur pa 'dril// gshin rje pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// dur khrod sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men sha
274b5(chi): ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ 'jigs byed chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// lho nub gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// mi g.yo mgon po mthing dmar smug ste rdo rje dang // spu gri zhags
274b6(chi): pa ri rab phur pa 'dril// srin po pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gtun khung sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men gzig dang khwa yi mgo/ mi
274b7(chi): 'gyur chen po'i 'phrin las dus la bab// nub phyogs gru gsum rdo rje'i brag stengs nas// rta mgrin dkar sngo dmar te rdo rje dang // ral gri sbrul zhags ri rab phur pa 'dril/
275a1(chi): / chu lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gtum mo sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men byi la pung nyud mgo/ brjid pa'i
275a2(chi): 'phrin las chen po mdzad du gsol// nub byang gru gsum rdo rje brag sbrengs nas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dung ser ljang rdo rdo rje dang // rgya bram dril bu ri rab zur pa 'dris/
275a3(chi): gnod sbyin pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// rlung 'byin sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men seng ge pha wang mgo/ gzir ba'i 'phrin las chen po
275a4(chi): mdzad du gsol// byang shar gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal ljar se ra skra ste rdo rje dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM ri rab phur pa 'dril// dbang ldan pho mo
275a5(chi): bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// gsod ma sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men dr-id dang sre mong mgo/ mnan pa'i 'phrin las chen po mdzad du gsol//
275a6(chi): 'og phyogs gru gsum rdo rje brag stengs nas// stobs chen ljang ser dud ka rdo rje dang // tho ba gtun shing ri rab phur pa 'dril// sa bdag pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan stengs
275a7(chi): nas/ bskyod ma sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa'i 'phra men do ma dang byi ba'i mgo/ gdab pa'i 'phrin las chen po mdzad du gsol// dkar mo pu shud
275b1(chi): mgo can phur ba lcags kyu 'dren// snying rje chen pos 'gro don mdzad du gsol// sngon mo s+yA ka'i mgo can zhags pa phur pa 'dril// byams pa chen po'i 'phrin
275b2(chi): las mdzad du gsol// dmar mo srin bya'i mgo can lcags sgrog sdom// dga' ba'i 'phrin las chen po mdzad du gsol// ljang nag khra ma dril bu phur pa 'dril//
275b3(chi): btang snyoms chen po'i 'phrin las mdzad du gsol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha la bstod cing 'phrin las bcol ba'i le'u
275b4(chi): ste sum cu pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos//
275b5(chi): dregs pa'i ma srid chung ma rnams// ma chags thabs kyis sbyor ba las// dgyes pa'i sprin las spros pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ji ltar bsgrub// ces
275b6(chi): gsol pas// bka' stsal pa ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgrub 'dod pas// dur khrod chen po rab dben pas// zla ba yar gyi ngo la 'dug/ dkyil 'khor zla gam le'u rtse
275b7(chi): dgu pa la// gru can dang ni glo 'bur dang // bar khyams sgo rim gnyis par bya// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po ste// gzungs dang bcas nas dgod par bya//
276a1(chi): ki'u ri tsi'u ri pra ma pe tA li// phyogs kyi le'u rtse dag la dgod// pu ka kas ma sme sha tsan da li// mtshams kyi le'u rtse dag la dgod/
276a2(chi): seng gdong stag dang wa dang spyang ki rnams// phyogs kyi glo 'bur bzhi la'o// bya rgod ngur bya bya rog 'ug pa'i mgo/ mtshams kyi gru chad dag la'o// rta gdong phag dang
276a3(chi): sbrul dang seng ge bzhi// dang po sgo bzhi dag la'o// sring mo tshangs pa lha chen gsum// shar stong lcags ri dag la'o// gtogs 'dod gzhon nu rgyal byin gsum//
276a4(chi): sha ra smad lcags ri dag la'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi zla ba gsum// lce stong lcags ri dag la'o// be con srin mo za ba gsum// lho smad lcags ri dag la'o// dga'
276a5(chi): ba stobs chen rdo rje gsum// nub phyogs lcags ri dag la'o// 'dod na nor srungs rlung mo gsum/ nub smad lcags ri dag la'o// gsod byed mi mo phag mo gsum//
276a6(chi): byang stong lcags ri dag la'o// tshon byed sna chen chu lha gsum// byang smad lcags ri dag la'o// rdo rje nag mo/ rdo rje ser mo/ rdo rje dmar mo/ rdo rje ljang nag
276a7(chi): bzhi'i/ phyi yi sgo bzhi dag la'o// de yi lcags ri dag la ni// mkha' 'gro ging dang pho nya mo dang sring mo rnams// rang bzhin don gyis gnas par bya// yang na snying po lnga
276b1(chi): bcu nyid// dam bu dag la bris te dgod// yang na phyag mtshan lnga bcu nyid// so so'i gnas su de bzhin no// dur khrod thod pa'i nang nyid du// ras chen sdong bu sum
276b2(chi): sgril la// snang ba'i 'odang can nyid du dgod// yang na yab yum byang sems kyi// gsang ba'i thig le lnga bcu'ang bya// rdo rje sha chen thang mar brdal// dmar gyi rak+ta/
276b3(chi): rgya mtshor 'khyil// rus pa'i phung po ri ltar spungs// zhing che na g.yang gzhi sprin ltar gtibs// sprin dkar ljang lding g.ye ltar bkram// ba su ta'i rgyu 'phreng 'khor bar
276b4(chi): ldan/ gsur chen du ba rgyun mi gcad// mchod pa'i rim pa ci 'byor dang // yo byad la sogs 'bad par bya'o// de nas rnal 'byor blo ldan gyis// phyi nang rgyu
276b5(chi): 'grul dam du bsdams// chag nyams dam bshags byin dbab ste// rtags dbab mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs// dam bcas rnal 'byor tshul phyag ni// rgyal
276b6(chi): ba'i mdzad spyod gzhung du ba skrag/ thugs dam bzhin du snyan gsan gsol// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te// ting 'dzin bskyed pas nyid la bstim//
276b7(chi): sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin pa skyed// sems can don du bstan par bya'o// khams gsum kun gyi gdug pa dang // 'khor gyi mtshogs zil gyis gnon// ye shes
277a1(chi): lha la dbang mi bza' ste phyag kyang btsalnga// 'gro ba'i don du dam bcas te// kun bzangs lha mo lngas mchod nas// bdud rtsi rak+ta
277a2(chi): gtor ma gus pas dbul// bstod don gsol te rol mo yid 'ong bsgrags// 'byor pa tshogs kyi mchod pa dus drug rgyun mi gcad// mA nar ma bcos
277a3(chi): chos nyid dang // rang bzhin lhun grub gyis pa'i gnas// mi dmigs mkha'i klong du bsgrubs// bde chen byang chub bstan par bzung // gnyis med mtshon pa'i
277a4(chi): lam bzang po// srid pa dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum kun las 'das pa ste// 'di ni bdag gi byang chub sems// rgyu mchog 'bras bu yi ge 'dri//
277a5(chi): srid pa gsum la dbang sbyar zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal ba mnyam// byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// a e/ yaM baM raM/ su keng / bruMpan da//
277a6(chi): baM bruM/ nam mkha' rdo rje rlung nag rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dang // sa gzhi keng rus ri rab ste// 'byung chen lnga las grub pa'i gzhal yas ni// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan nyid so so
277a7(chi): gsal te ma 'dres kyang // nam mkha'i mkha' ltar kun tu khyab par bdal// phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i
277b1(chi): gzhal yas ni// zhing chen gzhal bkram smad du bya// ban dra skam rlon rtsig par brtsigs// gnam lkugs gzer btab rgyan rnams rdzogs// ba dan tshoms
277b2(chi): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// dbus kyi zla gra ma sgo can le'u rtse dgu// gru chad glo 'bur sgo rim gnyis kyis mdzes// rin chen dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan par gzhal//
277b3(chi): lha rnams kun la brgyad rtsa brgyad// ru lu'i 'od kyis gnas sbyangs nas// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa rdzogs chen rdzogs par bya// yan lag
277b4(chi): bzhi dang ldan byas la// mtshan ma 'byung ba gdon mi za// gsung gi ngo bo hUM nyid las// thugs kyi phyag rgya rab 'bar nas// 'phra mo sku yi 'phro 'du las//
277b5(chi): yab yum rtse'i bskur gsal bya// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri stengs su// mA hA daM ba gnyis bsnol kha// nyi zla ga sang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// chags med pad+ma kha
277b6(chi): dog rgyus// hUM hUM/ badz+ra gan da/ dz+nyA na badz+ra kI la ya/ tib ta sa ta/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big nan baM hUM phaT/ tipra tA tsakra ha nA ha na hUM phaT/ sa mchi
277b7(chi): dza ti sau ra stir gyi/ rang ma a pa su r+ya tsan padi pad ma ma 'da' la hUM/ rdo rje pad+ma ldan byas nas// byang chub sems ni nyi zla'i 'od// thim pas thim 'gyur
278a1(chi): gnyis ka s+ho// gnyis med dgyes pa'i byin rlabs nas// de las dgyes te ha brjod pas// gnas kyi lha mo brgyad 'thon te// phyogs pa'i
278a2(chi): mtshams brgyad nyid du ni// ngo mtshar bstan dang lag char bcas// hA ha hA ha ha hA ha ha/ de nas dgyes te ha brjod pas// yul gyi lha mo brgyad 'thon te// gru chad
278a3(chi): glo 'bur dgra la yang // ngo mtshar ches nas gong bzhin no// he he he he he he he he/ de nas dgyes te phaT brjod pas// ye shes sgom bzhi 'thon te// gzhal yas chen
278a4(chi): bo'i sgo bzhir dgod// phaT phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra e ma sUr+ya ma 'da' la/ hUM a tsan 'dra ma 'da' la aM/ ma ha bo ti tsa ti ma 'da' la hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo
278a5(chi): b+h+yo b+hU b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+hU b+hU/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes dgyes pa'i sprin las spros te/ phyi yi khyams dang sgo la dgod// ye shes mkha' 'gro rnams 'thon nos//
278a6(chi): sngon gyi rgyal ba'i mdzad spyod bzhin// las kyi ma tshogs zil mnan nas// phya rgya dkyil 'khor gsal bar rdzogs// phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // byin brlabs
278a7(chi): dbang bskur sngon 'byung bzhin// cho 'phrul chen po'i rang bzhin du// mkhas pas nan tan bskyed de bya// badz+ra ke'u ri ha/ badz+ra tsi'u ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra pe ta li ha/
278b1(chi): badz+ra pu ka si ma si ha/ badz+ra ka sa ma si ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsan da li ha/ badz+ra sing da mu ka he/ badz+ra bya gri mu ka he/ badz+ra sri la mu ka he/ badz+ra sho na mu ka he/ badz+ra kang ka
278b2(chi): mu ka heTabadz+ra kha kha mu ka he/ badz+ra hu lu mu ka Ne/ phaT ar+ya te tsa te dza/ phaT a mo ka si ta hUM/ phaT badz+ra lo ka baM/ phaT badz+ra pa smi pa la ho/ ma nu rak+kha si byo/ pra ma ni byo/
278b3(chi): raiSh+Ta ti byo/ ko ma ri b+h+yo/ sde sna pe b+h+yo/ ko ma re d+yo/ in+d+ra ya b+h+r-i/ badz+ra bing gA lam b+h+yo/ a mi ti byA/ so'u ni d+yo/ dan dam b+h+yo/ rak+Sha si byo/ bag sha saM b+h+yAM/ rai tri badz+ra ts+tsha/
278b4(chi): ru tri ma ra traM byo/ ma no hA ra ma byo/ si ti ka byo/ ma hA ma ra ni byo/ ag ne ye byo/ ba ra hi byo/ rtsa mun ti byo/ pu ta byo/ b+ha ru na byo/ ma ha ka la byo/ tsa ka la byo/ ku ma ra byo/
278b5(chi): badz+ra la ma po da ra byo/ oM badz+ra ki la ya sarba bi ga nan baM hUM phaT/ hUM ti ba ta tsakra ha he phaT/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ nges pa'i don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams// skal ldan rnal 'byor
278b6(chi): dag gis bsgrubs gyur nas// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas kyis// dam bcas bzhin du rtags dang mtshan ma'i brda ston te// gdeng med dag la ston par ga la 'gyur//
278b7(chi): brda dang lan du ma 'byor na// thabs med shes rab zang ka bas/ brda'i las la brtson par bya'o// lha mo rnams kyi sprul pa dag/ gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa// nges
279a1(chi): par legs par 'ong ba yin// de yi sor mo gnyis ston pa// g.yon pa'i mthe bos bcangs pa las// snyun sbed phyag rgya yin te g.yas pa'i
279a2(chi): mthe bong bstun// don dam bden pa'i lam 'dri ba// gang zhig srin lag ston pa la// de yi mthe'u chung bstan par bya// kun rdzob bden ldan lam 'dra ba'i// gang
279a3(chi): zhig mdzub mo ston pa la// de'i gung mo bstan par bya'o// thabs dang shes rab 'di ldan pa'i// gang gis srin 'theb ston pa la// de yi mgrin pa'i rus 'phreng bstan//
279a4(chi): lha yi skur sgoms nus pa ci// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi dbyug to mu tra bstan// sbyor ba byed par spyod dam pa'i// gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de yi gsang ba rdo rje
279a5(chi): bstan// bden bdun legs par 'bri ba'i// gang zhig rus pa'i ston+da na// khwa dang lho ni rab tu bstan// bden na sbyor ba bya'o// gang zhig 'bri ku ston pa la//
279a6(chi): bdag gis spyi gtsug dgrol bar bya// sbyor ba ma lus sdigs byed pa'i// de yi khro gnyer ston pa la// de yi lag mthil 'jigs mi dgos// sbyor ba'i don la nyal
279a7(chi): ba'i do na rkang mthil ston pa yi// de yi gnas dgur sen mo ga ba// de ltar sbyor ba byas gyur na// dam tshig dbang gis srin mo 'du 'gyur te// sras dang
279b1(chi): grogs su the tsom med// rus 'phreng la srogs rgyan thogs nas// bdag la dbang bskur byed par 'gyur// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci bstan yang // chos nyid mnyam
279b2(chi): las ma g.yos na// bu yi dam tshig shes 'gyur te// e ma bu ni rdo rje che// shin tu rtse ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// ma ltar dgongs pa'i don byed 'gyur// brtul zhugs
279b3(chi): phyag 'tshal ldan gyur na// bran dang sring mor the tshom med// ma bcol bzhin du las rnams byed// nor bu rin chen bzhin du re ba skongs// de ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ma//
279b4(chi): bdag gis bu mo'i tshogs te ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rigs 'dzin sa la smin te mngon pa nyid// rjes 'jug gang zhig rnam shes phung po yul dang khams rnams kun// ma
279b5(chi): spangs gnas su dag ste sangs rgyas 'di yis 'grub// las kyi mkha' 'gro ba sgrubs pas sangs mi rgya// brdal dang rtags de kun bsgribs pa ste// mtshan ma'i chos kyi ting
279b6(chi): 'dzin g.yeng ba'i rgyu// de bas sems dang sems las 'byung ba 'bad par 'gyur// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'du ba nyid// ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgrubs pa'i shugs las
279b7(chi): 'byung ba ste// don dang de la grub pa'i rtags mi bca' 'o// sngon gyi dam bsrungs rgya'i tshogs bsag phyir// las kyi mkha' 'gro ging dang mi srid pho nya 'bar tshogs la/
280a1(chi): tshogs kyi lhag ma kha chus bran te byin// dam bcas bzhin du gsang ba'i las bcol lo// spyan drangs ye shes mkha' 'gro la// gtang rag tshul
280a2(chi): du mchod dbul te// nyes pa bshags nas don sgrol na// gzhal yas nyid du gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams kun// bdag nyid chen po sku la
280a3(chi): bsdu/ de nas rims kyis mi dmigs par// thig le byang chub brtan par gzur// gzugs brnyan zhal phyis chags chab gdab// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa
280a4(chi): gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ye shes ma mo bsgrub cing / las kyi mkha' 'gro dam la gdags pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas yang
280a5(chi): rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal po la/ rdo rje 'dus pas gsol pa/ thabs kyi spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// khros pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bzhin//
280a6(chi): rjes su 'jug pa ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas/ khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// drod tshad rtags ldan bla ma yis// brtul zhugs 'chang ba'i slob ma'i phyir// yid
280a7(chi): 'ongs me tog rgyas pa 'am// dur khrod chen po rab dben dang // mchod rten drung ngam kun dga' ra// der ni dbang gi las la ste// sa chog mtshams chod gong dang 'dra//
280b1(chi): gnyis pa sta gon bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor dam rdzas chag chag gdab// lha rnams rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis thig le bya// thod pa'i bum pa bco
280b2(chi): lnga la dur khrod skra yis kha brgyan nas// ro ras dag gis dbu rgyan bya// zhing chen dag gi gdan la bzhugs// de nas slob ma'i sta gon ni// ba su ta'i bsrungs bskyed
280b3(chi): bya// dur khrod rkang la so shing bya// rdo rje dri chus kha dag bya// dbang gi yo byad ma lus kun// skabs der nges par gsog par bya// de dag sngags dang bskul tshig
280b4(chi): rnams// zhi ba'i las dang 'dra ba ste// thabs ni bdag nyid khro bo las su sgyur cing bya// thig tshon cho ga gong bzhin no// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// sgo dang
280b5(chi): bar khyams gru chad dang // de na thig bskor gnyis byas la// cha ni brgyad brgyad nyid du bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po la// thig bzhi btab pa sa le tse dgu//
280b6(chi): dbus su zla gam gcig byas te// mdun rgyub gnyis su zla gam bzhi// phyogs bzhi le'u tse cha la las bzhi dbyibs// phyi rim brgyad cha gnyis 'gyur la// dbang
280b7(chi): gi zla gam bcu drug bya// zla gam rnams ni dmar por bya// las bzhi dbyibs ni rigs dang sbyar// gzhan yang mdzes shing legs bris nas// dbus su khros pa'i
281a1(chi): rgyal po ste// mdun rgyab steng 'og khro bo bzhi// phyi rim zla gam dag la ni// phyogs mtshams khro mo bcu drug dgod// spyan snga phyogs bzhi
281a2(chi): dkyil 'khor bzhir// sras kyi phur pa lnga po dgod// gru mtshams bzhi la phyag rgya bzhi// sgo bzhi dag la sgro srungs te// zla ga ma nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// shes rab
281a3(chi): yum gyi b+ha ga nyir// phur pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ni// thabs mchog yab kyi ngo bo'o// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med dngos// rgyan dang mchod pas mdzes rdzogs
281a4(chi): nas/ cho ga'i rim pa gong bzhin du// de nas zhugs pa'i rim pa ni// zhi las khro bar sgyur zhing bya// de nas dbang gi rim pa nyid// dang la sku'i cha bskyed dbang //
281a5(chi): sngon 'byung bzhin du bsgyur ba ni// phung po ma spangs ngo bo nyid// gsang ba'i snying po brjod las 'das// rakra me dpal skur bsgoms te// lhang nge bA ru nges par
281a6(chi): gsal/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la sarba bi ga nan baM hUM phaT/ e ma de ni rang 'byung ba'i// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu sku// 'khor ba yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir// ye shes
281a7(chi): sems dpa' dbang bskur ro// dz+nyA na swa ta ki la ya a/ srid pa gsum la dbang bskur zhing // byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// khams gsum ye shes bskyed
281b1(chi): pa'i phyir// dbu la rigs lngas dbang bskur ro// oM aM hUM swa ta/ ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// pha rol phyin pa drug gi rtags// rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan gyis/
281b2(chi): rgyud drug gnas su sgrol bar shog/ zhag gi zo ris don dam bcud kyis brgyan// rak+ta'i thig les thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// thal chen thig le mtshan ma spros dang bral/
281b3(chi): mtshan ma gsum gyi don dam mtshon par shog/ ma hA sdig ta/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma ha king na ri ti/ skam po chos sku ra ri longs spyod rdzogs// rlon pa sprul pa'i sku yin te/ dus
281b4(chi): gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs kun dang // sku gsum ngo bor dbang bskur ro// ma hA ka pA la hUM/ sbrul chen rigs bzhi'i tshul khrims 'dis// mnyen la 'khril bas sku yi brgyan/
281b5(chi): zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin pas// 'phrin las bzhi yis gdug pa zhi bar shog/ ma hA na ka hU~M/ glang chen ko rlon stobs bcu brjid dang ldan// tshul khrims g.yang gzhi thabs
281b6(chi): la mkhas pa dang // stag lpags sha ma thabs dpa' bar ldan pa ni// na bza' rgyan gyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ khams gsum zil gnon rdo rje gshog pa 'dis// srid
281b7(chi): gsum 'debs byed rlung gi rang bzhin te// g.yas pa thabs la g.yon pa shes rab ste// rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ ye shes gcig las ma g.yos
282a1(chi): kyang / 'dul thabs bye brag tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// rtags kyi khro chung mtshon gang gis// rga nan chen po 'gro don byed par byed// kham nag
282a2(chi): ral pas stong nyid don rtogs te// mthing nag ral pa'i chu 'chang gis// 'khor ba rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te// ma g.yos u ma chen po'i don rtogs shog/
282a3(chi): 'bar ba thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // 'phro ba khyab pa thugs rje dang // 'du ba dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// glong ba zad pa'i 'phrin las dang // 'khyil ba gnyis su med par
282a4(chi): na/ rdo rje me yi dbang mchog thob par shog/ de ni sku la cha lugs rkyen no// de nas mdzad pa 'dzin las kyi dbang bskur ba// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams kyis//
282a5(chi): rab tu gsor te dril byas nas// byin gyis brlabs po'i dbang bskur nas// gnyis med chen por dbang bskur shog/ gu gul sbyar ma'i rdzas mchog dam pa 'di// sras
282a6(chi): mchog ki la ya'i gzi mdangs rab bskyed nas// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par shog/ nyungs kar rgyal po'i rdzas mchog dam pa
282a7(chi): 'di/ bder gshegs sras kyi mchog rnams kyis// thugs dam chen po bskul nas kyang // 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par shog/ rak+Sha'i rgyal po chags pa'i bdag
282b1(chi): nyid 'dis// 'gro ba'i don la thugs dam rab bskul zhing // phyogs bcu 'jig rten rab 'byams su// thugs rje chags pas 'gro don byed par shog/ thugs rje
282b2(chi): chen po'i cod pa na ni// thabs dang shes rab rtags yin pas// gzung 'dzin mtha' gnyis rnam pa spangs// dbyings dang ye shes mtshan par shog/ phyi nang gsang
282b3(chi): ba'i mchod rdzas 'dis// dus gsum sangs rgyas mnyes mchod cing // 'gro ba'i don la thugs bskul zhing // mchod sbyin stobs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/
282b4(chi): bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mtshon gang ba'o// gsang ba'i sngags kyis rab bskyed la// dus dang rgyun du bzlas dgos pas// 'job bsnyen 'di yis dbang bskur ro// de ni
282b5(chi): mdzad pa 'di 'dzin las kyi dbang ngo // drag po sgrol ba'i las dbang ni// dbyings dang ye shes don dam pho nya dang // thabs dang shes rab rtags kyi pho nya dang // 'khor
282b6(chi): bya'i gnas nas dgra bgegs dgug pa'i phyir// mngags pa pho nya'i phur pa bzung // phyag rgya bzhi ldan phur bu 'di byin pas// dgug dang bcings dang dbang du bsdu ba'i
282b7(chi): phyir/ bar chad dgra bgegs gzugs la phebs par shog/ rdo rje gdab phur 'di byin pas// ye shes phur pa dbyings la 'debs pa'i phyir// mtshan ma rtags kyi
283a1(chi): phyar pa yis// gdab pa'i ling ka shes rab la// thabs mchog phur bu 'debs par shog/ mtshon cha lnga ldan phur bu 'di byin pas/
283a2(chi): 'joms byed rdo rje gcod pa'i 'khor lo drang // gtub pa'i ral gri rdung ba'i dbyug tho dang // mnan pa'i rgya gram la sogs kyis// mA rig rgya mo ral bar shog/ rin chen
283a3(chi): rgyas pa'i phur bu 'di byin pas// dmigs pa'i mthu dang rtsal byed las la sogs// gnas su skud cing rdzu 'phrul sgrogs nas ni// rang nyid tshe dang dbang thang rgyas
283a4(chi): par byed par shog/ khro mo 'bar ma'i gtun khung ngu// khro bo 'bar ba'i the tshogs kyis// 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyangs pa'i phyir// ma dngos po rdul du
283a5(chi): rlog par shog/ drag po mchod gtor 'di byin pas// dam can rnams kyi thugs bskul zhing // gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul du rlog par
283a6(chi): shog/ dbang mchog dug gis gtor ma 'di byin pas// gnod byed ma lus myos shing 'dzub pa dang // bag chags sbyangs phyir sdig pa 'thol 'gyur nas// myos 'jug
283a7(chi): bab tshol myos su chug/ rdo rje srin mo za byed dang // rdo rje srin po zhag gdangs dang // sha rus khrag ste dug gsum mchod pa yis// dug gsum stongs nas sku gsung thugs
283b1(chi): ldan shog/ glong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// 'bar 'gro 'du klong me sbar te// yang me ye'i sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mA lus mnyes par shog/ zil gnon ri
283b2(chi): rab phur pa 'di byin pas// skal med dbyur ngan dus zad rnams// byang chub sems ni ma bskyed por// gnod byed stobs kyi dbang thob shog/ rigs ngan sme sha
283b3(chi): rdol ba'i rigs// kha cig kha ral gzugs mang ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// dbang bskur rim pa gong bzhin no// gang gi gzungs ma de nyid la// zab ma
283b4(chi): dbang yang de bzhin blang // de ltar dbang rims rdzogs gyur na// mi zhes bya ba bder gshegs yin// sangs rgyas zhes ni gud na med// de yis las rnams grub par
283b5(chi): ba shad/ de ltar drug po'i dbang rdzogs nas// gnod byed ma lus rang bzhin du// zhe sdang gting nas ma g.yos kyang // dang dam shugs kyis sgrol 'gyur na//
283b6(chi): dmigs pa bcas na smos ci dgos// de ltar dbang mchog ma thob par// bsgral bar las nyid brtsams byas kyang // rang nyid che yi bar bcad nas// 'khor
283b7(chi): ba'i g.yang sa chen por ltung // de bas nan tan bskyed par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo 'phrin las kyi dbang bskur ba'i
284a1(chi): le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o rdo rje gsang
284a2(chi): ba'i bdag/ bder gshegs rol pa'i rjes 'jug pa'i// rdo rje dbang rdzogs rnal 'byor pas// rjes su dam tshig rtog bsrungs gnas pa grang // phyi rabs don du bstan
284a3(chi): du gsol to// rdo rje gsang bas bka' stsal pa ni// nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso'o// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// rtogs pa'i don nyid yin pa ste// de las
284a4(chi): 'das na 'tshig par 'gyur// rtogs pa'i don mtshon pa der gshegs kyi// zhal nas gsungs pa gdam ngag ste// de'i don las 'das nas 'tshig par 'gyur// gdam
284a5(chi): ngag rig par bstan pa ni// rtogs par bya ba'i dam tshig yin// bsrung bar bya ba khyad par dam tshig ste// gnas par bya ba'i lhag pa'i dam tshig go/ mdor na rnam pa
284a6(chi): gsum du gsungs// yan lag rnam pa phye ba'i rim pa ni// don dam gnyis med ston pa'i sgron ma rdo rje mched rnams la// lha log ngan sems rku 'phrog brdeg la
284a7(chi): stsogs// ngan du sems shing gnod pa dngos su bgyis// sku yi dam tshig nyams na dmyal ba'i rgyu// dang po'i tha tshigs bcas pa bzhin// bzlas brjod sngags
284b1(chi): drang snying po bar mi ga cad// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin no// rang gsung thabs kyis chod nas ma rtogs bzhin du don med spel byed na/ thugs kyi dam
284b2(chi): tshig nyams pas dmyal ba'i rgyu// sbyor dang sgrol dang ma byin len pa dang // tshig brlang ba dang rdzun du smra ba dang // nyon mongs rang kar spyad pas ngan song rgya// drug
284b3(chi): lnga ye shes lnga yi ngo bo la// ma rig log par mthong bas spangs byas te// mi spangs dam tshig nyams pa de bzhin no// dri chen dri chu dmar chen mo sa sems// so so'i
284b4(chi): rnam par rtogs pa ma 'byongs te// gnyis med do na dang 'gal ba de bzhin no// phung po 'byung ba dbang po kha dog yul// gnyis med lta ba ngan pas ma rtogs te// ye shes
284b5(chi): lnga'i don dang ma ldan gong bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// rigs kyi khyad par ye shes lngar snang yang // ye shes gnyis med don de ma rtogs pas// grub pa'i
284b6(chi): 'bras bu med pas dmyal ba'i rgyu// sa la 'jug ste sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// spyi yi dam tshig mdo mang yang // don dang bstan pa'i nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// drang dang nges pa'i
284b7(chi): don du rtogs par bya// khyad par dam tshig srung ba ni// gcan gzan rgyal po seng ge dag/ gsang bar bya ba ma yin dang // za ma tog ni rin chen gter// dug rnams spyo
285a1(chi): bar mi bya'o// rin po che yi lcug ma dag/ rtsad nas gcad par bya ba men// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ khong du btung bar mi rigs so// pad+ma
285a2(chi): rgyas pa'i ze 'bru dag/ kha dbye spyad par mi bya'o// bug rdol can gyi snod dag tu// gsang ba'i bcud rnams blugs pa min// ma brtags pa'i zas dang nor// mi bsrel bcang
285a3(chi): bar mi bya'o// shel sgong bzhin du gsal zhing dag pa dag/ 'dam du sgrub par mi bya'o// seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ rin chen gser gyi snod du blug pa dag/ snod ngan dag
285a4(chi): tu blag mi bya// dgos 'dod skongs pa'i yid bzhin nor bu dag/ thab tu bsreg par yongs mi bya// bya rgyal khyang gi gshog pa dag/ bcag par bya ba ma yin no// gnam
285a5(chi): lcags ngur mo'i mtshon cha dag/ sa la brdab par mi bya'o// stag gzig 'drol ba'i las byas pa'i// las kyi mtha' ma mi brtul lo// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa dag/
285a6(chi): bshig cing dral bar mi bya'o// rdo rje ra bas bskor ba dag/ go mtshams bshig par mi bya'o// mun pa sel ba'i sgron ma dag/ gsad cing gnan par mi bya'o// rdo rje chu yi
285a7(chi): 'ol ka dag/ bcad cing bskyugs par bya ba men// rgyal po rtags kyi phyag rgya dag/ gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs ma yin// rdo rje mkhar rdzong gtams pa dag/ rmang nas
285b1(chi): bzlog ste mi bshig go/ rgyal mtshan rtse la btags pa'i nor bu rin po che// 'dod pa'i sems kyis dgog mi bya// khyad par bstan pa'i dam tshig don ma spangs//
285b2(chi): mdor bsdus nyi shu'i don dang bstun// sa la gnas shing spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag gzhan gnyis kyi don du bsrung bar bya// lhag par dam tshig gnas
285b3(chi): par bya ba ni// mdor na rtsa ba bzhir bstan te// spyod pa rgyun dang rang bzhin lta ba dang // lta ba'i nyams drod ga la mdo nges pa bzhi'o// yan lag don nyid bshad
285b4(chi): pa ni/ spyod pa rgyun la dam tshig bzhir bstan te// gnyid kyi sgra yang myos 'gyur dgra gzhom mo// gsang sngags brda srung le lo'i bdud gzhom mo// rang bzhin
285b5(chi): lta ba'i dam tshig bzhir bstan te// srid gsum yongs su bsgral ba dang // khams gsum zhing du lta ba dang // dug gsum rtsi ru bsgyur ba dang // 'khor ba gnas
285b6(chi): su dag par lta'o// lta ba'i nyams drod dag la dam tshig bzhi gnas te// brdal ba chos nyid lta ba ye 'jam du// rig pa ye shes lta ba ye gsal du// sprul pa phyag
285b7(chi): brnyan lta ba ye gnas su// khyab pa snying rje'i lta ba kun khyab pa'o// gal mdo nges pa'i don la mdo don gsum// ma khrel ba yi tshul dang ni// ma nyams pa yi mdo dag
286a1(chi): dang / mthar phyin pa yi rtags nyid do// mkhrel ba yi tshul la gnyis// bder gshegs thugs kyis ma khrel dang // gang zag yid kyis
286a2(chi): ma smras pa'o// ma nyams pa'i mdo las bzhir gnas te// zla yis nyams dang wAr la nyams// dbang med nyams dang kun tu nyams pa'o// mthar phyin rtags la
286a3(chi): de bzhin bzhir snang ste// dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang // byin rlabs che zhing rig pa chags pa gnyis// yid 'ong 'byung bzhi 'dod pa grub pa dang // mang
286a4(chi): pos bkur grags pa thob pa bzhi'o// sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig don la gnas par bya// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams//
286a5(chi): rtogs shing bsrungs te gnas par byas gyur na// sa gzhi chen po 'dra ste kun kyang bskyed// nam mkha' dang ba 'dra ste gu yang 'byed// sreg pa me dang 'dra ste brag rmugs
286a6(chi): bsregs// rlan pa chu dang 'dra ste dag par byed// g.yo ba rlung dang 'dra ste 'thor bar byed// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ste re ba skongs// gcan gzan seng ge bzhin du
286a7(chi): zin gyis gnon// gzhung du bsrungs na rang snang 'bras bu 'char// rgyun du bsrings na sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// de la sogs te yon tan bsam mi khyab//
286b1(chi): nyams par gyur pas mi 'grub ste// dngos su nyams na ljon shing mes tshig 'dra// zur gyis nyams na sa bon rtsi nyams 'dra// kun tu nyams na brjod pa'i mtha'
286b2(chi): las 'das// de yis bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub ste// slar la rang sems brlag pa dang // 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'byung ba dang //
286b3(chi): 'jig rten sgro dang skur ba'i gzhi// dam lnga gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis// skad cig tsam yang smra mi bya// smras na dam
286b4(chi): can 'bras bu rlag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor de// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang du blangs te bsgral bar bya// bsgral ba'i zhing gnas mchog
286b5(chi): yin zhes// rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag pos/ dam tshig gsang ba bkod pa de skad gsungs shing bstan to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig rim
286b6(chi): par phye ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas nyid las mi zhan pa'i// rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa des// he ru ka dpal
286b7(chi): la gsol ba ni// gdug byed ru dra la sogs pa// tshe dang gzi byin kun phrogs te// 'phros pa'i lha tshogs tshe dang gzi byin rgyas mdzad pa'i// rol pa'i mdzad spyod
287a1(chi): e ma ya mtshan che'o// de yi rjes spyod rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba'i tshe nyams tshe ldegs tshe 'thor ba// rjes su bsgrub na ji ltar bgyi/
287a2(chi): zhes gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ bka' stsal pa ni/ tshe dbang chen po'i gnas dag ni// 'khor lo gnam la pad+ma sa// ri bo chen po rab dben dang / yid
287a3(chi): 'ongs me tog rgyas pa ste// dbyibs 'dra'i sa gzhi rab tu brtag/ yang na sdong gcig ma dang me reg dang // lung gsum mdo dadrang dur khrod gnas// 'bab chu chen po'i
287a4(chi): ngos su bsgrub// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang // gdon rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs bsal ba'i phyir// phyi yi gtor ma gtang nas ni//
287a5(chi): rab tu gsang ste rgyan rnams ba sogs// dur khrod bdag po khyo shug dag/ brjid pa'i stobs kyis mnan par bya// dang po sa yi lha mo mchod// 'khor rnams
287a6(chi): kun la gtor ma sbyin// bden tshig bsgo ste gnas su btang // lto 'phye'i gzhung du bltas byas nas// brko la sa yi ro lnga bsal// rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // shin tu
287a7(chi): 'jam la snum pa'i sras// 'thas par legs pa nyid du bya// khru gang gyen du 'phags pa yi// mchur ni khru bzhi nyid du bya// bkra shis ras bal skud pa la// shin tu
287b1(chi): gsal zhing mdzes pa yis// mkhas pas rab tu thogs nas ni// thig gi cha ni rnam par dbye// byang chub sems kyi thig le bya// lha rnams spyan drangs bsams
287b2(chi): mchod bstod// phyag 'tshal sta gon gnas gsol gdab// bkra shis dag pa'i rgyu yin no// khrus byas phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab// srung skud tshems shing kha
287b3(chi): dag bya/ ku sha'i gdan la ltas ltos te// rtags kyi tshad rnams bcas par bshad// rim chen lnga'i 'am dri zhim zhing // yang na sa las byas pa yi// bum
287b4(chi): pa'i cho ga nyid mdzes par bya// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka'i// tshe'i ye shes khyad par las// pad+ma 'dus pa spyan sngar te// rdo rje 'dus pa nub phyogs su//
287b5(chi): gzhan rnams go rims bzhin du ba sams// gzhan yang 'bru lnga snying po lnga// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // spos lnga la sogs mgul chings gzugs//
287b6(chi): kha mngar skyar rlon snum pos dgang // tshe 'dzin mchog dang zas kyis brgyan// rgyan dang mchod pa'i bye brag sogs// bu mo gzhon nus bkal tshon skud// gos
287b7(chi): rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong gzungs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod par ldan// thig gi cho ga rim par bya'o// kha dog lnga yi tshon rnams kyis// cho ga bzhin du rgyas byas
288a1(chi): la ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin te// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// b+ha ga e yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje brag gis rnam par
288a2(chi): gtams// dbang gi zla gam nyi shu ga cig/ chu skyes pad+ma pa tras brgyan// zla ga ma yum gyi ngo bo la// yab rnams thabs kyi phyag rgya ru// sku gsung thugs nyid gang rung
288a3(chi): dgod/ spyan sngar pad+ma 'dus pa ste// phyogs cha bzhi li rigs bzhi la// sgo bzhi'i ngag tu sgo srungs dgod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa nyid// snang ba'i 'od dang
288a4(chi): chas par dgrom// lta ba spyod pa mthar phyin pa'i// lung dang man ngag tshad mas brgyan// dad pas mi ldog dam tshig gnas// byang chub sems la rab gzhol zhing //
288a5(chi): thams dang snying rje ldan pas bsgrubs// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog rtog las 'das// 'di ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol/
288a6(chi): pa'i sku'o// de yi che ba'i byin rlabs las// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// mi mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// sme la
288a7(chi): ba can gyi mthu chen gyis// rnam gsum dag tu nan tan bya'o// rin chen la sogs bum pa la// dzaHhUM baM ha~M bzhis bkug nas// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/
288b1(chi): lus ngag yid la bstim par bya'o// nr-i nyid dngos sum yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa'i mchog ni bzang po yis// tshe gzhag gnas ni de bzhin no// yang nas yang du dgug
288b2(chi): byas la/ mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang ni smra bar bya'o// rdo rje go chas bsrung ba ni// brtan zhing 'khor los gdam par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i
288b3(chi): nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par bsgoms// sku mchog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis
288b4(chi): brgyan/ yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba dang // za ma tog dang rin chen rgyal// bum pa bzang la sogs pa kun// gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don byas la// bsam gyis mi khyab
288b5(chi): mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nI rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po ston nas ni// thams cad
288b6(chi): ma lus thul bar bya'o// tshe dpag med kyi dbang du bsgrubs// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub chen dang // thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las
288b7(chi): rnams grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel lo// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'gyur// phyag na rin chen gang ba yi// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang // 'jig rten drug
289a1(chi): ga ma phyogs bcu nas// gnas pa'i 'gro drug thams cad la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di bskur ro// de las phan pa'i nus mthu med// yi ge bzlas
289a2(chi): pa'i 'phrul chen gyis// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags bzla cho ga bar mi ga cad// 'dril gsal brtan pa'i mchog gis bya'o// oM au au au au/
289a3(chi): d+huts+tshan+ma t+tha/ aM aM aM aM aM/ s+yA sA sA sA sa/ saha ha haH/ d+h+waM b+h+r-i d+h+r-i r+b+hu bruM/ bA Sha bA bA d+hA/ dz+hadzA dz+ra dzAdzA/ A A A A A/ yu yu lu yu y+YA/ she she she she she
289a4(chi): / hUM hU~M hUM hU~M hUM/ A A A A A/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bder gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzungs kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams/
289a5(chi): bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro drug tshe rnams dbang du bsdus// gshol dang gtun shing phyag rgya yis//
289a6(chi): 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste/ snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgyal khor lo chen po yis/ steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te/ dbang phyug che la sogs pa dang // bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba la// nr-i tshe drag tu dgug par
289a7(chi): bya'o// 'khor lo'i 'phrul bstim nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga ste// nr-i gnas lngar bstim par bya'o// oM AM hUM swA hA/ badz+ra ka ba ga dz+ra/ badz+ra ra ga hUM/ oM sarba ta tha ga hri ta/ ya a sti sti ta badz+ra swa ha/
289b1(chi): phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim// aT yid bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen 'phreng bas brgya na//
289b2(chi): nA~M nan m+b+ha dang spyan lnga dang // 'buM lnga sa lnga stong ba smra// sngags mkhan ba ldan tho brtan pas// yan lags nyams grags bzlas rnams// rgyan byas dang ldan byas na/
289b3(chi): dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos
289b4(chi): grub thob par bya// 'dod nas byang chub snying po la// rnam rtog las kyis 'khor ba rnams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug thabs mkhas sam// 'khor ba'i dra ba bkrol nas ni//
289b5(chi): yab yum gnyis med mkha' la bsgral// bsgrubs pa po'i las su ni// brtul zhugs bskyed de sbyor sgrol btsal// de dag sngags kyi dam tshig ste// ming gis mi byar mi rung
289b6(chi): ngo / gal te byas na ltung bar 'gyur// ma byas na yang ltung bar 'gyur// rab rtags sgoms te bya bar gsungs// rab bskyed spyan drangs mchod byas nas// bsnyen pa'i gzhung
289b7(chi): bzhin brtson par bya'o// 'bum ma ma sum 'bum bzlas nas ni// ma btab bzhin du las rnams 'grub// bsgrub pa'i bar chad byed pa dag/ nyin mtshan gung la rab
290a1(chi): bkug ste// gzugs la phab ste bcings la gzhag/ ting 'dzin gsal te rab tu gdab// mgo bro tsat+ta lte ba dang // gsang gnas yan lag
290a2(chi): bzhi lnga gdab// bden pa bradar zhing yang nas yang // gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// bcu gcig gam ni rtswa gcig gis// rked la bskor zhing gnang du brdegs
290a3(chi): mnan cing gzir ba'ang de bzhin te// de nas tshe yi dngos grub dag/ nges pa nyid du blang bar bya// bder gshegs mtshan brjod bkra shis gsol// rol mo yid
290a4(chi): 'ongs mnyes mtshe du dbul// gtor mchog sum gnas su dgye// bsdu dang bsrung ba de bzhin te// rigs ma nub par bskyed par bya'o// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud
290a5(chi): chen po las/ gzi byin tshe ga yang bsgrubs pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gzhi pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
290a6(chi): e ma rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bder gshegs rol pa'i mdzad
290a7(chi): spyod kyis// drang ba'i don du kun rdzob don bstan nas// nges pa'i don dam byang chub sems rtogs shing // phyir rabs don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho/ zhes gsol bas//
290b1(chi): gsol pa'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud de/ chos nyid byang chub sems de kho na nyid la cung zhig mnyam par gzhag ste/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i gtso// don dam byang chub
290b2(chi): sems kyi don zhus ya mtshan che ho// byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad kun gyi rgyu 'bras te// rgyu las 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir// kun rdzob don bstan mi 'grib cing //
290b3(chi): 'bras bu'i don dang ldan pa ste// kun rdzob don la mi gnas par// 'bras bu don dam byang chub sems nyid sbyang bar bya'o// nges don gdod nas ma skyes na// dbyings kyi lta ba dag pa'i
290b4(chi): rang bzhin te// rnam par dag pas yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs kyi sku// rig pa'i rgyal po dang byung bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// thabs kyi bdag por bdag
290b5(chi): gnas pas// 'gro kun bla med gnas su sgrol// chos kun rtsa ba sems yin pas// rtogs shing don du rang sems bzangs// sems nyid rtsa ba'i don rtogs shing // 'gyur med
290b6(chi): klong du don dam mnyam// gsung zhing brjod pa bsnyen pa la// gnyis med don gsal ting 'dzin te// lus kyi skul skyod phyag rgya yin// spyod yul kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ khyed
290b7(chi): spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur// phur bu byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'dis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bdar sha bcad// byang chub sems kyi phur
291a1(chi): pa yis/ ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos rig pas gdab// phur pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi
291a2(chi): phur bu des// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med de// gnyis med ma bcos chos dbyings la// rang rig byang chub sems kyis gdab// phur bu 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das// rnam
291a3(chi): rtog gzung 'dzin dngos dang bral// dngos po kun bral phur pa yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// don la gnyis med mya ngan 'das// gdab dang mi gdab gnyis las 'das//
291a4(chi): phur pa skye ba med pa'i ngang // ma skyes brdal ba'i phur bu 'dis// dbyings la btab pa'i rig pa shar// sems la btab pas don dam rtogs// khyab brdal rang bzhin phur pa 'dis// /
291a5(chi): snang srid kun la khyab par gdab// de ltar rtogs na thebs pa yin// mngon sum gyur na thebs pa yin// tshig las 'das na sangs rgyas nyid// grangs las 'das pa brjod du
291a6(chi): med/ rang bzhin phur pa'i don nyid ni// phur pa bla ma chen po yAn// phur pa chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o// phur ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gags med mya ngan 'das//
291a7(chi): phur ni thabs kyi rgyal po yin// pa ni shes rab dag pa'i don// gnyis med mnyam pas rdo rje'i sku// phur pa kun khyab nam mkha' 'dra// phur pa khyab gsal nyi zla 'dra// kun la
291b1(chi): snyoms pa'i ngo bor snang // chos kyi dbyings nyid phur pa yin// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid phur pa yin// sems kyi sems nyid phur pa yin// phur pa rgyud kyi rgyal po yin// phur pa
291b2(chi): lung gi bla ma yin// phur pa man ngag nges pa'i don// gnyis med gsal bas bskyed pa yin// khro bo pho nyas 'jig rten gang // 'phral la bkang ba ma yin te// de nyid nas/
291b3(chi): ni gang bar gnas// gsal bar bsgoms na skye ba yin// nyams 'og chud na bsgral ba yin// gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin// lhangs kyis rtogs na thebs pa yin// thugs
291b4(chi): rjes zin na dam tshig yin// de lta bu'i don ldan na// 'khor ba ngan song mya ngan zlos// sdug bsngal byang chub mya ngan zlos// sems can sangs rgyas mya ngan zlos// yul ni
291b5(chi): dbyings su mya ngan zlos// mkha' ni gtun khung bder gshegs gsung // rigs drug sems can mya ngan zlos// sems ni chos nyid mya ngan zlos// thams cad 'byung rgyu sems
291b6(chi): yin pas// sems las ma byung chos med do// sems nyid grol bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi bye brag rnam grangs bstan par zad// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin ni//
291b7(chi): rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis las 'das// 'dzin rtog med pa'i phur pa la// dbyibs dang kha dog mi gnas na// gzugs dang kha dog so sor gnas// log rtogs phyin ci log gis
292a1(chi): bcings// gnyis med don du byang chub sems// 'pho 'gyur med par phur pa'i don// mi dmigs nam mkha' klong du bsgrubs// ma nor mu
292a2(chi): bcos dbyings nyid ni// de la rang bzhin lhun grub pa// de la sems kyi 'bras bu ni// rgyu mchog 'bras bu yi ge hUM// gnyis med mtshon pa'i lam bzang pos// srid
292a3(chi): gsum dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum kun las 'das par bsam// de ni bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang
292a4(chi): skal pa gcig/ byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa
292a5(chi): gcig/ byang chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// thog mar ye shes byang chub sems// de ni rgyu 'bras ma bkag chos// bsgrubs pa'i ye shes mtshon gang ba'o// gsang ba'i/
292a6(chi): sngags kyis bskyed nas ni// sku dang ldan par rab brgyan cing // khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzod// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// sku yi tshogs kyis rab
292a7(chi): brgyan te// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang zhugs// dbu la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs lngas bsrungs// khro bo mang pos gzir gnas nas// yul ni rnam par bsgral
292b1(chi): ba'i thugs// srid pa gsum nang khengs zhes bya'o// de nas phur bu byang chub sems// rang 'byung gzugs med kun khyab pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das//
292b2(chi): khams gsum ye shes bskyed nas ni// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i rtags// phur bu ye shes khro bo la// nyi zla ri rab phur pa'i brgyan// shin tu brjid pa'i ye shes kyis//
292b3(chi): kha gting med pa'i phur pa la// khro bo'i tshogs kyis rab brgyan pa'i// rang byung ye shes shar ba'i phyir// khams gsum dbang du yang dag sgrub// khams gsum gdug
292b4(chi): pa bsgral pa'i phyir// dag pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // tsham rngam gzi byin 'od ltar 'brar// khams gsum rtsa dag gcad pa'i phyir// me dpung gsum gyis khams
292b5(chi): bsreg cing // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol dbyer med bstim// nyes byed gsum gyis khams bsregs nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i byin
292b6(chi): rlabs bskul// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur bas// rang byung sku ru rnam dag nyid// rab tu srog gi gong shar nas// gnyis ldan sku la gsung thugs ldan// mya ngan 'das
292b7(chi): pa'i dbyings su gsal// dus gcig le brgan 'bar ba'i smin// snying kha lce stengs spyi bo nas// yi ge 'bru gsum 'phro 'du las// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs dbang bskur
293a1(chi): ro/ hUM oM a~MHrnam par shes pa ye shes mchog/ rang 'byung phur bu mya ngan 'das// srog dang dbugs kyi byin rlabs ni// nam mkha' lta bu'i
293a2(chi): ngang nyid la// gnyis med don gyi sku byung bas// byang chub sems kyi phung po yis// snang srid chos dbyings ngang nyid du// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis grub// snang srid phur
293a3(chi): bur shar ba'i phyir// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams la// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba'i phyir// yum bzhi phyag rgya byin brlabs te// lag tu blangs nas 'dril nas
293a4(chi): kyang / khams gsum snang ba'i dug rnams te// dag pa'i dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// phur bu ri rab phyag rgya de// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung
293a5(chi): thugs/ rang 'byung phur bus byin gyis brlabs// rab tu sdug bsngal bsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje rab tu ki la ya// dngos po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// drag tu gsor te dril
293a6(chi): byas nas// chos sku ye shes shar ba'i phyir// sems kyi yul ni rnams bsgral te// ye shes sku'i khyad par gnas// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu// snang srid phur bu shar
293a7(chi): bas na/ Tamakha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// chos dbyings thig ler shar ba'i phyir// ma lus phur pa'i thabs shes bya// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo las// rdzogs nas dud kar
293b1(chi): gsal phyir du// byang chub sems kyi khyad par las// nyon mongs dug lnga bsgral ba'i phyir// khams gsum gsor bas bsgral bar bya'o// nyon mongs ye shes gnas bsgyur
293b2(chi): cing / srid gsum dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// de nas a las rnam dag pa'i// srid pa gsum du gsal 'tsher nas// bdag dag phur bu'i byang chub sems// sems
293b3(chi): can lus la bstim byas te// spros shing bsdus pas khrus byas nas// 'khor ba gsum ni mya ngan 'das// de nas yul sems gnyis su med// gnyis med don gyi nges pa
293b4(chi): las/ bskyod pa med pa'i ri rab kyis// dmigs pa med pa'i chos dbyings las// mkha'i gtun khung ba der gshegs nas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings dkyil du/
293b5(chi): g.yos pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// lha yang rung ste bsgral byas nas// srid gsum phur pas thebs zhes bya'o// snang srid skye 'gro'i phur bu'i gzugs// 'thon nas gcig tu gyur
293b6(chi): pas na/ ho zhes rab tu dga' ba yis// shin tu snying po 'di brjod do// hUM/ rang bzhin rgyud mchog sems gsal phyir// mnyam nyid rtsal gyi bdag nyid sgrol// de bzhin
293b7(chi): hUM gis drangs nas kyang // phur bu gzi ldan thob 'gyur zhing // gnyis med chos skur gcig pa'i phyir// yul des sems ni hUM du snang // 'od dang 'od zer phur bu las//
294a1(chi): bdag la 'dus pa'i tshe ru thim// gnyis med don gyis 'grub pa'i phyir// bdag gis rnam shes tshogs brgyad nas// gang zhig mnan pa'i mchog
294a2(chi): rnams la// rdo rje phur bu ma shar nas// de'i tshogs brgyad dgag par bya'o// khams gsum chos nyid bdar bcad cing // khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bar ba'i
294a3(chi): tho tshogs kyis// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar 'gyur// rtogs 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug des// mnyam pa'i rgyal por spags par
294a4(chi): sgrol shin tu gsor nas dgyes btar nas// za byed kun la bstabs pa mdzad// ha ha bgyis pas dgyes par rol// hUM hUM bgyis pas dbang du bsdus// kha la
294a5(chi): bgyis pas lhag ma bzhes// bdag dang gsum du ldan nas kyang // byang chub sems kyi dbang spros nas// phung po rdul du bshig nas kyang // sha khrag khams gsum gang bar
294a6(chi): dmigs// hUM gis rab tu nam mkha' gang // phaT kyis kun tu gtor byas te// ye shes rdo rje mtshon gang gis// khams gsum byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro ba ma
294a7(chi): lus don bya'i phyir// ljang khu las kyi sa bon te// dmar po srog gi sa bon yin// mthing ka he ru ka yi thugs// spros pas thig le nam mkha' khyab// thams cad 'dus
294b1(chi): pas shin tu brjid// grub nas sems kyi phung po tsho la// khams bsur dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bsgral ba'i phyir// srid pa ga dar sha bcad nas
294b2(chi): kyang / spyod pa rnam pa bcu dang ldan// byang chub sems kyis gol sa bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jig mtha' med// de ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mya ngan
294b3(chi): 'das la rtog pa'o// sgrib pa med pas mthar phyin te// brtsal du med pas ye nas grub// snang srid dang ni 'dzin rtog rnams// bsam pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// /
294b4(chi): 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// 'dzin dang rtog pa rnams spangs nas// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// lhan ne bar yang bdag gis sbyor// 'jig rten kun
294b5(chi): las grub pa'i rgyal// mi nus par par rtags bcags shing // rdo rje sems dpa'i mkha' la nub// nub mtha' med pas shin tu yangs// yid bzhin chos nyid mya ngan
294b6(chi): 'das/ rnam shes hUM dang mya ngan 'das// hUM nyid byang chub sems kyi gzhi// byang chub sems kyi phur pa ru// srid gsum ma lus mya ngan 'das// ces gsungs pas//
294b7(chi): phyi nang gsang bas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad mthar thug la byang chub sems kyi phur par lhun gyis grub par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las phur ba
295a1(chi): byang chub sems de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
295a2(chi): rjes su spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las dang dus kyi dbang brtson nas// tshe'i dus byas las kyi lus sems bral gyur na// lus sems gnas sbyangs dge ba'i stong ni
295a3(chi): gang // zhes gsol pas/ rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa ni/ lus sems gnas sbyangs dge ba'i stongs byas na// gang zhig lus sems sbyang gyur na// sum cu rtsa
295a4(chi): bzhi dgu'i zhag grangs tshun cad du// las 'di byas na stongs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor rtsal shugs ldan pa'i// snod ni gzhal yas bcud ni lha// dngos snang sku la sgrar
295a5(chi): grags gsung // rang bzhin med las thugs nyid de// sku gsung thugs su gsal ba dang // de yi byin brlabs sprul pa yis// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bkang ste// a nri
295a6(chi): su tri bri du dzas// rgyu drug gang na gnas kyang sems drangs la// gsal bar thugs rjes lus la bstim// de bzhin yang nas yang du bya// rnam rtog lus su gsal ba des//
295a7(chi): bder gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// phyag 'tshal gsol gdab 'jug par bya// dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs rnams kun// 'ga' na sbyor ba'i gzi byin rnams/
295b1(chi): drang don la de rab bstim nas// rnam rtog lus kyis rnams sbyangs te// gser zhun bzhin du sems gnas pa// nyi zla pad+ma dbus dmigs te// spar dang 'phangs pa'i
295b2(chi): sngags brjod la// yab rnams thugs bsku la rdo rje'i lam byung ste// yum rnams gsang ba'i dbyings su 'khyil// de la phyogs bcu rab spros pas// dus ga sum bder
295b3(chi): gshegs yab yum rnams// sprul pa'i rang bzhin thugs chung nas// 'ga' na chen po'i sbyor ba mdzad// sbyor ba'i 'od zer tshur 'dus pas// gsang ba'i byang chub
295b4(chi): sems dbang bskur// de nas lha rnams tshang ba 'am// sbar stod sngags kyi don brjod de// ma zhar zlos te brjod par ni// lha rnams kun gyis gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur//
295b5(chi): de nas bsdus pa'i sa bon gyis// gtso bo nyid kyis thugs kar bsdu// rdo rje lam drang pad+ma'i rigs// dbyings nas yi ge phyag rgya skur gsal de// de la phan pa'i dbang rnams
295b6(chi): kyis/ bcu drug zla ba rdzogs par ldan// sku'i char bskyed tshangs par skang // de ni sems sbyar rim par bshad// de'i lus la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gsal//
295b7(chi): brtul zhugs bcas pa'i ging chen gyis// ro ni rab tu gshegs gyur nas// gong nas sha rus khrag bcas kun// dum bu dum bur gtubs nas ni// don stong lha yi tshogs
296a1(chi): la dbul// dang po gzhung ldan gnas su ni// gzugs brnyan dam pa mngon bzhengs la// lam gyi rim pa rdzogs pa dang // khro bo rol pa'i
296a2(chi): sbyangs stabs dang // khro mo gsang ba'i gar rdzogs dang // 'phra men mgo brnyan gzugs brnyan 'jo tshul gyis// ro de nyid ni blang bar bya// chu mchog dag gis bskus nas
296a3(chi): ni/ dri yis byugs te ras kyis gril// de nas lha yi snying po brjod// brtsegs khang rim pa bzhir brtsigs te// dang po baM gzugs gnyis pa e// gsum pa yang gzugs
296a4(chi): bzhi pa 'am// dang po'i las kyis nyon mongs zhi bar bya// gnyis pa'i las kyis gshed rnams drag po bsgral bar bya// gsum pa'i las kyis dkyil 'khor du bcug ste// dbang
296a5(chi): rnams rdzogs par ro la bskur// bzhi pas zhi khro'i lha tshogs kun// de yi sku la rgyas bsams te// me nyid zhal gyi ngo bo'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams// stod de 'dod
296a6(chi): don gsol ba rnams// yang na 'byung ba me nyid la// dam tshig me lha bskyed nas ni// ye shes me lha spyan drangs mchod// de nyid gzhal yas nang du lha// des bsam spyan drangs
296a7(chi): bzhugs gsol mchod// de nas ro des rab zhig nas// lha rnams kun la bstong mchod dbul// de bzhin lus kyi gnas 'byongs nas// sems nyid sbyangs pa gong bzhin no//
296b1(chi): yang na dkyil 'khor mngon bzhengs nas// lha rnams kun gyi gnas su// ro zhig dur khrod rdzas su dbul// lha rnams spyan drangs mchod bstod dbul// snying pos byin bsdus
296b2(chi): rnal 'byor rol// des ni dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// de ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya// sems gnas dkyil 'khor drug cu ldan// ngan song sbyong dang mtshams dang ni//
296b3(chi): gsal ba 'am snying po sbyor dang sgral// dbang la sogs pa rug tu bya'o// de ltar las rnams ci byed kyang // tsa ti tsa lag yab yum la// sgo lnga rnams shes yul bcas sras
296b4(chi): mchog yab yum la// spyi gtsug gnas bzhi hUM mdzad 'khor// sprul pa'i tshogs bzhi rnam rgyal 'khor// lag g.yas lha bzhi mi g.yo'i 'khor// chags byed srid bzhi gshin
296b5(chi): rje'i 'khor// rkang g.yas lbu bzhi mi g.yo'i 'khor// gsang ba'i gnas bzhi rta mgrin 'khor// rkang g.yon lha bzhi gzhan gyis mi thub 'khor// thugs kha ba gnas bzhi bdud
296b6(chi): rtsi 'khyil ba'i 'khor// lag g.yon lU bzhi khams gsum rnam rgyal 'khor// rnam khung gnas ni stobs chen 'khor// yan lag bzhi la sgo ma bzhi// de la sogs pas rdzas
296b7(chi): rnams kun// dam la btags pa'i dam can mongs// yang na rtsa'i rim pa la// yang na nyon mongs rim pa la'o// de ltar las kyi stobs byas nas// lus sems bral ba'i gang
297a1(chi): / bag / phyir mi thug pa'i sa la gnas// mngon sangs rgyasal po tsam med// ces gsungs sa// rnarje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen pa las
297a2(chi): rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po dang / gang zag gang yang tshe'i dus byas nas/ dge ba las kyis stongs gdab pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas
297a3(chi): yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bder gshegs rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gi bdag/ blang dor med par mdzad spyod kyis// dregs pa nyon mongs la
297a4(chi): zhen zag dang bcas// longs spyod dam rdzas rnam lnga'o// zag med bdud rtsir rol pa dang // thugs rjes gsos kyis mdzod spyod kyis// sman dang 'bru rnams /
297a5(chi): thams cad kun// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// sangs rgyas sems can gsos su mdzad// rjes su 'jug par ji ltar bgyi// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog la
297a6(chi): bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol to// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gis bka' stsal pa/ e ma'o rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// bdud
297a7(chi): rtsi'i don zhus ya mtshan che// bdud rtsi'i don nyid bshad bya ba// nyon mongs pa yi bdud nyid la// thugs rje chen pos rtsi gtang na// khyab pa'i thugs rje chen po'i dpying /
297b1(chi): su 'khyil ba ni// bdud rtsi'i don nyid de la bya'o// kun rdzob rtags su bsgrub bya na// kun rdzob kyis ni bsgrubs pa ste// srid gsum ban d+ha bzang ko yug/ ye nas
297b2(chi): ma bcos rang bzhin snod// de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman// bcud kyi rtsa ba lo ma rnams// dbyer med ngang du bsogs par bya// de la nges pa'i bsam pa yis// nges
297b3(chi): pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// rin chen ri dang sman ljongs dang // rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i sa phyogs sam// nags tshal dra bas gtibs pa 'am// yid 'ong me tog rgyas par
297b4(chi): 'gyur/ 'khor du bya ba'i rim pa 'am// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// nyi shu 'am bcu 'am yang na lnga// khrims dang sdom pas bcings pa men// dang por ra
297b5(chi): ba'i tshes brgyad la// der ni brtsam pa'i dus yin te// rtags kyi don nyid mthong ba 'am// dus ni bcu drug nyid la gnod na// yo byad ma lus ldan gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di
297b6(chi): la the tsom med// ma tshogs pas na 'grub thag ring // de bas yo byad ldan par bya// bkra shis mtshan ldan pan da lngar// dam rdzas lnga dang sha lnga dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i
297b7(chi): rtsa brgyad stong // dbang po ra sa ya na kun// so sor rigs dang sdes phye la// sman gyi srungs ma bos mchod bstim// dam rdzas rnams kyi rtog pa gzhom// rigs kyi khog dar
298a1(chi): gyis gdag// tshon ldan bkra shis gzungs thag gdags// bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkon mchog dag la mchod bya zhing // bsgrubs
298a2(chi): pa'i zhag grangs 'di rtsam par// bar chad bgegs rnams bsal phyi ru// phyi nang gsang ba'i sgyu 'khrul bsdam// 'bar ba mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ro// nyon mongs bag
298a3(chi): chags gzhom pa'i phyir// 'bum lnga'i bshugs pa bya ba ste// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// khrol bu la ni 'khor lo ste// gdung bzhi ka ba brgyad gtang ba'i/
298a4(chi): bzhi dang brgyad dang sgo bzhir bcas// phye ma'i dus na brgyad cha bzhi// ka po 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen sgo bzhir bcas// gong bu'i dus na zla gam zhal spros sgo bzhir bcas/
298a5(chi): gzugs brnyan 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs lnga dang ni dgu bcu gsum// gsang chen rigs gcig bsnyen pa yis// de ni khrol bu sbyang ba ste// ye shes lnga'i
298a6(chi): 'phro 'dus sman// dgu pa'i sngags kyis gong bu la'o// 'phro 'du 'ju 'dul gyi dkyil 'khor ro// gtan pa lnga la mkha' lnga'i dbyings// rdung byed lnga la gsang ba'i mtshan
298a7(chi): bris la/ 'tshag pa'i 'tshag snod yab gsum ste// srang ni thabs dang shes rab bo// btag btsag bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla gam sgo shar du bltas pa
298b1(chi): lA/ dam pa pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris la// rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bla na med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// bdag nyid dang dang rang bzhin gyis//
298b2(chi): ba'i phur du bdud rtsi lha stangs yin// lbu ba'i gdeng chen de la nges gzhag na// lba ba bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// dam rdzas dag la blang dor med pa dang // 'ga' na dag
298b3(chi): la 'ching grol med pa dang // sta na skye shi med spyod na// spyod pa bla med gadreng ni de ltar bshad// spyi yi dam tshig rtogs par bya ba dang // khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba
298b4(chi): dang / lhag pa'i dam tshig gnas par bya ba ste// dam tshigo bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // mnan zlog drug ni gcig pu ste//
298b5(chi): 'phrin las bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// phye ma khrol bu gong bu gang la yang // rtags drug mngon du byung byung du// gzhung las byung ba bzhin bsgrubs na//
298b6(chi): bsgrubs pa bla med gdengs ni de ltar bshad// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mthar thug dbang // 'dod pa de la rab byin pa// dbang
298b7(chi): mchog bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad // thun mong dang ni thun mong ma yin dang // don dam dang ni thun mong ma yin dang // don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyis// dngos grub
299a1(chi): khyad par can yang thob// dngos grub bla med ga deng ni de ltar ba shad// bla na med pa'i gdeng brgyad kyis// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog bsgrubs
