299a2(chi): nas/ sangs rgyas mchod cing rang zos na// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dam rdzas sman sna re la yang // yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // byin rlabs
299a3(chi): mthu byin de bzhin no// de yi nus mthu dpag las 'das// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud rtsi chen po mchog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/
299a4(chi): sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog ki la yas/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhi rgyas
299a5(chi): dbang dang mngon spyod dang // sbyor dang sgrol dang bskang dang bzlog/ mnan dang gzir ba'i 'phrin las rnams// phyi rabs don du ji ltar brtsam// kun mkhyen khyod kyis
299a6(chi): bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas// khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ a ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// sems can phyi rabs gzhan gyi don gyi
299a7(chi): phyir/ 'phrin las rim pa bstan pa ni// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// rmugs par gyur pa'i sems can la// sna tshogs las kyi zhi bar sbyar// bkra shis
299b1(chi): dben pa'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog gzungs// bud+d+ha 'dus par bsam bya zhing // dkar la zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'od zer 'phro
299b2(chi): bas brgyan// rin chen kha dog dkar po 'am// dkar ba'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zlum po drug btab ste// zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs la// snying rje byams pas
299b3(chi): mchod kyang // yam shing dkar la spar ba'i me// dkar la dmar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// zhi ba'i tshul du sbyin sreg bya// rdul phye 'bras chen dkar po la// gtor ma
299b4(chi): bya rtse zhi brgya// b+h+rUM phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gaN+DI mug las kyis 'artul ba rnams// oM bar gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di nizhi ba'i las sra bshad/
299b5(chi): 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// 'phel bar gyur pa'i sems can la// sna tshogs las kyis rgyas par sbyar// tsan dran me tog nags tshal dang // nyams
299b6(chi): dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal du ni// lcug 'phran ma dang yid 'ongs gzugs// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras ma chags// ser po gru bzhi dkyil 'khor la// rin chen chus
299b7(chi): skyes dag gis brgyan// rin chen lo dog ser po 'am// ser po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur ba zur bzhi bzhi btab pa'i// rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs nas/
300a1(chi): byams pa'i sems kyis mchod byin bya'o// ser po'i shing las byas pa'i// kha dog ro ldan ser po yis// rgyas pa'i tshul du sbyin sreg bya//
300a2(chi): gser phye 'bras chen ser po la// gtor ma byas te rgyas par bya// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// nga rgyal las kyis 'chel ba rnams// rgyas par 'gyur bas dbyings
300a3(chi): su rol/ 'di ni rgyas pa'i las su bshad/ 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// chags par gyur pa'i sems can la// dbang du bya bar rab
300a4(chi): tu gsungs// zla mtshan can nam chu gling du// sdod cig ma'i gzungs ma zung // pad+ma 'dus pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor du// pad+ma
300a5(chi): mda' gzhu 'od kyis brgyan// zangs la sogs pa rin chen nam// dmar po'i shIng las byas pa yi// phur pa zla gam lnga btab ste// dmar smug khros pa'i lha tshogs
300a6(chi): rnams rdo rje spungs pas spyan drangs drangs// dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// dmar ba'i shing las sbar ba'i me// skyur la mngar ba'i rdzas rnams
300a7(chi): kyis/ dbang gi tshul du sbyin sreg bya// zangs 'phreng 'bras chan dmar po las// gtor ma byas te dbang du bsdu// ya yi tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/
300b1(chi): 'dod chags las kyis 'chel ba rnams// dbang du gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di ni dbang gi las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na//
300b2(chi): shin tu gdug pa'i sems can la// drag shul spyod pas las byas te// rkang gcig shing ngam dur khrod du// rigs ngan sme sha me reg gzungs// las rab 'dus pa'i bsam/
300b3(chi): sbyor gyis// nag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor la// rtsang thod rgyan gyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags la sogs pa'i rin chen nam// tsher ma'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zur
300b4(chi): gsum drug btab ste// mthing nag khros pa'i lha tshogs kyis// drag po gdul phyir spyan drangs te// btang snyoms khros pas mchod sbyin bya'o// tsher ma'i shing las sbar ba'i me//
300b5(chi): drag po'i tshul du sbyin sreg bya// lcags phye 'bru nag sha khrag las// sbyor ba'i gtor ma drag shul bya// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams//
300b6(chi): rlag par gyur pas dbyings su rol// 'di ni drag po'i las su bshad// chags pa'i don du sbyor ba ste// dbang pos yul la sbyor ba dang // chos can chos nyid
300b7(chi): gyur ba dang // shes pa shes par bya ba'i yul sbyor te// chos rnams skye ba med par sbyor ba dang / chos nyid bye ba med pa las/ da gzhan nulab sum gyur brje //
301a1(chi): yab sum gnyis kyi sbyor ba las// dz+nyA ba dang ni khro mar bskyed// khra ba wa ma'i sbyor ba las// 'gra men khra thabs rnams bskyed do// yab yum
301a2(chi): gnyis med sbyor ba las// sras mchog yab yum bskyed nas ni// sgro ma bzhi sbyor ba'i brdas srul te// yab yum thams cad thabs dang shes rab ni// gnyis su med/
301a3(chi): pa'i sbyor ba dang // mtshan ldan bkra shis gzungs ma la// tIs tsis skyon sbyangs gos dang rgyan 'phreng gdags// rnal 'byor nyid la yang de bzhin te// brgyan gzungs
301a4(chi): g.yas g.yon spel byas nas// bdag nyid lhar bsam gzungs nyid yum// bdag gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// thabs mchog nyi shu rtsa lnga bsam// yum la shes rab ma
301a5(chi): rnams te// rang bzhin gnas nas bstim gzhung bstim// mchod don gsol ba garab byas la// lcags sgrog bsdams te dril bus dgyes pa bskyed// yab yum dgyes
301a6(chi): bai ra myong dang // lus kyi gnas rnams spyang pa ni// sum rnams chos nyid gzhal yas su// yab rnams ye shes byang chub sems// dmigs med bde ba'i sbyor bras
301a7(chi): bstim// ma chags mnyam pa'i bde bas mchog/ bdag dang gzhan gyis ma dbye bar// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// bde chen byang chub sems nyid kyi/
301b1(chi): mchod sbyin chen pos tshi ma byas nas// chags pa spyad kyang bla na med// byang chub 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// bka' lung gtan tshigs tshad mar mi ldan pas//
301b2(chi): mtshan mer gzungs btsal 'dod chags dngos spyad na// 'bras bu yul med ya ga'i gzhi dar nas// tshul 'chos chags pa spyad pa 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'di ni sbyor ba'i
301b3(chi): lam du bshad// srog gcod phyir na sgrol ba ste// snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams dbyings nyid la// rigs pa byang chub sems su snang ba ye shes te/
301b4(chi): gnyis su med pas mtshon pa mya ngan 'das// de ltar rtogs pas khams gsum dang // thun mong ma yin thugs rjes bsgral ba dang // snod kyi 'jig rten shes rab
301b5(chi): gzhal yas la// bcud kyis bsdus pas ye shes khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du shA ra ba// khams gsum thugs rjes thun mong bsgral ba'o// bstan pa la gnod pa'i
301b6(chi): bsgral ba'o zhing // bstan pa la gdab nas pa'i blang ba'i phyir// zhung ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gnas 'khor phur pa yo byad dus ldan te// gzugs brnyan dam pa bzhed//
301b7(chi): ting nge 'dzin ni rim par gsar// rang bzhin mchog sgrub rgyal ba'i bka' la rten// dmigs pa'i rten ni bcas/ dbab dbral gzir gdab/ gtubs bstobs rol
302a1(chi): te/ shes pa'i gnas sbyangs rnams ni sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar ba lnga// bsgral ba byas kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i las ni
302a2(chi): khungs phyung // mthu rtsal 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa mchod// don dang mi ldan pa sgral ba'i las// spyod cing khro rnga ma 'khor ba'i ga yang sar ltung // 'di ni
302a3(chi): bsgral ba'i rim par bshad// nyams pa'i phyir na bskang ba ste// dam rdzas bdud rtsi la rten bcas te// yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lngas ni// dngos po dang mtshan ma'i
302a4(chi): bge chags kun spangs te/ phyag mtshan 'bar ba lngas ni gzugs su snang ba'i bag chags sbyangs te// dug lnga'i rten ye shes lngar bsgral bas// rigs lnga'i thugs
302a5(chi): dam gyi rgyud rtsa lngas bskul bas/ bde bar gshegs pa sku gsung gi ngo bor bzhugs pa rnams kyi thugs dam skongs te/ don dam pa'i bskongs te/ don dam pa'i
302a6(chi): bskangs pa dang / dgongs pa rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyu mchog gis skongs 'gyur yang / mtshams bcad 'phrin gdags me tog dor te lnga ngo bstan//
302a7(chi): phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ shes 'byung ba dmigs pa yis/ lha rnams kun gyi thugs dmigs bskang nas/ ka da ri ni byin brlabs ging dbang bskur/
302b1(chi): rgyu lnga'i sgo bkag drug lnga'i zhe bcad de// rnam shes gnas spar dbang bskur mi ldog sa la dgod// sha khrag la sogs kyi mchod par 'bul// de'i don ldan rnal
302b2(chi): 'byor pas// srog bcad bsgral bas dpal chen thugs dam skongs// de yi don dang mi ldan pa'i// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dgongs rgyud mi gsal spyod/
302b3(chi): pa'i don 'khrul pas// bskangs kyang mi bskongs rang nyid 'khor ba rgyu// 'di ni bskang ba'i rim par bshad// yid gnyis za phyir zlog pa ni// khams gsum 'khor
302b4(chi): pa'i sems can rnams// mi bde ba'i gnas su gting 'khyams pa// thugs rje nyi zer 'dra ba'i lus ngag sems gsum sku gsung thugs su bzlog/ 'di ni 'khor bcu
302b5(chi): zlog pa'o// mu stegs lnga spyod dman pa dang // nyan thos la sogs na spyod dman pa dang // sngags pa lta spyod 'phrul pa rnams// lta ba spyod pa bsnun te ma cha bar khrid
302b6(chi): pa ni/ log dman 'khrul pa ru bzlog pa ni// byang sems sangs rgyas rgyud nyid la// nyon mongs bdud kyis rkyen byas phung po'i b.rud du smin// lha'i bdud kyis bar du
302b7(chi): glags btsal na// 'chi bdag bdud kyis bya ba byed pa'i tshe// don rigs rtsal shugs 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// bka'i gzhung dang 'thun pa'i rdzas bsags te//
303a1(chi): rgyu mchog mtshan ldan dag la rten bcas nas// srog rjes sems spar sha khrag rdzas kyis bzlog/ skad cig tsam yang lus sems ma bral ba de
303a2(chi): thob dge spyad de// dge spyang thabs med nams kyang 'khor ba'i rgyus bzlog na// dge ba skad cig ma yang sangs rgyas rgyu// dge ba'i don song rtsi ba'i zlog pa po// don med
303a3(chi): rtsal shugs mi 'chang rnal 'byor tshul spyod pas// dge don song med gzhan gyi rigs kyi gnyer phab nas// tshig tsam bstod pa rang gi tshe skyes te// don med sha
303a4(chi): lpags 'dod phyir zlog par byed// dkon mchog mthu'i byin kun kyang ngas bzlogs na// 'jig rten dbang dag kyang smos ci dgos// de skad zer zhing bzlog pa'i las
303a5(chi): byed na/ mi zlog rang gis shes mar 'ong ste 'khor ba'i rgyu// bzlog pa'i rim pa 'di skad bshad// gnod byed pa la mnan pa ni// don dam sems la
303a6(chi): gnod pa ni// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la// bgra chags gangs rims bzhin gnas pa// phung po la gnas tshogs drug yul la ma btang bar// bag chags thams
303a7(chi): cad mnan te kun gzhi'i ngo bor gnas// des ni chos nyid don mthong ste// don dam bden pa'i mnan pa'o// gnas dang dkyil 'khor rdzas dang cho ga thams cad dang //
303b1(chi): ting nge 'dzin dang sngags phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis// gnod byed bgegs ni mnan byas na// spogs pa'i thabs med de las thar dus med// kun rdzob bden pa'i
303b2(chi): gzhung du mnan pa'o// dkon mchog bden pa'i bka' la mi rten par// 'jig rten 'di yi grags pa'i dbang bzung nas// mthu chen dregs pa'i lha klu gnas rnams
303b3(chi): su/ des mchod de la sems kyi mthu ltos shing // de ltar gsol grag bdeg gnod byed pa// de ni 'jig rten log na gnas pa de// chos 'gal ya ga'i gzhi ste de mi
303b4(chi): bya/ mnan pa'i rim pa de ltar bshad// 'gran med sems can la gzir te// chos dbyings ye nas gnas pa la// bag chags nyon mongs 'gran 'dzugs
303b5(chi): pa/ rig pa'i ye shes sngar te// chos kyi dbyings du gzir// mthar thug dron gyi gzir ba'o// dpal chen 'bar ba cha byad kyis// 'gran semasA ru tra gzir bas
303b6(chi): ni/ sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs chen rdzogs// 'di ni rtags kyis gzir ba'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsgrubs pa lo// 'granA sems can gyi dgra dang
303b7(chi): bgegs// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// ming ngam yang na gzugs bris la// khrag 'thung thugs rtogs phur pa gzir// 'di ni rdzas kyis gzir ba'o//
304a1(chi): bdag nyid ting 'dzin ga deng zhugs la// 'og tu bcug la kun tu gzir// 'di ni bsam sbyor kun tu gzir ba'o// gzir ba'i rim pa 'di
304a2(chi): ltar bshad// ces gsungs pas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don/ las bya ba 'gro ma rmongs par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen
304a3(chi): ba~M las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'phrin las rimA par bye ba'i le'u skye sum cu rtsa brgyud pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos
304a4(chi): 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bder gshegs ting 'dzin mchog gi bdag/ sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bza' btung gos rgyan bya byed spyod pa 'gro nyal
304a5(chi): 'dug ldang ba'i tshe// rgyun du ting 'dzin ji ltar lags// ting 'dzin mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyun gyi ting
304a6(chi): nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// za ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// gtsang sme med pa'i zas rnams kun//
304a7(chi): snod chen dag gi nang du bsogs// mdun du gzhag nas sems bskyed nas// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bskul ba gsum gyis dngos por sbyang // byin
304b1(chi): brlabs gsal gdab mchod dbul 'phrin las bcol// byin bsdus pa dag rol dngos grub yin// lhag ma byin te gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba'i don du smon
304b2(chi): lam ga dab// oM badz+ra ki lA ki la ya sarba big nan baM hUM hUM phaT/ hUM r-i ra hUM yaM hUM khaM/ bruM ban d+ha ma a pa ma d+ha la/ oM AM hUM ba len ta pu tsa hUM/ oM badz+ra ki la ki la ya kro ta
304b3(chi): kro te ha he phaT sa ma ya dza/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na ma hA pu tsa pany+tsa ta ba lin da a mr-i ta rak+ta bo de tsi ta ma hA argaM pra ti dza ho/ shrI ri ban+da kha raM kha'i/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM kha'i
304b4(chi): ha ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ shan+ti pus ting pa shang ma ra ya hUM phaT swa hA/ oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya oM AM hUM/ lo ka pra ti pa na rat+na si ma ti hUM a/ rak+Sha yakra ma ma
304b5(chi): byoTadza pu tsa sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ ka ya bA ka tsIt+ta tri sha ho ya hi ga dza/ sa ma ya ho/ dga' ldan lha'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byor ldan sbyin 'phel sbyin pa rgyas//
304b6(chi): sbyin pa la rtag tu longs spyod cing / sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par shog/ a la la ho/ btung ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rlan dang gsher gyis
304b7(chi): bsdus pa'o// 'bru bcud 'dza' gar la sogs btung ba la// gdeng ldan drang gi 'phro 'du yis// ma ma ki'i ting 'dzin pa sa ma// 'byung ba bcud len phyag rgya
305a1(chi): yis// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA byaM ma ma ki la kri traM traM/ hUM badz+ra dza grad pra ba nan hUM swa hA/ bsil mdAr bdud rtsi ngo bor brlab// sbom po dbang
305a2(chi): mo thabs dang shes rab kyis// rtsir gyur sman gyi 'phro 'dur gsal// lha yi tshogs la thim par mchod// oM AMHhUM gis byin bsdus te// rang nyid 'thungs pas
305a3(chi): sgrib byung nas// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin 'thob// bgo ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// reg bya bgo ba'i bye brag rnams// 'jam dang rtsub pa'i gnyis med par// gsal
305a4(chi): ldan ho yi 'phro 'du las// ga na de reg bya'i lha ba lbub can// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya gan ti de pan tsa ling ga pU tsa ho/ nad med lang tsho bde ba dang // mtshan gyi me tog thob par
305a5(chi): 'gyur/ rgyan 'phreng rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad la// legs dang mi legs dbyer med par// nges ldan trad kyi 'phro 'du las// mA le rin chen 'phreng
305a6(chi): thogs ma// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya ma le rat+na pU tsa sa ma ya ho/ ba der gshegs sras dang ba tsas la mchod// byin bsdus lhag ma bdag nyid gdags// sha bkra ga ga sa la
305a7(chi): zhing mdangs chags dang // dpe byad 'bru rnams thob par 'gyur// bya byed rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// bya dang mi bya dbyer med par// mkhyen ldan ha yi 'phro 'du las// bya ba mo ni
305b1(chi): chos kyi dbyings// byed pa po ni ye shes te// bya byed dbyings la ye shes rol// oM badz+ra kI la ki la ya/ karma dar ma dz+nyA nA ma 'da' la pU tsa sa ma ya ho/ bya ba byed pas don dang
305b2(chi): ldan/ spyod pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// spyad par bya ba'i rdzas rnams kun// nges pa'i ting 'dzin rab gsal bas// sgrib sbyangs phyir na bkol ba ste// spyod pas rab
305b3(chi): tshogs chen rang thob// oM badz+ra ki la ki la ya/ prad na 'gu ha pu tsa sa ma ya ho// nyal ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gyi// bying rmugs g.yengs 'phro bya ba spongs// myos 'thibs gnyis
305b4(chi): kyi dgra bcom ste// seng ge'i nyal thabs rab tu brtag/ dpal ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// rtag chad gol sgrib gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs te// brjod med bsam med
305b5(chi): brjod las 'das// chos nyid bde ba chen po'i ngang du gsal// oM badz+ra ki la ki lA ya ma ha gnyu shu nya ta/ des ni don dam tshogs chen rdzogs// ldang ba rgyun gyi ting
305b6(chi): 'dzin ni// dngos por mtshams mar ldan par yang // nges ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos dbyings skye ba med pa las// 'gag pa med pa'i sku ru bzhengs//
305b7(chi): / oM badz+ra ki la ki la kA ya bag tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM/ lus ngag yid kyi sku gsung thog/ 'gro ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// grub ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// drang don tshad
306a1(chi): med phyir nyid 'gro bas tre// nges don dmigs med 'gro ba'i don du brtags// oM badz+ra ki la ki la ya/ e baM ma ra ya da rA ma karma hUM/
306a2(chi): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir bshags pa ste// bdag gi don du 'gro ba gzhan gyi don// 'dug pa rgyan gyi ting 'dzin ni// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag
306a3(chi): nyid ston pa'i rang bzhin te// gang la gnas pa gnas kyi mchog/ nye gnas 'khor ni rang bzhin khyad par 'dul ba'i 'khor// brjod pa thams cad bstan pa ste/
306a4(chi): de ltar 'dzom na dus zhes bya// oM badz+ra ki la ki la ya ma 'da' hUM hUM/ des ni phun sum tshogs par 'dug par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pas/ sa la spyod pa'i rnal
306a5(chi): 'byor pa rnams/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin las su rung ste/ sa la smin par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang bya'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin rim par bya ba'i le'u
306a6(chi): sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o ba dag dang mchog de nyid bdag/ sa la spyod pa'i
306a7(chi): rnal 'byor pas// de nyid yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la rten de nyid kyis// sgrib sbyangs tshogs rdzogs 'bras bu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyag
306b1(chi): dkyil 'khor dang ni mi 'dal dang // sku gsung dang ni mchod rten dang // glegs pa ma dang ni 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // mchod rdzas dang ni rol mo ste// 'di
306b2(chi): rnams de nyid ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho/ zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i don thugs su chud nas/
306b3(chi): de kho na nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste// 'di skad ces gsungs so// sa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor phyir// de nyid don zhus e ma'o ya
306b4(chi): mtshan che// de nyid dam pa bstan par bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// gzugs brnyan bzhengs dang ting 'dzin bsgoms// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa ste//
306b5(chi): yid rangs 'ongs gnas dag tu// rdul tshon kha ba bab pa bzhin// re ga gri so sgreng ba ltar// gzhal yas khang gi tshul lam dbyibs// legs shing mdzes par bris pa ni//
306b6(chi): gzugs brnyan spyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// lha yi go go gnas gnas su// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dag/ bkod nas mi shes drang phyir bstan// lhag pa gzugs
306b7(chi): brnyan zhes pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyibs kyi dbus gnas par// ting 'dzin snying po che ga yis// gzhal yas dam pa bsam pa// gnas kyi ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
307a1(chi): ro/ de'i bzhugs pa'i sa gnas su// cho ga gsum mam lnga nyid kyis// lha yi rnal 'byor gdeng ldan des// nges pa nyid du bsam pa ni/
307a2(chi): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor snyoms pa ni// ting 'dzin khyad par dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid bdal ba chen po la// rang 'byung ye shes 'khor gyis brgyan// dmigs
307a3(chi): par gsal kyang dmigs med pa// rang bzhin don dang dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// 'gro ba'i bsam pa drang don du// 'gag pa med pa'i phyag rgya
307a4(chi): bzhengs// de bzhin bzhugs phyag mchod bsgrub pa// rang bzhin kun rdzob dkyil 'khor te// rang bzhin don gyis gnas pa ni// 'di ni dkyil 'khor de nyid do//
307a5(chi): ma 'dal de nyid bstan pa ni// dge don ma 'dral brtson pa brtson 'grus te// 'bu srin sems can gsal ba bzod pa'i mchog/ ga dar byi dor byang chub tshul
307a6(chi): khrims te// sman dang dri yi skyang nul sbyin pa yin// me tog phung po bkod pa shes rab po// de nyid lha ru bsam pa bsam gtan te// spyan drangs bzhugs phyag
307a7(chi): mchod bskor thabs su shes// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs chen de yis thob// de yi 'bras bu thob pas ye shes so// 'gro ba'i don du shes pa smon lam nyid//
307b1(chi): ma 'dal don gyis pha rol sa bcu rdzogs par 'gyur// de phyir ma 'dal don la brtson par bya// sku gzugs kyi de kho na nyid dang // zangs lcags gser dngul la sogs
307b2(chi): la/ bzhu nas lugs su blugs kyang rung // dur khrod tshon rtsi sna lnga yis// khang bu'i logs sam thang ga la// thabs la mkhas pas bris pa 'am// rwa dang ba so rdo shing
307b3(chi): rnams la 'bur du bstod pa ste// mkhan po gang yang shes rab ldan gyur nas// legs shing dod de tshad dang ldan par bya// rang 'dod lha'i gzugs nyid la// nges par
307b4(chi): ting 'dzin rtse gcig tu// yang dag par ni bsams byas nas// sku phyis sku khrus gsol ba dang // dbu bshad snyan spabs bsal te spyan dbye shangs spu ba tog/
307b5(chi): tshems brud ljags bzhar nas// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs bstems// phyag 'tshal mchod de bsgrubs byas nas// bkur 'os mchod 'os phyag bya'i gnas//
307b6(chi): 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni// zhal spro'i bkra shis dbang bskur de// mnga' gsol nas/ sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten du de nyid bya'o// mchod rten gyi kho na nyid
307b7(chi): ni/ dang po dang ldan gyi rnal 'byor gyis don spyod pas// gzugs brnyan mchod rten mngon bzhengs na// sngags mkhan rab kyi blo ldan kyang // rtse gcig ting
308a1(chi): 'dzin bya ba ni// 'og ni 'bras btang dge ba bcu// bang rim dang po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// gnyis pa yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste//
308a2(chi): gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o// bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po bzhi// bum rten stong pa'i dbang po lnga/ bum pa byang chub yan lag bdun// srog shing mkhyen
308a3(chi): pa bcu yin te// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsum// char khab skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de// bya ru thabs dang shes rab la// tog
308a4(chi): ni mi dmigs chos kyi sku// dril bu chos nyid stong pa'i sgra// dar dbyangs 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das// rgyu 'bras 'khor chos las grub pa'i sku mchog la// sku phyis
308a5(chi): sku khrus gsol te gzhal yas bsam// de nyid ma nor bsam pa'i gzhal yas su// sku gsung ngo bo gang yang rung ba 'am// 'di ni sprul pa'i sku nyid de// spyan
308a6(chi): drangs nas btib mtshad dron gsol// phyi mtha' mu med bar du 'am// 'khor ba mtha' glegs bar du ni// sku gdung mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// glegs pa ma de nyid
308a7(chi): bstan pa ni// glegs shing thabs dang shes rab la// shog pu theg pa'i sa bzhi ste// zhi nas lhag mthong mchod zhing rgyags// dbyings dang ye shes kha rgyags gnyis// /
308b1(chi): thig ni ma non bden pa'i lam// dmigs bskor chos dbyings spros dang bral// smyu gu'i rig pa'i ye shes te// byang chub sems rtags snag tsha yis// yi ge/
308b2(chi): gsung gi phyag rgya bri// byed pa'i ni dam tshig can// legs shing tshad dang ldan byas nas// sngags mkhan dam tshig blo can gyis// dus gsum bzhugs pa
308b3(chi): thams cad kyi// gsung gi de nyid byin bsdus na sa// glegs bam nyid la bstim par bya'o// de nyid 'jig rten ma stongs par// gnas par bya ste zhal spros
308b4(chi): la/ de'i don bsgrags char bab pas// 'gro ba'i nyes bkol bder gshegs gsung mnyes te// glegs bam de nyid dus gsum mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs//
308b5(chi): bgrang 'phreng de nyid bstan pa ni// ru rak+Sha'i 'am ni ra'i su'i// yang na gdug pa'i tsher ma'i shing // 'phreng ba chen po brgyad nyid ni// ba su ta 'am rgyud chen la//
308b6(chi): dgu bsgril dag tu byas nas ni// rgyus pa'i mdo la phur bu gdags// mthe bong mthe'u chung gir bgyis bsgreng // bdag nyid mi phyed dpal yon yin// phur pa sras
308b7(chi): mchog ki la ya// 'phreng ba'i yi ge 'bru dgu ste// 'phreng thag dbugs kyi rta nyid do// phar 'phro ba dang tshur bsdu ba// mgal me klad la bskor ba 'am// lcags
309a1(chi): kyi tsha tsha bdab pa bzhin// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'phro tshur 'phro rgyun mi 'chad// bgrang 'phreng de nyid don la gnas
309a2(chi): par bya'o// rdo rje de nyid bstan pa ni// gnam lkugs thog gi lcags dag gam// phal pA'i lcags ni gang rung ngam// yang na shi shing la sogs gdug pa'i shing
309a3(chi): nyid la/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa la// lte ba pad+ma gnyis bskor bya// de la nges pa'i blo can gyis// thabs kyi phyag rgya gsal bar bsam// lte bar dpal chen 'bar
309a4(chi): ba nyid/ yar gyi tshes lnga gnas mchog lnga// mar gyi tshes lnga gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do// yar 'bur mar 'bur steng 'og khro bo ste// pad+ma brgyad la phyogs
309a5(chi): mtshams khro bo// ye shes 'bar ba'i khro bo 'di// khro rgyal 'brar ba'i thabs kyi sku// bde chen yab rnams sgyu bzhugs pas// dgyes pa mchog gi
309a6(chi): 'phrin las mdzad du gsol// rdo rje de nyid rab tu gnas par rtags// dril bu'i de nyid bstan pa ni// 'khar ba dang ni ljon dmar la// dril bu tshad dang ldan par
309a7(chi): bya rnal 'byor nges pa'i blo can gyis// de nyid shes rab dag pa'i gzhal yas khang // rnal 'byor khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'god// lte bar zlum po 'khor lo rgyas
309b1(chi): 'debs ma// rA lnga rgyas 'debs yum lnga ste// lung ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do// spyi bo rtse lnga dang lce la ni// steng 'ongs khro rnam par brgyan// pad+ma 'dab ma
309b2(chi): brgyad po la// phyogs mtshams 'gro rnams bsam ste// rang bzhin shes rab khro tshogs rnams// rdo rje sprul pa sprugs pas spyan drangs nas// shes rab ma la
309b3(chi): bstim mchod bsgrubs// de yi sgra sgrogs dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes// 'gro ba'i sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// hUMshes rab chen po'i rang bzhin te// chos nyid
309b4(chi): stong pa chen po'i sgras// 'khor ba'i bag chags zil gyis gnon// dus gsum rgyal ba kun kyang mnyes// dril bu'i de nyid mchog tu gsungs// mchod rdzas de nyid
309b5(chi): bstan pa ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas gang la yang // dbul gnas dbul med dbul ba'i rdzas// phul ba'i sgrib pa gang dag 'bras bu gang dag thog/ sngags
309b6(chi): dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // 'di brgyad ldan pa'i mchod pa'i de nyid don// mchod pa de nyid don la brtson par 'bad par bya'o// rol mo de nyid bstan pa ni// rtse 'jo byed
309b7(chi): spyod la sogs dang // bla ri rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang // ba dan dar gyi ljang lding dang / khro gar klu tshig sna tshogs dang // bud med rung rang sil khrol brdab pa
310a1(chi): dang / sdug mdzes mi sdug 'jigs pa'i bye brag rnams// tha dad sna tshogs dbul ba rnams// nam mkha' skye ba med pa las// mtshan nyid
310a2(chi): cho 'phrul byung ba yang // tha ma nam mkha'i bag la zha ba ltar// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// rol mo'i bye brag ci 'byung yang // phul bas chos nyid bag la zhwa/
310a3(chi): rol mo g.yeng ba'i rgyu ste mi g.yeng chos nyid rlung gyur na// rol mo de nyid don dam rtog pa'o// de nyid bcu'i don dam rtog pa// rnal 'byor de nyid shes rab can//
310a4(chi): mi zhes bya ba ba der gshegs yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ de kho na nyid bcu'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu tham
310a5(chi): pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// dam chos gzhung spyod rnal 'byor la// bar chod sku dgra 'byung 'gyur yang //
310a6(chi): gzhan yang skrag par bya ba'i phyir// thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang // mi nad phyugs nad btang ba dang // smyo ba dang ni 'bog pa dang // myos pa dang ni lkugs pa dang //
310a7(chi): 'thab gzhug pa dang bskrad gyur na// thabs dang rim pa ji ltar lags// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ gsol pa'i don thugs su chud
310b1(chi): nas/ gzhan skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de la thog dbab par 'dod pas/ lcags sna lnga la
310b2(chi): byas drag po'i phur pa byas te// klu nag po'i gnas su dkyil 'khor nag po gru gsum byas la// 'bras kyi zan la klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs byas la/ klu'i rgyal po dgug
310b3(chi): gzhug bstim la/ phur pa rdo rje 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ klu'i rgyal po de la btab ste klu gnad la bor na// thog dus su phebs par 'gyur ro// sor ba dbab par
310b4(chi): 'dod pas/ shi shing nag po la phur pa byas te/ 'bras ser po'i zan la/ khyab 'jug rgyal po'i gzugs byas la/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gdeng dang ldan par byas
310b5(chi): la/ lce pog nag po'i dud pas gdug pas ba dug cing / khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su// khyab 'jug nyid gzugs la phab ste/ phur par btab la gan de la phab na/
310b6(chi): ser ba dus bzhin du phebs par 'gyur ro// mi nad gtang bar 'dod pas/ mi gang rims kyis shi ba'i mchog phur thogs la/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor zla gam dmar
310b7(chi): por byas la/ rims kyis shi ba'i ro ras la/ bram ze nag po'i mdangs khrag gis ming rus bris te/ zi ra nag po'i du ba bdugs te/ dgra bgegs bkug la bstim
311a1(chi): nus pad+ma 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ phur pas btab ste dgra bo'i nya la sar sbas na/ mi nad 'bab par 'gyur ro// myos
311a2(chi): par 'dod pas/ bram 'tshe mchog phur g.yas pa thogs nas/ nags tshul chen po'i gnas su/ dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa gcig byas la/ rtswa kun
311a3(chi): ma'i lo ma la gzugs byas te/ 'da' ru ra'i du bas bdugs te/ rin chen 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/ gzugs la phabs te/ phur pa lce la btab
311a4(chi): ste/ yi dgas gnas pa'i sar btab na/ mi de smyo bar 'gyur ro// 'bog par 'dod pas/ g.yer shing dam phur pa'i skyer pa thogs te/ ras sam gro ga 'am/
311a5(chi): a gar gyi khu bas mi rus bris la/ gong bzhin lasa? byas te/ 'byung po gnas pa'i sar sbas na/ mi de 'bogs par 'gyur ro// myos par bya bar 'dod pas/
311a6(chi): rgyal rigs kyi mchog phur g.yas pa thogs te/ ri bo 'dus pa'i rtser dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po byas te/ dug shing gi lo ma la gzugs byas la/ tsan dan
311a7(chi): dkar po'i thang chus ming bris te/ nr-i tshal dud pas bdugs la/ 'bu ta 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas la/ gzugs la phab ste/ spyi gtsug tu phur pa btab
311b1(chi): nas/ ma mo'i gnas su sbas nA/ mi de shin tu yang myos par 'gyur ro// lkugs par 'dod pas/ shug pa 'am 'dzag gi phur pa thogs la/ shog shog gam
311b2(chi): shing shun la sngar lkugs nas shi ba'i klad khrag gis ming bris la/ gong bzhin du phur pa lce la btab nas/ sa bdag gnas pa'i sar btab na ni/ mi de shin tu yang
311b3(chi): lkugs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'thab par 'dod nas ni// dmangs rigs kyi phur pa g.yon du thogs/ shing rkang gcig gi gnas su/ dkyil 'khor nag po
311b4(chi): gru gsum du byas te/ 'ug pa'i pags pa la/ bya rog gi khrag gis khro dang mdza' ba'i ming bris te/ sbrul dang smigs pa lto sbyar ba'i bar du bcug la/ tshe na skud
311b5(chi): kyis bcings te/ rdo sol nag pos spros pa la/ las rab 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa byas/ ming byang gi mtshams su phur pas btA ba ste/ dur khrod kyi shing rings la
311b6(chi): btags te/ rlung chen po la phyar na/ mdza' bo dang 'thab par 'gyur ro// skrag par 'dod pas/ rma shing gi phur pa thogs te/ rlung gi rnga mo'i pags pa la/
311b7(chi): rak+Shas ming rus dang yul gyi ming bris la/ gong bzhin las byas te/ khyim gyi rtsig rmang du sbas na/ mi yul 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan skag pa'i las kyi rim pa
312a1(chi): 'di ni/ dang po rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin las su rung zhing / rtags mthong drod tshad zin pa rnams kyis ni/ gadron
312a2(chi): mi za bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gzhan skrag par byed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig
312a3(chi): pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ rdo rje phur pa don sgrub pa'i tshe//
312a4(chi): bdug dang thugs bskul chags pa rab bskyed phyir/ nyungs kar rgyal dang rak+ta sgrub dang gu gul sbyar// rdzas su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid de// de ltar thabs ni ji ltar
312a5(chi): lags/ zhes gsol pas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// yungs kar rgyal po sgrub 'dod pas// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug
312a6(chi): nas ni/ yal ba med pa'i ba ta bsham// ma 'dal gru gsum skyang nul bya'o// gu gul chu yis khyad par sbyar// yab yum dur khrod chen ches// khrag chen bcas
312a7(chi): pas sa bon bsregs// thabs dang shes rab chu yis bran te// mthing nag dar gyis kha bkab nas// ma 'dal dbus su de gzhag la// mchod pa'i bye brag ci
312b1(chi): 'byor 'bad// ban+da d+ha khang pas sa bon lha// bskyed dang spyan drangs rim par mchod// mtheb mdzub nyi zla dkyil 'khor// khro bo sngo nag mtshon cha 'dzin/
312b2(chi): thugs las mthon thim bskur byin brlabs nas// gsang sngags 'di nyid bskur mang du bzlas// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya pe ta la kro ta ma d+ha la rakA rak+Sha hUM phaT/
312b3(chi): ces bzlas so// byug bdug dus drug tshang bar bya// bar chad bgegs rnams drug tu bskrar// sa bon kha 'brus myu gur gyur pa dang // bsgrubs pa'i
312b4(chi): gnas su nye bar ni// gnas su gru gsum thur du brko// sa yi ro rnams gsal ba yi// dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la ni// bzang po'i mtshams su ban d+ha spa'o//
312b5(chi): zla ba ngos drug bar du ni// gsal gdab bzlas brjod par mi gcad// ston zla tha chung nya la lnga'o// ru la dang ba ma sums ma shor bar// nyi grib mtshams su
312b6(chi): legs bskams nas// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// dgun zla ra ba'i nya la zhal dro dngos grub blang // de yis bder gshegs thugs bskul
312b7(chi): zhing / sdang dgra gnod bgegs rdul du rlog/ rnal 'byor lus sam mgul du gdags// rtag tu lus la bcangs pa las// g.yal bar byas na mi rung ngo //
313a1(chi): gu grul sbyar bar 'dod pa yis// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// dpyid zla ra ba'i nyal 'jug/ ma 'da' gru gsum gcig byas la/
313a2(chi): glang can gyi ban+da d+ha lA// ra mig nya 'og skra spu gzhong // kyi spyang phag gi dri chen dkar// skye ni'u 'bras bu ru drug kyi lce ba// za ri d+ha ru ra dang lce po gra mu zi khrag chen
313a3(chi): dang / 'khril shing dri yod pus bu'i// me tog dug gi me trog thang chu dang // 'ug mig khra glang sbrang rtsi ske tshe ga can gzan sder mo rnams// nges par bsams
313a4(chi): te cha bskums la// ra phod lug phong bong rang byang chub sems kyi bran// tshon gyi skud pas dam bcings la// khAng ral ma'i zhab mas gril// tsan dan me la dros
313a5(chi): par bsro'o// ma 'dal dbus su de gzhag la// ba su ta'i gzungs thag gdags// bdag gtso lha mo pe tA li// bsam gtan gsal bar rab bzhugs te//
313a6(chi): pe ta nag mo 'khor lo can// nyi ma hUM dang ldan pa la// spyan drangs bstim mchod rim pa bya// oM de nas bsnyen pa 'di bzlas te// ma grub bar du rgyan mi gcad//
313a7(chi): oM badz+ra ki la ki la ya du pe pe ta li ma ku tarta la rta phra rta la hUM phoT/ ngan med rgyun du bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin 'dris shing 'phro bsdu gsal ba dang // 'od dang dri
313b1(chi): rang du ba 'byung // yang drang dro chu bzung ste// rtags byung nas ni des bsams te// lha la mchod de thig le bya// nges ni gzi byin thob par byed// lus la bcang
313b2(chi): pas gdon bgegs 'joms// dud dang dgra la bdugs 'gyur na// lha dang rgyab rten 'brel bar 'gyur// rtags rnams mngon du byung nas ni// rul dang
313b3(chi): sums ma bsam// ru li byas te rnal 'byor bcang // gu gul sbyar ma'i rdzas su gsungs// rak+ta bsgrub par 'dod pa'i// chu gling gnas su 'dug nas ni// ma
313b4(chi): 'dal dmar po zla gam bya'o// dgun zla rA ba'i nya la 'jug/ pad+ma can gyi b+han d+ha ru// gzhi'i rak+ta dang / bsgral ba'i rak+ta/ me tog ri gi rak+ta dang / rtsi'i rAk+ta dang /
313b5(chi): rdo'i rak+ta lnga dang / 'bras bu'i rak+ta lA/ shing gi rak+ta lnga/ chu'i rak+ta lnga dang / rak+ta sum cu rtsa gsum sogs// de la sbyor ba'i rak+tas bran// lI brgan dar gyis kha
313b6(chi): bkab nas// seng ldeng me la dro bsros nas// ma 'dal dbus su de gzhag la// bdag cag chags pa'i dbang can bsams// dgug bstim mnyes mchod
313b7(chi): bsnyen pa bsdus// oM badz+ra kI li ki lA ya ma hA rak+ta ra sa ma ya pu pu hUM phaT/ ces ni 'bum mam bye ba bzlas// mngon du khol lam rlangs pa 'byung // yang na lud
314a1(chi): dam 'phags pa na// lha la mchod de bdag nyid btung // chags pa bskyed cing mdangs kyang dmar// khams so// gsum 'o ma'i
314a2(chi): pad+ma'i madrangs// chags skyes nas ni 'bum du'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byugs te bdug pa'i sras bsgrub pa'i
314a3(chi): le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas yung rdo rje 'dus byas 'di skad ces gsol to// ma dad cing bskur ba'i nyes pa ni gang //
314a4(chi): sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gi ring la bshad// da ltar bstan pa 'di nyid ni// srid pa gsum du dad pa can gang gi ring la dar bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na
314a5(chi): sangs rgyas gang gi ring la bstod par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan cing bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa ni/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po/ rdo rje phur
314a6(chi): pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po/ lung thams cad kyi spyi'o// man ngag thams cad kyi byung khungs so// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse'o// spyod pa
314a7(chi): thams cad kyi lam mo// dam tshig thams cad kyi lam mo// dam tshig thams cad kyi bsrung gnas so// 'phrin las thams cad kyi rim pa'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad
314b1(chi): kyi ngo bo yin te/ 'on tang na rdo rje 'dus pa chen po/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mtshungs so// 'on tang na gsang ba'i yi ge 'di gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de na ni// rdo rje
314b2(chi): khros pa'i rgyal po nyid gnas par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun mi 'chad par skor bar shes par bya'o// gnas 'khor de nyid na/ 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa phun sum tshogs
314b3(chi): par shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las yin par shes par bya'o// 'o na tang na gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
314b4(chi): btags la/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / phud du byas te/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bri bar bya/ bklag par bya/ mnyan par bya/
314b5(chi): bcang bar bya/ mchod par bya/ sems par bya/ bsgom par bya/ bsgrub par bya/ bshad par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// rdo rje 'dus pas yang rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i
314b6(chi): rgyud 'dri la rnal 'byor du bgyis gang zag dam pa de ni/ khyod la sogs pa rnams kyis de sems can lta bur mi blta ste/ yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta'o//
314b7(chi): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang nga nyid dang so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i phyir/ gzhan yang rdo rje 'dus pa khyod nyid dang ltar ma 'ongs pa rnams dang
315a1(chi): tshul dang mthun cing dbyer med pa'o// yang rdo rje 'dus pasnga ma dad cing skur pa'i gang zag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas lung ma bstan cing ma
315a2(chi): nges pa'i bsam pa can/ shin tu 'dzum pa'i sems kyis/ bla ma bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / zab mo'i don la mi bsgrib pas/ don du nyer ba chud gson cing phyi rol
315a3(chi): gyi sde pa'i khar gtong ba/ sgrib sdug cing bsam+ba pa log pa can// yid gnyis za zhing 'dzums pa'i bsams pa can/ de lta ba'i rna lam du 'gro zhing rtogs par mi
315a4(chi): 'gyur bas skur cing smod do// de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mi bzad de/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la ma dad cing skur pa'i dbang gis/ dmyal ba'i gnas na yang
315a5(chi): rdo rje mi zad par bskal pa gsum du skye'o// de nas tshe 'phos nas byol song gi nang nas/ bkrol spyod can du bskal pa gsum du skye'o// de nasna tshe 'phos nas kyang yi
315a6(chi): dgas kyi nang nas yang / sgrib pa can gyi bsgrib pa can bskal pa gsum du gnas so// de nas tshe 'phos nas mi'i nang nas/ mtha' 'khob sdig spyod gnas su bskal
315a7(chi): pa gsum du gnas so// ro nas tshe 'phos nas lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'thab cing rtsod pa can du bskal pa gsum du skye'o// de nas tshe 'phos nas kyang / lha dbul
315b1(chi): po tshe ring po'i nang du yang bskal pa gsum du skye'o// bskal pa chen po bcwa brgyad du rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams nas/ rdo rje gsang rgyud 'di tshig tsam
315b2(chi): yang thos par mi 'gyur zhing / de lta ba'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe 'phos nas dam sri dmar po'i lus su skyes nas/ sangs rgyas
315b3(chi): kyi bstan pa la mi dad pa'i tshul ston cing / de lta bu ni de ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ thugs rje thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod kyis bsgral bar bya'o// rdo rje
315b4(chi): 'dus pa'i rgyal po/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di 'byung ba shin tu yang dkon no// dper na u dum 'bar ba'i me tog shin tu yang dkon pa dang tshul mthun te/ gsang
315b5(chi): ba'i theg pa 'di ni sngon 'byung sangs rgyas 'odu srungs chen pos/ 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa 'di 'byung ba shin tu yang bskor ba'i dri'i dus su/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di
315b6(chi): yang ma bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus de'i 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i theg pa 'di yi snod du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba
315b7(chi): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang / gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ma bshad do// sngon thog ma bskal pa kun bkod pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas sngon gyi rgyal po
316a1(chi): zhes bya ba de'i bstan pa la rgya cher grags/ nges pa'i don rgya cher spyod do// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i theg pa la shin tu dad par 'gyur
316a2(chi): te/ rnam par grol ba'i lam chen po la bkod de rdo rje 'dus pa chen po/ da ltar gyi bstan po 'di nyid kyang / lung bstan pa can ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs
316a3(chi): pas spyod la/ klu'i gnas su na klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa la/ 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs kyis lung bstan cing rgya cher grags par gyur/ de la skal ba dang ldan
316a4(chi): pa rnams spyod par 'gyur te/ ched 'ga' ni dar/ ched dga' ni nub/ ched dga' ni mngon du byung / ched dga' ni gab cing sbas/ la las ni tshul bzhin du spyad cing sngags
316a5(chi): kyi mthu stobs nye bas/ phal cher 'dra tshul log par spyod pas lhung gnas su gyur par 'gro ba la la ni dang / la la ni ma dang de/ dus nam zhig na snyigs ma lnga'i dus
316a6(chi): 'ong ste/ sprul pa'i skus bstan pa'i tshe na dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid de ste bskal pa bye ba 'das pa'i 'og
316a7(chi): tubaskal pa me tog bkod pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ da ltar dang mthun pa gcig 'byung ste/ des gsang ba'i theg
316b1(chi): pa 'di rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gang gis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ston par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'gro ba rnams gsang ba 'di nyid kyi
316b2(chi): snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcangs zhing bskur ba'i skyon yon dang / dus gsum sangs rgyas gang gis/ dus gang gis
316b3(chi): gsungs pa/ zhus lan gyi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos
316b4(chi): nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ mchod pa du mas ni mngon par mchod de/ lan stong du rkyang phyag btsal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bzhi bcom drug ldan
316b5(chi): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rtogs thugs bdag gzhan gnyis kyi dpal mnga' zhing // phyin ci log bzhi spangs pas khyad par mthu byin che// gzungs 'dzin ma spangs
316b6(chi): ma g.yos rdo rje de// don rtogs drang don nges pa'i don ni khros pa'i sku gsung thugs// ston pa'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e ma 'o dgyes pa chen po yum
316b7(chi): gyi mkha' klong nas// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par rab tu sbyor// gnyis med thig le byang chub dag pa'i sku// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las//
317a1(chi): dka'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i 'khor la bstod// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyis thugs// mi nub chos srog dbang po 'dzin byed
317a2(chi): pa'i/ smra ba'i seng ge zhu ba'i spobs pa dang ldan sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje nyid la 'dus// rdo rje 'dus pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod//
317a3(chi): e ma'o sku gsung thugs klong gsum gyi chos mchog bdung rtsi che dang mtshungs// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kun gyi mdzod du bzhugs// 'das dang ma byon da
317a4(chi): ltar rnal 'byor bsgrol pa'i lam// theg pa kun las 'phags pas 'og ma zil gyis gnon// don dang bden pa'i mi mdzod ni mi dmigs sgrol mar snang //
317a5(chi): bstan pa rgya mtsho'i chos la phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa'i bzhugs gnas khyad pa ra can// bka'i dam chos ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// shes rab b+ha ga'i dus gsum
317a6(chi): gshegs pa'i gnas// phyi nang gsang gnas de la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan pa gnas 'khor dam chos 'byung ba'i dus// 'das dang ma byon da ltar dang //
317a7(chi): ma nges dus na gang 'dzem pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i dus la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhes mngon par bstod do// de nas yang sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa'i
317b1(chi): 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje 'dus pa khyod ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' zhu ba spobs pa dang ldan pa ste/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i phyir/ rgyud gyi don bsdus pa gsol
317b2(chi): to/ zhes bskul lo// rnam par bskul lo// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas bskul ba'i don thugs su chud de gsol ba ni/ e ma'o bde bar gshegs pa'i bcom
317b3(chi): ldan 'das// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i rgyud kyi don nyid rab tu bsdus nas// gnas shing rtogs par ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol
317b4(chi): pas bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dus pa/ brgyad khri bzhi stong sgo mo dang // yan lag bcu gnyis sde snod dang // bsdus pas sde snod rnam gsum dang // theg pa'i bye
317b5(chi): brag bsten pa yang // bkri ba'i don du bstan pa ste// nges don bsdus pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'dri nyid// khyod la sogs pa de ltar phyis 'byung bcas// lta spyod
317b6(chi): bsgrub dang 'phrin las dkyil 'khor dang // dbang dang dam tshig ting 'dzin rnams// rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud la gsal bas na// lam gyi nang nas nye lam drang po ste//
317b7(chi): rdo rje 'dus pa khyod la gtad// gsang ba'i rgyud 'di nub par gyur ta re// zhes gsungs pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dus pas/ shin tu yang dag pa'i yid g.yos
318a1(chi): nas rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje gnas su gsor zhing / 'di skad ces dam bca' 'o// e ma'o bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// khyod
318a2(chi): kyi don bsdus rdo rje yi rgyud pa'i rgyud 'di la// bdag la sogs pa da ltar phyis spyod pas// lam gyi nye lam dam par bgyis// gang dag lta ba la dad pas// rgyud
318a3(chi): 'di yi lta ba'i lam la blta bar bya'o// gang dag spyod pa la dga' bas rgyud 'di nyid kyi spyod pa'i lam la mngon par spyod par bgyi'o// gang dag sgrub pa po la mos rgyud 'di
318a4(chi): nyid kyi/ 'di rgyud 'di nyid kyi bsgrubs pa'i lam la mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// gang zhig 'phrin las la gus pas rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'phrin las kyi lam la 'phrin las su bya'o// /
318a5(chi): gang dag dkyil 'khor rtsom pa bas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lam la mngon rtogs par bya'o// gang dag dbang nod par sems pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi dbang
318a6(chi): gi lam la mngon par nod do// gang dge dam tshig srungs pas sems pas yod pas/ rgyud 'di'i dam tshig gi lam la mngon par dka' thub tu gnas par bya'o//
318a7(chi): gang dag ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog par 'dod pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la mngon par bsgom par bya'o// 'on tang na bdag phyis 'byung ba'i
318b1(chi): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang / rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di'i chos kyi sgrog shing mngon par gzugs so// chos kyi rnga sgra bsgrags par brdung ngo // chos kyi drung nges
318b2(chi): par 'bud do// chos kyi char mngon par rabab bo// chos kyi 'khor lo rgyud par bskor te/ mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen por gnas par bgyi'o// zhes dam bcas
318b3(chi): so// de nas 'khor rnams ni/ chos nyid de la ye shes kyi rtsal mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la zhugs te/ mi snang bar gyur to// bcom
318b4(chi): ldan 'das nyid ni dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la rnal lo// rgyud kyi don bsdus pa de dag ni/ rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la/ bai dUr+ya zhun mas bris nas/ sku
318b5(chi): gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum gyis sa gsum du chos kyi char mngon par phab nas/ lha dang / klu dang / mi'i rnal 'byor rnams dang / tshom bu'i lus la ma chags par/
318b6(chi): rigs 'dzin byang chub kyis blangs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud yongs su gzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// /
318b7(chi): rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / o D+yan gyi mkhan po pad+ma saM b+ha wa dang / lo chu ba l+ye ku ku ra dza dang / brang ti rag
319a1(chi): shis bsgyur// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra ki lA ya ma hA ba lin ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/
319a2(chi): rdo rje phur ba chen po gtor ma'i rgyudabacom ldan 'das dbul kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos dra'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
319a3(chi): thams cad mkhyen pas/ sku thams cad kun tu gsal zhing / mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas/ thams cad kun tu ma bsgribs pas/ phyogs thams cad nas gsal
319a4(chi): bar gyur te/ lhang nge lhan ne ma bsgribs par gsal ba ste/ gsang sngags dam pa 'byung ba'i dus na/ byin gyis rlabs ston pa nyid du go bar gyur pa ste/ 'og min dam
319a5(chi): pa'i gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ rin po che'i gnas phyi nang med pa'i kun tu nang du gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po dang gnyis su med par bzhugs
319a6(chi): nas/ mnyam pa'i ngang gi rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du ston par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen par ma lus par/ yang dag don rnams ston pa'i mchog/ thugs rje chen po rgya
319a7(chi): mtsho chen po la// thams cad 'byung zhing rnam par 'du/ nyon mongs spangs pa'i pha rol na/ rgyal ba bya ba rdul tsam med// sems nyid byang chub sems 'di ni//
319b1(chi): rgyal bar gyur pa'i snying po yin// stong pa'i chos nyid dam pa yin/ snang ba ma 'gags lhan gyis 'grub// gnyis su med pa'i dam pa yin// 'khor ba'i bcud byung ba de
319b2(chi): gshegs rgyu// 'khor ba'i dri ma rang bzhin dag/ rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gsum// bstan cing go ste shin tu gsal// med pa ma yin snying po'i don// nam
319b3(chi): mkha'i snying po mtha' yas mchog/ nges med sems ni sna tshogs te// sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu sdung // thams cad mchog gi snying po 'di// gzhan du rgyal bas chos
319b4(chi): mi btsal// rang rig snying po ma rtogs na// btsal bas rgyal ba'i cho sra mi rnyed// 'khor ba med cing sangs rgyas med// lha yang med cing 'dre yang med// mtho ris med
319b5(chi): cing ngan song med// thams cad sems nyid rig pa'i klong // 'di ni gang yin pa de gshegs rgyu// de nyid ma spangs lhun gyis grub// ma btsal ma bsgrubs lhun
319b6(chi): gyis grub// kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen// rdo rje sems dpa'i don rnams ston// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// gnyis su med de 'dul ba'i don// kun
319b7(chi): bzang dam pa lha yi lha// tshad ma gsum ni nges bzung nas// nges gzhi don la yang dag 'bebs// gnyis su don rtogs gang 'dzin pa// gnyis med ngo bor
320a1(chi): yongs mi 'grub// drug dang bcu yis ma grub cing // bcu bdun rtsa gcig nges par bsgrub// nges gzung med par don rtogs na// tho ba med
320a2(chi): 'bras bu bsgrub mi dgos// brtsal med lam la bgrod mi dgos// rim pas sa la sbyang mi dgos// yang dag nyid du don rtogs pas// de ma rtogs pa'i 'bras bu
320a3(chi): med/ bsgom med brtsal med snying po'i don// nyams su lon pa'i dam pa 'di// nyams med rtogs pa sa bcings pa'o// rtogs pa'i 'bras bu gang ltas pa//
320a4(chi): de nyid rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur// rtog pas ltas pa 'khor ba'i rgyu// rtog pa nyid kyang ngos bzung bral// nges par rtog par gang du 'dzin// ma nges rtog par gzung
320a5(chi): du med pa de phyir rtog pa'i nges gzung bral// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin 'di// rgyu las bskyed par snang mi snang // rgyu las bskyed par gyur pa na// rgyu las
320a6(chi): bskyed par 'jig par 'gyur// de la yang dag don mi dgos// gal te rgyu las ma grub na// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// rgya med rkyen gyis de mi 'jig/
320a7(chi): ma rig rgyu mer stong pa la// ji ltar byas kyang ngal ba'i rgyu// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// rgyu dang rkyen du ma bstan kyang // sprin dang na bun khu rlangs 'byung //
320b1(chi): de bzhin sems nyid stong pa la// rgyu las bskyed dam ma bskyed pa// don nyid yang dag bstan dga' yang // ma rig nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// nam mkha'i sprin du
320b2(chi): ma shes shing // sprin nyid nam mkhar ma shes na// sprin dang nam mkha' tha dad med// sems nyid stong pa nam mkha' la// ma rig pa nyid sprin dang 'dra// ma rig
320b3(chi): ye shes tha dad med// ma rig pa nyid yang dag lam// 'khor ba nyid kyang bde gshegs rgyu// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dper na rin chen gser gling 'dra//
320b4(chi): rin chen gser gling phyin gyur na// dbyibs dang kha dog tha dad kyang // thams cad gser gyi ngo bo gcig/ de bzhin sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mtshan ma sna
320b5(chi): tshogs cir snang yang // thams cad sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// 'di dang 'di ru bstan par ni// bder gshegs nyid kyis brjod par
320b6(chi): dka' don dam chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// skye med nam mkha'i ngo bo las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang // de bzhin skye med chos dbyings las// skye
320b7(chi): ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang // gleng gzhi byang chub sems 'di ni// dper na nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra// dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun// 'byung yang nam
321a1(chi): mkha' nyid las 'byung // 'dus kyang nam mkha' nyid la 'dus// gleng gzhi byang chub sems nyid la// lta ba sgom pa dkyil 'khor dang /
321a2(chi): lha dang dam tshig la sogs dang // mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // thams cad byang chub sems las byung // 'dus kyang byang chub sems la 'dus// yang dag
321a3(chi): bstan pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su gzung du ga la yod// ngos bzung bral ba'i chos nyid la// dngos por gzung du
321a4(chi): ga la yod// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid la// phyogs char gzung du ga la yod// snang stong gnyis su med pa las// snang zhes mtshan mar ga la 'dzin//
321a5(chi): stong zhes chad par ga la lta// de phyir snang stong gnyis su med// kun tu bzang po kun gyi gzhi// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nyid kyis brjod du med
321a6(chi): pa'i don bstan to// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas mnyam pa'i ngang gis yum
321a7(chi): gyi b+ha ga la bzhugs nas/ e ma ho mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni// bsten pa'i snying po don gyis go/ 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste// kun bzangs nyid du rnam par
321b1(chi): grags/ e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// ya mtshan 'phrul che rang las byung // mi brtsal rang byung ngo mtshar che// ngo mtshar chen po lha yi sku// ji ltar ltas pas
321b2(chi): 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni rab tu ngo mtshar che// e ma 'di ni rab tu ngo mtshar che// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings las// bstan pas go bar ngo mtshar che//
321b3(chi): don nyid brjod du med pa la// brjod pas gro ba ngo mtshar che// mun pa lta bu'i gti mug la// mar me lta bu'i 'od byung nas// gti mug mun sel mar me smon//
321b4(chi): mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'di ltar 'dul byed pa der gshegs 'byung // 'dul ba'i ngo la cir yang snang // gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyar//
321b5(chi): e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// nam mkha' stong pa skye med la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston// de bzhin skye med chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul bsam mi
321b6(chi): khyab/ ston pa 'byung zhing 'khor rnams 'byung // thugs rje 'byung zhing byin rlabs 'byung // dkyil 'khor 'byung zhing mchod pa 'byung // thams cad thams cad
321b7(chi): 'byung ba yin// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bde ba chen po dbab tu gsol// e ma 'di ni gang byung ba// thugs rje'i sprul pa chen po 'byung // 'gro ba
322a1(chi): 'dul ba ston pa'i phyir// gang gis 'dul ba de bzhin du// 'dul ba'i ngo la cir yang ston// yab la dgyes shing yum la chags
322a2(chi): chags pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pas na// sems drang sems su 'dres pas nA// sems nyid mi 'gyur brtan pa'i mchog/ dgyes pa chen pos dbab tu gsol//
322a3(chi): e ma mi 'gyur bstan pa la// 'gro ba kun gyi don gyi phyir// ya ba la 'khyud cing dgyes pa bskul// 'od dpag med pa rab tu 'dzum// zim bag bcas shing rtse
322a4(chi): ba skye/ mchu 'gul lce 'dril rab tu gdungs// rtsa rnams rab tu rgyas mdzad de// pad+ma la ni bde ba phob// e ma ston pa yum dang bcas// yum ni dgyes pas
322a5(chi): yub la 'khyud// yab kyi bde ba chen po 'di// yum gyi dgyes pa bskang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i rdo rje bde ba 'bebs// bde ba chen po 'di dag ni// yum la dbub
322a6(chi): kyis dgyes par mdzod// yab yum bde ba chen po 'di// dgyes pa chen po dbab par bya// e ma oM tAM phaT/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya snyom/ a nu ra ga ya myi/
322a7(chi): a nu ra ga ya haM/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ hUM hUM hUM/ gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// bde ba chen por byin brlabs nas/ thams cad dbang bskur byin brlabs nas/
322b1(chi): na mongs skyong zhing byang sems 'phro// drag po la sogs rnam bzhi yis// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin spros nas// dkar nagu dmar dang ser ba dang // dus rnams
322b2(chi): kun tu rab sbyar nas// yang dgra nyid du rnam par spro// 'di ni sangs rgyas byin brlabs yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// dus gsum snga phyi med
322b3(chi): par sbyor// hUM hUM hUM/ shan tIng ku ru swA hA/ pus ting ku ru sA hA/ pa shang ku ru swA hA/ ma ra ya ma rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya sA hA/ hUM hUM hUM/
322b4(chi): rnam bzhi 'dul ba gang yin pa// de ni sangs rgyas mdzad spyod yon// rngam pa chen po'i lce tshogs ni// 'jigs byed chen po 'di lta bu// drug po rngam pa'i hUM sgra can/
322b5(chi): re yis stong gsum rab tu g.yos// yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams// rngam pa'i nga ro drag po sgrogs// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya hUM hUM hUM/ zhes rngam zhing ngo mtshar
322b6(chi): khro bor rab tu 'phros nas/ thams cad rab tu 'dus nas/ snang la rang bzhin med par gyur nas/ mnyam pa'i ngang gis bzhugs so// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i
322b7(chi): rgyud las/ gleng bslangs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sgrol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyon mongs 'a
323a1(chi): ba'i sems can rnams// gab sbas lta ba don ma rtogs// khams gsum 'khor zhing sdug bsngal myong // shin tu ma rungs srin por
323a2(chi): 'gyur/ yi dgas srin po ma rungs pa// nang dang ma rungs sna tshogs 'byung // srin po gdug pa'i byin rlabs la// sems can thams gdug par 'gyur// rang
323a3(chi): la rang nyid rab tu gdug/ rang gi rtog pa rtas pas na// me bzhin tsha bas rab tu gdungs// de yang rang gi rnam rtog yin// rang la rang gis 'tshogs par byed// chu
323a4(chi): bzhin grang ba rang las byung // rang nyid rang las sdug bsngal 'byung // dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal yang // rang gi rnam rtog rtas las byung // yi dgas
323a5(chi): bkres skom sdug bsngal yang // rang gi rnam rtog rtas las byung // byo la song glen lkug sdug bsnga la yang // rang gi rnam rtog rtas las byung // de la sogs pa'i
323a6(chi): sdug bsngal ni// rang gi rtog pa de ltar snang // zhe sdang dra ba la chags me ltar 'bar// gti mug khang pa mun ltar gtibs// phrag reg zur rno rta ltar 'gyes//
323a7(chi): 'dod chags 'dzin byed rtsi ltar 'dzin// nga rgyal bden med brag ltar 'cher// le lo rgyud snyoms chu ltar 'phyos// nyams med spyod pa rang dgar byed// 'dod
323b1(chi): nyams pa'i dbang 'gyur na// nyes byed lnga po rnam par 'chang // don med spyod pa rlung ltar 'phyos// 'di rnams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ste// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma bsgral
323b2(chi): na bsgral ba'i dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// nyams byed lnga ni rab tu bsgral// zla byed lnga ni stod la mnan// mgyogs byed lnga ni zhags pas bcings// sgrib byed lnga
323b3(chi): nirta la skyon// 'khrug byed lnga ni rab tu bsal// bsgo byed lnga ni bsgo dang dpral// 'dzin pa lnga ni bcing zhing sgrol// med pa lnga ni gter dang spar// yod pa lnga ni phya ma la sgyur//
323b4(chi): lkug pa lnga ni sma ru chug/ bcings pa lnga ni zhags pa khrol// smyo byed lnga ni bcings la gzhag/ nyes byed lnga ni rnam par spangs// 'dzin pa gsum ni rnam spangs la// nyes byer
323b5(chi): gnyis ni shes par bya// rtsa ba gcig tu yang dag bsgral// 'dzin pa lnga ru rab 'dzin cing // mtshang can gsum dang rab tu 'gro ka/ chen po gcig ni rab shes na//
323b6(chi): thams cad ma spangs lhun gyis grub// spang byed rnams kyis sbyang mi dgos// de yis bsgral ba chen por 'gyur// ma bsgral nyams par yang dag bshad// rdo rje phur pa
323b7(chi): chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ gdug pa btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
324a1(chi): shin tu gdug pa'i sems can chen po la// rab tu bsgral ba rab bstan te/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi
324a2(chi): la/ thig dang bri ba byas nas su// dus ma nor bar bsgrub byas te// rdzas su bstan pa ma lus kun// gtor ma'i rdzas rnams 'di lta ste// dpal gyi gtor ma chen po
324a3(chi): nI/ sha sna lnga las rab bshams nas// dkyil 'khor lha bskyed spyan drangs nas// mchod pa phul ba ma lus kun// gtor ma chen po'i las rnams te// oM badz+ra kI
324a4(chi): li ki la ya ma hA ba len ha la kha'i/ dus drug gtor ma 'bul bya sa la// mi 'dzin gtong bas gtor ma ste// dus rnams kun tu gtang ba dang // lo dang zla bas gtang ba dang //
324a5(chi): thams cad kun tu gtang ba dang // dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i// rus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba pa// rigs 'dzin
324a6(chi): bdag cag rnams la ni// rtags dang mtshan ma ston pa dang // ki la ya yi dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya sarba big na na baM hUM phaT/ rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang
324a7(chi): gcod/ mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang // snying gi go ru shar ba bsgom par bya// snying rjes
324b1(chi): bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam b+hA sa na// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// me ru 'bar ram 'ong du 'byung // 'gul
324b2(chi): lam ldeg gam 'phyo ba 'am// 'di rnams gang byung gtor ma 'grub// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya mA ra ya ba lenA ta hUM b+h+rUM bye byo/ gang yin phyogs su 'phangs nas ni//
324b3(chi): sprug cing brdabs te khrag kyang gtor// khro ba chen po bcu rnams la// gtor ma chen po 'di lta ste// oM badz+ra kr-i d+ho hU~M kA ra hUM/ ga gaHhU~M phaT/ sbed phyogs zlam
324b4(chi): hUM ka ra/ yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// 'phra men phag dang smig pur ba cas// glang chen sha dang thod khrag dang // go ro tsa na'i gtor ma 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha
324b5(chi): bi dza ya hUM/ ha na han hUM phaT/ shar gyi khro bo rnam par rgyal// yum chen rdo rje rnams bsnyems ma// 'phra men stag dang bya rgod bcas// seng ge dkar mo'i sha dag
324b6(chi): dang dri chen bdud rtsi chen po dang // skams sa chen po'i sha gtor 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni la ngan tra hUM/ da ha dra ha hU~M phaT/ shar lho'i khro bo dbyug sngon po/
324b7(chi): yum chen rdo rje sder mo ma// 'phra men g.yag dang bya rog bcas// 'dzin byed wa yi sha dag dang // 'dzul byed gcer bu'i sha'i mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAnata
325a1(chi): ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ lho yi khro bo gshin rje gshed// yum chen dur khrod chen mo ma// 'phra men sha ba 'ug par bcas// gshog
325a2(chi): / med 'phur dang ma sa dang // chag med shwa khrag mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+hA ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ b+han d+ha b+hana? d+ha hUM phaT/ lho nub khro bo mi g.yo mgon// yum
325a3(chi): chen rdo rje gtun khung ma// 'phya men gzig dang khA ru bcas// sgrol byed srin po'i sha khrag dang // me 'bar shing gi bdag po dang // 'gro byed stabs 'phral
325a4(chi): sha khrag mchod pa 'bu lnga// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya 'gri ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub kyi khro bo rta mgrin dpal// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo dang // sprul pa byi la bu
325a5(chi): shud ba cas// dus 'dzin pad+ma'i sha khrag dang // mtshor byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a a pa ra tsi ta hUM/ tis sta tis sta hUM phaT/ nub byang
325a6(chi): khro bo gzhan mi thub// yum chen rdo rje ma dra' snyen ma// 'phra men khra dang spyang khu ra bcas// sbyin byed sha dang sdig byed lag/ myo byed sha yi mtshed pa 'bul//
325a7(chi): oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta ku na da li/ tsin da tsin da hUM phaT/ byang gi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum tshon rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// 'phra me na seng ge pha wang bcas// skyod
325b1(chi): byed mo dang dran byed snying // dri chu sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin da bi na da hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang /
325b2(chi): yum chen rdo rje bskyed chen ma// sprul pa dred dang srin mor bcas// dri byed sha dang 'gro byed rkang // nyal byed shra yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma ha pa la hUM/
325b3(chi): s+pho tA s+pho ta hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po stobs chen dang // yum chen rdo rje gsod chen ma// 'phra men dom dang byi ba'i mgo/ gnyen byed klu dang sdong byed sha// 'jom byed
325b4(chi): sha yi mchod pa 'bul// bzhi mtshan bcu po lha yi tshogs// hUM mdzad thog 'bebs bsgo 'dul rgyal// sreg byed dbyug dang sgrol byed gshed// gnod byed mgon
325b5(chi): dang dbang rdul rta// 'phen byed gzhan dang gsod byed bdud// 'dzin byed khams dang 'bebs byed stobs// so so'i las rnams sgrub pa dang // so so'i mthu
325b6(chi): byin rab tu grater// ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ sgrol byed chen po'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog gnag cing tho ba bsnams// rkang lag sha yi mchod pa 'bul// gang
325b7(chi): yin sgrol ba'i las rnams byed// ha sa ra na ha na ha hUM phaT/ 'bral byed chen po'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog mthing zhing gu gul rnams// rmig zlum sha yi mchod pa
326a1(chi): 'bul gang yin sgrol ba'i las rnams byed// a b+he sha ya a b+he shwa ya hUM phaT/ 'gugs byed lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog dkar
326a2(chi): zhing lcags kyu rnams// dran byed snying gi mchod pa 'bu la// shi krin a na ya hUM phaT/ 'ching byed lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog sngo zhing zhags pa rnams//
326a3(chi): mkha' la khrag gi gtor ma 'bul// dzA la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ bsko byed lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog dmar zhing dug rnams bsnams// 'dul byed mid pa'i
326a4(chi): mchod pa 'dul// bin ra ya bin da ya hUM phaT/ stobs pa'i lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog ljang sngon gzas pa rnams// don snying smang lnga'i mchod pa 'bul//
326a5(chi): lha drug sgrub pa drug tu bstan// nyams drug rtag drug rab tu bzang // bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul// 'dzab bstod la sogs de bzhin bya// bsgrub
326a6(chi): drang bsgrub pa chen po dang // 'phrin las rdzogs par shin+da tu bzang // dam can gsum la rim pa bzhin// nag smug snying dang mkhal ma dang // pad+ma'i khrag dang
326a7(chi): sri'i shaM/ gcan gzan sha yi mchod pa 'bul// dza ye bi dza ye/ rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// nal bu'i sha dang dbang po'i sha// nag mo sha yi mchod pa 'bul//
326b1(chi): kang tang ka te ye/ bsten pa bral dang khol dang bya// mar dang khrag dang 'o ma dang // sbrang rtsi chu lug lho ser+ra dang // gzho ba 'go sna skya mchod pa 'bul// a tsi ta a
326b2(chi): pa ra tsi ti/ rim pa bzhin du de sbyar nas// bskyed dang spyan drangs mcho dra pa dang // 'dzab bstod de bzhin mchod pa 'bu la// bsgrub drang bsgrub pa chen po dang //
326b3(chi): yang dag nyid du der bstan bya// hUM ma mu ka shiM ku ru/ ma staM nya ka ra i nan/ da ti ma ma ka ra ma/ nan ni dza/ nyid kyi bka' las 'di'i mi byed// bka' snyan
326b4(chi): gsung sdod bran ltar 'khol// las bzhi'i bsen mo nyid du 'dus// bse mo'i rtags rnams rab tu rtag/ ma ra sa ni pra mar sta ni ye hUM phaT/ thams cad las
326b5(chi): sngags yang dag pa// 'di dag bse mo nyid du bya// grang byed bsgrub pa'i rim pa la// dam can rnam gsum bka' nyan zhing // bra na dang pho nya bka' nyan
326b6(chi): tshogs/ khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// dkar po snying dang skyes pa'i snying //
326b7(chi): rta dang 'bras dang dri yi sha// dkar po sha gsum mchod pa 'bul// shri krang ka re ya/ drug dang gcig dang bzhi rnams dang // drug la rdzas drug yang dag bshad//
327a1(chi): de bzhin yang dag shes par bya// de rnams kun gyi las rnams ni// bsad pa'i ling ga brgyangs la bri// bstabs pa'i ling ga bskum la
327a2(chi): bri mnan pa'i ling ga phyi nang gnyis// gzir ba'i ling ga nang nas grang // bsad dang bstabs pa rkang pa dang // phyi ma gnyis po 'khor lo drug/ gsang ba dag
327a3(chi): gi sngags rnams bri// khro bcu sngags rnams la sogs pa// thod pa'i phyi rim de bzhin bskor// rno ba mtshon gyis lus la gtur// smug nag thal ka rab tu
327a4(chi): byadagod pa'i rim pa yang dag bstan// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// yi ge khro bo
327a5(chi): grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/
327a6(chi): thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig
327a7(chi): srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang
327b1(chi): mtshan ma ston pa dang // ki la ya yi dngos grub gsol// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya/ oM AHhUM/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra yak+ka kro d+ha kha hi kha hI kha hi/ dzaHdam tshig
327b2(chi): chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus lnga bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// sho na mu khe'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i rus la
327b3(chi): bab sa bdag rgyal mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// mthu rtsa la 'byung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing //
327b4(chi): dus gsum rgyal ba'i ga dung 'tsho ba pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod
327b5(chi): pa'i tshogs// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yung tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin
327b6(chi): bsgral nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM laM hUM laM/ stan pa nan+ta/ mo ha 'ag ya bA ga ban/ shri kr-i b+hi kri badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/
327b7(chi): / oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya/ dzaHhU~M baM ho/ sarba big nan/ badz+ra ki la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ hUM ka ra hUM/ a a/ dngos grub par
328a1(chi): chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs shig grogs dang
328a2(chi): bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam pararwa gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/
328a3(chi): pa ra bid tan hUM phaT/ tsin d+ha tsin dz+ha hU~M phaT/ b+hi na d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ 'gri na 'gri na hU phaT/ ha na ha nA hUM phaT/ ban+da d+ha bAn d+ha hUM phaT/ ha na ha na badz+rA/ da ha da ha
328a4(chi): badz+ra pa tsa pa tsA badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ las kyi sngags rnams dril dril na sa/ snying dang dbang po rnam shes
328a5(chi): la/ rim pa bzhin du phur pas thob// spyi 'thun kun tu ma lus gdag/ stong pa kha nas yang dag bsgral// chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags kyi byin rlabs/
328a6(chi): so/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a bi tsa ra'i brnag pa de kho na la'o// dkar nag mtshams su'o// nag po gru gsum gtor ma// mtshon rtse gnyis dang dbyig dug zangs/
328a7(chi): gzhan yang dngos po mtshon rnams la// bsgrub pa tshul bzhin byas nas ni// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // dgra bgegs dbang po mngon sum bsgral// rdo rje gsang
328b1(chi): ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshul pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs//
328b2(chi): nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// las sngags mtshon du bcas pas gdab// dum bu nyid du de bzhin 'gyur// drag po drug gsum gtor ma la// 'da' ru ra yi rtsa
328b3(chi): ba dang / lug mig grib bskams byas pa dang // rtsa ba lo ma 'bras bu dang // thams cad drug tu 'gyur ba kun// nag po dag tu yang dag bya// bsnyen sgrub tshul du
328b4(chi): byas nas ni// me 'bar 'odad 'byung rtags rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du yang dag sbyar// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung //
328b5(chi): nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu drang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// las sngags dag la yang dag sbyar// nyon mongs 'khor ba gzhom pa'i phyir// rten gtun mkha'
328b6(chi): dbyings yang dag bsam// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal snying bsregs nas// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun
328b7(chi): khung du/ rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par bya'o// kha thaM kha thai kha thaM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ khyad par gtor ma chen po ni// sha chen dam
329a1(chi): rdzas mchod pa dang // snying khrag dron mo ma lus dang // nyon mongs lnga po rtsad gcad phyir// sna lnga tshon gyi 'dab mas dgab// bsnyen pa nyid du
329a2(chi): yang dag ldan// klong drug sngags drug lha drug dang // rdzas drug las rnams ma lus bya// bsnyen bsgrub drod du 'gyu rA ba dang // nang rnams ma lus dbab par bya//
329a3(chi): des ni 'khor ba gting nas skems// nyon mongs 'joms par yang dag bshad// las rnams ma lus grub pa'i phyir// sreg pa'i glong drug yang dag ldan//
329a4(chi): 'phrin las las rnams bya ba'i glong // bsreg cing mchod de btab pa'i glong // dgug cing bstim dang gdab ste gtub pa'i glong // mnyes byed mchod pa 'bul ba'i
329a5(chi): gloslong / gzir ga khro bo stang stabs glong // bsreg pa'i glong drug nyon mongs dag par bsregs// thugs rje me'i byin rlabs yin// gdug pa me la rab tu sngags//
329a6(chi): drug po zor gyi las bya'i phyir// glong drug las ni 'di rnams bstan// 'phrin las bya ba las kyi glong // 'dzab dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i glong // drag po sgrol ba dus
329a7(chi): kyi glong / tshigs bshang drag po gyer gyi glong // drag po'i sngags rnams 'phangs pa'i glong // rmed pa spa'i glong dang drug/ glong drug drag po 'phangs pa'i glong // lam
329b1(chi): bstan gyur gyi grong drug yin// las rnams yang dag grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs 'khor bya mnan pa'i phyir// mnan pa'i glong drug 'di lta ste// 'phrin las byu ba
329b2(chi): las kyi glong // 'dzab dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i glong // brgya dang brgyang ni gdab pa'i glong // khyad par bal tshon byad kyi grong // bskyed dang spyan drangs gtad pa'i
329b3(chi): klong ba zang btang thabs mnan pa'i klong // gling drug mnan pa'i lus kyi mchog/ las gsum 'phrin las mtshon pa'i phyir// 'di nyid drug po'i 'byin pa
329b4(chi): yang dag bstan// bya ba gsum du yang dag bstan// rnal 'byor gang zhig gtsor 'dzin pa// gzhung dang ldan pa'i gtor ma la// stong pa chen po chos kyi mchog/
329b5(chi): hUM las dang sngags kyis gtso borla bsam// dzaHhUM baM hos spyan drangs nus// hUM gsum bstim pa'i las rnams bya// gtor ma hUM gsum lha mo drug/ rtsa sngags bzhugs
329b6(chi): lde bstab sngags gdags// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis bstab// 'phrin las btsal ba'i las rnams bya// de bzhin dus rnams rdzas kyis mchod// byang chub sems
329b7(chi): kyirang bzhin ni// chags pa med par zhe 'dod med// mnyam pa med du bzhag pas na// thams cad ye grub gtor ma yin// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs su 'gyur/
330a1(chi): tshogs bsags rim pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag nyid du rnam par bshad// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ drag po gtor mas
330a2(chi): gadrug pa btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ las
330a3(chi): kyi don bstan pa 'di lta bu// dang po byang chub sems bskyed de// bum+b+ha pa kha brgyan mgul chings can// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams
330a4(chi): lA/ dbab pa'i sngags kyis yang dag bsgrub// gnyis pa bsdus shing bum par thim// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang // bum pa sku gsung thugs dbang bskur/
330a5(chi): nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams kyis// cis kyang mi tshugs tshe dbang bskur// 'chi med tshe yi dbang dang ldan// rab tu stan 'gyur dbang dang ldan// bdud po pad+ma
330a6(chi): dbang phyug dang // bdud mo gar gyi dbang phyug mA// dpag bsam shing gi rked pa la// 'dus byas bu ni bcu gcig byung // gnod byed bcu gcig yang dag rtsub/
330a7(chi): 'gro ba kun gyi don bya'i phyir// thod pa bcu gcig mnan pa'i rdzas// gnang du bstan pa'i sa rnams ni// mi 'gyur rten du mnan pa'i sa// dbus su snying po tri
330b1(chi): rnams bri// 'khor lo drug la sngags drug bri// mnan pa'i ling gar rab tu shes// spyi ltar shes pa rab tu gces// sgron mar dkri zhing re bas gtum// bya ba'i las
330b2(chi): rnams byas pa dang // mnan yin mnan sa dag tu mnan// don rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur// de yis 'gro ba rab tu mos// gdug pa can gyis zin pa la// 'bum
330b3(chi): mam lha sngags mang bzlas te// gang yin bstan pa'i sa de la// rtse gsum lce yi sngags bzlas la// ldag cing nang rnams zhi bar 'gyur// 'dag pa chu dag gang yang rung //
330b4(chi): mang du bzlas la nad la glan// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sman la sngags btab la// gang yin nang la glan par 'gyur// nang nub dus gsum dag
330b5(chi): tu gdab// rdo rje lce yis nad rnams zhi// lha yi ting 'dzin rab tu gsal// des ni gnod pa'i nad rnams zhi// nang rnams ma lus zhi 'gyur na// gnas lnga bsrung la bgegs
330b6(chi): rnams bsrung // bsrung ba'i rim pa rab tu 'byung // nyungs kar thal chen la sngags te// sor bzhi dag gi glang ma la// 'bru gsum sngags rnams bri bya ste// gdug
330b7(chi): pa can gyi shing dag la// phur bu sor bzhi nyungs kar gdags// sa ya drug 'bum mang du bzlas// dus rnams kun tu srungs ma bskul// dregs pa mchod cing chang phud
331a1(chi): gtor/ mthos bskor rdzas rnams rab tu sba// nyungs kar thal chen de bzhin sba// bzlas nyungs sbreng zhing mtha' ma bskor// de bzhin
331a2(chi): rab tu brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa yang // 'khor ba rtogs las yang dag 'byung // dus gsum byang chub
331a3(chi): sems las byung // bskul pa stong du rab stsal nas// sems nyid byang chub rnyed mi 'gyur// gal te sems de rnyed mi 'gyur na// sngon po stong par gA la 'gyur//
331a4(chi): yang dag bstan pa'i snying po 'di// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed mi 'gyur// rnyed mi kun pa grangs yo dra ma gzungs// kun tu bzang po ngang nyid las// bstan
331a5(chi): pa 'di dag brjod las 'das// de nyid brjod par sus gsungs pa// de ni brjod par bstan pa med// 'di dang 'di ru bstan par ni// gsungs par ngo bor
331a6(chi): brjod pa med// sus kyang ga la bcings pa med// rang gi rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin// de yis bcings pa rab tu dam// skye med chos dbyings dam pa la// rtsa ba'i
331a7(chi): dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // khro bcu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // sras mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // spyan drangs mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // 'dzab
331b1(chi): dang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // drang po las kyi dkyil 'khor dang // bsregs pa me yi dkyil 'khor dang // 'chi mer tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang // dkyil 'khor bcu
331b2(chi): bzhi yang dag bstan// hUM drug gsum 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// yab yum dgyes par sku bskyed nas// gdug pa 'dul zhing rngam pa'i zhal// ye shes
331b3(chi): drug gi phyag rgya ca ni// zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs// yum dang gnyis su med par zhugs// hUM mdzad sgra 'byin phag drang skyigs bu'i mgo/ rnam rgyal
331b4(chi): bsnyems ma sdug dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug sngon sde ra mo g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ gshin rje dur khro da sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ mi g.yo gtun khung khA dang gzig gi
331b5(chi): mgo rta mgrin gtum mo byi la pu shud mgo/ gzhan mi mda' snyen spyang khu khra yi mgo/ bdud rtsi rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang mgo/ khams gsum rnam rgyal dred
331b6(chi): dang srin mo'i mgo/ stobs chen bskyod mya dom dang byi ba'i mgo/ thugs dam gnyen po dus la babaM// hUM/ sras kyi dam par dbang bskur bu'i// mthing
331b7(chi): kha dkar ba sngo dang dmar// nag dang ldong sngon su mdog can// phur pa gri gul lcags kyu 'dzin// zhags pa dug gtor tho ba 'dzin// gang yin nyams pa byas/
332a1(chi): bsnams// sku stong khro bo chen po la// sku smad lcags phur sbal dang ldan// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor nas// rtse mo lta bur rnam
332a2(chi): par bsam// ye shes dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang // rig pa rang rtags phyag rgya dang // brgya byin dpal rtags phyag rgya dang // 'dzin byed pho nya'i phyag rgya dang //
332a3(chi): ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdung byed tho ba'i phyag rgya dang // rdeg byed mtshon gyi phyag rgya dang // gnon byed ri rab phyag rgya dang // sreg byed ma yi phyag rgya
332a4(chi): dang / 'phen byed zor gyi phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya bcu yis rab bstan nas// skye med chos dbyings phyag rgyar 'dus// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams// yi ge kun
332a5(chi): gyi rtsu ba ste// yi ge thams cad 'byung bar byed// mtshon byed yi ge'i rang bzhin las// skye mod chos dbyings rnam par dag/ skye ba med las thams cad skyes//
332a6(chi): 'di ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin// las rnams thams cad ma lus kun// yang dag nyid du bstan par byas// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ las
332a7(chi): thams cad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas ni
332b1(chi): rab tu bstan bya'i phyir// dur khrod ma mo 'tshogs pa'i sar// bdag po gang yin sa rin gcal// ma 'dar 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dur khrod rus pa'i phye mas gdab//
332b2(chi): dam rdzas lnga yis chag chag gdab// mtshams ga cadra rim pa ma nor bya// thig ni hUM las yab yum bskyed// sa man dza dang phyag rgya bzhi// spyan drangs bstim pa byas nas
332b3(chi): ni/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mchod pa 'bul// sa thig gnam thig gnyis su ga po// mtshon la hUM les nyid du babs// rim pa gong bzhin shes par bya// gru gsum
332b4(chi): zla gam mu khyud dang // gru chud snam bu sgo bzhir bcas// dur khrod sna tshogs kho la ma gtang // rdzas rnams ma lus rim pa yang // dam rdzas gsum gyis mthun
