332b5(chi): rdzas bsags// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin rlabs la// gtso bo bskyed dang ma mo ni// gang byed rang sngags 'khor bskyed nas// thams cad sngags kyis bya bar 'dus//
332b6(chi): lnga la mchod cing bsnyen pa drang // phyi nang gsang gsum gang byed kyang // sngags kyi rim pa de bzhin bya// drod rtags brtan po byung ba dang // bsgrub pa dag kyang de bzhin
332b7(chi): bya/ de yis gong 'dra de byung nas// phur pa lnga ni gdab bya ste// snying dang yan lag bzhi rnams la// rang rang thun dang bcas pa'o// las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa
333a1(chi): dang / gang yin me la bsregs byas nas// lha dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'bul// tshe bstim rim pa lha lngas byas// dbab pa de bzhin
333a2(chi): shes par gyis// rkyang pa bcu gnyis bsgrub pa la// gtso bo re dang las byed pa// sngags kyi bye brag yang dag bstan// tha ma snying po rab tu bstan// dregs pa dbang
333a3(chi): sdud yang dag la// dkar po gsum gyi snying khrag la// bsten pa'i rdzas su yang dag bstan// gtso bo nyid ni yang dag bsdam// 'bru dgu sngags kyi bsnyen pa drang //
333a4(chi): bsgrub pa dregs pa'i lha la gtad// snying dang dbang po lnga la gdab// tha ma las bstan yang dag bshad// drug dang bzhi yi sgrub pa la// sngags drug lha drug rdzas drug
333a5(chi): dang / gtso bo nyid la rab tu bskor// bzhi yi las su bstan pa ste// dbye dang bstan pa dor byas la// bzhi yi sngags kyis dmag dpon bsam// rim pa nyid du
333a6(chi): shes bya ste// drug ni yan lag lnga rnams drang // snying dang dngas ma bzhi la gdab// de bzhin rim pa drangs kyi sbyar// rtags thogs bsgrub par yang dag bstan//
333a7(chi): nus pa rten 'brel byin rlabs ni// sha yi bya ba yang dag dang // re sho dang 'o ma zangs phye dang // mal 'og dag tu zhag gsum mnan// 'da' ru ra dang ka na si//
333b1(chi): 'tsher byed dag la shing dang slong byed bzhi// snga dro gcig tu mnan par bya// bdug pa'i mgo rang dug rnams dang // rdzas rnams bsres pa'i phye ma la// gang yin
333b2(chi): zhabs 'og dag tu mnan// chu drang dag la sngags btab la// tshe sa brgyad nam langs dag la btungadra// 'dzin pa'i shu dang du marari breg khrag/ chang dang 'thun par
333b3(chi): rab bsnyams la// me la bsrog la rab tu sbyin// dkar po phum dmar snying dag la// de la sogs pa'i dkar po lnga// srog snying dam par rab bsgrags te// gang
333b4(chi): yin lha rten dag tu sba// nag po spyi dkar snying dag dang // mon pa nag po'i snying khrag gnyis// srog snying nyid du bcings pa gsum// gang yin sa la gnas par bya// tsa
333b5(chi): rA'i snying dang snying po dang // thod pa'i snying shun dag tu sbas byas lnga// ra yi thod pa'i nang du man na// klu yis gzung ba'i thod pa ru// gdug pa sbrul gyi snying bcug la//
333b6(chi): ming rus bcug la yang dag mnan// de nas phyung ba'i rdzas de ni// gdug pa klu yi gnas su sba// skyo ba dag gi thod pa ru// gang yin ming byang bcug nas ni//
333b7(chi): dkar po gsum gyi snying shun dang // dkar po nyid kyi sngags bcug la// dregs pa'i snying po kun bris la// gu gul dud pa gtang byas la// sme ba'i rdzas rnams lha
334a1(chi): rten sgra// thod pa gang yin gnas su sra// rims kyis shi ba'i thod pa ru// de nyid khrag dang zangs phye dang // dug rnams ma lus thugs
334a2(chi): byas la/ mnan pa chen po rab tu bya// sre mo dag gi thod pa ru// gcan gzan sna tshogs snying bcug la// drag po sngags kyis bskor byas la// sgo gsum
334a3(chi): 'dus pa'i mdo ru mnan// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
334a4(chi): 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig dang / sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dam tshig chen po ngas bstan gyis// bstan par go bar rab tu bcas/
334a5(chi): snying po mchog rnams dam tshig ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas dam pa ste// bstan pa dam tshig 'dri dag ni// sa bzhi lta bur rab tu bstan// yi dam dam pa mi spang
334a6(chi): zhing / nyi ma re la lan gsum du// dran pa nyid du rab tu gzung // sngags dang phyag rgya snying po dang // 'di dag rab tu bstan pa yin// nyams pa lnga nI gzhi
334a7(chi): nas bstan// gsum dang gcig ni rtsa ba nyams// bsgrub pa bzhin du ma shes na// ming dang khams rnams rang rgyud de// rang dgar gzungs pas ngar 'dzin te//
334b1(chi): ngo bo shes pa nyams pa'i rgyu// yi dam lha dang snying po dang // sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang // rdo rje slob dpon mcher lha ma dang // bsrung ba'i rim pa de bzhin
334b2(chi): bya/ sngags kyi lasra rnams 'di lta ste// 'bru dgu ye shes lha mchog ste// 'khor gyi dregs pa rang bzhin 'du// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags rnams la//
334b3(chi): bdud dang ma mo sgrol ba'i ging // las kyi drag po nyid du sgrol// g.yas pa thabs la g.yon pA yum// ma dang a yi byin rlabs las// hUM lnga yab lnga ma lnga yum//
334b4(chi): sngags kyi rnam par bsam par bya// yab yumA sku ru gyur pa las// g.yas dang g.yon gyi khrig ma las// sngags kyis rab tu bskor byas las// bdag nyid yi
334b5(chi): dam lhar bsams la// snod ni a dang bcud kyi hrI// 'og tu raM dang yaM bsgoms nas// bde ba sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// rlung bskyod raM gyis me spar nas//
334b6(chi): a dang hUM du bcas pa zhu// bdud rtsi chen po nyid du 'gyur// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam pa yi// hUM dang a yi byin rlabs las// 'khrig ma sngags kyi 'khor
334b7(chi): lo yis yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// bdud rtsi chen po nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin gtor ma nyid la yang // snod dang bcud zhu lha mo drug/ yang na bdud
335a1(chi): rtsi nyid du 'gyur// rak+ta thod pa nyid la bsam// snod dang bcud du gyur pa las// rba klong 'khrug cing mtsho ltar 'khyil// ya ba yum sngags
335a2(chi): las thams cad 'byung // khro bo ha sti las rnams ni// rnam par rgyal bar yang dag bshad// dang por rdzas rnams 'tshogs 'gyur na// stong pa nyid la rnam
335a3(chi): gsum gyis// ha sti rab tu bsgom byas te// gtso bo dbu yi gtsug tu bsgom// sngags kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs// sngags rnams rab tu de shes bya'o//
335a4(chi): oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sngags bstod ha ti yab kyi sngags// hUM ni ha sti yum gyi sngags// ha na ha sti yab kyi sras// ha na ha sti yum gyi sras//
335a5(chi): hUM phaT thams cad las kyi sngags// bskyed pa dang ni spyan drangs dang // mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // thams cad sngags su shes par bya// mkha' 'gro lnga lnga
335a6(chi): las lnga ni// yang dag nyid du 'di nyid bsgrub// mkha' 'gro gsum ni mchod bya ste// rim pa don gyi gong du bstan// yi dam lha la rab mchod na// mkha' 'gro
335a7(chi): rnam gsum spyan drangs la// thod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan// rang re rtsa sngags gang yin la// ba len ta yis gtor ma 'bul// gshegs su gsol dang 'phrin
335b1(chi): las bcol// yum gyi mkha' 'gro mchod pa ni// gang yin thod par rab rlug la// yab yum gnyis med bskyed pa las// sngags kyi bya ba kun kyang bya// gtor ma a
335b2(chi): las byin rlabs las// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum sngags kyis mchod// 'phrin las bcol zhing las gnyer gtad// nyi ma re la lan gsum gtang // ci bsams
335b3(chi): las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ dam tshig dang sngags kyi bya ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
335b4(chi): de nas rgyud gtad par rab tu gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi mas ni// kun tu bzang po nga yin te// so sor ston pas gsungs pa bzhin// sdud pa rnams kyis
335b5(chi): rab brdzes nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi mes ngas// rigs can skyes bu khyod la gtad// gsang sngags brda yi ge bar gyis// las dang skal bar ldan pa dang /
335b6(chi): sbyangs dang las 'byor ldan na ni// shes po rno la thos pa che// thogs pa med par rtsol ba des// des ni rgyud 'di rtogs par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i
335b7(chi): rgyod chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la sha'aM tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi
336a1(chi): rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs sgrol byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na
336a2(chi): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang ba'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ pho brang lhun gyis grub pa dur khrod chen po'i
336a3(chi): gnas ni/ khro bo chen po yon tan sdud pa zhes bya ba dang // khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang // khro bo
336a4(chi): chen po gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang / khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon zhes bya ba dang / khro bo chen po rta mgrin zhes bya ba dang // khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa
336a5(chi): zhes bya ba dang / khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba zhes bya ba dang // khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang // khro bo chen po stobs po zhes bya ba la
336a6(chi): sogs pa btsun mo dang bcas/ bran dang bcas/ bka' nyan dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu
336a7(chi): bzhin du yongs su bkang nas bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal sku gsung thugs sgrol byed kyi rgyal po/ yum 'khor lo rgyas
336b1(chi): 'debs ma dang gnyis su med par gyur to// de gnyis su med par gyur nas kyang // gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ros khyab par gyur to// de'i tshe khro bo chen po
336b2(chi): bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gnyis su med pa'i ngang las stan las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la gsol ba
336b3(chi): btab bo// e ma'o bde ba chen po'i sku// ye nas dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// skur gyur sems can kun sgrol phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid bshad du gsol/
336b4(chi): ces gsol te/ de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku dang / gsung dang / thugs srung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
336b5(chi): ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdud thams cad sel bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tu
336b6(chi): kA ya ba ka tsit+ta badz+rA nAn u tsa ta ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
336b7(chi): dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed la sogs pa snga mar gyur pa thams cad phyogs
337a1(chi): dang phyogs mtshams thams cad rab tu byer ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phye ma sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
337a2(chi): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugasgyu ma thag tu bdud 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
337a3(chi): lus phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bka tsit+ta badz+ra nan tsakra oM bruM/ tsakra hUM b+h+r-i/ tsakra swa bruM/ tsakra hr-i bruM/ tsakra ha bru~M/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum
337a4(chi): rmyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang klu la sogs thams cad la/ 'khor lo'i thog dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri la sogs pa'i
337a5(chi): thog gi char bab par gyur to// thams cad kyang breng sha tho na nas/ phyogs mtshams su mi gra rtsa bgra da de cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
337a6(chi): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can// khyod mthong bas
337a7(chi): ni bdag 'jigs na// lha dang klu la sogs pa rnams// 'jigs par gyur pa smos ci dgos// drag cing gdug pas rab bsgrubs pa'i// drag po'i gtum po khro bo yang /
337b1(chi): khyod gzugs mthong bas skrag par 'gyur// sgra skad thos pas smos ci dgos// ces gsungs so// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil bas/ lha dang klu la sogs
337b2(chi): pa blangs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bde gshegs kun gyis dbang bskur ba'i// las kyi khro bo bdag nyid kyang // drag po'i sku ni mthong bas sreg/ gzhan pa'i sgra
337b3(chi): sogs smos ci dgos// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i tshogs// gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' ba// a dz+nyA ka yi dog pa bzhin// mgo ni tshal bar 'gas par 'gyur//
337b4(chi): zhes bsgo bas thams cad nyan par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ bdud thams cad 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
337b5(chi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po khro bo 'jigs byed chen pos/ bde ba
337b6(chi): chen po gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa chen po 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo//
337b7(chi): thams cad gsang ba kun gyi bdag/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur// gang du gsang ba'i don 'byung ba// de nyid bcom ldan bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol
338a1(chi): ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po khro bo 'jigs byed chen pos 'di
338a2(chi): skad ces bka' stsal to// don chen po dang rab ldan pas// thams cad gsang ba'i don gsol pa// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod legs so// gang du gsang ba
338a3(chi): bde ba'i don// ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// 'gyur dang bstan pa'i bdag nyid can// rnam snang gnas su de nyid bsgom// dbang po
338a4(chi): lnga las 'od byung bas// rdul 'byor dbang po kha dbyi bar// gsal ba'i sku lnga gsal bar bsam// gang du 'gro dang 'od ba kun// mchod dang bstim pa'i tshul du gnas/
338a5(chi): gang tshe gnas par gyur pa'i tshe// 'ong ba'i tshul du gnas par bzhag/ snang mdzad sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'od bzhi rtsa ba'i 'od dang ldan// de nyid bsgoms
338a6(chi): kyis dngos grub gnyis// thogs pa med pa rdo rje bzhin// snang ba mtha' yas gnas dag tu// bde chen snang ba mtha' yas bsam// dbang po'i 'od las rtser bzung
338a7(chi): nas/ mchod dang dngos grub gnyis kyi tshul// 'gro dang 'ong ba gnas par bya// mtshan mchog rtsa gnyis 'od ldan pa// 'od bzhi rtsa ba'i 'od dang ldan// yon tan dngos
338b1(chi): grub de bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas dag tu// de bsgoms dbang po sbyong ba dang // rin chen gnas kyang sbyang bar bya// gang du gcig cig sogs pa
338b2(chi): yi// rtags lnga rim skyes mtha' mar ni// bde gshegs dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// gang tshe gsang ba'i don ldan pa// de yi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//
338b3(chi): sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu rab bsgoms pas// rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba yi// rin chen nor
338b4(chi): bupu rab bsgoms pas// rnam rtog tha mas cad bzlog pa yin// dngos rtogs sem sa rba da tha mas ca da la// bla med byang chub yod mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i yi ge la
338b5(chi): gnas pa// rnal 'byor de ni grol bar 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog/ rdo rje phur pa'i rgyud las rnyed// 'di ni bcom ldan thams cad kyis// ma gsungs
338b6(chi): gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// bskal pa grangs med thams cad du// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa// shes rab mig dang ldan pas 'grub// ces gsungs so//
338b7(chi): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gsang ba chen po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung
339a1(chi): dang / thugs rdo rje bdag pos kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos// yongs su dag pa'i sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
339a2(chi): par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// 'dus pa chen po 'khor thams cad kyis/ chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i sbyor ba'i ngang du
339a3(chi): sangs rgyas par mthong ngo // de'i tshe zla bo chen po mi g.yo mgon stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ e ma ho bde ba chen po'i sku// gsung ba bde
339a4(chi): ba chen po nyid// yongs su dag pa sbyor ba'i mchog/ bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bka' stsal pa/ bde ba chen po rab bsgrub
339a5(chi): phyir/ gsang ba'i don zhus khyod legs so// gang phyir gsang ba chen po'i don// ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// dngos po
339a6(chi): snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu stong // chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// cir snang sems kyi snang bar 'dod// kun nas 'khrul pa'i dbang
339a7(chi): ngag tu/ sna tshogs snang ngo rang bzhin med// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// 'khrul pa yin phyir so sor snang // dper na chu zla smig rgyu bzhin// sems ni thog
339b1(chi): ma tha ma med// 'das dang ma 'ongs phyi nang med// snga phyi ltos pas gang yang med// rang bzhin 'od gsal 'dus ma byas// dam pa'i don la rtag par bsgom// dngos
339b2(chi): por gyur pa'i don bsgoms pas// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// de las dngos po med par bsgom// dngos med mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas// sems mthong de la
339b3(chi): dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sogs skye 'jig gnas bral ba// thams cad dngos po med par bsgom// dngos med dngos po'i sa bon med// ces gsungs so//
339b4(chi): / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang tshe dngos po med gyur pa// de tshe rnam par rtog dang bral// de ni mi rtog ye shes te//
339b5(chi): rtog las 'das pas chos sku mthong // zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngon pos 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad sems nyid ngo bo bas//
339b6(chi): thog ma med pa'i dbyings nyid du// sems gsal dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ des ni gang dmigs dngos grub myur// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
339b7(chi): pa gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// don dam 'dod 'gyur rnal 'byor pas// rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa spong // bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yis//
340a1(chi): rnal 'byor de ni grol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo mgon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bskyed
340a2(chi): rdzogs ting 'dzin la gnas nas// spyod pa dag la brlab par bya// grogs dang de nyid ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs
340a3(chi): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rta mchog dpal gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mdzub mos zla bstan ji bzhin du// chos rnams dngos po med gyur
340a4(chi): kyang / ming dang tshig dang yi ge yi// brda yi sgo nas bstan par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'di skad ces
340a5(chi): gsungs so// ming dang tshig dang yi ge yis// don gyis brdar byed ma rtogs par// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams la// ming med tshig med ces gsungs so//
340a6(chi): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// glang du yod pas skye ba med// med dang rtag chad gnyis las min// gang tshe skye
340a7(chi): ba ma grub pas// gnas dang 'gag pa'ang 'grub pa med// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs po yon tan sdud par mdzad pas 'di skad ces gsungs so//
340b1(chi): skye dang 'gag dang gnas dang kun// byis pa rnams kyis 'khrul nas brtags// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis brtags na// dngos med sa bon la sogs med// ces gsungs so// /
340b2(chi): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzem pa stobs chen zhes bya ba sa 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang tshe sems can snang ba la// bde gshegs sprul pa cir snang yang //
340b3(chi): bsod nams thugs rje'i stobs yin te// don dam pa la snang ba med// ces gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbu ma
340b4(chi): chen po'i ngang la mi g.yo bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i lha mo rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtag tu mnyam nyid thugs rje'i
340b5(chi): bdag rnga smon lam mchog grub rdzogs pa'i sku// ma nyam nyid ngang la rab bzhengs la// rnal 'byor ma la rtag tu spyod// ces pas thams cad rags pa'i rnam par
340b6(chi): 'bar ba 'phro bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa
340b7(chi): thams cad kyi las kyi khro bo gtso bo kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed chen pos 'khor lo bkod pa'i tshul du rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tshul du snyoms par zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di
341a1(chi): brjod do// rags pa'i rtog pa rnam spong zhing // phyag rgya grub 'dod rnal 'byor pas// gtso bo'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// las rnams thams
341a2(chi): cad 'grub par 'gyur// hUM mdzad ting 'dzin la gnas na// nyi zla pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// las rnams thogs pa med par 'gyur// rnam rgyal ting 'dzin la
341a3(chi): gnas na// dri za pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dbyug sngon ting 'dzin la gnas na// me lha pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// sreg pa'i
341a4(chi): las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gshed po ting 'dzin la gnas na// gshed po pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// mi g.yo'i ting
341a5(chi): 'dzin la gnas na// srin po pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// rengs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rta mgrin ting 'dzin la gnas na// klu rgyal pho mo thabs kyis
341a6(chi): 'dul// dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// mi thub ting 'dzin la gnas na// rlung lha pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// bsad dang 'gugs pa'i las rnams 'grub//
341a7(chi): bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// gnod sbyin pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// bsad pa'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// khams gsum ting 'dzin la gnas na// 'byung
341b1(chi): po pho mo thabs kyis 'dul// rmongs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// stobs chen ting 'dzin la gnas na// sa bdag pho mo thabs kyis btul//
341b2(chi): mnan pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// bde gshegs khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// snying khar thig le bsgoms nas kyang // thabs dang shes rab rol gyur nas//
341b3(chi): bde ba chen po'i don rnyed nas// rtag tu mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ las kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi
341b4(chi): pa'o// rnga de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed rgyal po sa srin mo rol pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
341b5(chi): zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor phyag rgya'i bdag nyid can// sgra 'byin ting 'dzin la gnas na// rtag par de nyid gsang sngags ldan// dngos grub
341b6(chi): 'byor pa byas gyur na// lha mo bkol ba'i cho ga 'grub// bskems ma'i ting 'dzin la ga nas na// zhi dang lha mo dgug pa dang // dri za pho mo dgug pa 'grub// de bzhin
341b7(chi): lpags bsregs las kyang 'grub// sder mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// me yi las rnams thams cad dang // me lha bu mo bkol ba dang // bsang dpral las kun grub par
342a1(chi): 'gyur/ dur khrod ting 'dzin la gnas na// mnan pa'i las rnams bya ba dang // gshin rje pho mo dgug pa dang // bcud dgug pa yang 'grub par
342a2(chi): 'gyur/ gtun khung ting 'dzin la gnas na// brdung ba'i las rnams thams cad dang // srin po pho mo dgug pa dang // spyi 'bros khu ba dgug pa 'grub// gtum mo'i
342a3(chi): ting 'dzin la gnas na// dgug pa'i las rnams bya ba dang // klu yi bu mo dgug pa 'grub// mnga' bsnyems ting 'dzin la gnas na// dgug bskrad las rnams bya ba dang //
342a4(chi): rlung sgra'i bu mo dgug pa dang // tshe bsring ba yi las rnams 'grub// rlung 'byin ting 'dzin la gnas na// dgug dang myos par bya ba dang // gnod sbyin bu mo dgug pa dang /
342a5(chi): bu slong ba yang 'grub par 'gyur// gsod ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas na// gsad dang dpral bar bya ba dang // 'byung po pho mo dgug pa dang // de bzhin gso ba'ang 'grub
342a6(chi): par 'gyur// skul byed ting 'dzin la gnas na// sangs rgyas slong bar byed pa dang // sad dang sa bdag pho mo dgug/ shi ba slong ba de bzhin no// rnal 'byor 'di la
342a7(chi): rtag gnas na// snying khar thig le bsams nas kyang // 'og gi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// bsam gtan 'di la rtag gnas na// mtshan ma lnga 'am yang na ni//
342b1(chi): dag pa rnam bzhi rims kyis 'byung // zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ rdo rje srin mo bka'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
342b2(chi): / de nas yang dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos gnyis su med par sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs
342b3(chi): so// rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// rang nyid gtso bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// mos 'gyur yum dang gnyis med las// so so'i khro bo'i sprul pa spro// slar la sdud
342b4(chi): pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i bde ba la// snyoms zhugs rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs pa dang // slob ma'i sdig pa legs
342b5(chi): bslang ste// shi 'phos gyur nas bum pa'i chus// spyi bor legs bkru sa dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu'i bdag po yis// legs bzhugs rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can//
342b6(chi): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi ma zla ba lce la reg/ nyi zla kha sbyor rab byas te// gnyis med bde ba'i dgyes pas bstim// gsang ba byang chub phur bu yis//
342b7(chi): rnam rtog rtsad nas gcod par byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las gnyis su med pa'i rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug
343a1(chi): pa'o// // de nas yang dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi le'u 'di
343a2(chi): gsungs so// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// rtag tu gzhan gyi don la gnas// stegs bu khru ni nyi shu lnga// nyi shu bcu drug legs byas te// steng du sbyang ba'i ngang
343a3(chi): la gnas// thams cad rang bzhin med par bsam// zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i dam tshig go// yi ge lnga las legs byung ba'i//
343a4(chi): sa bzhi bzang po mdzes pa ste// 'od zer kha dog lnga dang ldan// rtag tu sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhes pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje'i dam tshig
343a5(chi): go yon tan tshogs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas bgegs rnams bzlog/ khro bo'i tshul dang ldan pas 'grub//
343a6(chi): ces pa ni sa chen po bzung ba'i dam tshig go// kha dog lnga ldan legs bsgril te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// yi ge lnga las legs byung bas// rdo rje khu tshur
343a7(chi): legs par byed// ces pa ni rdo rje thig gdab dam tshig go// rin chen lnga 'am kha dog lnga// legs byas yi ge lnga yis brlab// dbus mthing shar lho nub byang bzhi/
343b1(chi): dkar ser dmar ldang 'khor lo grub// rdo rje yi ge sku rnams kun// gang zag mos pa'i dbang du gsungs// gru chad ljang ku bzhi'i khyams// sgo glo khyams la sogs pa
343b2(chi): rnams// legs par tshon gyis bri bar bya// rgyan dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mkhas pas rtag tu bsgoms na 'grub/ byin brlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung //
343b3(chi): zhes pa ni rdo rje tshon gyi dam tshig go/ rtag tu gnod pa'i sbyor ba can// de ba sa la phyi na na 'jug pa brtsam// ku sha la sogs sbyor ba yis// bgegs bskrad byang chub
343b4(chi): sems bskyed de// ngag gi nyes pa sbyang bar bya// a khri bir hUM/ yi ge wA la 'jug par 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba'i don la gnas// de nas ku ka'i dam tshig gis//
343b5(chi): bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i cho ga bya// so shing dag gi dam tshig gis// ngag gi nyes pa sbyong bar byed// tshon skud lnga'i dam tshig gis// nyon mongs pa dag srung bar byed// ces
343b6(chi): pa ni 'jug pa'i cho ga'i dam tshig go/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
343b7(chi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos/ yi ge 'khor lo spro ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
344a1(chi): ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
344a2(chi): rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM shrI badz+ra ku mA ra sarba bib+ha nan nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ye hUM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i
344a3(chi): d+ha nI la dAN+Da hU~M da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+yA a tsa la hUM ban d+ha ban d+hu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM/
344a4(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha a pA ra dzi ta hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la
344a5(chi): hUM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// 'di gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yi ge'i 'phreng bar gyur to//
344a6(chi): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge 'phreng ba rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// e ma'o stong gsum thams cad yi ge'i tshogs// yi ge'i sems nyid
344a7(chi): snang ba de// 'di la sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sems can kun yang 'di las 'byung // gang tshe tshogs rnams thams cad kun// sems las byung rtogs de yi
344b1(chi): tshe/ sems dben don mthong de ru ni// de bsgrubs gyur nas de la dmigs// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams// sems snang de phyir sems nyid yin// sems
344b2(chi): nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid// ci ltar sgra rnams kun brjod kyang // yi ge nyid las gzhan ma yin// sna tshogs yi ge sgra byung ba// sgra la smra bsam brjod las 'das//
344b3(chi): de la smon lam thugs rje dang // sems can las 'phros sna tshogs sgra// gsungs pa nyid lngas brjod du med// brjod mod de nyid sna tshogs sgra// de ni ma skyes skye ba
344b4(chi): med/ yi ge oM ni sku yin te// spros nas mchod de spa ra ba dang // bskyed pa'i las byed yi ge lnga// mtshonA ni rlung lnga 'byung ba'i bdag/ yi ge hUM ni thugs yin te//
344b5(chi): 'du bo myur ba rnam sdud dang // 'bar ba'i 'bebs dang ye shes lnga// mtshon no rlung lnga 'jug pa'i bdag/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don rnams ston pa'i yi ge ste//
344b6(chi): chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// 'di ni nor bu dang 'drar bsam// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
344b7(chi): / de nas dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos don thams cad grub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje las kyi le'u 'di
345a1(chi): gsungs so// zhi ba'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// dngul lam dkar po'i phurU pa la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas gdug rtsub zhi
345a2(chi): bar 'gyur// dngul phye 'bras chan dkar po la// 'o mar sbyor ba'i gtor ma yin// mchod na de yi dngos grub 'byung // gzhan pa'i yul du gyur ma yin// rgyas pa'i
345a3(chi): las kyi sbyor ba ni// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas yon tan rgyas par 'gyur// gser phye la sogs gtor ma
345a4(chi): yin// mchod na de yi dngos grub 'byung // dbang gi las kyi sbyor ba ni// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab
345a5(chi): pas thabs cad dbang du 'gyur// zangs phye la sogs gtor ma yis// mchod na de yi dngos grub 'byung // gsad pa'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// lcags sam nag
345a6(chi): po'i shing rnams la// de nyid khro bor byin brlabs te// btab pas thams cad gsod par 'gyur// lcags phye la sogs gtor ma yis// mchod na de yis
345a7(chi): gsod par 'gyur// dgug pa'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// bya rgod gshog gi phur bu la// 'gugs byed lha ru byin brlabs te// gang btab lus de 'gugs par
345b1(chi): 'gyur/ lha mo dang ni klu mo dgug/ de bzhin mi yi bu mo dgug/ rgyas pa cha las rab grags pa'i// tshe bsgrub pa yi las dag ni// ba tsan dug til mar 'o
345b2(chi): ma dang / sgog par bsres te gnyen po dang // sbyar te zos na de 'grub 'gyur// yang na mu zi lhang tsher dang / mar dang gnyen por rab sbyar te// zos na de yi
345b3(chi): las 'grub 'gyur// bsam gtan dbang du gyur pa la// rtag tu 'jug pa'i dbang du gsungs// khu ba dgug pa'i cho ga ni// spyi bo ra a lA sa logs bskul ba'i//
345b4(chi): byang chub sems kyi chus bkrus nas// gang dmigs nad rnams zhi ba dang // rtag tu bde dang ldan par 'gyur// bcud dgug pa yi cho ga ni// rten las sha dang bdud
345b5(chi): rtsir bskyed// yang na de yi yum du gsal// rten las sangs rgyas sems can gyi// bcud dgug rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// gzhan yang dgug pa thams cad kun// /
345b6(chi): 'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// bskyed pa'i las kyi sbyor ba ni// yungs kar yungs nag la sogs pa// ro bsregs thal ba dang bsres te// bong nag spangs
345b7(chi): dang rab bsres te// dri bo'i thod par blugs nas ni// dug skye'i sa ru mnan par bya// skyes pa de yi 'bras bu yis// zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar byed// rgyas pa
346a1(chi): la sogs sbyor ba ni// thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje bzhin// yang na nas dang sran ma la// las des mi snang dngos grub 'gyur// til gyis myur du
346a2(chi): sdig pa bsreg/ khra yi thod par byas gyur na// rdzas de bsags pa tsam gyis ni// mi snang 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rnga mo'i thod par las byed na// las de byas pa
346a3(chi): tsam gyis ni// gtor ma gang yang gzhan du 'bros// rdo rje sems kyang de bzhin no// phag gi thod par las byed na// mkhar la sogs pa la gtor na// de ni myur du 'jig
346a4(chi): par 'gyur// 'ug pa'i thod par las byas na// mtshan ma mig gi mngon shes 'gyur// yang na mtshan mo nyin mo'ang rung // mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa ni// dkar dmar
346a5(chi): khu ba 'ug pa'i meg/ cha bsnyams tshil chen dud par sbyar// ri lu gnyis byas lce 'og gnyis// bcug nas sngags bzlas sbyor ba bya// zla ba phyed na mtshan ldan gyi//
346a6(chi): thod pa bsngags te bsgrub par bya// mig la byugs pas de 'grub 'gyur// zangs sogs gser du 'gyur ba yin// rna ba la sogs de bzhin no// dbab pa'i las kyi cho ga
346a7(chi): ni/ dkar dmar stegs bu gnyis byas te// thabs dang shes rab gtsang ma gnyis// ma spyad snod la gtad par bya// mchod pa'i snod la gnas pa ste// byug pa rgyan
346b1(chi): dang rab ldan nas// de nyid smra ba'i lha mor bsgom// rlung me dz+haiM gyi sbyor ba yis// chu dang sa yi 'khor lo la// legs gnas 'phar dang smra bar 'gyur// shes rab bskyed
346b2(chi): pa'i cho ga ni// ma bslangs pa yi skyur po la// nang par dus su bza' zhing bsgrub// dkar gsum mngar gsum zas la brten// dbye ba'i las kyi cho ga ni// rlung gi rnga mo
346b3(chi): gnyis kyi ltar// phan tshun gnyis ni steng du gzhag/ khro bo gnyis ni legs gnas te// dbye bsam de yis dbye bar 'gyur// bdag las sprul pa'i lha tshogs kyis/
346b4(chi): rdo rje'i lam du byung nas ni// snying kha'i lha yi mdun song nas// mnyes pa'i las byas nyes pa bsgo// bdag la 'dus pas gzi byin bskyed/ byin brlabs lha dang dbye bar
346b5(chi): 'gyur// khro chung gu gul thogs pa yis// bram ze kham pa'i mdun du song // gu gul thogs te dang po bzung // khrod pas snying rtsa chad nas ni// bdag 'od snying du
346b6(chi): bsdu zhing bstim// lhan cig skyes pa dbye bar 'gyur// bdag las sprul pa'i lha tshogs khro bo yis// 'od zer lnga las thog phub pas// stong gsum thog gis rab bkangs
346b7(chi): nas/ rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med 'gyur// gzhan gyis bsrung ba dbye ba'o// ba wang dag dang sbrul zong du// dmigs pa gnyis kyi ming rus gzhug/ rgyab spong
347a1(chi): ri las mnan byas pa// pho mo dbye ba'i cho ga'o// smyo byed las kyi cho ga ni// ka na ka yi khu ba dang // myos pa'i khrag dang lo'i chang // de dag
347a2(chi): myos pa'i thod par gzhug/ ra yi bags pa'i nang du gzhug/ dmigs pa'ang bcug cing klad la bskor// myos pa'i sngags bzlas khros tshul bstan// rengs pa'i las
347a3(chi): kyi cho ga ni// nang du hU~M las phur bu bskyed// de las lus rengs sbyor ba 'byung // mnan pa'i las kyi cho ga ni// lus mnan steng du ri rab bskyed// ngag la 'khor lo
347a4(chi): bsgom pas 'grub// mnan pa'i las su gsungs pa'o// yang na rabs chad thod pa la// shing shun ming rus bris la gzhug/ klu yod chu mig nang du mnan// des ni
347a5(chi): grub 'gyur gdon mi za// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
347a6(chi): ces gsol to// gang phyir gdug pa thams cad kun// las gzhan dag gis mi 'dul ba// de la drag po'i sbyor ba mchog/ bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol//
347a7(chi): de skad ces gsol pa dang // bka' stsal pa/ gdug pa thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po'i don zhus khyod legs so// gang phyir gdug pa 'dul ba'i thabs// de phyir/
347b1(chi): khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// drag po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// ske tshe dug dang shang tshe dang // rkang rjes khrag dang dri chu rnams// gang
347b2(chi): yin gzugs su byas nas ni// shing shun dag la ming rus bri// snying kar gru gsum rab brus nas// bcug ste gan rkyal dag tu mnan// mdun du dgug pa'i cho ga bya//
347b3(chi): ljags las byas pa'i phur pa la// khro bo bcur byin brlabs dbang bsgyur nas// gnas bcur gdab pa brtsam par bya// de nas ral gris gtub pa dang // gtun du
347b4(chi): brdungs nas las rnams bya// khro tshogs kun gyis sgrol bar byed// rig sngags sgrol ba'i cho ga ni// bsgral bya mnan dang de bzhin du// bzlog pa'i cho ga de bzhin no//
347b5(chi): mnan pa bcad pa dkyil 'khor 'og/ gru gsum dug gis byugs pa'i nang // zhing spags ming rus bris te gzhug/ rabs chang thod pas steng nas mnan// phur bu sogs
347b6(chi): pa'i bar du gang ba// yang nA nas dang sran ma tsam// dra bo nang ngan khrag dang bsres// gnod pa'i phyogs su gtor bar bya// lha gdon bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// shing shun
347b7(chi): dag la ming rus bri// brgya byin phur pas gdab par bya// me lha la sogs gdab par bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bur pa las/ drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bcu
348a1(chi): pa'o// rnga de nas khro bo rta mgrin ni// langs te thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// bsam gtan dbang du gyur pa yi// sngags
348a2(chi): lnga gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid nges pa mi 'grub pas// sngags kyi nges pa bshad du gsol// de naso bdag po bcom ldan 'das// kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed
348a3(chi): kyis// rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs// so so'i rigs kyi bdag pos byas// shAn ting ku ru hUM swA hA/ buSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ pa shang ku ru pa na hri/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/
348a4(chi): A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ dz+nyA na a yu She hUM a/ gu h+ya bo d+hi satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ rat+na ma ma ki A/ A ka ra Sha ya hUM a/ sarba pA paM de ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ hu lu bany+dza hu lu bany+dza/ rat+na ku ru
348a5(chi): ban hUM phaT/ oM A be sha A pre shwa/ to pA yA to pA yA/ rA rA rA rA/ tsa li ha tsa le ha/ hUM A ta dz+nyAM sA hA/ pradz+nyA ka ra ku ru hUM a/ ha sa ya na ha sa ya na hUM phaT/ mu khaM ku ru mu rma/
348a6(chi): ku ru ban da ya hUM phaT+Ta/ kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT/ phaT na ma swa man ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta yA g+hA ta yA sarba duSh+TAn bi g+ha naM hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la ya
348a7(chi): sarba pA pan hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM hU~M badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra na kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gsang sngags kyi
348b1(chi): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen pos rdo rje srin mo bkol ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// ma mo bkol ba'i che ga mi
348b2(chi): rabs chang thod pa rlon pa ru// dmigs pa ming rus bcug gyur nas// thod skam klang la bskor zhing brdeg/ dang por las de ma grub na// de ni klu yi khang par gzhug
348b3(chi): khang par zla ba gsum bcug pas// de ni myur du las 'grub 'gyur// zlog dbab pa'i cho ga la// yungs kar dang ni yungs nag dang // ske tshe shang tshe lan tshwa rnams//
348b4(chi): bdud rgyu dus kyi nyi ma la// brtags nas dri bo'i khrag gis sgra// sran ma'i tshad tsam byas gyur nas// rabs chang thod par legs gzhag ste// nyi ma bdun du bzlas brjod
348b5(chi): bya/ de nas lung gsum mdo la sogs// klu yod chu mig nang du mnan// des ni ser ba rgyun du 'byung // yang na bdud rgyu'i dus dag tu// de ni dug la bsreg par bya//
348b6(chi): ngos ni thog mar 'ong bar 'gyur// gzhan sbyor bzlog pa'i cho ga ni// gro ga dang ni shin shun la// sbyor ba mkhan gyi ming rus bri// bkug 'gyur lus la phur pas gdag/
348b7(chi): de yi sbyor bas ma bzlog na// drag po'i me la bsregs gyur nas// thal ba dri bo'i khrag dang bsre// sran ma tsam pa legs byas te// gzugs bcas de la brdegs
349a1(chi): pa dang / gang gnod phyogs su 'phang ba dang // rgya mtsho'i phyogs su bskur bar bya// khyad par mnan pa'i las dag ni// klu yod chu
349a2(chi): mig nang drag tu// shing shun dag la ming rus bri// rta mgrin sbyor bas las byas na// las de myur du 'grub par 'gyur// drag po'i lha yi gnas dag tu// glo shun/
349a3(chi): ngag la ming rus bri// rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyor ba yis// las byas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// me yi phyogs su bsregs pa la// drug gi me la rab bskams te/
349a4(chi): dbyug sngon sbyor bas las byas te// bsreg pa'i 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin// gshin rje dbang ba'i gnas dag tu// zhing lpags dag la ming rus bri// gshin rje'i sbyor
349a5(chi): bas las byas na// las de myur du 'grub par 'gyur// srin po gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// thod tshal dag la ming rus bri// mi g.yo mgon gyi sbyor ba yis// las
349a6(chi): byas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rlung lha gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// zangs kyi gab tsher ming rus bri// 'dod pa'i rgyal pos las byas na// las de myur du 'grub par
349a7(chi): 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// dmigs pa gang yin ro ras la// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis// las byas myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
349b1(chi): khams gsum rgyal la phyag byas te// bgegs bzlog cho ga byas gyur na// zlog par 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin// gang zhig las 'di la gnas na// zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs
349b2(chi): pathams cad thams cad ci 'dod pa// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ las kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste
349b3(chi): bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed chen pos drag po 'phro ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
349b4(chi): zhugs te/ rdo rje drag po gsang ba zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya bi sha staM b+ha yi bi sha staM b+ha ya/ mo ha yA
349b5(chi): myo ha yA/ rak+Sha tsa pa ya rak+Sha tsa pa ya/ mug ti thi ya hUM a/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ gardza gardza ya hUM phaT/ hUM pa ra bid d+ha na/
349b6(chi): chen rna tshon d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hi na da b+hinA da hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ han ha na hU~M phaT/ ta tha ya na ta tha ya na hUM phaT/ ha sa ya na ha sa ya na hUM phaT/ krI kr-i A na ya hUM phaT/
349b7(chi): la ba ma dz+wal pa ya hU~M phaT/ a be sha ya~M a ba sha ya~M hU~M laT/ b+hin da d+hin da hU~M Ta/ hra lu hu lu hU phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M baT/ spoT sto Ta hU~M phaT/ oM sr-ib+ha ne su~M d+ha hUM pha/
350a1(chi): gr-ih+NA hUM phaT/ grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ a na ya ho b+ha ga ban bi d+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ rdo rje gsung gi ting 'dzin gyis// 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba las/
350a2(chi): lcags kyu can la sogs pa yis// myur du 'gugs dang 'ching ba dang // de bzhin brdeg pa la sogs byed// gang zhig gsang ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yi las la khyab par
350a3(chi): gsungs// deng nas brtsams te rnal 'byor pas// khro bo bcu ru byin brlabs te// khro bo rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu lung ston dngos grub 'byung // rgyud kyi rgyal
350a4(chi): po rdo rje phur pa las/ drag po'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen pos nor bu 'phro ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya
350a5(chi): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u 'di gsungs so// kye ma 'o bde gshegs snying po'i mchog/ gang tshe gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i mchog/ ngas
350a6(chi): ni khyod la bshad par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bde gshegs spong len mi bya'o// yang dag lung ston slob dpon la// bsnyes par mi bya shin tu bkur/
350a7(chi): tha mal pa yi lus ngag yid// rdo rje gsung gi sku ru bsam// rtag tu rang gi mched lcam la// sgo gsum nyes med bkur bar bya// rtag tu gsung ba'i man ngagra mchog
350b1(chi): snod med rnams la bstan mi bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dang ni dmar rtsi dang // de bzhin dri chen sha chen dang // dri chul
350b2(chi): sogs mi spang ngo // rtag tu stong gsum 'jig rten khams// lha dang lha mo sgyu mar brtag/ de bzhin rnam dag rang bzhin med// 'di ni rgyal ba kun gyi gter// rnal 'byor
350b3(chi): dras ni bstan par bya// rtag tu bud med sbyor la bstan// dus su brtan gyi gzhan du min// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// sdom pa 'dri ni bstan par bya// gang
350b4(chi): zhig dam tshig las 'das na// rtag tu mnar med skye ba dang // ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// de srid sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // dam tshig rtag tu bsrungs gyur na//
350b5(chi): dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // khro bo khro mo pho nya'i tshogs// phyag brnyan bka' nyan la sogs pa// rtag tu bde ba skyed par 'gyur// gsang ba'i dam tshig nor bu'i
350b6(chi): tshul/ rnal 'byor pa la bde ba ster// gang zhig rnal 'byor bde ba che// byang chub sems ni gsang ba'i dam// 'da' bar mi mdzad thar pa'i mchog/ gang zhig gsang chen
350b7(chi): bde ba che// rnal 'byor pa ni dpal dang ldan// nyams na bskang ba'i cho ga ni// snod chen nyi shu rtsa lnga'i nang // bdud rtsi sha dang bcas pa yis// gang 'gyur gsum gyi sbyor
351a1(chi): ba bya/ bdag dang khams gsum thams cad kun// gcig tu brtags nas gsum la mchod// sdig skyong cho ga'i las rnams kyis// rtag tu
351a2(chi): nyams pa skong bar byed// ma nyams don la rab 'jug na// rtag tu yang dag don la gnas// des ni nyams pa skong bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po
351a3(chi): rdo rje phur pa las/ bsrung ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed chen pos yongs su tshim par
351a4(chi): byed pa'i N+Di zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sa// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// smod pa yongs su spyod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di
351a5(chi): gsungs so// rtag tu rang gnas rnal 'byor pas// 'dod pa lnga ni bsten par bya// dkar dmar ser dang ljang ku dngo // de bzhin gzugs mdzes sna tshogs pa//
351a6(chi): rnal 'byor mig gis bsten par bya// dung dang gling bu 'khar ba'i rnga// zin dang ma zin la sogs pa// rnal 'byor rna bas bsten par bya// tsan dAn ga pur gla rtsi dang /
351a7(chi): de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun// rnal 'byor sna yis bsten par bya// ka ra bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // de bzhin yid 'ong ro rnams kun// lce yi dbang pos bsten par bya//
351b1(chi): 'jam pa'i reg bya yid 'ong ba// kha drog dbyibs su ldan pa rnams// lus kyi dbang pos bsten par bya// 'dod pa lnga la rtag gnas nas// rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar
351b2(chi): 'gyur/ yang na spyod pa dga' ba yis// btsun mo mtshan ldan legs mdzes ma// brgya rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu gnyis// gcig bcas rnal 'byor la gnas na// rdo rje bran
351b3(chi): yis legs mtshon te// ci bde 'dod pa lnga la spyod// yang dag rnal 'byor pa yi rgya// gar mkhan tshul du rab sbyor bas// rdo rje 'gying tshul sbyor ba bya// bslab pa dam chi
351b4(chi): la gnas na// rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa bsten// ci 'dod yul la gnyis kas spyod// rtag tu 'bar ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde gshegs byang chub sems phab ste// rang
351b5(chi): lus bde ba chen pos rgyas// gnas gzhir bde ba bzhir skyes pas// de ni mngon par sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskyod pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// bde ba chen po'i phyag
351b6(chi): rgya brnyes// de don bden pa'i phyag rgya can// rtag tu yang dag bde ba thob// de bzhin rgyal ba dbugs phyung ba// sna tshogs don dang rab tu ldan// ces gsungs so//
351b7(chi): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ gsang ba bde ba spyod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan 'jigs byeng che// gar sbyar rdo rje sbyor
352a1(chi): ba yis/ rnal 'byor pa ni rtag gnas nas// legs sbyangs pa yi btsun mo dang // lhan cig rnal 'byor yum la spyod// glang chen rta dang ba glang
352a2(chi): khyi de bzhin mi dang rnam pa lnga'i// sha lnga rnal 'byor pa yis bskyed// de bzhin bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// bcu gcig pa ni yang dag ldan// rnal 'byor pas ni de longs
352a3(chi): spyod bde ba chen po'i lus bskyed pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// mchod pa'i sprin lding 'od zer 'phro// rtag tu mnyes pa'i sbyor ba ldan// rnal
352a4(chi): 'byor snying gi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'khor lo gzhal yas stong // yi ge hUM gis legs bskul te// 'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya// yi ge oM las legs byung ba'i//
352a5(chi): 'od kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kun// bdag lus dbang po'i tshogs la 'bul// yi ge A las legs byung ba'i// kA pa la yi sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa ni grol
352a6(chi): bar 'gyur// yang na rdo rje'i phyag rgya can// yan lag thams cad rdo rje tshe// spyi gtsug rdo rje hUM ka ra// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba'o// mgrin par rta mgrin rgyal
352a7(chi): po ste/ lag g.yas khams gsum rnam par rgyal// g.yon par dbyug pa sngon po ste// snying kar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gnas// lte bar gshin rje gshed po ste// rkang
352b1(chi): g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yon pa mi g.yo mgon po bsam// gsang bar khro bo stobs po che// rdo rje khro bo chen po rnams// lhag pa rna ba sna dang lce// mkhal
352b2(chi): ma pus mo bshang ba'i lam// rkang mthil rtse mo sgal tshigs su// so so'i mtshan mas gdab par bya// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kun// za byed dang ni gsod byed dang //
352b3(chi): rdo rje sras mchog tshogs kyis brgyan// yang nA 'dod pa'i gzhal yas su// lnga bcu gnyis rang bzhi bcu gnyis// bcu gcig pa ni yang dag ldan// so so'i dkyil 'khor
352b4(chi): gyis brgyan// rnal 'byor pa ni der gnas na// sgrib pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
352b5(chi): dpal ldan 'jigs byed che// sreg byed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sreg byed dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa
352b6(chi): la/ drag po'i khrag gis legs smras te// gla rul bya bsams na myur du 'chi// baM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sreg byed dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// til
352b7(chi): mar 'o ma la sogs pa// sbyor ba'i don la dmigs pas 'grub// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sreg byed dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// rak+ta mtshal la sogs
353a1(chi): pa la/ bsdu ba'i don la dmigs pas 'grub// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sreg byed dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// ba pra dang ni ldong
353a2(chi): ros dang // nor bu'i sbyor bas dmigs pa 'grub// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhir bltas// tshad med bzhi yi bsam gtan gyis// las rnams thogs pa med
353a3(chi): par 'grub// sreg byed rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya lnga yi bdag nyid kyis// snying kar 'khor lo bkod gyur nas// zas la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya// gsang
353a4(chi): ba yum gyi ha~M khung du// byang chub snod can lha gzhag ste// byang chub rdo rjes mchod gyur na// chags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// skye 'gag med pa'i ha~M khung du/
353a5(chi): rtog pa dang bral ye shes kyis// rnam par rtog pa kun bsregs nas// mtshan bral dngos grub thob par 'gyur// me la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thabs gzhan
353a6(chi): med cing 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ me'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// /
353a7(chi): de nas dpal ldan 'jigs byed che// de nyid bdag po bcom ldan 'das// gsang ba bdag la legs gnas te// rtag tu sgrol ba'i las byas nas// de nyid gsang /
353b1(chi): ba'i don 'di gsungs// gang phyir dpal ldan sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las de dag nyid// sgrol chen khro bo chen po'i mchog/ yon tan sgrol byed sku gsung thugs//
353b2(chi): ma lus don byed gsang ba'i badrag/ 'da' bar mi mdzad mthu chen yin// de nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// langs te thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// gang tshe bcom ldan de
353b3(chi): nyid sku// kha dog med cing dbyibs dang bral// dngos med dngos po sa bon med// don bral dpag med brjod las 'das// gsang ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo//
353b4(chi): yon tan kun ldan phyag 'tshal lo// bde don bdud rtsi phyag 'tshal lo// mi rtog brjod med phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod do// de nas gtso bo 'jigs byed che// yon tan
353b5(chi): rjod byed don 'di gsungs// ngas smras rdo rje phur pa'i rgyud// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud ces bya// gdul bya'i srog len de yi phyir// gsang ba srog len rgyud ces bya//
353b6(chi): yon tan mdzod dang dpal 'dzin dang // sgrol byed rgyun du yang dag bstan// ngas smras don 'di yid la zung // zhes gsungs ma thog tu// 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor
353b7(chi): thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste
354a1(chi): bcwo brgyad pa'o// // rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phur pa zhes bya ba/ drag po'i las kyi rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// /
354a2(chi): / slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi phyag dpe las/ bod kyi lo tsA ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// /
354a3(chi): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya sprin dza ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa
354a4(chi): thams cad kyi sras/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen
354a5(chi): po badz+ra kI lA ya dang / kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo nga tsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga la yid kun tu bzang po ye shes 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med
354a6(chi): par lhun gyis grub par gnas par bzhugs so// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i nang nas/ bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya bzhengs nas/ chos nyid zhi bas
354a7(chi): 'dul bas skabs la ma bab ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang ma bral/ mtshan ma can la zhe na chags pas/ gdug pa can dregs pa can du smin te sems can thams cad la
354b1(chi): gnod 'tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod pa thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir ro// mi g.yo ba rab tu drag po'i dpung rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
354b2(chi): snyoms par zhugs te/ thabs mkhas pa'i drug po'i 'phrin las kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ sku rab tu khros pa mi bzad pa brtan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs
354b3(chi): las gsang sngags 'di byung / oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA nA baM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas nas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sprul lo//
354b4(chi): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / dri za dang /
354b5(chi): 'byung po dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / lha chen po dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams thams cad gti mug gi dbang
354b6(chi): gis las rgyu 'bras kyi don ma rtogs shing / mtshan ma med pa dang ma bral/ mtshan ma can la mngon par chags pas/ ngan song gsum du'ang bskal pa mang por sdug
354b7(chi): bsngal zhing / mi bde ba mang po nyams su myong zhing / las kyi 'bras bu las kyi srin por skyes nas/ rgyu 'thun pa'i dbang gis shin tu 'jigs shing rngam pa dang /
355a1(chi): mi sdug pa dang / dri nga ba dang // dregs pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs su byung nas/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid/ mdangs
355a2(chi): kyi'aphrog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ bred skad 'don par byed/ yid mi bde ba mang po bgyid// 'khrug par byed/ mya ngan du byed/ srog dang bral bar byed/ 'joms par
355a3(chi): byed pa rnams la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur to// dbu dgu pa/ phyag bco brgyad pa/ zhabs bgrang / spyan bzlog/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ sku gsung thugs mi bzad pa cig tu
355a4(chi): gyur to/ gsang ba'i sngags bcu gnyis phyung nas kyang / sbyang bsgyur ye shes kyi cho 'phrul du gyur to// nyid kyi sku las dI p+ta tsa kra zhes 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma g.yon phyogs su
355a5(chi): thon no/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ sras mchog rdo rje tho ba lcags kyu grangs med pas/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dza dza hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ti ra bi kI la ya/
355a6(chi): song chom/ btogs/ thabs shes rab las/ cha 'dzin nyi shu byung / de las cha 'dzin grangs med pa byung ste/ gdug pa can bsgral te/ rtsa ba dbyings dang / ye shes cha 'dzin nyi
355a7(chi): shu byung / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyi shu byung / de las byang chub kyi sems grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ste/ yid la dran pa'i snying po
355b1(chi): brjod pa tsam gyis/ nyi zer la ser ba babs pa bzhin du/ sprul pa'i sku byung ste/ bdags shing bsgral lo// de nas 'jigs byed dregs pa'i bdag po rgya mtsho tsam zhal du
355b2(chi): rngubs so// de nas badz+ra ki la ya'i 'od zer lus la bstim pa la/ bsgral 'bog bcom pa brgyal ba sangs te dran pa rnyed de badz+ra kI lA ya'i yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong ngo //
355b3(chi): de'i gdug can dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par bcug pa de'i tshe de'i dus su/ phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi khro bo dang // dbyings dang khro mo las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
355b4(chi): su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ gti mug byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i byin rlabs las/ karma shri he ru ka zhes pas/
355b5(chi): khro bo karma he ru ka/ sku ldang nag/ sku gsung thugs nyid las mi gzhan pa 'thon to// thugs ka nas kyang sras mchog stod zhal gsum phyag drug la/ smad lcags phur zur gsum
355b6(chi): pa grangs med pa 'thon no// sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rjes su dran nas gdug pa can tshar gcad do// des 'jigs byed chen po
355b7(chi): dang / khro bo rnams kyi lus gdan du phul lo// yid phyi rabs kyi rjes su 'jug gi tshogs dang / grogs dang / chos skyong ba'i bsrung mar dam bcas te/ rgyal po btson du
356a1(chi): bzung nas dmangs cha ma la phebs te/ dbang med dad pas bsdus pas 'khor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
356a2(chi): kI la yA bcu gnyis kyi tan+ta las/ gleng gzhi'i lce'u m+me dang po'o// de nas kar+m+ma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das gas phreng chen po la 'din/
356a3(chi): ces gsol to// e ma ha~M/ bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// dbyung thag chad pa'i blo ngan 'khor ba la// thugs rjes gzung nas cho 'phrul bstan pa 'ang // 'di lta bu yi rdzu 'phrul
356a4(chi): ngo mtshar che// de yi rjes su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de ltar de bzhin yang dag don// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ de nas kI
356a5(chi): la ya'i bdag pos/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
356a6(chi): rnams/ yang dag don ni ngas bstan gyis// gsang sngags yang dag don dam ni// theg pa gsum ni rgyab kyis phyogs// skal pa chung ba snod med de// dka' thub bsdams
356a7(chi): shing dam tshig med// don gyi gsang sngags ming du mi bsgrag cing // nye lam gol te don las 'gyang // e ma ho rgyud 'di rtogs par dka'// bsam pas mchog tu gyur
356b1(chi): pa'o// dbyings nyid rig pa rgyun mi gcad// rtog pa bor ba'i pha rol na// rtog med btsal bas mi rnyed pas// rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med la// yang dag don gyi snying po
356b2(chi): ni/ bde bar gshegs pas ma gzigs so// kun kyang byang chub snying po bas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// rnam par
356b3(chi): shes pas rdo rjer sgom// de bzhin nyid ni brdal ba'o// stong nyid ye shes dag pa la// gzugs sku rnam gnyis byin rlabs can// 'di ni rang bzhin dag pa'o//
356b4(chi): 'di ni don dam nas bsngags te// don dam blo yi spyod yul min// rang bzhin gnod min gsang bas grub// sangs rgyas phyir slad mi re bas// snga ma sbyang ba'i mkhyen
356b5(chi): rabs can// rang la sangs rgyas ye shes rtogs// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus// thabs mang thabs mkhas thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du//
356b6(chi): gsung sngags 'ba' sha smin thA dang // rdo rje khros pa zhes sogs nas// mthar gnas thugs kyi sa bon par dag gis// rnal 'byor dgongs don blang bar bya// yang dag
356b7(chi): dbyig gi gter brus la// zhing rab zhing la sa bon gdab// glen pa'i brtul zhugs drag po dang // 'bu su ka yi spyod pa yis// bden rdzun le lo re dogs dang // the tshom
357a1(chi): med na kun gyis 'grub// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// re re la yang
357a2(chi): gsum gsum mo// ma dang bu mo chung ma dang // rab tu brgyan pa dag dang ni// drag snyan tshig mtshon ma shor ba// snod ngan gsang ba mi sprul pa// sems skyed nga rgyal ma yengs
357a3(chi): pa/ gsang sngags dam las mi 'da' bas// don dam sems skyed srog dang mi 'bral ba// brdzun tshig brlang po smra ba dang // sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags/
357a4(chi): zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang // mangs zil pas brgyan par bya'o// don dam kun rdzob phyin ci log/ gnang bkag gnyis
357a5(chi): ni bder gsungs pa// rgyu dang lung dang man ngag dang // rab 'bring gsum du bshad par bya// thugs sku mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yi// snang ba ye shes cho 'phrul
357a6(chi): gsum gyis sbyangs// phyi nang ye shes cho 'phrul gsum gyis sbyangs// phyi nang ye shes rtog pa gzhil bar 'gyur// a hUM r-i yaM khaM/ e yaM ra su ke ban d+ha b+h+rUM/ raM khro bo'i
357a7(chi): dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni// zhing khams 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rgyas 'debs ma// hUM kA ra dang sgra 'byin ma// rnam par
357b1(chi): rgyal dang rnams snyems ma// dbyug pa sngon po ster mo dang // gshin rje gshed po dur khrod ma// mi g.yo mgon po gtun lung ma// rta mgrin rgyal po gtum mo ma/
357b2(chi): gzhan gyis mi thub mnga' skems ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rlung 'byin ma// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod mA dang // stobs po che dang bskyod ma dang // gnyis su med
357b3(chi): pa'i sprul pa 'phra men dang // phag mgo g.yag mgo stag mgo dang // sha ba gzig dang byi la'i mgo/ spyang mo'i mgo dang seng ge'i mgo/ dred mo dom gyi mgo ru bstan//
357b4(chi): snyigs bu bya rog bya rgod mgo/ 'ug pa khA ta pu shud mgo/ khra yi mgo dang pha wang mgo/ zer mo'i mgo dang byi ba'i mgo/ yang sprul sum sprul grangs med kyi// srid pa
357b5(chi): rlung gis mi 'chor gtams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs/ kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las/ yang dag pa'i don gyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste
357b6(chi): gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos rdo rje gsang sngags drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsung
357b7(chi): so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rjes 'jug rnams// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub
358a1(chi): sems// 'di skad de bzhin mi shigs pa// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig can// phyogs bcu dus gsum rang bzhin dag/ de bzhin
358a2(chi): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang gi rtog pa tha rgyas kyis// so sor smin cing sdug bsngal ba// grol bar bya phyir zla med nams// brtan phyir rdzogs lung sprul pas mdzad/
358a3(chi): 'og min btsun mo b+ha ga nas// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba bzhengs// mgon po bdag nyid chen po pa// rdo rje gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor// ljags kyi dbang po bkram
358a4(chi): nas ni/ kun gyi don du gsungs pa 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnal 'byor rjes 'jug brtan por gzung //
358a5(chi): nam mkha' mtha' med chos dbyings gzhal yas khang // thigs pa lta bur snang srid dngos med shwar// srog sems go ru rdo rje gzhon nur shar// snang srid phung po rdo rje yang dag
358a6(chi): gtams// gsang sngags don gyi dang po la// dkyus tshig 'bru tshig don tshig dang // dkyus tshig gnyis dang 'bra tshig dgu// don tshig brgyad dang man ngag ni// rin chen dag la
358a7(chi): bri bar bya// dang po gnyis med byang sems ldan// gnyis pas rigs ni so sor bstan// gsum pa drag po 'dzab dgongs bstan// bzhi pa sku gsung thugs su bstan//
358b1(chi): don de shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bzlas pa'i las la 'jug par bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya
358b2(chi): hUM.oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dan+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a
358b3(chi): mr-i ta kun+d+ha li hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza yA hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM ti pa ta tsakra hA na hA na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sha ya bya ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi lA
358b4(chi): s+ye mu kha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tra tre dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI rta na ba tI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI dza la ti ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI dza ya hi hi hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sha ya ti hUM
358b5(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ba ya be hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma ra na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tsun+da de hUM phaT/ gardza gardza phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ban d+ha
358b6(chi): ban d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshan d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ badz+ra u ka mu kha he/ badz+ra byA g+h+ri mu kha he/ badz+ra tsa re
358b7(chi): sa mu kha he/ badz+ra ha ri mu kha he/ badz+ra bya ri mu kha he/ badz+ra tsa la mu kha he/ badz+ra shA na mu kha he/ badz+ra sing nga mu kha he/ badz+ra sha ta mu kha he/ badz+ra rak+Sha mu kha hi/ badz+ra sha mu kha he/
359a1(chi): badz+ra gri D+ha mu kha he/ badz+ra kA kA mu kha he/ badz+ra hu lu ka mu kha he/ badz+ra ba ya ta mu kha he/ badz+ra bi sha mu kha he/ badz+ra tsa ta ka mu kha he/ badz+ra ni ku la mu
359a2(chi): kha hebadz+rA ti ti mu kha he/ badz+ra ka si ka mu kha he/ sUr+ya tsan dra ye/ in drA ya/ ag nA ye/ ya ma ye/ ni ri ti/ ba ru Na/ ba ya be/ ku be rA/ in drA ya/ u ti shan te/
359a3(chi): ti ra bAM/ oM Adz+dza hUM a mr-i ta/ kuN+Da li hUM/ na ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta la kha hi/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya/ oM rat+na kI li kI la ya/ oM pad+ma
359a4(chi): kI li kI la ya/ oM karma kI li kI la ya/ sum b+ha ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ b+ha ga bAn/ bi d+yA rA dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI la kI la ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/
359a5(chi): / prapra dz+wa la pra dzA la sarba na sa pa ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba duSh+TAn bag hri sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ tshan d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya
359a6(chi): sarba duSh+TA nA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya pu ru pu ru u tsum+b+ha ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ bing bid hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kri li kI la ya a tshu sha tshin d+ha tshin d+hu hUM
359a7(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya kro d+ha mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI la ya/ na ma sa man+ta bi shud re be ra be ra hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha ga ban/ shi kri bi
359b1(chi): kri shrI badz+ra hUM kA ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya dza hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nAn/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ hUM kA ra hUM a/ hUM pa ra si ta d+ya hUM phaT/
359b2(chi): tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gri h+Na gr-i hA hUM phaT/ ha na ha ni hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+hi hUM phaT/ ta thA ga tA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra na da ha ta na hUM phaT/ shi trin a na ya
359b3(chi): hUM phaT/ dz+wA la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bid da ya bid drA ya hUM phaT/ oM nA ma sa nam ta/ kA ya bag tsit+ta badz+ra nAn/ grA g+ha g+hA ta ya/ sarba dun phaT/
359b4(chi): kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big b+ha/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ shAn taM ku ru ye swA hA/ puSh+TiM ku ru ye swA hA/
359b5(chi): ba shang ku ru ye sA hA/ mA ra ya ku ru ye swA hA/ Tak+ki raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ kro d+ha raM dz+wa la kha raM khA hi/ ha la raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ raM raM NaM shaM dzA la raM kha hi/ yo gi kha raM dz+wa la raM kha hi/ e h+ye hi b+ha
359b6(chi): ga ba na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka tri sha/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ a a badz+ra sa man ta b+ha dra hUM/ badz+ra ban da a yu a/ badz+ra pra be sha ya/ A
359b7(chi): be sha ya a a/ ha na ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+re/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ ka tang ka tang badz+ra/ dza ye bi dza ye/
360a1(chi): a tsi te/ a pa rA tsi te/ ma ra sa ra pra ma ra da ni ye hUM phaT/ hUM ma ma ni ku mra rtam bya// ka ra i nan/ darti ma ma karma/ shri krang ka re ye/ sarba a na ya/
360a2(chi): hU~M phaT/ ta tha ya tA ya hUM phaT/ kha thaM Sha thaM lathaM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra sak+Sha kro d+hA khA hi ShA hrI/ ha ha ha/ hU~M hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM phaT hUM phaT hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/
360a3(chi): phaT phaT phaT/ nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag gsang sngags 'di/ rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa'i sgrol ba'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig e ka ni// oM na ma gsang
360a4(chi): sngags kyis// phyogs bcu bde gshegs thugs kyi gsang sngags kyis// byin brlabs chos nyid bden pa'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis/
360a5(chi): gdug pa'i lus ngag yid gsum snying kha bsnun pa'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig tri yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i dbang po 'du rten klad pa brgya tshal 'gas
360a6(chi): pa'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig tsA ri gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa thams cad dbang po rnam shes bsdams shing sgrol ba'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus
360a7(chi): tshig pany+tsa'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i snying nas 'debs par byed pa'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo'i dkyus tshig tsha'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa thams cad rtsa sbubs
360b1(chi): btsir zhing khrag skyugs sgrol ba'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig tsit+ta'i gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi gsang sngags dbang du bsdus nas gnyis med 'debs
360b2(chi): pa'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo dkyus tshig rtsi'i gsang sngags kyis// tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid thugs kyi dngos grub rgyas pa'i mthu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs
360b3(chi): dkyus tshig du wa'i gsang sngags kyis/ gdug pa thams cad dbang med 'chir ba'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo'i dkyus chog shrin dza'i gsang sngags kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
360b4(chi): grub thob pa'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo dkyus tshig sprin dza e ka'i gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje phur pa gzi byin bskyed cing dbang du bsdus nas sgrol ba'i mthu// bdud kyi bdud
360b5(chi): chen gdugs kyi yum bzhi'i gsang sngags 'di// 'phrin las dkyus tshig a ka'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa 'gugs shing yan lag gnon pa'i mthu// 'phrin las/
360b6(chi): dkyus tshig ra'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i dbang po bcing zhing gnon pa'i mthu// 'phrin las dkyus tshig tri'i gsang sngags kyis// rnam shes sdom zhing gnon
360b7(chi): pa'i mthu// 'phrin las dkyus tshis tsa ri'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i gzugs dpung rdul du brlag cing mnan pa'i mthu// 'phrin las dkyus tshig pany+tsa'i
361a1(chi): gsang sngags kyis// bcom ldan bdud ba dag bka' bsgo nyan pa'i mthu// 'phrin las dkyus tshig tsha'i gsang sngags kyis// khro rgyal byin rlabs
361a2(chi): mi g.yo ba'i sngags// dbang du bsdus nas drag tu mnan sgrol mthu// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad po//
361a3(chi): g.yas pa dgu ni za byed dgu// g.yon pa dgu ni gsod byed dgu// 'phra men phyag nas 'od zer 'phro// shin tu mi srun gtum bag can// snang ba'i dug lnga rab tu 'bar// kI
361a4(chi): ya'i sgra sgrogs pas/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// shin tu rab tu g.yos so// g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can thams cad brgyal ba sangs nas rab
361a5(chi): tu skrag par gyur nas/ 'jigs byed chen po'i bdud dag gis// zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas// skyabs su gsol te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras te// rdo rje
361a6(chi): bdud bdag 'jigs byed kyi// phur pa'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar// khro bo'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// 'jigs tshul 'chang ba'i khyad par can// dbu mangs rtsub pa'i sgra sgrogs
361a7(chi): shing // phyag mang 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// 'jig rten khams kun ngas bkang nas// khro gnyer zhal gangangs ngar skad kyis// 'jig rten khams kun 'brug stong
361b1(chi): sgrogs// rgod dang gshe dang za byed pa// don dang rtags dang ldan pa yis// 'bar ba'i rgyan cha mtshon cha 'chang // bskal pa zhig pa'i srid rtse 'bar// 'jig rten thal
361b2(chi): bar brlag mdzad pa// dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi// bdud bdag khyod la skyabs su mchi// khro rgyal khyod la skyabs su mchi// thugs rje chen pos gzung du gsol//
361b3(chi): nan tan thugs rjes ma gzung na// mgo dang lus kyang gas su bgyis// me lce 'phreng bas sreg par bgyid// de phyir bdag cag thugs rjes gzung // zhes dregs pa can
361b4(chi): rnams 'thun par skyabs su gsol nas/ ma dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bran mo dang / ril phul te sras su gsol te/ gdan dang grogs skyong ste/ chos skyong ba'i
361b5(chi): bsrung mar dbang med dad pas bsdus so// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// kun la khyab pa ma yin no// srog dron bka' dam las
361b6(chi): kyis nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// 'di bdun spang ste yang dag don// bsgrubs na nges par 'grub pa'o// srog lA nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni//
361b7(chi): pha dang ma ni slob dpon stsogs// 'gal bas bsgral ba dam par bshad// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba la sogs smra zhing spel// bka' las nyams
362a1(chi): pa 'di lta ste// skur 'debs log par 'khrid la sogs// sbyor sgrol la sogs gsang ba rnams// mngon du byed pa dam pas 'dus// ya ka
362a2(chi): la sogs sku la bsngo// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pa// las kyis nyams pa dbang med bsgral// skye ba med pa'i chos bshad kyang // mtshan ma'i chos la zhen pa
362a3(chi): sgrogs// mtshan ma nyams te shin tu bsgral// rtag tu zhen chags zas la sogs// 'dod pas nyams te bsgul ba yi// de nas kI la ya'i bdag po la/ 'khor rnams
362a4(chi): kyis mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ kI la ya yi bdag po lags// bsgral ma bsgral gyi skyon yon ji ltar lags// de dag bsgral na rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams btu
362a5(chi): nas bstan pa nyan// med par bsgral na bar chad nyung // ma bsgral skyon ni dmyal khams 'phel// ma btul bar chad bsam mi khyab// chos nyid bden pa'i gsang
362a6(chi): sngags byin rlabs dang // thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas mthu yis ni// a bi tsaR+Ya nan pa 'di kho na'o// zhes kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+ta las/ rdo rje gsang sngags drag po'i
362a7(chi): le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas 'jigs byed chen po rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rtags kyi
362b1(chi): dam pas bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho rigs kyi khyad par n+dan// byang chub sems kyi phur pa la// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo khyud
362b2(chi): bcas/ shel gyi dkyil 'khor bcas pa la// bdud kyi bdud bdag khro bo rnams// rgyas 'debs la sogs khro bo rnams// stag g.yag la sogs za byed tshogs//
362b3(chi): gsod byed la sogs 'phra men tshogs// lcags kyu la sogs dam la btags// gzhal yas khang gi sgo gnas so// lho nub ho lnga yang dog la// phyi nang gsang ba'i ho shing
362b4(chi): la bsreg rdzas rnams dang brnag pa'o// shwar lhor 'phrin las dkyil 'khor// mda' bcu ltas ngan sgo bzhi la// khro bcu'i snying po gsal bris la// thun khung phur bdun
362b5(chi): skyer mda' gzhug/ nub byang thod pa'i gnan dkyil 'khor// gnAn phur brgya ni rtsa brgyad de// gru gsum e la thun du drabab// byang shar brnag pa bsgral dkyil 'khor//
362b6(chi): gru gsum bang rim gnyis pa 'gyur// nag pa'i rnam shes dgug pastim bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la
362b7(chi): bab/ chos skyong dam can dus la bab// bran dang pho nya de bzhin bskul// sngon du bskal ba nyams pa bdun// sngags dang ting 'dzin 'phrin las gsum// dkyus dang
363a1(chi): sbyar la gdab par bya// rab 'bring gsum gyi rtags byung na// dam tshig drug gi dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus
363a2(chi): gsum rgyal ba'i gdung sob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing
363a3(chi): 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul bzhin bshig nas kyang //
363a4(chi): sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// dkar nag mtshams kyi gnad chen la// so sor gdab dang dril la gdab// dgug cing gdab dang bsreg pa'o// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon
363a5(chi): spyod dang // dri dang so yi cho ga 'o// zlog dang re re drug drug go/ zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa// lha rnams 'khor bcas sman drangs te// mchod rdzas thams cad dkar
363a6(chi): por bya/ sngags dang ting 'dzin 'phrin las rnams// bsgoms na thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// thog med bsags pa'i sdig sgrib dang // gdug pa can gyi dgra bgegs
363a7(chi): rnams/ thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhi ba'i las zhes bya// dkyil 'khor hom khung zlum po la// rdo rje pad+mo brgyan par bya'o// bsreg rdzas dkar por mchod
363b1(chi): byas nas// lha rnams 'khor bcas zhi bar 'gyur// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu// rnam rtog sems 'khrugs zhi bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhi ba'i hom zhes bya//
363b2(chi): dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur zlazlu ma// khong ser byang sems gzhal yas khang // logs la zhi ba'i lha bsgoms la// btab pas thams
363b3(chi): cad zhi bar 'gyur// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// zhi mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin sngags dang zhi ba gsum// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus//
363b4(chi): thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i phur pa gdab ces bya'o// dngul dang 'bras chen 'o ma zho// gtor ma dkar po rgyan dkar po// sngags dang ting 'dzin 'phrin las
363b5(chi): gsum chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus// zhi bar bsgom zhing gtor byas na// dgra bgegs dngos lta zhi bar 'gyur// lha dang pho nya zhi bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i gtor
363b6(chi): ma zhes bya'o// lha yi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs bsgoms la// lha rnams gsang sngags zhi bar sbyor// 'bras chen 'o ma zho bar gnyis// tsan dan
363b7(chi): rgya shug srol tog dkar// bal tog me tog dkar sna tshogs// re re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad sbyor// sbyor ba'i lha grangs re re la// sdig sgrib sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur// de ltar
364a1(chi): de bzhin smon lam gdab// de ni gsang sngags sbyor ba'i las// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad kyis//
364a2(chi): lha rnams zhi zhing shis pa dang // gal bar sems dpa' zhi ba dang // gdug pas zin pa zhi ba dang // slad kyi bar chod bya sems zhi// 'di dang gzhan du bde mchog
364a3(chi): thob/ sbyin sreg sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshogs chen tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'gyur// zhi ba grub pa'i yon tan no// gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
364a4(chi): rtsibs brgyad pa// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas ser po me tog ser// chos gos thams cad ser por bsgom// lha rnams thams cad ser
364a5(chi): por bsgom// bdag nyid nga rgyal rdo rje bsgom// kun tu bzang po chos dbyings la// kun tu bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis// bdag nyid lha rnams gnyis med bsgom//
364a6(chi): de ni rgyas pa'i las zhes bya'o// hom khung gru bzhi 'bar ba la// rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya// hom shing ser pos shing rnams la// gser gyi thag pas bkyigs byas la//
364a7(chi): lha rnams bskyed dang spyan drangs la// de ru byin mchod bsreg par bya// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ho zhes bya// gser ram ser ro'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdung rtse zur
364b1(chi): bzhi/ khong seng bya ba sems gzhal yas khang // logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms la// btab pas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med//
364b2(chi): rgyas mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin sngags dang 'phrin las gsum// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus// thams cad ma lus rgyas par thebs// rgyas
364b3(chi): pa'i phur pas btab ces bya'o// gser ram ser po phye ma dag/ me tog ser po sna tshogs phye// ser po 'bru sna mang sbyar la// rgyas par gyur pa'i gtor ma ste// gtor mas
364b4(chi): thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// 'di ni rgyas pa'i gtor ma'o// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// lha rnams dkyil 'khor bsnyen rdzogs nas//
364b5(chi): lha rnams gsang sngags rgyas par sbyor// nyungs kar me tog sdong shing ser// re re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad sbyor// bsreg rdzas hau du bsreg pa na// thams cad ma lus rgyas par
364b6(chi): 'gyur// rgyas pa'i gsang sngags sbyor ba las// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags byin rlabs
364b7(chi): mthus/ lha dang rnal 'byor gzi byin byin rlabs rgyas// dpal dang tshe dang bsod nams rgyas// don dam kun rdzob longs spyod rgyas// rgyu dang 'bras bu gsod nams
365a1(chi): tshogs chen rgyas// 'di ni rgyas pa'i yon tan no// zla gam dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par// lha bskyed dkyil 'khor spyan
365a2(chi): drangs nas// mchod pa la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// lha rnams go rims dmar por bsgom// chos gos dmar po rnam pa lnga// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// rdo rje
365a3(chi): 'phra men ma'i sngags nas ni// ma dang bu la byams pa'i tshul// thams cad dbang du bsdus nas 'grub// 'di ni dbang gi las zhes bya'o// ha~M gyi dkyil 'khor zla gam lA/
365a4(chi): rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya// seng ldeng 'dzo mo glang 'khal ba// gzhan yang shing rtsi dmar po rnams// hau shing thag dmar bkyigs pa ni// rnam rtog gnag pa gnyis
365a5(chi): bsregs na// ci bsgo bka' nyan dbang du 'dus// 'di ni dbang gi ho zhes bya'o// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdung rtse zur gnyis// khong seng
365a6(chi): byang sems gzhal yas khang // logs la dbang gi lha bsgoms la// btab pas thams cad dbang du 'dus// dbang du ma 'dus gang yang med// dbang mdzad lha la
365a7(chi): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ni dbang gi phur pa gdab pa'i las so// zangs phye shing dmar gong dmar phye// 'bras chen dmar po me tog dmar po phye// bu ram chu yis sbar la
365b1(chi): gtor/ khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'phra men tshogs kyis bkug nas ni// ci bsgo bka' nyan dbang du 'du// dbang gi gtor ma'i las zhes bya'o// dbang gi
365b2(chi): dkyil 'khor chen po ru// lha dbang dkyil 'khor bsnyen rdzogs na// lha rnams gsang sngags dbang du sbyor// zangs me seng ldeng 'jo mo me// nyungs dmar kha dog dmar
