365b3(chi): po'i 'bru// re re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad sbyor// bsreg rdzas ha~M du phul bsregs na// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs sangs rgyas mthus// gnyis su med pa'i byin
365b4(chi): rlabs kyis// srid gsum khams gsum dbang du 'dus// mi mthun rtog sgrib dbang du 'dus// bdag dang gzhan gyi tha mi dad// kun bzangs yab yum gnyis
365b5(chi): med kyis// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin ni// dbang gi grub pa'i yon tan no// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// de la gru gsum re re
365b6(chi): 'o/ bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// lha rnams dkyil 'khor bskyed spyan drangs// gnyis su med par bstim byas la// sha khrag dmar gyis mchod byas la/
365b7(chi): bsnyen sgrub rdzogs par bskyal bar bya// phur pa bzhi bcu rtsa drug la// rang rang snying po bris la ni// dkyil 'khor go nas dgod par bya// sngags dang ting 'dzin
366a1(chi): 'phrin las kyis// 'phra men tshogs ni rbad par bya// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni drag po'i las zhes bya'o// ho
366a2(chi): khung gru gsum nyis brtsegs la// thod pa me ris brgyun par bya// gsang ba'i shag pa bcu gsum dang // gdug pa can gyi tsher dug shing // lcags thag bsdams
366a3(chi): la gzugs par bya// phur pa brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// mtha' ma bskor la dgod par bya// ming byang yugs sa mo yi skra// brgyus la mtha' ma bskor la gzhag
366a4(chi): mi rta khyi spyang glang dreng spre'u// bso zho dug dung sna tshogs dang // lany+dza tsha mar nyung nag dang // ske tshe sdong ros gu gu la dang // lcags phye zangs phye rdo dang // btsos pa'i sha
366a5(chi): dang bsregs pa'i gsur// tri yi tshil dang skye ba'i rgyu// rdo rje glu yi dbyangs blangs nas// lan grangs brgya dang stong du dbul bar bya'o// lha rnams gsang sngags ma grub
366a6(chi): par/ gnag pa thebs pa bcug pa ni// gzugs dang ming rus bsregs par bya// dus gsum 'byung po sha khrag bkang // gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod//
366a7(chi): hau du bsregs na mod la 'chi// 'di ni drag po hau gyi las so// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdung rtse zur gsum// khong seng byang sems
366b1(chi): gzhal yas khang // logs la drag po'i lha bsgoms la// btab pas thams cad rlag par 'gyur// brlag pa ma gyur gang yang med// brlag mdzad lha la phyag
366b2(chi): 'tshal lo// khro bo khro mo 'phra men tshogs// gnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus la// ngag tu bskul ba gdab par bya// gnang gcod srog dang bral bar 'gyur// 'di ni
366b3(chi): drag po'i phur pa gdab pa'i las so// sna tshogs dug gi phye ma dang // nyungs nag ske tshe til nag dang // gdug pa'i tshe ra ma phyi ma dang // sran chan bra chan lcags phye dang /
366b4(chi): sha khrag gtor mar bsres pa ni// rdo nag che ru bsres la gtor// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'phra men tshogs kyis bkug nas ni// gdug pa can rnams rlag
366b5(chi): par byed// drag po'i gtor ma'i las zhes bya'o// drag po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsnyen rdzogs nas// lha rnams gsang sngags drag por sbyor//
366b6(chi): lcags phye dug phye nyungs nag gis// re re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad sbyor// gzas par them par bcug la bsreg/ rdo rje me dpal snying bsreg go/ chos nyid bden pa'i byin
366b7(chi): rlabs kyis// gzas pa'i rnam shes tshe rten ni// bya sgo me yis bsreg bzhin 'tshig/ 'di ni drag po'i sbyor ba'i las zhes bya// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
367a1(chi): drag po'i sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus// bar chod bgegs rnams brlag pa dang // gnag pa tsha ba'i nad kyis
367a2(chi): / skyo 'bog rgyal nub bgegs rnams // gabs pa'i spyanang bdun rdzo na bsregs// rnal 'byor gyur shog dngos grub thog// drag pa sgrub pa'i yon tan no//
367a3(chi): 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la// ho lnga yang dog rtse mor brtsig/ kha dog rigs dang 'thun par brtsig/ gdug pa can gyi ho shing la// lcags
367a4(chi): thag gis ni bskor la gzugs// kI la ya ni nyi shu gcig/ snying po nyi shu gcig gis bsdus// lan grangs nyi shu gcig tu ni// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor phur bskor
367a5(chi): la/ phur pa'i 'od zer stong khams khengs// gsang sngags 'brug stong sgrogs pa bsgom// mgyogs byed ye shes pho nya 'gyed// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs//
367a6(chi): khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// gsang ba'i yum bzhi gsang sngags kyis// lha rnams gsang
367a7(chi): sngags bsdus te dgug/ sder mo'i sngags kyis dgug cing gcir// bran dang pho nyas dgug cing bstim// de nas bstab pa'i las byas la// gnad la dbab ni brgyad dag
367b1(chi): la dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rdungs shig rdo rje 'brar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can ni// rdo rje
367b2(chi): me dpal snying bsreg go// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags kyi byin rlobs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a bi tsaR+Ya'i dus la
367b3(chi): bab bo/ brnag pa 'di kho na la'o// rdo rje me dpal gyis snying sregs cig/ skor tshoms re zhing bcu drug dag/ rtsa brgyad dag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags gnag
367b4(chi): pa 'them par 'gyur// gnag pa 'dod pa'i bya ba 'grub// ces kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
367b5(chi): / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed chen pos mchol sprin mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rjes 'jug gi don du
367b6(chi): mchod pa dang bstod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// bdag po phyag rgya mnyam gzhag la// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// lha rnams dkyil 'khor spyan
367b7(chi): drang ngo / srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang /
368a1(chi): mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// lha rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad la// spyan drang phyug 'tshal mchod bstod
368a2(chi): bya/ dngos grub rnam gnyis thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes mchod do// bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer las// mchod pa'i lha mo sprin tshogs
368a3(chi): tsam nam mkha' khengs pa'i char bzhin phab// bdag la mchod pa byed par bsams la// gtor ma tshogs mchod rdzas la yang // sbyang ba'i yi ges sbyang bar bya//
368a4(chi): spel ba'i yi ges bsgril la ni// thod pa'i snod ni 'jig rten khengs// bdud rtsi chen po'i 'od zer las// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro// 'dod yon lnga dang lha mo
368a5(chi): brgyad/ nam mkha' khengs pa'i sprin tshogs la// bar snang khengs pa'i char bzhin phrab// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// mchod pa'i sngags kyis dbul
368a6(chi): bar bya/ thog mar rtogs sgom bdag nyid bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan sems can yun du 'khor// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya'o//
368a7(chi): de bzhin nyid du gnas bcas te// thugs rje chen po 'byung bar byed// 'tsho ba'i zas ni byin brlabs nas// ho gzar ho khung dkyil 'khor mchod// bdag mchod
368b1(chi): kun 'grangs thams cad mnyes// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// thams cad bzang zhing brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes gyur na// nyes pa thams
368b2(chi): cad rnam par dag/ dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// lha tshogs dkyil 'khor dam tshig can// spyan drang ba la sbyin par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// mchod
368b3(chi): dang bshags dang dgug bstim dang // bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bAs brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o//
368b4(chi): kha tham gyis ni rdul du brlag/ dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// sha khrag mtshan ma ming bcas gdag/ ha ha dkyil 'khor mnyes par 'gyur// he ru ka yi gnas bcu
368b5(chi): dang / dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi
368b6(chi): ar+g+ha rgya mtshor 'khyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas rnams// ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol// mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni// nag por byas te
368b7(chi): dbul bar bya// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// dam can tshogs la bstab pa ni// skra bshig gcer phur phyung la ni// thal ba rag ta'i zhag gis mtshan// khro bo'i cha lugs
369a1(chi): gzung nas ni// kha nas khrag dang zhag 'dzag pa// lag pa thong khrag thogs nas ni// hi hi dgod cing spyugs pas 'bod// so so rnams kyis ming nas
369a2(chi): 'bod/ gnag pa bos nas zhal du bstab// srin mo rnams ni tshogs kyi bdag/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' dbyings
369a3(chi): b+ha ga klong yangs nas/ byang chub sems ni mchod par spro// phyogs bcu'i lha rnams sku gsung thugs// mchod pa phul bas mnyes rab mchog/ rgyal ba mnyes pas
369a4(chi): dngos grub thob// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// mkha' klong me dpung gzhal yas khang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'//
369a5(chi): 'di yang nga yi gzhal yas khang // sngags dran ye nas bde gshegs skra// yid ni kun bzang rang la sha ra// mkha' klong me dpung dbyings nas ba zhengs// me yi snying
369a6(chi): por sku dang phyag rgyar gsal// gnyis med rtogs pas chos sku yin// byang chub sems ni khyab pa'i sku// 'jigs byed rngam pa khro rgyal sku// dpal chen 'jigs
369a7(chi): byed sku yi mchog/ zhi ba'i sku yi mtshon chen yin// mchod pa chen po mchod pa che// 'di yang nga yi sku yi mchog/ bdag gis bdag mchod kun mnyes mchod// stong gsum
369b1(chi): stong gi 'jig rten na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// mkha' klong me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// 'di yang nga yi
369b2(chi): gzhal yas khang // sngags dran ye nas bde gshegs gsung // yid ni kun tu bzang po rang la shar// mkha' klong me dpung dbyings nas bzhengs// me dpung gdangs
369b3(chi): / skad dbyings nas sgrogs// rngam pa'i nga ro khro bo'i gsung // snying po 'bru dgu bsnyen pa'i gsung // sprul pa'i brda tshig ma mo'i gsung // sna tshogs mi las gsung mchog ste//
369b4(chi): zhi ba'i gsung gi mchod pa yin// mchod pa chen po mchod pa che// 'di yang nga yi gsung gi mchod// bdag gis bdag mchod kun mnyes mchod// stong gsum stong gi 'jig
369b5(chi): rten na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// mkha' klong me dpung gzhal yas khang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang po'i mkha'// 'di yang nga yi gzhal yas khang // sngags dran
369b6(chi): ye nas bde gshegs thugs// yid ni kun tu bzang po rang la shar// mkha' klong me dpung dbyings nas bzhengs// tsit+ta gzhal yas sum rgyud thugs// phyi dro nang bzhi lha yi
369b7(chi): thugs la ltos// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis mer thugs// kun bzang yab yum rol pas mchod// zhi ba'i thugs kyis mchod pa yin// mchod pa chen po mchod pa che/
370a1(chi): 'di yang nga yi thugs kyis mchod// bdag gis bdag mchod thams cad mnyes// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor
370a2(chi): gru bzhi la// mkha' klong me dpung la sogs nas// dbang dang mngon spyod par dag gis// de ltar de bzhin de rjes las// rgyas dbang mngon spyod mchod pa che// sku gsung
370a3(chi): thugs kyi mchod chen po// de ni khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag gis bdag la 'di bstod pa// hUM skye med rnam dgra chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni//
370a4(chi): thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// gdug pa 'dul phyir sku sprul pa// phyi nang bdud rnams rnam par
370a5(chi): 'joms// 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal lo// he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid gsum 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// dgyes pa chen po nyid mnyes gyur//
370a6(chi): sngags kyi spyod pa 'di gsungs so// ji bzhin gsungs pa'i dbang sogs ldan// byang chub spyod pas rnam par sbyor// byang chub sems ni ma spangs shig/ rdo rje phyag rgya la
370a7(chi): sogs pa// dam pa'i chos kyang mi smod cing // mi shes pa 'am blun po 'am// gsang ba'i bstan pa bya ba ni// nga bdag yongs su spangs nas ni// dka' thub kyis kyang
370b1(chi): gzir bar bya// rtags su sdom pa bskyang ba ste// bdud rtsi lnga dang / dkon mchog la gnod bsgral bar bya// gsang sngags bud med 'dod pa rnams// byang chub sems ni
370b2(chi): blang bar bya// brdzun tshig brlang po gsang don smra// sbyor sgrol mchod pa gzhung du smra// nyams bdun ma traM bsgral bar bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa chen po ni//
370b3(chi): goms lam ting 'dzin brtan pa thob// gsang sngags thabs chen thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// de nas ma traM gying la gtad pa// nyon mongs
370b4(chi): 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// bsgral ba chen po'i las su rung // dpal chen zhal du bstab bo khA hi// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs la bsngo// sems can 'dul ba'i
370b5(chi): skal du bzhes// ta na chen po'i zhing du sbyor// gying chen rdo rje phyag du 'bul/ ye shes rgya mtshor bzhes su gsol// de nas ma traM sdig can de// dkyil 'khor chen por
370b6(chi): drangs nas ni// thar pa'i lam byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can dag 'ongs pa ltar// skal bar ldan pa'i sems can khyod// bde bar 'ongs so legs so 'ong //
370b7(chi): khyod ni bsod nams skal bar ldan// bde gshegs thugs rje sgrol mkhas pas// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar snang // thabs
371a1(chi): dang shes rab rnams kyis kyang // de nas gling gis bsgrub par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams// e hi e hi tshur
371a2(chi): skyon 'khor dang bcas// dzaHhUM baM ho spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// kI li kI la ya dga' ba'i bzhad mos bkang ngo // bde 'grongs bde mchog a ho su ka
371a3(chi): shom pa ri// ti sha zhes ni slob ma tshud cig snang bar mdzad// rol cig dgongs cig 'dod pa'i ti ta kha kha khA hi// sbyin no bskul lo da ra da ra ha ra ha ra// zo zhig
371a4(chi): mtshar mchog tu gtams so kha kha khA hi// zla ba la sogs dmar chen snying po lnga// maM sa la sogs ro mchog dpa' bo mchog/ ma tsa me tsa rag ta ru d+hi rag ta khA hi/
371a5(chi): nye ba'i bsgrub pa'i ma lus bsgrub 'tshal gyis// dri med gzi ldan mchog gi mchod pa sbyar ba 'di// ye shes tshogs rnams dgyes shing bzhes su gsol// de nas rnal 'byor/
371a6(chi): gying chen gyis// ma tra la yang sdang mig lta// zhabs bsgrar mdzub g.yon gtad de ni// ye shes mkha' lding sder chen gyis// 'khor ba'i bye phrug blang ba ni// bu
371a7(chi): phrug ma la gzan ster bzhin// 'dus pa chen po tshogs kun dgyes// dkyil 'khor chen po'i steng du gzhag/ gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor du// 'dus shing
371b1(chi): tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bstan// sgyu dag phyin par phyir mi ldog par nges// sbyang ba'i sngags kyis sbyang bar bya// khrus lung rnam gsum rdzogs byas las// khro ba'
371b2(chi): men pho nyas bskul// khyod ni pho nya'i gying ka ra// ka dar sngon po 'di long la// a bi tsaR+Ya gnas bstod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur cig/ ye shes
371b3(chi): rno dpal mtshon cha 'di// nyon mongs sdig gcod ral gri ste// 'khor ba'i rtsa ba drungs nas phyung // tsit+ta drangs nas ban nga'i snod du btsal// sdig can shes pa
371b4(chi): yi ge hUM du bsgom// s+pha ra phaT kyis don gnyis byas// ha ra hUM gis thugs ka ra 'dus/ rdo rje thugs su dbang mchog bskur// gsung dang sku nas de bzhin du//
371b5(chi): dung khang gsang lam rdo rje'i lam// pad+ma las 'phros byang chub sems// lha rnams dkyil 'khor skur rdzogs par// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed par bya'o//
371b6(chi): lha rnams dkyil 'khor gnas gsum nas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer spro// dkyil 'khor ba de gshegs thams cad mchod// don gnyis byas shing tshur 'dus
371b7(chi): nas/ mgal me bzhin du bdag la mchod// thugs nas sku gsung rim bzhin du// gsang ba'i lam byung rdo rje'i lam// byang sems b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor thim/
372a1(chi): lha rnams 'od zhu byung sems kyis// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// tsa na kA yi 'bru tsam la// kI la ya yi gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje
372a2(chi): gzhon nu mtshon gang ba// b+ha ga'i gzhal yas khang nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yi spyan drangs nas// 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor// bteg nas 'og min
372a3(chi): gnas su drangs// rigs lnga yab yum lhums su drangs// rdo rje sems ni rlung lta bu// gang dag bsgral nas rdo rje'i tshe// de nyid sras kyi dang po ni// rdo rje sems
372a4(chi): dpar khyod nyidu 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas mchod pa ste// rta na ga na sbyor ba mchod chen po// sgra ni kham pa gyen du ba rdzes// brang thag dma' la gsus pa
372a5(chi): 'bor/ tshigs bzhi sbom la ldum pa dang // rkang pa sbom phra zheng che zhing // dri dreg ma yin sha dreg chags// mig ni shel la 'bras bu ster// nyams bdun
372a6(chi): zhing bcu de dang mnyam// lkugs pas byol song ji bzhin te// dkyil 'khor chen por bcug nas bsgral// gong bzhin de ltar de bzhin bya'o// mchod pa chen po rgyal
372a7(chi): ba mnyes// thun mong dngos grub ci 'dod bya// dngos grub yon tan 'di la blang // rtan gan mchod pa mchod chen po// zhes kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan tra las//
372b1(chi): mchod pa'i sprin mngon par byang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rjes 'jug gi don du/ dbang bskur dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
372b2(chi): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa'i rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha//
372b3(chi): ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// rang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/
372b4(chi): thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro dron du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang gsum byin brlabs 'dir gsol cig/
372b5(chi): don dam blo yi spyod yul min// brtag par dka' la dpag tu med// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// phra mo bzhi yi sbyor ba las// yang dag dbyings nas rol pa
372b6(chi): ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pas ni// stong pa las ni sku ru byung // 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag po yis// dbang bskur dngos grub ci 'dod 'byung // zhing sa 'phru
372b7(chi): rmog chu lung rkyen// de las 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhin// lo gsum snang bcu brtags la// yang dag dbyis kyi gter brus nas// zhing rab ga shin la sa bon gang gi
373a1(chi): nam mkha' sA gzhi pad ma brgyad// nags tshal me tog gling chags pa// rin chen sna lnga'i lung ba dang // rin po che yi phung po dang //
373a2(chi): bkra shis pa yi gnas dag tu// sa rin brtul te blangs byas la// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi lnga// gsang rdzas gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs// thabs dang shes
373a3(chi): rab gnyis med las// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab pa'o// tshon rtsi ye shes lnga dag tu// byin gyis brlabs la bri bar bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang //
373a4(chi): bzlog dang so sor bri ba ni// drag nag dbang dmar rgyas ser zhing // dkar po ser po bar khyams ser// sgo bzhi rigs dang gnag pa'o// le'u tshe dgu yi zlum
373a5(chi): zo dkar// sgo rnams zur gtad gru bzhi ser// pad ma zla gam dmar po dag/ gru gsum 'khor lo nag po la// 'bru tshig so sor dgod pa'o// slob dpon 'khor nas
373a6(chi): phun sum tshogs// 'tsho ba zas dang rkyen bzlog sman// grub rdzas gsang ba'i dam rdzas so// snod du lung pa'i cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor dam pa gzhug phyi ru// phyi dbang
373a7(chi): dus su khrus byas la// dkyil 'khor gzhug par 'phrin las zhu// 'phrin las gnang nas gzhug yon dbul// dar dkar yol bres phyi rol nas// bskyed rim sngags
373b1(chi): bsnyen rdzogs pa'i bla ma la// me tog dag ni 'phang bar bya// me tog gang la phrog pa de// bskal pa'i mtha' dang ring ba'i dus// las dang skal bar 'dzom pa'i lha//
373b2(chi): sngags dang phyag rgyas sems bskyed do// don dam kun rdzob de bzhin no// mig dbye a mr-i kha ru blud// rgyu 'bras mi bslu dam yang dgag/ bsnyen pa'i snang ba'i dbang
373b3(chi): thob nas// mngon shes yi ge 'bru brgyad la// rin chen bstan pa'i gzhung bzhin du// bsgom bsgrub gsal ba ci nus bya// ha cang sgra cher ma yin chung bar gyis//
373b4(chi): gug kyang klad kor rtse ga bar ma nyams par// smra bzhin ma yin ha cang g.yeng ba min// rnam gsum gcig tu yid la drag gsal ba// sgom sgrub gsal ba ci nus bya//
373b5(chi): ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// byang chub sems kyi sems dpa' yang // sku gsung thugs kyi gnas gnas nas// dbang bskur gsang lam yab yum
373b6(chi): gnyis thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// gsang lam mkha' nas sras mchog ston// gzhal yas khang la lan gsum du// bskor ba byas nas lan gsum
373b7(chi): du/ pad ma dbang sgo sgor zhugs nas// dbang dang dngos grub blang bar bya// dkyil 'khor lha rnams lus la gzhug/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang thob 'gyur// ka pA la
374a1(chi): yi dbang bskur bas// dur khrod he ru ka'i dbang thob 'gyur// maM sa rag tas dbang bskur bas// dur khrod mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la dbang
374a2(chi): bskur thob// bdud rtsi chen pos dbang bskur bas// 'chi med srog srubs dam pa yang brtan pa thob// byang chub sems kyi mar mes dbang bskur bas// snang ba ye shes
374a3(chi): rang shar dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje dril bus dbang bskur bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbang thob 'gyur// dngos grub rten ni lha dag ste// bdud rtsi
374a4(chi): sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rten// shar du rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub rten// zla phreM zla rgyas go ro tsa na'o// lho ru rin chen 'bar ba'i dngos grub rten// maM sa me sa zla rgyas
374a5(chi): ur geng ba su ta// nub tu zla gam dbang gi dngos grub rten// rag ta rug ti ba su ta// byang du 'phrin las gru gsum dngos grub rte na/ 'bru bcud bdud rtsi zla phrom
374a6(chi): rnams/ rigs dang sbyar te phyogs phyogs dgod// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi// phur pa bzhi yang gdab par bya// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// dbang
374a7(chi): dang dngos grub blang bar bya// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa// sgra ni ser la li ba dang // mig la smig chags pa dang // rkang pa rgyu ma phra ba dang // lus la dri zhim
374b1(chi): nad med dang // nu ma chung zhing ker skabs dod// skad kyang ngang pa gzhon pa 'dra// rdo rje lha mor byin brlabs nas// e sti nyi ma pad ma brgyad// zla ba rdo rje rtse lnga
374b2(chi): a s+t+waM dang ho yi bskul la ni// de nas gnyis med sbyar ba bya// pad mo la ni rdo rje zhugs// byang chub sems ni pad mor 'khyil// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa//
374b3(chi): byang chub sems chu rab phab nas// gsang ba'i pho brang dbus su ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rnams bskyed// spro bsdus byang sems 'od du zhu// dkar 'tsher byang
374b4(chi): chub sems su zhu// byang chub sems ni spyan drangs nas// byang chub sems bsags gnod pa la// ya rkan ma rkan zla dkyil 'khor// lce dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad de//
374b5(chi): dbang bskur dngos grub bstim par bya// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song gsum du lhung mi srid// lha dang mi yi dbang rgyas bskyed// bskyed rim la ni sems
374b6(chi): zhugs nas// nus pa'i dbang thob sems zin nas// thar pa'i ye las zlog mi srid// zab mo'i dbang yang thob gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan yongs su
374b7(chi): rdzogs pa'i sa non pa'o// zhes kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan tra las/ dbang bskur dam pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas snang srid lha yi
375a1(chi): dkyil 'khor la thugs ye shes cig la ye shes kyi bye brag mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rjes
375a2(chi): 'jug gi don du 'di gsungs so// sems g.yeng sems 'dzin snang ba bsgyur// gting mtha' med par gzhal yas khang // snang srid ye nas rdo rje thugs// 'jigs
375a3(chi): byed rdo rje ku mA ra// nga ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i yab// srid gsum sgrol mchog rdo rje thugs// dkar dang dmar dang bung kha'i zhal// dpa' ba sgeg po 'jigs su rung //
375a4(chi): rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par ston// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa// bdud bzhi gdan du 'joms pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// dur khrod chas brgyad ldan pas sgeg sgeg
375a5(chi): 'dra/ sku che yan lag hwags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhad pas dgod dgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs pas gsheg
375a6(chi): sheg 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la gnag pas khro khro 'dra// zhal nas gdug rtsub 'byin pas rngam rngam 'dra// rgyud drug thugs rjes zin pas snying rje 'dra// chos sku mtshan
375a7(chi): ma med pas zhi zhi 'dra// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan pas// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse
375b1(chi): lngas rgyud lnga rab tu sgrol// me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum nyon mongs sreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsa da nas gcod// ri rab phur pas khams gsum dbang du
375b2(chi): sdud/ 'khor ba rgyas 'debs chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stobs// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas//
375b3(chi): bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gdug pa 'dul mdzad khro bo bcu// hUM ka ra dang rnam par rgyal// dbyug pa sngon po gshin rje gshed// mi g.yo mgon po
375b4(chi): rta mgrin rgyal// gzhan gyis mi thub bdud rtsi 'khyil// khams gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// g.yas
375b5(chi): dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus dkar zhal// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// g.yas sgo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal//
375b6(chi): g.yas sngo g.yon smug dbus ljang gnag/ ga yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus skya zhal// g.yas ser g.yon dud dbus ljang
375b7(chi): zhal/ Tagayas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang ser// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus dud zhal// 'khor lo mda' gzhu tri shul lcags kyu dang // me dpal dbyug to/
376a1(chi): dgra sta be con dang // gshol mda' ral gri sbrul zhags lcags sgrog dang // ba dan rnga yab rgya gram dbyug tho dang // tri shul mda' gzhu tho ba
376a2(chi): sog mdung rnams// dang po gnyis rdo rje ban d+hA tha ma gnyis phur bu rnams// don rtags gsum dang lnga dang brgyad// gsum dang gnyis dang don rtags cig/ dur khrod
376a3(chi): chen po'i chas kyis brgyan// kun tu bzang mo chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stobs// gtso la 'khril bar bzhugs
376a4(chi): pa'o// 'phra men nyi shu'i phyag mtshan ni// gtso bo rnams kyi bar ma'o// zhal ni g.yas g.yon rigs dang sbyar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// sku mdog
376a5(chi): rigs dang sbyar ba'o// yang sprul phyag mtshan sgo bzhi yis// 'dod pa'i bya ba don grub pa'o// sum sprul pa stod cing za ba'o// za byed shas cher za ba'o// gsod chen
376a6(chi): sha sa cher gsod pa'o// gdug gsum bsgral ba'i khog pa la// bsgrub pa'i rgyal po'i gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas khang gi phyogs bcu nas// mnyam nyid phyogs
376a7(chi): nyid rtogs gyur na// bskul gsigs thams cad phyag rgya yin// thugs dam 'phrin las mtshon pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng // rkang pa brgad nas brkyang
376b1(chi): bskum du// gom pa'i stabs kyi sa gar byed cing // gsang sngags las sngags lan gsum du// drag tu lta zhing sdang mig blta// phan tshun yas mar sdang mig gis//
376b2(chi): re re la yang gsum gsum du// rkan sgra ljags dri la lan gsum gyis// dngos grub thob dang zil gyis gnon// ru tra bsgral ba'i khog pa la// bsgrub pa'i rgyal po'i gzhal
376b3(chi): yas khang // gzhal yas khang gi pho brang phyogs bcu ru// de ltar de bzhin gsang sngags so// bya ba des kyang 'grub pa'o// ting 'dzin gzhan na gzhung du bya'o// zhes kyi
376b4(chi): la ya bcu gnyis kyi ta na tra las/ mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu dpal khrag
376b5(chi): 'thung rngam pa chen pos gdug pa can bsgral ba'i phyir/ gsad pa las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs
376b6(chi): so/ khro bo rol pa'i chu byad dang // lung pa gru gsum zla gam dbyibs// nags ri tsher ma can gyi shing // dur khrod chen po'i gling yod par// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor
376b7(chi): bri bar bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la ni// phur pa byin gyis brlab par bya// nang gi byang sems gzhal yas khang // gzhal yas khang ni sum brtseg la//
377a1(chi): steng 'og rked pa'i gnas gnas su// bzhi bcu rtsa drug gsal bsgoms la// bskyed la bde gshegs gzhug par bya// kI la ya ni nyi shu
377a2(chi): gcig grangs 'dzin nyi shu gcig gis ni// phur pa bskyed cing gzi byin bskyed// nyi shu gcig gis 'od zer 'phros// mgar gyi tsha che rno myur chas// nyungs kAr
377a3(chi): rgyal pos brdeg par bya// gu gul tshil chen gdug byugs lnga// rag tas byug la e yis gdab// brgya mtshams stong mtshams mchod pa 'bul// bstod dang bstim
377a4(chi): rang phan gnod smon lam gdab// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor la// gru gsum thur du brus pa yis// brnag pa de kho na gzhug par bya// rgyu brgyad gzugs ni
377a5(chi): de yi nang // mgo ni lho nub thur du bstan// dpral snying rus dang ming gzhug la// snying kha'i ni ste dza gzhag la// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs nas ni// brnag pa'i
377a6(chi): gzugs la bstim par bya// dbab pa'i sngags kyi bstim byas la// phyag rgya bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// dgug cing gdab brdeg yang nas yang // 'phrin las drug
377a7(chi): dang sngags drug dang // bdag nyid las kyi lhar zhugs nas// lung ni sum rgyud 'bru dgu las// phur pa'i khro bo sku phyung nas// bde gshegs 'jigs tshegs
377b1(chi): yan chad du// gser gyi ba tha ga gzings pa yi// rdo rje phur pa lA thim bya// 'bum phrag gcig gam sa ya 'am// bye ba bzlas te dbang bskur nas// ting 'dzin
377b2(chi): bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// gyur shog dngos grub thob par 'gyur// drag pa'i 'phrin las 'jug pa yi// 'bru dgu'i phur pa skur phyung ba// phyogs bcu dag tu khyab
377b3(chi): pa'i sku// khro sku lcags phur zur gsum po// mgar gyi tsha tsha rno myur chas// nyi zer ser ba babs pa bzhin// nag pa'i steng du babos pa bsam// phyag rgya bzhi yis
377b4(chi): bkug bstim bya// gsar sngags drag sngags yang nas yang // dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// mgyogs byed ye shes pho nya yis// de ltar de bzhin dgug bstim
377b5(chi): bya/ sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// thugs rjes sprul pa'i pho nya'o// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// za byed gsod byed pho nya'o// shA na mu kha'i dus la bab//
377b6(chi): shA na bzhi yi pho nya'o// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la brag// re ma ti mched bzhi pho nya'o// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// tsha ba'i ma mo bzhi yi pho nya'o// yang
377b7(chi): nas yang du dgug bstim bya// so so'i drag sngags bstim par bya// khrag zor dug zor nyungs zor brdeg/ dug gi gtor ma za ru gzhug/ 'phra men rnams dang 'gyogs
378a1(chi): ma rnams// glo snying za zhing dbang po 'thog/ 'dod cing za ba'i ting 'dzin gsar// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang
378a2(chi): sems byed pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phog shig rnam par gzir
378a3(chi): bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// mthu brog gu gul grogs dang bral// mngag gzhug bsnyen phur dbab pa dang /
378a4(chi): dbang du bsdu ba sngon dmar bcings// sdigs phur kha tha ma tho ba ba tab// zil gnon mda' du lug mig smra// rtags phyin drag po dam rdzas bsgom pa'i bka' nyan
378a5(chi): byed/ gab sbas glong gi rus sbal yan lag 'dra// gdab pa'i rin chen dag la bri// rtags 'byin drag po'i phur pa yis// tshe yi dngas ma'i rten phral nas// gti
378a6(chi): mug rtsad nas gcad pa'i mthu// mthu dbrog phur pa sras mchog gis// khrag gi dngas ma gnad sle ba na// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i mthu// bsngagasA pa'i sras
378a7(chi): mchog phur pa yis// dbugs kyi dngas mas rta phral nas// phrag dog rtsad nas gcad pa'i mthu// sdig pa'i phur pa sras mchog gis// 'od dang sems kyi gnad
378b1(chi): skabs nas// nga rgyal rtsad nas gcad pa'i mthu// zil gnon sras mchog phur pa yis// tsa dang kun gzhi'i rten phral nas// zhe sdang rtsad nas gcad pa'i mthu// dbang
378b2(chi): gi sras mchog phur pa yis// rgyu bzhi'i gnad nas sreg pa'i mthu// bsnyen pa'i sras mchog phur pa yis// 'byung ba kun gyi rten 'brel sreg pa'i mthu// a shog pa'i rgya
378b3(chi): de ba brtsegs 'dra la// gnang bdun gcig tu dril ba las// so mal lcags mda' sra rno yis// skad cig ma'i grangs yod kyi// dus gcig thog rdzis glang phag gnad bslab
378b4(chi): pas/ kun gyi rten bral tshe lung 'og min rnam gsum mo// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa// mngon
378b5(chi): spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug
378b6(chi): nas/ klad pa tshal pa brgya ru los// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// gdug cing sdang semam ldan pa rnams//
378b7(chi): lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas//
379a1(chi): lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// zhes kI sa sa bcu gnyis kyi tan+da tA las// gsad pa las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
379a2(chi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud bdag chen pos sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas sngags kyi sbyor ba'i las 'di gsungs
379a3(chi): so/ rjes 'jug rgyud 'di nan tan du// sa gzhi legs par brtags byas la// 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin bsam la bsgoms// bdag nyid ting 'dzin dam tshig sdom
379a4(chi): pab chags// dngos grub par chod dgra bgegs rnams// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// grasad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phra mo'i sbyor ba ting 'dzin
379a5(chi): bsgom// bdag dang khro ba phur pa rdzas// sku gsung thugs kyi gnang nas su// skye med mtshon pa'i ting 'dzin sgom// rnam gsum dag la skye med mtshon// de
379a6(chi): gsum skye med mtshon 'phros pas// srid pa gsum du gsal 'tsher nas// nyes byas gsum po sreg pa ni// 'di ni byang chub sems kyi khrus// 'phrin las
379a7(chi): gsang sngags sgrol ba'i khrus// e ka ra dang mthar gnas so// e ka ra yi aM ka ra// e ka ra yis dbus ma nas// e ka ra'i mthar gnas so// e ka'i don
379b1(chi): tshig e kA'i gsang sngags kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags sgrol ba'i mthus// sku yis byang chub sems kyis lus ni rnam dag khrus// e ka ra yis don
379b2(chi): tshig tsA ri'i gsang sngags kyis// lus ngag yid gsum byang chub sems kyi khrus// e ka ra'i don tshig rwa'i gsang sngags kyis// thugs ni byang chub sems
379b3(chi): kyis yid ni rnam dag khrusa?// e ka ra'i don tshig pany+tsa'i gsang sngags kyis// bcom ldan 'das bka' dri ma dag pa'i khrus// e kra ra'i don tshig tri'i gsang
379b4(chi): sngags kyis// gsung gi byang chub sems ni ngag gi rnam dag khrus// e ka ra'i don tshig tsha'i gsang sngags kyi// bgra chags thabs ni byang chub sems kyi khrus//
379b5(chi): e ka re'i don tshigs sa ta'i gsang sngags kyis// shes rab dmigs med byang chub sems kyi khrus// e ka ra'i don tshig de wa'i gsang sngags kyis// phur pa
379b6(chi): byang chub sems kyi gnang bdun dri ma'i khrus// e ka ra'i tshig rtsa brgya'i gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi 'phrin las byang sems rnam gsum khrus// e ka ra'i
379b7(chi): don tshig sprin dza'i gsang sngags kyis// tshad med sgo ma gsang yum byang sems khrus// e ka ra'i sprin don tshig ai ka'i gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje phur pa
380a1(chi): dgra yi bag tshugs byang sems khrus// e ka ra'i sprin rin don tshig gsang sngags kyis// dgra bgegs mnan gzir thams cad byang chub
380a2(chi): sems kyi khrus// e ka ra'i sprin dri'i don tshig gis// rdo rje phur pa thugs kyi byang sems kyis// srid gsum bsgral pa'i gra du byang sems khrus// e kA ra'i sbyin
380a3(chi): ra'i don tshig gis// rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs kyi 'phrin las kyis// chags pa dbang du bsdus nas bsgul ba'i byang sems khrus// e kA sprin gyi pany+tsa'i don tshig
380a4(chi): gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi thugs ni 'phrin las chags pa yis// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med pa'i khrus// e ka ra'i don tshig e ka ra'i gsang sngags
380a5(chi): kyis/ chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags byin brlabs mthus// brnag pa'i ri bo ye shes lnga yis mnan// ra tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rtsa brgyad phur pa
380a6(chi): gnag pa mnan// ra yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// ri bo'i 'og tu thugs ni byang chub sems kyis mnan// pany+tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// bdud bdag
380a7(chi): bcom ldan 'jigs byed kyis// bran dang lha 'dre gdug pa bka' bsgo nyan// tri'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa can la gtad mnan pa'o// sad dang tsa'i
380b1(chi): don tshig gnyis kyis gsang sngags kyis// gnag pa thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnan// rtsa rgyu'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje khro bo'i phur pa yis// 'phrin
380b2(chi): las chags pas dbang du bskul nas btub// bskal par mi 'byung mnan pa'i gsang sngags so// de wa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// mAnan phur gso zhig
380b3(chi): gzi byin bskyed// e ka'i sprin gyi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// bzung zhing bsdam brdeg mnan pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu'o// sprin ra'i dron tshig gi gsang sngags
380b4(chi): kyis/ khro bo phur pas thugs dbang drag tu bsgral zhing mnan// sprin tI'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum thugs ni yang dag gis// 'phrin
380b5(chi): las chags pas dbang bsdus drag bskul mnan// sprin dag pany+tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi 'phrin las chags pas dbang sdud skye ba med pa
380b6(chi): mnan/ e ka'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// yid dang zhe sdang ma rig gnas su bsgral ba'i mthu// tsa ra'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gnag pa'i tshe brten
380b7(chi): 'khor ba rtsad gcod mthu// ra yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// nyon mongs yid kyi bge chags 'dod chags rtsad nas ga cad// tri'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis//
381a1(chi): bag chags so bzhi'i gti mug rtsad nas gcad// pany+tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis/ bcom ldan bdud bdag sku ni myur bskul mthu/
381a2(chi): tsha yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// dpal chen rdo rje khro ba thabs dang shes rab dang // hUM gi 'phrin las dbang sdud tshe rtag rnam shes bsregs// sa ta'i don tshig gas
381a3(chi): sngags kyis// sku stong sku slad khro bo lcags phur la// rno myur chas pa'i bar snang ser bab bzhin// rtsa rgya'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gsang ba yum bzhi
381a4(chi): gzung zhing gdam brten mthu// di ba don tshig gsang sngags kyis// brnag pa thams cad mnan cing rab bzir te// rdo rje phur pas dbang bsdud bskul sgrol mthu/
381a5(chi): spri na dza'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje khro bo 'phrin las kyis// chags pas dbang du bsdus nas drag tu bsgral// sprin dza'i e ka'i don tshig gsang sngags
381a6(chi): kyis chos rnams thams cad skye med ngang du sgrol ba'i mthu// dkyus tshig don tshig 'phel 'grib ni// re re la yang gdam par sbyar// e ka'i dam tshig gsang
381a7(chi): sngags kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi mthus// yan lag bcings pa'i gnang rdeg zor// ri'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// sems dran myos byed
381b1(chi): gnad brdeg zor// pany+tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// bcom ldan bdud bdag gong don bka' bsgom gnang brdeg go/ tri yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis//
381b2(chi): dbang po rnam shes bsdam brdeg zor gyi mthu// tsha'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// thabs dang shes rab rab tu lus bshig gnang brdeg zor// tsa rA'i don tshig
381b3(chi): gsang sngags kyis// gnag pa'i snying khrag gcod pa'i gnang brdeg zor// sa ta'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// dpal chen rdo rje khro bo'i thugs kyi 'phrin las kyis//
381b4(chi): tshugs pas dbang sdud bskul bsgral tshe brten gnang brdeg zor// de wa'i ron tshig gsang sngags kyis// gzung cing bsdam brdeg gnad brdeg zor// rtsa brgya'i don
381b5(chi): tshig gsang sngags kyis// bcu gcig mda' phur gnad bdun rtsa brgyad zor// sprin dza don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gnag pa mnan brdeg gnang brdeg zor//
381b6(chi): rdo rje phur pas khrag rdal ni bsgrag zor// sprin dza e'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje khro bo thugs kyi 'phrin las kyis// bag chags phung po skye med ngang du
381b7(chi): bsgral ba'i phyir// e ka oM ka'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu// brnag pa'i lus dang gti mug bsregs// rnal 'byor
382a1(chi): sku'i dngos grub thob pa'i mthug/ ra yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// brnag pa'i yid dang tsha grang bsregs// rnal 'byor thugs kyi dngos
382a2(chi): grub thob// pany+tsA'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// bden pa'i byin rlabs sangs rgyas mthu yis ni// bka' bsgo myur du bsreg cing gnag pa'i ni rbal bsreg pa'i
382a3(chi): mthu/ ra tsa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rnam shes bcud dang tshe yi rten bsregs mthu// dri'i don tshig gsang sdigs kyis// gnag pa'i ngag dang bkres skom
382a4(chi): bsregs// rnal 'byor gsung gi dngos grub thob pa'i mthu// tsha'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje ye shes me 'bar bas// rdo rje
382a5(chi): me dpal snying bsreg mthu// sa ta'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// dpal chen khro bo thugs kyi 'phrin las kyis// chags pa mi gtong dbang sdud drag tu bsreg
382a6(chi): di wa'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gzung zhing bsdams brtag rdo rje me dpal snying bsreg mthu// rtsa brgya'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje phur pa'i me bskal
382a7(chi): zhig/ me dpung dug sdong bsreg pa'i mthu// sprin dza'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// gnag pa mnan gzir rdo rje ye shes me yis bsreg/ sprin dza'i e ka'i don
382b1(chi): tshig gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje phur pa'i me dpal snying khrag bsreg/ sprin dza rA'i don tshig gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi 'phrin las chags pa'i dbang sdud
382b2(chi): brdegapasprin dza tri yi don tshig gsang sngags kyis// mi rtog ye shes me'i rtog pa'i dug stong bsreg/ e kA ra la 'bru tshig gnyis gnyis so// tI la don tshig gnyis
382b3(chi): dang 'bru tshe lnga// tsa ri la 'bru tshig lnga dang don tshig gnyis// pany+tsa'i 'bru tshig bzhi dang don tshig gcig/ tshwa yi sa ta don tshig gnyis dang 'bru tshig gnyis gnyis so//
382b4(chi): rtsa brgya 'bru tshig bcu gsum don tshig dgu/ di pa la dron tshig gsum dang 'bru tshig dgu/ sprin dza la ni 'bru tshig bzhi// sprin dza e kA la ngan tshig gnyis dang 'bru tshig
382b5(chi): drug/ sprin ra ngon tshig gnyis dang 'bru tshog lnga// sprin tri don tshig gnyis dang 'bru tshig drug/ mthar gnas sprin dza tsi ri don tshig lnga dang 'bru tshig bcu gsum
382b6(chi): mi rdo rje thugs kyi 'phrin las gsang sngags kyis// khyab pa'i drug sngags sbyor ba las// btsan dug sbyor ba me dang 'dra// gnag po'i sbyor ba drug sbeng tshe rten
382b7(chi): bsreg gdams pa rin chen dag la bri// e ka'i dbus ma ni dkyus ni bskor tshoms la// e ka'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags ni// khyab pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i don//
383a1(chi): pha rol phyin pa grol ba'o// ra yi dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu// zhe sdang sgro la tshe la gnad gcod
383a2(chi): mthu/ tri yi dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// phrag dog sgro la tshe gnad 'brel// tsa ra'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// nga rgyal tshe sgo la tshe gnad 'brel//
383a3(chi): tsha yi dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// gti mug sgo dag tshe gnad 'brel// pany+tsa'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// gti mug sgo dgra tshe gnad 'brel/
383a4(chi): pa ny+dza 'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// 'dod chags sgo dag tsha'i gan da gcod 'brel// skor tshoms dkyus tshig rtsa brgya la// don gyi dkyus tshig e ka'i sa//
383a5(chi): e ka'i gsang sngags skor tshoms gsang sngags kyis// sbyor ba e da ka ra sbyar byas na// grogs bral khrag dngas me dpal khrag skyug gnad// chos nyid bden pa'i
383a6(chi): byin rlabs mthus// 'dod pa'i bya don grub pa'o// ra'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// dbab pa'i dbugs gdangs me dpal snying gzer gnad// 'dod pa'i bya
383a7(chi): ba don grub pa'o// tri yi dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// tsa dngas yan lag me dpal bcings pa'i ga nad// skor tshoms e ka'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis//
383b1(chi): gzir non sems dang me dpal snying khrag spyo ba'i gnang // tsi ri'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// smyo dang me dpal rnam shes sdom pa'i gnang// tsha ba'i dkyus tshig
383b2(chi): gsang sngags kyis// stobs byed tshe rten mi dpal srog rtsa gcod pa'i gnad// yang snying bdun gyis don bzhi re re drug/ thun 'phang me dpal gnad bdun du gug
383b3(chi): bstim la// dgug thul bsdam gzar smyos brgya la sha rus rul// gnag pa me dpal 'byung lnga rim bzhin 'gegs pa'i mthu// e ka'i mthar gnas e ka'i
383b4(chi): dkyus tshig gsung sngags kyis// tshor byed rnam shes rten la gdab// yum bzhi 'dzin byed gsang sngags kyis// sbyor ba bco lnga gnang re'o// ra'i dkyus tshig
383b5(chi): gsang sngags kyis// mthong shes rnam shes rten la gdab// tI'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// thos byed rnam shes rten la gdab// tsa ri'i dkyus tshig
383b6(chi): gsang sngags kyis// rten byed rnam shes rten la gdab// pany+tsa'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// myong byed rnam shes rten la dra brab// tsha'i dkyus tshig gsang
383b7(chi): sngags kyis// 'khor rgyu rnam shes rten la gdab// sa ta'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags dang // sprin dza'i gsang sngags par gyi ni// bran dang pho nya sbyor ba'o//
384a1(chi): mthar gnas dbus ma na'i gsang sngags kyis// mthur dbrog zil gyis gnon par byed// mthar gnas dkyus ni skor gsum gyis// rdo rje
384a2(chi): me dpal gzir gnon sgrol mchod dang // skur stonA byang sems rin chen rnam gsum don// bco brgyad nyi shu gcig dang gnad bdun sa// mnan pa'i rgyu dang sku
384a3(chi): mchog phan gnod smon lam mo// zhes kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+da tra las// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan
384a4(chi): 'das badz+ra kI la yas// 'jug gi don du tshag dang / yi ge'i sgra yi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta tra Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba
384a5(chi): b+ha ma ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaHa A/ i I/ u U/ r-i rAM/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ 'khum par byed dang sdud pa dang / khong du 'gro dang sbyor ba'o//
384a6(chi): lhag ma gnyis dang rwa bo gnyis// zla tshes thig le dgas yig dang // ring dang thung dang drag zhan dang // rtse mo rked pa rtsa ba dang // sgra yis sgra yig bod cing drang bar bya'o// yi ge
384a7(chi): dra bo skabs dang sbyar// sgra yi sa bon sgra yi bong// don ni sgra las byung ba ste// sgra don phyi mo de las drang // zla tshes thig le gdag yig dang // zhes kI la ya bcu gnyis kyis
384b1(chi): tan+da tra las/ tshig dang yi ge sngags kyi sgra'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis ting nge
384b2(chi): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad pas/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro ba'i don 'di gsung so// snang ba thams cad yul yin te/
384b3(chi): yul gyi rnam pa sems yin pas// sems las ma rtogs gang yang med// sems ni yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// rnam rtog skye ba'i gzhi med par// rnam rtog
384b4(chi): nyid kyang yang gsang thugs// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// thams cad kun gyi dngos gzhi ste// gnyis su 'byung ba gang zhe na// rtogs dang ma rtogs byung bas na//
384b5(chi): sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med la// 'khor ba lnga 'am myang 'das snga// myang 'das snga na 'khor ba min// 'on te 'khor ba snga 'gyur na// rang rdol byung ma tha dad byung //
384b6(chi): nyi ma grib so rang bzhin nam// mo sham bu drang ri bong dang // me dang du ba de bzhin pas// de ltar de bzhin rtsod gzhi rtogs// dka' spyad theg chen rigs can gyis//
384b7(chi): rgyu dang goms dang 'bras bu 'byung // ci phyir 'khor ba yul la shor// sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin pas// nyi ma'i ngo la mun pa'i gzhi med ltar du// 'khor
385a1(chi): 'das byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no// 'khor 'das byang sems rang byung gzhan ma med// rin chen gling du phyin pas gzhan nas btsal mi
385a2(chi): dgos rig pa khong nas shar bas sangs rgyas da lta nyid// sems rtogs ye bsgom sgom med yengs su med// yongs su med pas 'byung theg skyon// sgom med
385a3(chi): yengs drang ma yengs med nyid na// da lta nyid na thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs// nus pa thob pas sgom dang mri bsgom gnyis// de ltar de bzhin gdams pa rin chen
385a4(chi): dag la bri// nang rtogs na nang sangs rgyas nub rtogs na nub sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// bsgom med dgos 'dod rnam rtog spang du med//
385a5(chi): bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu ste gzhan nas byung ba min// bden pa'i byin rlabs yang dag bstan bsrungs mthu// thabs kyis 'gro don 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad mthu//
385a6(chi): sangs rgyas dngos grub par chod bsgral bar bya'o// stag dang stag phrug gnyis char rtsa la ma shor// bkug gdab mnan 'phangs bsreg pa'i mthu// dkyil 'khor gru
385a7(chi): gsum zla gam 'khor lo dang // gru char zla gam 'khor lo dang // gru chad zla gam par khyams sgo khyud dang // thod pa'i thun dang rtsa ba'i lha sngags// khrag zor nyungs zer
385b1(chi): dug zor dang // gtor zor rting la phur zor dang // thun zor mthu srog zil mnan drang // khams gsum bsgral ba'i mchod pa bya'o// mnga' gzhu thal chen khrag chen
385b2(chi): byug thod khrag thun ni phyar bar bya// dam tshig brgyad kyi dus la bab// las kyis mnar ba'i byur ngan las zad 'di// drag pa'i 'phrin las shugs kyis mi bsgral du//
385b3(chi): bstan pa 'jig pa'i chos 'khor slob// drag por gyur pa'i khrag zor 'di// snying khrag bcos shig gu lu na// rnam shes sdom shig ga na raM// srog rtsa chod cig su tri
385b4(chi): ram/ phog par rgyob cig snying gri dkyil// gnad du rgyob cig srog pa rtsa// gnag pa'i khong du khrag thun khrag zor spyos// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil
385b5(chi): 'khor nas// b.rung bdag 'jigs byed chen po dang // yum chen 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ma// gnyis su med pa'i byin rlabs las// gdug pa 'dul mdzad
385b6(chi): khro bo khro mo byung // khro bo khro mo'i byin rlabs las// sprul pa'i mgo brnyan rnams byung ba// da ni zor gyi las mdzod cig/ phyogs bcu'i zor la mnga' mdzad pas/
385b7(chi): phyogs bcu'i khro bo phyag brnyan de// bud med 'di ltar yi mtshan can// bud med lus la khwa thabs mgo/ wa thabs mgo can ma ni byang sems phyag rgya mo// 'phra
386a1(chi): men mgo can ma ni byang sems 'phra men ma// g.yas pa rang rtags zhing mchog gzhu// g.yon pa ltas ngan mde'u phur// g.yon mdung g.yas
386a2(chi): drangs thugs kur bkang // gnag pa'i gnar la thun zor ya// de ltar de rjes de bzhin no// badren pa'i byin rlabs zor gyi mthu// kunan+da lus khrag skyug rgyu gzer mthu/
386a3(chi): sha ram gyis ni skyo 'bog skyug pa'i mthu// su tI ram gyis srog dang bral ba'i mthu// 'ba' lcis snying ni zhugs par byed pa'i mthu// ki lis gnad bdun tshe rten bdun rgyud
386a4(chi): gcang pa'i mthu// mthu srog zil gnon rig pa'i rgyun gcod mthu// khams gsum bsgral tshod dkyus don bcu gcig mthu// stag dang stag phrug rtsal ma shor ba'i mthu
386a5(chi): ni/ lta spyod glang po spyad na tshogs su 'gyur// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dang // sku mchog rgyun gyi spyod lam dang rnam bzhi yis// shes pa'i rgyu dang gom
386a6(chi): pa'i lam// khar tsha ro khar nyin da lta'i shes pa bzhin// 'chad dang nyan dang bsgom drang 'don// ma'i gzhal yas khang na gnas kyang de ltar de bzhin no// shes pa'i
386a7(chi): bag chags goms pa sa gang ltar byas pa mthu// mnga' mde'u gzhu dang skyes bu'i mthu// gang ltar byas pa'i 'dod pa de bzhin du// dbus ma'i drag po drug gi sbyor
386b1(chi): ba'i 'phrin las kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu// gang la bya ba 'dod pa'i don grub pa'o// skor tshoms lnga lnga'i mtshan nyid gsang sngags dang /
386b2(chi): bran dang pho nya grang la dmigs pa'i sngags// bdun 'bum bsnyen pa thos nas 'dod pa'i bya ba 'grub// e ka dbus ma nas sa'i gsang sngags drug/ e ka'i gsang
386b3(chi): sngags sbyor ba'i mthu// bde bar gshegs pa'i zer gyi mthu// skor tshoms lnga yi gsang sngags la// bran dang pho nya'i gsang sngags 'dus// e ka'i gsang sngags
386b4(chi): drag pa'i bsdus la gdab// gnad sa re rer phur pa bdun tsho la// phur pa re lu gzir gno na re// 'dzin cing 'gugs pa'i sngags kyis gzir cing gdab// yum
386b5(chi): bzhi sngags dang phyag rgyas mnan// gnad rer de ltar bdun bdun gyis// 'dzin 'gugs gsang sngags dam pa ni// bde gshegs thugs kyi gsang sngags yang zhun
386b6(chi): mthu bco brgyad gnAng rer bdun gyis gnag pa tshe rtenu 'brel bar byed// e kra'i dbus ma nI e ka sa gsang sngags ni// thugs kyi gsang sngags e ka'i gas
386b7(chi): sngags dang // 'dzin cing 'gugs pa'i rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// sbyor ba bzhi'i gnas pa'i sngags// zhe sdang myos dang snying yang 'gas nas 'chi// e ka
387a1(chi): dbus ma ra'i gsang sngags la// thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// sbyor bzhi'i gnag pa phrag dog rkang bskums
387a2(chi): e ka dbus ma tI'i gsung sngags la// thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// sbyor bzhi'i gnag pa nga rgyal lag bskums 'tsho//
387a3(chi): e ka'i tsa ri'i gsang sngags la/ thog me thugs kyi gsang sngags 'dzin rdo rje yum bzhi sngags// sbyor gzhi'i gnag po 'dod chags chu 'gags 'chi// e ka'i dbus
387a4(chi): ma pany+dza gsang sngags la// e ka dbus mA na yi gsang sngags dang // thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'grogs rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// sbyor gzhi gti mug glang khor mgo
387a5(chi): 'gas 'chi// e kA'i mthar gnas e ka'i gsung sngags la// e ka'i A ka'i kar ma'i gsang sngags dang // thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs rdo rje yum bzhi'i
387a6(chi): sngags// gnag pa dri 'gags tsha ba'i nad kyi 'chi// e ka'i mthar gnas ra'i gsang sngags la// e kA'i e ka'i karma'i gsung sngags dang // thugs kyi 'dzin
387a7(chi): 'gugs rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// gnag pa'i gzugs 'gas mkhris nang nad kyis 'tshe bar 'gyur// e ka'i mthar gnas tri'i gsang sngags la// e ka'i e
387b1(chi): ka'i karma'i gsang sngags dang // thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa'i rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// dgra bgegs rna gzer nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// e
387b2(chi): ka'i mthar gnas tsa ra'i gsang sngags la// e ka'i e ka'i karma'i gsang sngags dang // thog ma thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags//
387b3(chi): lus 'dzid lus 'jig rlung 'grags nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// e ka'i pany+tsa mthar gnas gsang sngags la// e ka'i e ka'i karma'i gsang sngags dang // thog
387b4(chi): ma thugs kyi gsang sngags 'dzin 'gugs yum bzhi'i sngags// skyo 'bog rgyal nad lkugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur// e ka'i mthar gnas tsha'i gsang sngags la//
387b5(chi): e ka'i e ka'i karma'i gsang sngags dang // thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa'i rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// skye ba'i rgyun gcad chu 'gags nad kyi 'chi bar
387b6(chi): 'gyur/ mthar gnas e ka'i gsang sngags la// e ka'i e ka'i gsang sngags dang // thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa'i rdo rje phur pa yis// dbang
387b7(chi): po rten mgo klad pa gas nas 'chi// mthar gnas uSh+Ta na'i gsang sngags la// e ka'i e ka'i karma'i gsang sngags dang // thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs
388a1(chi): pa'i rdo rje yum bzhi'i sngags// che sri chung sri grod sr-i dang // lha 'dre gdug pa can gyi rigs rgyud rtsad gcad nas// de yi mthu 'phrog zil gnon bslang rmi
388a2(chi): srid mthar gnas e mthar dbus ma nas// gsang sngags gsum la dkyil 'khor gsum// e ka'i e ma gsang sngags dang // thugs kyi 'dzin 'gugs 'debs pa'i
388a3(chi): rdorje yum bzhi'i sngags// phur pa bcu gcig snying po bris sngags btab// thog dang ser ba chu chen zlog par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khar btab 'jig par 'gyur// gang la
388a4(chi): dmigs pa'i ri 'gyel brag 'grum 'gyur// chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags byin rlabs mthu// gang la btab kyang thogs med thebs pa'i mthu// zhes kau la ya bcu gnyis kyi
388a5(chi): tan tA las/ chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags dang // 'phrin las rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das bdud bdag
388a6(chi): chen pos bdud rnam par bcom nas 'bras bu mthar thug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'bras bu tan tra yongs su gtad pa la ched du gzung ba 'di gsungs
388a7(chi): te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // bde gshegs dngos gzhi ma gzigs so// rang bzhin sbas pa gab pa dang // rgyud lung man ngag gsang phyir gcus//
388b1(chi): rin chen dag la bri bar bya// rtog ge ba yi spyod yul min// kun gyi dngos gzhi rtog par shor// gzugs rdzogs 'byung ba bzhi po yang // nye bar len pa len byed byed
388b2(chi): lnga 'phen par byed pa'i las yin pas// smin pa'i 'bras bu rgyud drug tu// rten cing 'brel pa'i 'khor lo bskor// de las bzlog thabs yang dag don//
388b3(chi): bskyed pa'i rim pa yang dag don// de ltar de bzhin dkyil 'khor lha// gnyis su 'byor pa gcig tu gsal// nus 'jug skyes pa ltas thob pa// e A n+d+ra
388b4(chi): gis gzungs la sogs// nyon mongs sgrib pa phyi gzung yul las 'das// oM dang AHdang hUM gi ngo bo las// 'dzin pa shes bya'i sgrib pa don ma longs//
388b5(chi): chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems kyi rnam pa lha'i sku// bde gshegs gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rig pa gsal// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs ma long //
388b6(chi): phung po khams dang skye mched dang // bde gshegs dkyil 'khor klong du'o// lus ngag yid gsum phur pa 'am// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi klong dkyil 'khor/
388b7(chi): snang la rang bzhin mod pa'i 'ja' lta bu// kha mig rna ba yan lag gzung 'dzin gnyis// rang bzhin med par 'dzin pa yang gsang min// mar me 'od kyis mun
389a1(chi): pa sel 'gyur te// phyogs gcig mun pa sel mo 'gyur// 'od chung mun pa sel mi 'gyur// bcu drug 'od kyi mun pa sel/
389a2(chi): tha dad rin chen rnyed gyur tsam// dang po de ltar de bzhin no// rin chen rang la rtog pa rnyed// mun pa'i dmag ni mtsho nag bzhin// sprin gyis
389a3(chi): bsgribs pa'i nyi ma ltar// rin chen tha dad de bzhin no// sprin med nyi ma shar ba'i 'od// nyi zer dro gsal bde 'bras 'byung // rang la rin
389a4(chi): chen rnyed gyur te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes smra// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// gzugs su rnam gnyis 'byung ba'o// dag dang ma
389a5(chi): dag 'gro don ni// skad cig ma ni 'phrin las bzhi// sku gnyis 'gro don byin brlabs snang // 'gro ba rnams la bde 'bras snang // rgya
389a6(chi): mtsho'i kha dang rgya mtsho'i gting // rkyen gyis de ltar de bzhin du// tha dad pa dang tha dad min// rin chen rnyed pa de bzhin no// yang gsang thugs rgya
389a7(chi): dkyil 'khor ni// chos rnams thams cad sems yin no// sems nyid rnam par shes pas rdo rjer bsgom// chos can chos nyid gnyis su med// chos rnams
389b1(chi): thams cad 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid kyang sems yin pas// sems nyid rnam par shes pa rdo rjer sgom// 'khor 'das kun rdzob sems nyid pas//
389b2(chi): don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med// sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// gnyis la gdam ngag re re ni// 'od kyis
389b3(chi): mun pas sel mi sel// tha dad pa dang tha mi dad// rims bzhin rin chen gdam ngag 'byung // chos rnams thams cad skye med la// rtog pa'i dbang
389b4(chi): gis sdug bsngal smin// de dag grol bar bya ba'i phyir// 'og min gtso mo'i b+ha ga nas// drag po 'jigs byed bdud bdag bzhengs// mgon po
389b5(chi): bdag nyid chen po ngas// thams cad rgyud kyis rgyud brtags dka'// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// kun gyi don du gsungs pa yis// rjes
389b6(chi): 'jug rnams kyis bstan par gzung // 'gro ba las ni dang po yin// rdo rje rgyung 'di bris gyur nas// klog dang kha ton byed pa rnams// sgra med gnas su mi
389b7(chi): skye bar dkon mchog sgras sgrogs gnas su skye// skye ba ngan pa len pa bor// rim par bgrod nas byang chub thob// rdo rje rgyud 'di thos bsams nas/
390a1(chi): rjes 'jug thogs med shes rab 'gyur// rdo rje rgyud 'di ba shad 'gyur na// skye ba mang rgyud gnas lnga la// 'di yis 'bras bu 'phel bar
390a2(chi): 'gyur/ rdo rje rgyud la bsgoms gyur na// tshe 'di nyid la phyi re mi ldog/ mngon shes drug no 'char bar 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen la// ci 'dod don
390a3(chi): ni 'byung bar 'gyur// kI la ya sprin dza tan tra ka pa tsa// snga rabs da lta slad kyis 'byon// sangs rgyas 'di las byung ba yin// rgyud kun gyi ni gsang sngags sgra/
390a4(chi): gsal 'di// rjes 'jug las ni dang po yin// mthong zhing thos nas rtogs par 'gyur// 'di la ma yengs dam tshig che// rdo rje thugs kyi las skyes rtogs gyur
390a5(chi): na thugs kyi sku dang blugs kyi gsung // bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags pas// yon tan thams cad 'di las 'byung // dngos por lta ba'i gsang sngags kyang //
390a6(chi): 'di nyid gzung zhing gsang spyad na// dam pa rnams kyang dam pa'i mchog/ dngos po sgyu ma na bu na mthong // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung // thugs rdo rje la zhus
390a7(chi): te/ gnyis su med par ting 'dzin las bzhengs te/ sdud pa po thugs rdo rje la gnyis su med par bzhugs te// cig par rang bzhin du mnyam zhing dbyer med par gyur te tshe
390b1(chi): snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ki la ya bcu gnyis kyi ha na tra las/ 'bras bu mthar thug pa'i yongs su gtad pa'i le'u
390b2(chi): sde bcu gzhes pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya gu h+ya man tra ta na tra sa du b+hU ta b+h+r-i na/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur ba
390b3(chi): gsang po'i sngags rgyud 'byung po kun 'dul/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
390b4(chi): 'das zhe sdang rdo rje zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'og min sum cu rtsa gsum du 'bar ba'i gtun khung rdo rje tho ba rol pa'i gzhal
390b5(chi): yas khang mngon par sprul te/ 'byung po thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhal gsum las/ oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya sarba big+h+nAn
390b6(chi): baM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba bsgrags pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dod pa khams kyi gnas ris su/ 'ur 'ur dang / mer mer dang / shig shig dang / thor thor du gyur to// thugs
390b7(chi): ka nas hUM hUM hUM/ zhes spros shing zhal nas drag po'i sngags brjod pas/ phyogs bcur phyogs skyong ba'i gdan la/ 'bar ba rol pa'i khro bo chen po bcu gshegs te rnam par gtams
391a1(chi): so/ nyid kyis snying po brjod pas sprul pa dang / yang sbrul dang / sum sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par sprul te/
391a2(chi): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang za ba 'bar ba'i gtun khrong srid pa'i khyams khang bang rim gsum dang ldan par sprul te/ 'di ltar gyi snang ba 'di byugaso// de'i
391a3(chi): de ma thag tu ru tra'i sde dang / dam log dang / dam sril sogs pa khyams khang du chud de/ 'bros bzhin du gonas med par thams cad kyang du 'a'od chen po'i gnas
391a4(chi): su lhung ste gnas so// rdo rje khro bo chen po rnams kyang sprul pa dang yang sbrul sum sbrul du bcas te/ kun nas 'khrig pa las shin tu sha'i phung po la sbrang bu lding zhing
391a5(chi): 'du ba ltar gnas par byas so// de ltar cho 'phrul chen po kun nas 'khrugs pa las/ de ma thag par karma he ru ka rdo rje las zhes bya ba/ rang gi gnas
391a6(chi): 'khor gyi rlung / bzung nas bzhengs te/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i drung du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po/ 'dod pa'i
391a7(chi): khams 'dir 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ston pa ci'i chu ci'i rkyen lags/ zhe sdang gi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
391b1(chi): byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las/ ma 'ongs pa rnams la don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar cho 'phrul snang bar byas te/ dri
391b2(chi): ba'i dus la bab pas dris shig/ dris pa legs so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dge ba srog dang 'dra ba la bar du gcod cing / dkar po'i las rnam par
391b3(chi): 'gag par byed pa tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten du cho 'phrul bstan pa'o// sems dpa' chen po/ dam log dang / dam sri dang / ru tra'i
391b4(chi): sde tshar gcad pa'i phyir phur pa gtun khung rdo rje tho ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'bar ba'i khro bo rol pa'i las bshad par bya ste/ don yod par 'gyur ba'i phyir
391b5(chi): gus par gyis la zung zhig/ ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje bur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
391b6(chi): / de nas sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyis gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das// dam log dam sri ru tra'i sde// khungs kyi rtsa da ni ji ltar gcad// sgrub la bar chod
391b7(chi): ji ltar bsgral// khro bo'i sngags dang dkyil 'khor gang // gdug pa bsgral zhing dkyil 'khor mnan pa'i las// 'jigs byed rol pas bstan du gsol// ces gsol te gus pas 'dun mo/
392a1(chi): 'jigs byed chen po zhe sdang rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon dran pa thog ma'i tshe// bskal pa 'bum phrag 'dzum sngon du// sangs rgyas
392a2(chi): 'jig rten sgron ma'i dus// dge slong thub par dga' ba la// nag po thar pas gsang don zhus// de tshe kun po kun mo no// ming sring gnyis kyis phag nyan byas
392a3(chi): rang gi sgrar zhugs log par bsgrubs// gzhan la tshul brjod log par smras// de nas nag po rang thag pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i sgor zhugs nas// gangs rgya
392a4(chi): zhun chu khol ma 'thungs// skye ba de 'phos sdug bsngal myong // thug pa chen po'i zhing khams su// las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams skyes// rang thag ru trar nar
392a5(chi): seMn che// mos pa byas shing 'khor du 'dun// ru tra'i bskal pa ma mchis te// skal ngan zhing sas dpyad thag chad// 'di dag drang ba'i skal ba med// rtag
392a6(chi): tu 'khor 'gyur rtag tu gzhom// 'di dag lang ka'i grong rdal du// srin po lang ka mgrin bcu'i bu// dud bu mgrin drang kha 'bar ma// zhe sdang ma rungs rags
392a7(chi): pa can// sngon gyi las kyi mtshams sbyar bskyed// bong bu lta bu'i rna pa can// mi yi thod phor lag na thogs// spre'u lpags pa gos su gyon// kha nas
392b1(chi): dud pa sngo dmar phyung // bu chung rkun bur brkus shing za// dud 'gro ra rkun ra sha za// ra lpags ra mgo brungs su 'tsher// sbyor ste srin mo brag phugs sbed// lus dang
392b2(chi): mnyam pa'i ral pa la// mgo ge sum sprul cing ro dag sbed// bu chung phyi ba nya yi mgo/ 'phreng ba bgrang zhing rlung nag dang // kha nas me 'phror chu gzhung zhon//
392b3(chi): srog chags 'phra mo kun gsod cing // srog dang sngags kyi 'tsho ba byed// sngags kyi nus pa log pa'i mthus// las kyi srin po'i rigs su grug// gshog par ldan zhing
392b4(chi): so rno ba// sder mor ldan zhing mi phyugs skra// gsang sngags dam las gtan log pa// dam pa'i sri can byed pa'i sgra// smon lam 'debs shing sngags tshul spyod//
392b5(chi): ming yang 'brog te'u nag po dang // nag mo bya yi mgo can grags// de dag bu tsha ming sring drug/ mi phyugs phra mo kun yang brku// dge ba'i rna nyan bar chad byed//
392b6(chi): srog chags za byed dge sbyong rdzu// ming yang dkor begs 'ba' te'u 'dre// sa srin klu srin dam sr-i grags// sho khams srin po'i yul khams nas// 'dod/
392b7(chi): khams srid pa thams cad nyul// 'jig rten khams kun khyab par 'tshe// thod 'a phreng can dang bzhin mi sdug/ bdud po bdud mo'i bu tsha ni// ming sring
393a1(chi): bcu gcig sde tshan bcas// de dag sprul pa bsam yas pa// mgon po srog bdag mngag pa'i phyogs// spun dgu 'gong po'i phyogs su rdzu//
393a2(chi): 'gong po 'gong mo drapag med pas// dge ba'i bar chad bdud du 'gyur// srid pa'i bde ba phung bar bsgyur// thar lam bgrod pa log par 'dren// 'di dag
393a3(chi): log pa rnam gsum ste// rnal 'byor thar lam gang 'dod pas// 'di dag rtag tu grub par bya// ngan pa'i lus ngag las grub pas// yang 'byung 'byung po sdug
393a4(chi): bsngal myong // thar lam gtan bral srid par dmyal// rab tu snying rje spyang thag chad// klad par byas na yud tsam bde// de ltar shes pas mnan par bya// zhes
393a5(chi): gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las/ log pa'i khungs rtsad gcad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang zhe sdang
393a6(chi): gi rgyal po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' sku la pa/ ru tra dam log dam sri'i sde// rim pas dbang bsdu bsgral mnan bya// steng nas khro bo hUM ka ra// sgra 'byin phag dang
393a7(chi): smig bur bcas// steng gi tshangs pa pho mo yang // gdan du byas pas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'du zhing zal gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM gardza gardza hUM
393b1(chi): phaT/ shar nas khro bo rnam par rgyal// rnam snyems stag dang bya rgod bcas// shar gyi dri za pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing
393b2(chi): zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M ha na hA na hUM phaT/ shar lho khro bo dbyug sngon po// sder mo g.yag dang bya rog bcas// shar lho me lha pho mo'i gdan// gdan
393b3(chi): du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dar+b+ha hU~M da had ha hUM phaT/ lho nas khro bo ga shin rje gshed// dur khrod sha ba'ug
393b4(chi): par bcas// lho phyogs ga shin rje pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA na ta ka hUM pa tsa pa 6
393b5(chi): hUM phaT/ lho nub khro bo mi gso mgon// gtun khung gzig dang khwa tar bcas// lho nub srin po pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing
393b6(chi): zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha AR+Ya a tsa la hUM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ nub nas khro bo rta mchog dpal// gtun mi byi la pu shud bcas// nub phyogs klu rgyal pho mo'i
393b7(chi): bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub byang khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal/
394a1(chi): mda' snyems spung mo khra dang bcas// nub byung rlung lha pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis
394a2(chi): gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ byang nas khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// rlung 'byin seng ge pA wang bcas// byang phyogs gnod sbyin pho mo'i bdag
394a3(chi): gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du bsdus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ byang shar khro bo khams gsum rgyal//
394a4(chi): gsod byed dred dang sre mor bcas// byang shar dbang ldan pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha traM
394a5(chi): lo kya bi dza ya hUM bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ 'og nas khro bo stobs po che// bskyed chen dom dang byi bar bcas// 'og gi sa bdag pho mo'i bdag/ gdan du gzir bas sprul pa
394a6(chi): rnams// dbang du 'dus shing zil gyis gnon// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M phoT phoT hUM phaT/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rdo rje khro bas rnam par gtams//
394a7(chi): dbus su ma hA de ba dang // ru tra chen po khyo shug bsnol// bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nu dang // 'khor lo rgyas 'debs dag tu bya// khro bo bcu gcig dkyil 'khor ni/
394b1(chi): kun kyang mthing nag rngam pa'i sku// rdo rje phur pa thod khrag rnams// sprul pa lcags kyu phur pa 'debs// ru tra chen po'i sde dpon rnams// dbang sdud bran du gzir nas kyang //
394b2(chi): dpa' rtags dpa' bo'i chas brgyad ldan// sa gnon nyi zla pad+ma tshogs// nyon mongs sreg pa'i ma dpung 'bar// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// mtshon cha sras mchog
394b3(chi): bur pa bskyed// sku stong khro bo chen po la// sku smad phur pa zur gsum mo// gzas pa'i snying dkyil thebs pa bskyed// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa'i gsang ba'i
394b4(chi): sngags rgyud las/ lha rnams kyi rang bzhin dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen pos badz+ra kI
394b5(chi): la yas bka' stsal pa// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas btsal te// rdzas dang yo byad 'khos ldan pas// phyi dang nang gi mtshams kyang gcad// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ban d+he/
394b6(chi): runas nag sngon mo blug par bya// phur bu btse lnga dar gyis gril// rgyu rkyen dbang bskur byin brlabs bya// thog ma dngos grub kun gyi bzhi// bzhi bcu gnyis dang
394b7(chi): lnga bcu brgyad// zhi dang khros pa rigs brgya mchod// 'dzab dang bstod pa bskangs bshogs bya// dza gad bdud rtsi lhag ma yis// rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor ba tsam//
395a1(chi): bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis// gang la mos dang shis pa bri// ye shes khros pa bco lnga dang // pho nya dpung tshogs bcas pa yis//
395a2(chi): phur pa dkyil 'khor gnas la god// gdug cing rtsub pa'i gzas pa'i gzugs// 'dra 'bag bca' dang gzugs su bca'// zag pa'i rdzas dang rme khrag byug/ yang na chu
395a3(chi): sgra'i 'jim pas bya// ming dang rus dang sreg yig gzhug/ smug nag dang ni thal dkar bya// lcags thag btags la e la gtang // rta mgrin skur gnas dbang btsugs te//
395a4(chi): srid pa'i bgegs la zhal mche bcad// mthing nag me 'bar dkyil 'khor du// smug nag sngo nag dmar nag 'bar// 'jigs byed khro bo'i sprul pas drangs// dpal gyi pho nyas
395a5(chi): gnas nas dgug/ bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa dgod// bco lnga khro bo ma mo gsum// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa tshul bzhin gyi// mtshan ma mthong ngam dus bab na//
395a6(chi): 'phrin las drag po brtsam par bya// drag po'i rdzas dang phur pa dang // lha dang sngags kyi dgongs mtshe sdeb// rta mchog skur gsal gnas nas dgug/ dbang drag
395a7(chi): chas su zhugs nas kyang // gsur chan dud pa sgra bcas nas// ma mo bod cing dam la bsdu// bkrag mdangs dbrog cing tshe lung bya// gnad sgor gdab cing khrog thug
395b1(chi): dbag/ byang gi ponyas pa khrag bsgrug/ khyud kyis mos bud du gzhug/ nub kyi khro bas gnas sbyar te// lte skra smras kyis sems lung bstan// nyon mongs bsad nas
395b2(chi): bso ba shar// rtag pa rgyun gyi ye shes bsgom// de ltar 'phrin las mthar phyung na// tshangs pa'i tshe yang 'jig par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa
395b3(chi): gsang ba'i sngags rgyud ltos/ khro bo gsang ba las nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang zhe sdang gi bdag po dpal rdo rje gso
395b4(chi): nus bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ prA dz+wa la pra dz+wa la s+phuT s+phu Ta nas pa na ye hUM phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn hri da la hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+dan+nin+na hUM phaT/
395b5(chi): mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru hUM phaT/ bi da ya bing bing hUM phaT/ na ma sa man ta bing bing hUM phaT/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+he hUM phaT/ na ma sa man ta bi she d+hA ya be ra ba ra
395b6(chi): hUM phaT/ a~M ku shats+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM phaT/ b+hag+h+nAM pa la go hr-i dA ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags rgyud las/ sras mchog rtsa ba'i snying po'i le'u ste
395b7(chi): lnga pa'o// tide nas zhe sdang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// mtshams med pa la mtshams kyang gcad// khro bcus phyogs bcur phur pa gtams//
396a1(chi): khro bo 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad re mig la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas//
396a2(chi): ki la ya yi 'od zer gyis// lcags kyi tsha tsha btab pa ltar// gang la babs pa sul du glan// skor mtshams bzhi dang skor tshoms gsum// smad kyi dkyus tshig drag
396a3(chi): po la/ rag ta tshar gsum tshar lnga sbreng // rngam pa glog gi dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'khrul// dpa' bo khro bo 'jigs par bcas// rigs sngags don
396a4(chi): la yang dag sbyor// rag ta'i mtsho dang keng rus ri// ma sa'i nyor tshogs zhing chen gsur// rngam pa'i mkha' 'gro tshogs la btab// rdo rje khro rgyal he ru kas// gtum
396a5(chi): khro gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// hUM mdzad hUM la ho te rol// hUM mdzad hUM gis thugs dam bskang // gar dgu khros pa'i zhal du
396a6(chi): bstab// stong gsum thams cad phur pa'i lha// bdud 'dul khro bo'i skur bstan pa// phyogs bcu dgra bgegs thams cad kun// dengs par mi byed 'dug 'gyur na//
396a7(chi): thams cad ma lus thebs par gdag/ dam log dam sr-i ru tra'i sde// 'di dag tshar ni ma gcad na// bsgrub la bar chod ma rungs byed// nyams pa bdud ni 'di rnams de
396b1(chi): dgra dang bgegs dang bdud tshogs kyang // 'di gsum ma thul sku dgrar ldang // de phyir bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dam sri mnan cing dam log gsad// ru
396b2(chi): tra'i sde rnams gdul bar bya// bcu gcig dpal dang phyag rgya bzhi// ye shes khro bo bcu lnga'i thugs// srog dang ldan pa'i ye shes sems// 'khor dang bcas
396b3(chi): pa'i bdag po bskyed// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dbyer med pa stim// gzir gnon sgrol ba'i sku ru bsgom// sku dang gsung thugs srog dbang bskur// zhi ba bsnyen
396b4(chi): cing khros pa bsgrub// dngos grub kun gyi gzhi ma yin// sman rag gtor ma la sogs pa// phyi nang gsang po'i mchod pa yis// lo zla'i dus su brtson par
396b5(chi): 'bad/ bsnyen pa'i bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor gang la mos pa ni// 'jigs byed e yi dkyil
396b6(chi): 'khor bskyed// rang bzhin bsgrub phyir bstod cing bskul// zhes gsungs so// kI la sagasang ba'i sngags rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
396b7(chi): / de nas zhe sdang gi bdag po rdo rje gzhon nus bka' stsal pa/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen
397a1(chi): gzhon nu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum brgyad// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg skyeg 'dra// bdud bzhi gtan du bcom
397a2(chi): pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// sku tshe yan lag rag pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhad pas rgod rgod 'dra// g.yon pa dmar la dngas pas gshig she

397a4(chi): 'jigs pa'i skur bstan pas// chos sku mtshan ma med pas zho zhi 'dra// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse lngas rgyud lnga gnas su sgrol// me dpung 'bar

397b1(chi): 'dril sku mdog mthing ka dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs nyi zla pho mo mnan// sgra 'byin phag dang sdigs bu 'khor gyis skor// rnam rgyal dkar po
397b2(chi): rdo rje thod khrag dang // tI shul 'khor lo ri rab phur bu 'dril// zhal mdog dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs brgya byin pho mo mAnan// snyems ma
397b3(chi): stag dang bya rgod 'khor gyis bskor// ba shin rje sngon po rdo rje thod khrag 'thung // nr-i mgo dgra sta ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog sngon po dkar dang dmar bya'i zhal// zhabs
397b4(chi): bzhi brag stengs gshin rje pho mo gnon// dur khrod sha ba 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// rta mgrin dmar po rdo rje thod khrag dang // zhags pas spu gri ri rab phur bu 'dril/
397b5(chi): sku mdog dkar po sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs klu dbang pho mo mnan// gtum mo byi la pu shud 'khor gyis bskor// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram dbyug
397b6(chi): the thogs// sku mdog ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs gnod sbyin pho mo mnan// rlung 'byin seng ge phA wa 'khor gyis bskor// dbyug
397b7(chi): pa sngon po dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs me la pho mo mnan// sder mo g.yog dang bya rog 'khor gyis bskor// mi g.yo ljang sngon rdo rje thod khrag dang //
398a1(chi): ral gri zhags pa ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku mdog ldang sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs bden bral pho mo man na/

398a3(chi): ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs rlung lha pho mo mnan// mda' skems spyang ki khra yi 'khor gyis bskor// khams gsum rnam rgyal tri shul mda' dang gzhu// sku mdog ljang

398a5(chi): 'thung Tazhags pa tho ba ri rab phur bu 'dri la// sku mdog dud kha da kar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brag stengs sa bdag pho mo mnan// bskyod byed dom dang byi ba

398b5(chi): dkyil 'khor bsgom// dben pa ra sa sbyangs maN+Da la bca'// 'khor gnas yo byad blo ldan pas// khro bo yum gyi gtun khung bri// gru gsum rtsa gcig 'bar ba brtsam/
398b6(chi): yang na bcu gcig bdun yang bri// las kyi dkyil 'khor gru gsum e// lto ba dag gra ma sa la bya// lcags sna lnga/ dang du ga shing dang // ming dang bya yi rus pa la// sras mchog
398b7(chi): phur pa gzi ldan bya// gu gul rag ta yungs kar gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin bskyed// ka pA la yi gnas zhugs nas// rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pa brtsams/

399a2(chi): 'dus nye bar bsnyen bya ste// bdun 'bum nyi khri grangs rdzogs nas// rdo rje khro bo rol pa sgrub// 'phar dang sngags khrol bro brdung dang // nyams dang smi ltas bzang mthong

399b7(chi): d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ragA ra tsa tsat+ta zung zung / kha la rag+na tsed tsa da/ kha rag sharma sha na rbi da sto//

400b1(chi): breng breng / tsa la dun dun kham shag rbad/ ma ra sa na pra marta na ye badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn trig nan rA dza ya ma dza haM shaM trig hU ra thum dza/ du me ma ma srog la gzer thums ril shag/ oM

400b3(chi): ra re yatri'u tri'u ya na ma sho dz+ra/ badz+ra ma ri ni tri dza/ tri mA ra ya dza/ dam sr-i tI mA ra ya dza/ na ga rA dza stag sha ka/ many+dzi ko sha gar+b+baM ni/ mA rA ya hUM phaT/ sha lung ni ti sta pa ma a

400b7(chi): ya chings snyoms/ oM badz+ra rag sha rA dza'i tsit+ta zung zung / kha ma rag sha rtsad rtsad/ kha rag sma sha rbad snyoms/ lu na dum bu shig shig snyoms// da na rag sha tsit+ta phyung rba da/
401a1(chi): snyoms zung byaM si rag sha ma ra na b+h+yo/ tri rA dza au aM hUM mA ra ya staM pa nan nan/ spyi ti spyi ti ma snying kha rag dza dzA/ au laM hUM laM staM ba nan/ mo ha g+ha ya
401a2(chi): b+ha ga wa na/ shi kri bi k+Shi badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ badz+ra sum tri ragrA gtubs/ tsi tra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ khyad dam las ldog na// su tri mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sa tu ke pa ya/ su ta/
401a3(chi): mU ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra sig nan sig nan/ ma ra ya hUM phaT/ drig nan hUM phaT/ badz+ra dug nan hUM phaT/ badz+ra tsag du tsag du sod/ tsag tsag yer yer sod/ bruM myogs sod/ ri yaM/

401a6(chi): ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra tsU ka ra a/ du me nA ga mo trig nan me hur thums dza/ ru tri tIg nA na ru hu ra thums dza/ dun tri pa ri pa ri tsit+ta garba sha ya ga pi sod/ tri tsit+ta garba sha yag pa
401a7(chi): sod skan tsit+ta garba sha yag pa sod/ dung skyong pa te mA ra ya hUM phaT/ tig tig zho 'thung skyugs sod/ tsha bang mdzod pa sen mA ra ya hUM phaT/ chu ha na tri dza ya mA na byi dza ya
401b1(chi): hUM phaT/ sha ma sa ru tri rA dza a ho bru rbad/ rA dza chings chings gtubs/ gtubs/ khrun du tsit+ta shig/ rag sha tsit+ta zung / rma na rbad / thu ba rbad/ rbad ti dr-i rbad/
401b2(chi): ya rbad ya khra ri ma ri b+ha sha ya dza/ badz+ra sho na sa ma ya/ ya ma sha na sa ma ya/ nA ga sho na sa ma ya/ kha rag sho na sa ma ya/ rgyal 'gong rgyal tshe la ma sha/ dom ro la
401b3(chi): khrag 'thung / sgying khrag 'byung po swa ma ya dza/ badz+ra dzar trig rog ta 'byung po mA ra ya snying khrag dzaHhUM baM ho/ badz+ra aM ku sha dz+nyA/ 'byung po rmyi la ma sha do mA rol khrag 'thung /

401b5(chi): nan rbang nan/ tri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ tAd+ya thA tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ sarba a na ya hUM phaT/ ni sha ku ru yaM/ kha song dbang dril yang / thod khrag spyos shig tsit+ta ku lu
