469a6(chi): chos nyid brtsal du med pa las// chos can mchod pa'i rgyu ru snang // chos nyid brtsal du med pa la// skye mched khams rnams mchod par snang // nam mkha' dmigs
469a7(chi): su med pa las// 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams mchod par snang // thams cad chos nyid rgyun du gsungs// mchod pa phul bas khyad par 'phags// thams cad mi
469b1(chi): dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang // dmigs mang bsam 'das brjod du med// bsnyen pa phul bas khyad par 'phags// dmigs su med pa'i sems nyid kyis// thams cad
469b2(chi): bla med rgyur ston pas// pho nya bkye las khyad par 'phags// khams gsum sems can thams cad kun// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // thams cad
469b3(chi): dbyer mod dbyings su bsgral// dgra bgegs bsgral las khyad par 'phags// snang ba'i yul ni chos nyid las// bsam pa'i cha ni ye shes te// gnyis su med
469b4(chi): por rtogs pas na// phur pa btab las khyad par 'phags// ma skyes pa yi sems nyid kyis// skyes pa'i phung po skye rgyun bcad// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid kyis//
469b5(chi): bcos pa'i chos nyid zil gyis mnan// mi dmigs pa yi nam mkha' yis// dmigs pa 'byung ba zil gyis mnan// thams cad skye shi rtsa ba bcad// zil mnan
469b6(chi): byas zhes de la bya// 'khor ba'i dong spyugs khyad par 'phags// skye shi rtsa nas khyad par 'phags// thams cad dbyings bkod khyad par 'phags// 'khor ba'i rgyu
469b7(chi): nyid yang dag byang chub lam// thams cad mya ngan 'das las khyad par 'phags// skye med rdo rje lta bu'i ngang nyid las// skye shi 'phro 'du nyid las khyad par 'phags//
470a1(chi): de lta bu yi don la mkhas pa yis// rtogs pa'i blo ldan skyes bu gang zhig gis// de la 'dris na sangs rgyas yin// brtsal du med pa'i don rtogs
470a2(chi): bsgom pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
470a3(chi): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ lta ba'i man ngag 'di gsungs so// brtsal med dbyings kyi ngang du thams cad 'dus// mi 'gyur
470a4(chi): byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// thams cad skye shi'i rtsa ba bcad// sgrub med chos kyi dbyings la ye nas btab// btab pa nyid ni 'khor ba ming yang med// ma
470a5(chi): bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings nyid la// ye shes rig pa'i phur pa ya nas btab// btab pa nyid na dngos po mtshan ma med// snang srid byang chub snying po'i ling ga la//
470a6(chi): kun tu bzang po'i rol pa'i phur pa btab// btab pa nyid na sems rtogs yid las 'das// dngos por snang ba'i shes rab ling ga la// rang byung thabs kyi rgyal po'i
470a7(chi): phur pas btab// btab pa nyid na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// de phyir dbyer med don rtogs mnyam pa'i ngang // ma brtsal bzhag pas phur pa btab ces bya//
470b1(chi): de la chos nyid phur pa ni// chos can gang la'ang mi dmigs shing // ma bcos dang du thams cad 'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// de la sems kyi phur pa ni// skye mched
470b2(chi): khams la mi gnas shing // rang byung dang du thams cad 'dus// phur pa zhes ni de la bya// de la nam mkha'i phur pa ni// kha dog dbyings la mi gnas shing // khyab
470b3(chi): brdal dang du thams cad 'dus// phur bu zhes ni de la bya// de gsum dbyer med mya ngan 'das// dngos po mtshan mur mi snang zhing // bsam pa las kyang mya ngan
470b4(chi): 'das/ thams cad ye nas mnyam nyid las// rgyu dang 'bras bu dbye ru med// tha snyad 'dogs na 'khrul pa yin// mthar yang sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur//
470b5(chi): de la phur pa'i man ngag ni// bla spyad dag la mi gnas shing // brtsal du med cing dngos po med// thams cad dbyer med dbyings su gcig/ 'khrul pa'i tha snyad
470b6(chi): ming yang med// bdag nyid phur bu'i rang bzhin las// gzhan du 'dogs pa 'khrul pa'i lam// grangs kyis bgrang du ga ma yod// chos nyid gcig tu gnas pa
470b7(chi): la// grangs kyis bgrang na gol sa yin// phur bu'i rang bzhin dag pa la// ming tsam gzhan la brten mi bya// rang gi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis// de bzhin
471a1(chi): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom
471a2(chi): ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ phur pa byang chub sems kyi don 'di gsungs so// phur pa byang chub sems kyi rtags// byang chub sems
471a3(chi): kyi phur pa yis// srid gsum 'khor ba bdar sha gcod// ma btag bzhin du spyan gyis rdzogs// mnyam pa'i rgyal po rigs pas gdab// phur pa chos kyi
471a4(chi): dbyings kyi rtags// gzhan du dbab pa'i gnas med kyis// rang gi byang chub sems la gdab// phur bu 'dzin chags mya ngan 'das/ gzung 'dzin rnam rtog
471a5(chi): nyid la gdab// phur bu dngos po kun dang bral// dngos me sems kyi phur pa yis// dngos po phyin ci log la gdab// gdab dang mi gdab brjod pa'i mtha' las
471a6(chi): 'das/ phur pa skye ba med pa'i den// skye med sems kyi phur pa yis// sems la btab pos rig pa shar// dbyings la btab pas lhun gyis grub//
471a7(chi): gnyis su med pa brdal ba'i ngang // khyab brdal chen po'i phur pa yis// snang srid kun la khyab par gnas// de ltar rtogs na thebs pa yin// mngon sum
471b1(chi): gyur na rtogs pa yin// tshig las 'das na sangs rgyas yin// grangs las 'das na brjod du med// gcig dang gnyis su dbye ru med// de bzhin gshegs pa
471b2(chi): thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal
471b3(chi): po zhe sdang rdo rjeso// phur pa rang bzhin gyi don la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di gsungs so// phyur bu'i rang bzhin don bstan pa// pur ni chos kyi dbyings zhes
471b4(chi): bya/ pa ni bla ma chen por bstan// phur ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// pa ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// bur ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// pa ni 'gog pa med
471b5(chi): ba'i don// gnyis su med pa phur pa'i ngang // phur ni thabs kyi rgyal po yin// pa ni shes rab yum gyi don// gnyis su med pa rdo rje'i dang // phur pa nam
471b6(chi): mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phur pa khyab brdal nyi zla 'dra// kun la snyoms pa'i ngo bor snang // phur ba chos kyi dbyings nyid yin// phur pa nam mkha'i mtshan
471b7(chi): nyid yin// phur pa sems kyi sems nyid yin// bur pa rgyud kyi rgyal po yin// phur pa lung gi man ngag yin// phur pa man ngag nges pa'i don// gsang ba'i
472a1(chi): sngags kyis bskyed par bya// gang la dmigs pa'i ngo bo la// pho nya sgrar tshogs sprin ltar gtibs// dkar nag mtshams nas drangs nas ni/
472a2(chi): lha zug phral te rlag bsams te// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'jig 'gyur na// sdig can dgra bgegs smos ci dgos/ pho nya mang po stong khams gang // 'phral la
472a3(chi): gang ba ma yin te// ye nyid nas ni gang bar gnas// gsal bar bsgoms na bkye ba yin// nyams su chud na bsgral ba yin// gnyis su med na sbyor ba
472a4(chi): yin/ lhangs kyis rtogs na thebs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
472a5(chi): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ rtsa ba'i don la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// 'phyang
472a6(chi): ldan ma dang ro mchog ma// spyi khyer 'phyang ldan shes rab ma// ro mchog ma ni thabs kyi ngos// spyi khyer ma ni dbus na gnas// rnam rtog mi phyed phra gzugs
472a7(chi): ma/ byang chub sems ni skye 'gyur te// gnas shing gzung 'dzin bral byas pa'i// mi bskyod rgyu bas 'phyang ldan ma'o// rak+Sha rgyu ba sa ro mchog ma// shes
472b1(chi): rab zla ba rgyu ba ni// spyi khyer ma ni rab tu gsungs// mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma// bzang mo g.yas na g.yon 'thung ma// rus sbal mo dang sgom pa mo// dbang
472b2(chi): sgur ma dang mtshan mo can// chen mo gnas dang ma mo dang // kun mtshan mo dang grang mo dang // drod ma 'phyang ma sbyi ga tsug mo// ro ma rtog ma dga' ldan ma'o//
472b3(chi): gzugs mdzes ma ni thung mo'o// rgyu sbyin ma dang bral ba mo// mngag pa mo dang grub pa mo// dga' byed ma dang yid mdzes ma// de bzhin sum sgril 'dod ldan
472b4(chi): ma/ khyim nas gtum mo bdud bral mo// srid gsum yongs su zhu ba rnams// kun kyang gzung 'dzin rnam par bral// yang na thams cad bdag nyid
472b5(chi): kyis/ dngos po mtshan nyid rnams kyis brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i le'u ste drug
472b6(chi): pa'o// tade nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ sa dang lam gyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// de nas rjes su
472b7(chi): rnal 'byor pas// lam 'di dag la dgod par bya// tshogs lam sbyor lam mthong ba'i lam// sgom lam dang ni rnam grol lam// bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis//
473a1(chi): bcu gnyis pad+ma can gyis// 'khor lo tshogs chen bcu gsums// kun bzangs bcu bzhi pa ru grags// dang po'i sa nas rigs 'dzin te/
473a2(chi): gnyis pa tshe la dbang rigs 'dzin// kun rdzob phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin te// rtogs pa lhun grub rigs 'dzin no// phur bu'i rang bzhin don rtogs pa// rig
473a3(chi): dag tu ni yang dag bshad// las byas sngon gyi tshogs kyis so// las bdun byas pas sbyor ba'o// de nyid bsgoms pas mthong ba dang // 'byung ba lnga dang lha
473a4(chi): yi ga nas// gdan dang bcas pa bskyed par bsgom// srog nyid ye shes rgyur byas pas// bdud pa zhi las ni rnam par grol// dkyil 'khor gsum la sogs
473a5(chi): mtshan nyid// phur por ma grub pa dang 'od// gong bur gnas dang 'chi bdag dang // yi ges nyon mongs med par sbyangs// snang srid grags pa can dang ni// mi snang
473a6(chi): bar bcas lha bdud bcom// nyes ldan srog gi dbang po dang // bdag bzhi drug dang snang ba ste// ga nas skabs dag la rab tu grags// dus dang grangs dang mtshan
473a7(chi): ma'o// bsnyen po dag tu bshad pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ sa dang lam gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//
473b1(chi): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ mi rtogs pa'i don la snyoms par zhugs te/ snang srid drug cu rtsa gsum bsgom// ye
473b2(chi): shes chos nyid yon tan sku// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin 'dus// ya ba yum gnyis ni rang bzhin gnas// yum yang hUM 'dus ting 'dzin hUM// sems dpa'i rtse
473b3(chi): dbus hUM drangs la// ye shes sna bkag srog rtswa brgyus// rang snying rtsa dgu'i nang brgyus de// shangs kyi rlung sbom rtse la bton// sor bzhi slar 'phros slar bsdus
473b4(chi): te// 'dus pas nyi zla dbus su 'od// a yi tshul du gnas par bya// hUM ldan oM gyis tshur 'dus pas// srid gsum 'gro ba rang snang bzhin// phyi nang snod bcud
473b5(chi): de nyid de// sems dang yid dang rnam shes nyid// de nyid las ni 'khrul nas brtags// rnam rtog bag chags spang ba'i phyir// bdag dang phur pa gzhal yas khang //
473b6(chi): byang chub sems ni gsum du bshad// dang po bdag gi byang chub sems// snying khar pad+mar a bsams te// phar 'phros thams cad 'od du zhu// a ni mar me'i rtse ltar
473b7(chi): 'bar/ gzung ba zla ba'i 'od ltar te// 'dzin pa'i rtsi rnams shin tu dmigs// yang yang de la yid kyis bsgom// 'phro bar gyur na spros te bsgom// bying bar
474a1(chi): gyur na bzlas pa bya// gzung 'dzin 'gags pas shes rab gsal// nyi ma'i 'od zer tshul lta bur// de ni phur bu byang chub sems// a yi rang
474a2(chi): bzhin 'gags 'gyur te// e tshul mi dmigs nam mkha' ste// rang bzhin gsal la rtog pa med// gzung 'dzin shangs kyi 'grogs 'gyur na// gzhal yas//
474a3(chi): byang chub sems zhes bya// gzhal yas phur pa bdag gis ni// byang chub sems ni slu bcas pa'i// gnyid log sad pa ji bzhin du// ye shes rang bzhin
474a4(chi): skyur grub pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs skur 'gyur zhe na// ye shes sku ste rlung 'od zer// snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te// gzhal yas sprul yang des 'grub ste//
474a5(chi): ye shes sA dang rdo rje 'dzin// bcu gsum bkod pa de yin te// de la sprul pa'i rim bzhin 'gyed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje
474a6(chi): bkod pa'i rgyud las/ sa dang lam gyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes//
474a7(chi): sras mchog rigs kyi khro bo 'di bton to// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor na/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad sku mdog mthi ngo na ga zhal gsum phyag drug pa/
474b1(chi): sku smad phur pa'i tshul du zur gsum du bzhugs pas/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing // kI la ya mthing nag tu 'phros pas/ zhe sdang dmyal ba thams cad stongs
474b2(chi): shing zad par mdzad de/ zhe sdang can thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// shar zlum la 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
474b3(chi): kyi khro bo thams cad sku mdog smug nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ smad drag po'i rang bzhin zur gsum du gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos shing / kI la la
474b4(chi): smyug nag tu 'phros pas/ gti mug gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad stongs shing zad par mdzad do// gti mug thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su
474b5(chi): sangs rgyas par gyur to// lho sogs kha gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ rin po che'i rigs kyi khro bo thams cad sku mdog ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ smad drag
474b6(chi): po'i rang bzhin phur pa zur gsum du gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'jab zlos shing / kI la ya ser nag tu 'bros pas/ nga rgyal can gyi tshogs thams cad zad cing
474b7(chi): stongs par mdzad de/ nga rgyal can thams cad rin po che'i rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// nub zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ pad+ma rigs kyi khro bo thams
475a1(chi): cad sku mdog dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa ste/ sku smad drag po'i rang bzhin phur pa zur gsum du gnas pa zha la nas phur pa'i 'dzab zlos
475a2(chi): shing kI la ya dmar nag tu 'phros pas/ 'do chags kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad zad cing stongs par mdzad de/ 'dod chags thams cad pad+ma'i rigs
475a3(chi): sangs rgyas par gyur to// byang gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ las kyi rigs kyi khro bo thams cad sku mdog ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku smad
475a4(chi): drag po'i rang bzhin phur bu zur gi sum par gnas pa/ zhal nas phur pa'i 'dza ba zlos shing / kI la ya ljang nag tu 'phros te/ phrag dog gi sa zin pa'i sems
475a5(chi): can thams cad rtsad gcad de/ phrag dog gi gnas stongs te/ phrag dog thams cad las kyi rigs su sangs rgyas par gyur to// sku gsung thugs yon tan
475a6(chi): 'phrin las lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur te// hUMrak+ti'i rgya mtsho chen po 'khyil ba nas// keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng/ rdo rje brag chen gtams
475a7(chi): pa'i sa gzhi la// dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sus kyang ma bskyed la nas tshad las 'das// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/
475b1(chi): dregs pa lha chen gsol ba'i gdan stengs su// nyi zla'i gdan bshams pad+ma'i ge sar bcas// 'jigs byed dpal chen tshogs rnams bcas pa ni// ye shes
475b2(chi): tshad med sprul pa'i thabs mnga' ba// gang mos gang la de bzhin skur snang zhing // ci la cis 'du la de bzhin cha lugs ston// thugs mtshan sna tshogs mtshon
475b3(chi): cha'i char 'bebs shing // gsung gis kI la ya yi sgra sgrogs 'brug stong ldir// rdzi bskyod spyan zlog me stag tsha tsha 'phro// zhal gdangs mtsha gtsigs dug
475b4(chi): gsu ma zhal du rngub// mngag pa'i pho nya 'gugs byed glo ga stong 'gyu// 'phrin las sA bzhis log pa'i dgra ba ge gas 'jom sa// spu la pa'i pho nyas
475b5(chi): bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// drag po'i 'phrin las lhun gyis grub par mdzod// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje gzhon nu dbu
475b6(chi): gsum pa phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ g.yas ldang na ga/ g.yon da ma ra na ga/ dbus mthing nag tu gzhugs pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse
475b7(chi): dgu pa bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na me dpung 'bar ba bsnams pa/ g.ya sa bar pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / sta ri dang / tho ba'o// g.yon bar pa na kha T+wAM dang /
476a1(chi): thod dbyug dang / lcags kyu'o// g.yas tha ma phur pa'o// g.yon tha ma na spong stong 'phra men gyi tshogs bsnams te/ bya rgod dang /
476a2(chi): khyud dang / 'ug pa dang / pho rog dang / khra ba snams pa'o// zhabs bzhi la gnyis brkyang / gnyis bsku ma ste dor stabs su bzhugs pa'o// sku la bskal
476a3(chi): po'i me ri dang / glang po che'i ko rlon dang / stag gi sham thabs dang / zhing chen gyi pags pa dang / thal ba'i tshom bu dang / zhag gi zo ris dang / khrag gi
476a4(chi): thig le'o// sbrul rigs lngas brgyan te/ rgyal rigs dang / rdza rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gdol pa'i rigs so//
476a5(chi): thugs rjes chags pas khrag gi rgya mtsho la gsol ba'o// yum 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas yab kyi mgul nas
476a6(chi): 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa na d+ha rak+ta sa bkang nas yab kyi zhal du sto ba pa/ skra la dur khrod ni rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dro shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / mgur chu
476a7(chi): dang snyan cha dang / sen mo dos brgyan te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung
476b1(chi): thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las rigs kyi khro bo'i le'u sta dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang
476b2(chi): rdo rjes chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ya ba yum gnyis su med par chags pa'i don la bskul ba/ yab kyi sa bsku la ba/ sa ma ya
476b3(chi): yuma? gyis bskul ba/ sa ma ya stAM/ ro ho haM/ ra ga ya mi/ yab yu ma gnyis su med par gyur te/ pad+ma yo gi sa ma ya pra be sha yo pha Ta/ yab kyi
476b4(chi): byang chub kyi sems yum gyi mkhar babs te/ yum yang byang chub kyi rang bzhin du gyur te/ lan cig 'phros pas khro bo 'chol pa'i rang bzhin du gyur to//
476b5(chi): hU~M hU~M hUM hUM bi shwa kro d+ha dzA la maN+Da la ha ya ha la hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pa sa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lhag gis khengs par gyur to//
476b6(chi): dur khrod kyi bdag po ma tang ka ru tra da nga/ a kaR+Ya ru tra dang / kha tong ka ru la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i kha log par bltas pa'i sems can de dag thams
476b7(chi): cad bsgral zhing rtsa da gcad do// slar de dag thams cad bsgral zhing rtsa dag cad do// slar de dag thams cad yum gyi b+ha ka la bsdus te/ 'od phyogs bcur 'phros
477a1(chi): pas/ des phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can bsgral te/ de'i steng du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'thon te/ shar phyogs su khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang
477a2(chi): yum snyems ma gnyis su gyur te/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o// dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ zha bas brgya byin gyi gdan la
477a3(chi): brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o// lhor khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po dang / yum dur khrod kyi bdag mo gnyis su gyur te/ gshin rje gshed dbu gsum phyag drug pa'o//
477a4(chi): zhabs dang ldan pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub tu khro bo rta mchog dpal dang / sum rdo rje gtum mo gnyis su gyur te/ khro brta mgrin
477a5(chi): gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// shar lhor khro ba
477a6(chi): dbyug pa sngon po dang / yu ma rdo rje sder mo gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa drang srong ba rdzis pa'o//
477b1(chi): sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// lho nub mtshams su khro ba mi g.yo mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtun khung ma dang gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo mi g.yo
477b2(chi): mgon po dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis srin po brdzis pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi cha sa brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub byang mtshams su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thu ba
477b3(chi): pa dang yum rdo rje mda' snyoms ma gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis rlung lha pho mo brdzis pa/ sku la
477b4(chi): dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// byang shar mtshams su khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum gsod byed ma dang gnyis su gyur ta/ khro bo khams gsum
477b5(chi): rnam rgyal dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis dbang ldan pho mo brdzis pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// steng gi phyogs su khro bo hUM ka ra dang /
477b6(chi): yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo hUM ka re dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis nyi zla brdzis pa/ sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o//
477b7(chi): 'og gi phyogs su khro bo stobs po che dang / yum rdo rje bskyod byed ma gnyis su gyur te/ khro bo stobs po che dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhis sa bdag brdzis pa/
478a1(chi): sku la dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// yab kyi sprul pa stag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang
478a2(chi): gzig gi mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can dang / sbyang ki'i mgo can dang / seng ge'i mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / phag gi mgo can dang / dred kyi mgo can no/
478a3(chi): yum gyi sprul pa bye rgod kyi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can dang / pu shud kyi mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can
478a4(chi): pha wa nga gi mgo can dang / sre mo'i mgo can dang / smigs bu'i mgo can dang / byi ba'i mgo can no// de nas zhe sdang rdo rjes dregs pa can thams cad tshar bcad pa'i
478a5(chi): phyir/ thugs kyi sras mchog 'di dag phyung ste/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hU~M/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM hUM/ zhes gsungs te/ nyid kyi mdun du 'thon te/
478a6(chi): oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT phaT/ ces gsungs pas/ sras mchog de dag kyang / dbu gsum phyag drug pa sku smad zur gsum du gyur te/ mdun du
478a7(chi): bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas zhe sdang rdo rjes 'di skad gsungs so// thugs kyi sras mchog ki la ya// dregs pa 'dul phyir thugs las phyung // ngo mtsha
478b1(chi): las 'di grub par gyis// de nas sras mchog de dag gis kyang / hU~M hU~M dang phaT phaT kyi sgra mang po phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag g.yos rab tu g.yos so//
478b2(chi): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs so// brgyal lo rab tu brgyal bar gyur to// myos rab tu myos par gyur to// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
478b3(chi): cad kyang shin tu ngo mtsher skyes te/ e ma'o thugs kyi sras mchog ces bstod cing / bde bar gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma
478b4(chi): ko&haM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / khams gsum dus gcig tu sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// de nas sras mchog de dag gis kyang lte ba log par 'dzin pa'i
478b5(chi): dregs pa can de dag thams cad drag po'i stang stabs kyis bsgral te/ mgo bcad/ snying byung / yan lag bregs te/ lus gtso bo'i gdan du phul lo// rnam
478b6(chi): par shes pa 'og min du 'phangs so// sha khrag la/ ma mo dang / khro mo dang / 'phra man ma dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul dang / sum sprul la sogs pa
478b7(chi): dang seng ma da/ stag mad sha la rol pa bzhin du gyur to// zhal nas kyang hUM hU~M dang / phaT phaT dang / ha ha dang / ha he dang / khA khA dang / b+h+yo b+h+yo dang / ru lu
479a1(chi): dang phaT phaT la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin cing rol lo// de dag thams cad kyang snang srid drug cu rtsa gcig gi dkyil 'khor du gyur to// de
479a2(chi): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom
479a3(chi): 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M ka ra hUM gardza gardza hUM/ oM
479a4(chi): badz+ra kro d+hi da di tsaN+Do ya sti hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM ha na ha na hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi da du la saM ke hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dan+ta hUM da ha da ha hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi da du sta na bi
479a5(chi): sti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM pa tsa pa tsa hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi da du ma hA pa ya hi hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha aR+Ya a tsa la hU~M ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi d+ha du mu ha la/
479a6(chi): hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya ha ya gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi da du mu ha la hI/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pA ra dzi ta hU~M/ tiSh+ThA tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM ba dz+ra kro d+hi da du sha byA
479a7(chi): yai ti hUM oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mra ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin d+ha tshan d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha daM du ba ya bya phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi trai lo kya bai dza ya hUM/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM/ oM
479b1(chi): badz+ra kro d+hi d+ha du mA ra na hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi d+ha du mu ne hUM/ badz+ra u ka ra mu ka dza dza/ badz+ra ka sho ru ka dza dza/ badz+ra byAg+h+ri
479b2(chi): mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra kr-i d+ha mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra tsa sa ra mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra kha kha mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra ha ri mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra hU lu ka mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra kra ka mu kha/
479b3(chi): dzi dza/ badz+ra b+ha ya ti mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra pa tsa la la mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra bag shi ha mu kha dza dza/ badz+ra sho na mu khA dza dza/ badz+ra pu ka mu kha dza/ badz+ra si ha mu khA
479b4(chi): dzabadz+ra ti ti la mu kha dza/ badz+ra rig sha mu kha dza/ badz+ra dag shi mu kha dza/ badz+ra na gu la mu kha dza/ badz+ra ki sa ka mu kha dza/ badz+ra yag+ga ta mu kha dza/ badz+ra be ra/
479b5(chi): bi hUM/ badz+ra am+l-i ta ba/ badz+ra mA ra na hUM/ he he he hUM/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ ma ma mA mA/ b+hUb+h+yAMb+h+yA b+h+ya/ d+h+yAr+m+mar+N+Nab+h+yak+Sh+ya b+h+ya b+h+yA
479b6(chi): b+h+ya b+h+yo s+yA b+h+yA b+h+yAM b+h+ya b+h+yo/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las sngags kyi mo'u ste bcu gcog pa'o//
479b7(chi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes drag po'i 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// bla med bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge sbyod
480a1(chi): 'bras bu 'phal bya na// shin tu gdug pa tshar gcad phyir// drag po'i 'phrin las rab tu brtsa ma// thog mar gnas ni btsal bya zhing //
480a2(chi): phyi yi gtor ma gzhung bzhin bya// phyogs skyong la sogs srungs ma la// dam tshig bzhin du 'phrin las bcol// de nas nang du mtshams gcad phyir// dkyil 'khor
480a3(chi): mthing nag bri bar bya// zla gam rdo rje brag la sogs// bre de skam sgo khyud gzhung bzhin bya// de nas rdzas rnams bsag bya ste// phur bu dang ni yungs kar dang // zhing /
480a4(chi): ras gtor ma la sogs pa// shes rab can gyis bsag pa'i rdzas// dkyil 'khor de dag bskor te gzhag/ de nas las gos ban pas byas te// tshe dang ldan pa'i rnal
480a5(chi): 'byor pas// phur pa byin gyis brlab bya zhing // de nas ting 'dzin gsal ba las// spyan drangs mchod dang gnyis med bstim// phyi nang mchod pa rim bzhin dbul//
480a6(chi): de nas sgrub pa gsal bar bsgom// de nas bsnyen pa gsum bya ste// nam gyi gung dang nyi ma'i gung // pho nya bka' sdod 'bangs kyi tshul// dge zhing gzugs la bstims
480a7(chi): byas la/ ta de yi rtags dang mtshan ma ni// 'od dang 'khro dang 'bar pa dang // bra ma rmi lam bzang la sogs// de ltar rtags ni byung ba dang // bsgrub pa po ni ma lus
480b1(chi): pas/ gsal ba rnam gsum dag dang ni// bden pa brdar zhing yang nas yang // gnas bdun dag tu gdab par bya/ khro bo bcu yi sngags brjod cing // gang la
480b2(chi): dmigs pa'i ngo bo la// gzir mnan brlag pa'i las rnams bya// byin chung snying ni mi dga' na// spogs pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// lha rnams mnyes par
480b3(chi): bya ba dang // las kyis lhag chad bskang ba dang // yun gyi sgrib po byung ba'i phyir// mthol bshags la sogs 'bad pa bya// gzugs ni dum bu gsum
480b4(chi): dog tu/ rnon po'i mtshon gyis gtubs nas kyang // gtor ma gtang zhing hom du bsregs// de nas gtor ma la sogs gtang // dkyil 'khor dag ni bsdu bya
480b5(chi): zhing // dngos grub dag kyang blang bar bya// bgegs kyis mi tshugs bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje'i go cha bgo bar bya// snying rje'i sems dang 'bral mi bya// de
480b6(chi): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ drag pos bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de
480b7(chi): nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// sme sha can la
481a1(chi): sogs pa yi// bcu gnyis dang ni bco brgyad dang // yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// rnam gsum
481a2(chi): tshul du nan tan bya// ha cang sbom min phra ba min// ring ba ma yin thung ba min// smin mtshams ring zhing sha mdog dkar// sme ba'i ga shal yod pa dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis
481a3(chi): mtshan du ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus brgyan// spyi bor oM la snying kha ra hU~M// mtshan mar a ste rnam gsum dgod// rnam ka sum tshul du sbyor ba bya// dang
481a4(chi): por dga' dang ma chog tu dga'// rang bzhin dga' dang dga' bra la lo// bang chub sems dpa' slob ma la// tshul bzhin yid kyis bskur bar bya// de ltar bskur byed
481a5(chi): slob dpon la// rang lus srog dang nor gyi dbyig/ ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma rab tu brgyan te dbu la// shin tu mdzas dang yid 'thad dbu la// rta dang glang po
481a6(chi): nor gyi dbyig/ yul ris sna 'phran bcad la dbul// de ltar 'bul byed slob ma la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya// de bzhin gshegs
481a7(chi): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ dbang poskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
481b1(chi): byed kyi rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rjes/ drag po'i sbyin sreg gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba ni// gru gsum cha ni mnyam
481b2(chi): pa la/ dbus su gru gsum khru gang brko// kha khyer sum brtsegs sor bzhi'i tshad// mu khyud zlum po sor gsum pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// phyi
481b3(chi): rim 'khor lo rtsabs brgyad la/ bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhir bcas// phyi rim mthing nag me ris bskor// gdug pa can gyi shing rnams la// drag po'i sngags kyis
481b4(chi): bta ba nas kyang // dbus kyi gru gsum nang du bzhugs// dmar gtor dang ni yungs kar dang // lcags phye dang ni rdo phye dang // dug gtor la sogs 'gram du
481b5(chi): gzhag/ gzugs dang ming rus la sogs pa// ral gris dum bur gtums nas ni// ban da'i nang du bzhag par bya// skyer tsher dang ni mar khu dang // ro shun ras kyis de
481b6(chi): dag bya// byin za gru gsum raM las bskyed// sku mdog dmar nag dud kha'o// phyag na me sgron bsnams pa ste// sman drangs bskyed dang gnyis med bstim// las
481b7(chi): bco la 'phrin las rdzogs par bya// bruM las ye shes dkyil 'khor bskyed// dbus su ya k+Sha yab yum bskyed// 'khor lo dag la khro bcu bskyed/ sras mchog grwa yi phyogs la bskyed// khyams la ma
482a1(chi): tshogs spel mar dgod// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma'o// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// bsti ma dang mchod bstod la sogs bya/
482a2(chi): 'phrin las bcol dang bstod pa bya// smon lam bzod gsol bshags pa bya// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis//
482a3(chi): tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ bsreg khang me yi dkyil 'khor du// 'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho//
482a4(chi): ai badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ A gan+d+ha ya A gan+d+hA ya/ pra be sha ya pr-i be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya bar+t+ta ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badz+ra Ta k+ki ni hUM phaT/
482a5(chi): ces spyan drang ngo // e baM ma ya/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bkod pa'i
482a6(chi): rgyud las/ drag po'i sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // zhe sdang rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// ngas gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di la// rnal 'byor
482a7(chi): gang zhig dad mos pa// dngos grub chen po rnyed nas kyang // rigs 'dzin rgyal po'i sa thob nas// bcu gcig kun tu 'od la bgrod// ngas gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di la//
482b1(chi): gang zhig skur ba 'debs pa de// dus med par ni tshe zad nas// ru tra nag por skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje dmyal bar lhung nas kyang // thar pa'i dus med 'o dod 'bod// slan chad
482b2(chi): sdom zhes smra bar byed// rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud 'di la// mi dad spong ba'i sems can de// gshin rje'i zhags pas bzung nas kyang // bdud kyi khram la btab nas
482b3(chi): ni// smyo 'bogo nad dang brgyal ba dang // khrag gi nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyud 'di dag la yang // rnal 'byor gang zhig dang mos pa// 'jig
482b4(chi): rten 'di yi yon tan yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten phyi ma'i dngos grub kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// thar pa de yi 'bras
482b5(chi): bu yis/ rigs 'dzin sa la gdon mi za// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// dam tshig gtsang ma rnyed par 'gyur//
482b6(chi): 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang // theg pa chen po lhur len cing // rdo rje slob dpon mchod byed pa// de ni dam tshig mchog tu gsungs// snying rje'i sems dang 'bral mi
482b7(chi): bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung blugs rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las/ rjes su gdams pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // phur pa
483a1(chi): rdo rje bkod pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya kar gyi mkhan po shri dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba
483a2(chi): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma thod 'phrang rtsa la dang / lo tsA ba dpal gyi ye shes kyis kyang bsgyur te/ mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyi thugs dam du gzhag pa'o// dol
483a3(chi): gyi rgyud 'bum dang / zur pa'i dpe las bsgyur zhus dag// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la la gu h+ya tan+t+ra u pa de sha/
483a4(chi): bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa gsang bag dam ngag can gyi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal badz+ra kI li ya la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
483a5(chi): nabacom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu sku gsung blugs yon tan 'phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ya shes sku can de/ chos kyi dbyings
483a6(chi): kyi ngang nyid las/ 'bar ba'i khro bo shin tu mi bzod pa/ sku'i dbyig tu gyur par bzhings te/ ye shes 'bar ba'i gzha la yas khang / rang snang gsal ba'i dkyil
483a7(chi): 'khor gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor na/ kang rus gsar rnying brtsegs pa'i ri rab kyi steng / me ri 'bar ba'i klong / rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i maN+Dal na/
483b1(chi): rgyu rin po che dang thod pa gsar rnying las grub pa/ drag po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rtsibs brgyad la sgo bzhi pa dur khrod kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas klubs pas//
483b2(chi): bdud dang / phyogs skyong dang / nyi zla'i gdan la rab tu bzhugs te/ thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra 'dus pa dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / za byed dang /
483b3(chi): gsod byed dang / sprul pa dang / yang sbrul brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / gzhan yang dur khrod kyi lce spyang dang / zangs kyi wa mo dang / lcags kyi spyang mo dang /
483b4(chi): dur khrod kyi khyi dang / rdo rje lha mo ya byin dang / de byin dang / chu byin dang / phag byin dang / nag mo'i tshogs re ma ti dang / re ma dzu dang / re ma dza dang / ra ma te dang /
483b5(chi): gzhan yang dur khrod kyi ma bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / skye mchog pho mo dang / rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi
483b6(chi): rigs kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te// de'i tshe thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra kI la ya 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das
483b7(chi): la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ gu h+ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ shrI badz+ra ku ma ra la na mo/ sarba big nan baM hUM kI la ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ a la la zhes gsol pas/
484a1(chi): bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srid pa thams cad rdo rjer grub pa mdzad de/ 'bar ba'i khro bo sha stag pas
484a2(chi): gtum pa dang / rngam pa dang / brtul zhugs kyis gdug pa'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshar bcad nas slar chos kyi dbyings su bsdu ba mdzad de/
484a3(chi): rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog badz+re kI la yas/
484a4(chi): bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// gdams ngag gsang ba'i rgyud chen po// ma
484a5(chi): 'ongs pa yi don rmed du// 'khor rnams la ni ba sha da du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsa la pa// nyon cig badz+ra kI la ya/
484a6(chi): snying rjes sgral ba'i dam chog ste// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// rnam shes rnams su dag bya'i bshad// ces gsungs so// de na sa yang bka' sku la
484a7(chi): pa/ rgyu de 'di dmigs pa'i yul dang ni// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pa dang // grub pa'i 'bras bu dag dang gsum// man ngag bdag gis bshad kyis nyon//
484b1(chi): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud la sa/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras
484b2(chi): mchog des// de yi don nyid yang dag zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin ma bcos gnas pa de// ma rtogs gdul bya'i zhing du
484b3(chi): dmigs// snying rje'i dmigs par bya ba yin// bsgrub pa bya ba'i thabs la yang // gzhi dang don gyi khog nyid dang // srog dang ye shes dbang dang ni// spyan 'dren
484b4(chi): mchod bsnyen dngos grub blang // 'jug sdud las kyi kha bskang ba'o// grub pa'i 'bras bu chos sku dang // gzugs sku rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// gzhi ni phun
484b5(chi): sum tshogs pa ste// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i gnas dang rdzas// 'khor rnams phun sum tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dag las// sngon 'gro'i
484b6(chi): las rnams bya ba dang // dngos la rten dang brten nas te// 'byung ba lnga dang gzhal yas khang // bdag nyid rtsu ba'i phyogs bcu 'phro// phur pa rdzas kyi
484b7(chi): dkyil 'khor ro// khams gsum srog la dbang bskur dang // de yi srog kyang ye shes te// bdag gi dkyil 'khor gnyis la bskur// de yi 'gro drug dag
485a1(chi): la'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur ba'o// spyan drangs mchod dang bsnyen pa dang /
485a2(chi): dngos grub bcud ni blang ba ste// phyag dang mchod pa gtor ma dang // bdud rtsi rak+ta sbyor sgrol lo// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga brgyad// bsnyan pa lha dang dam
485a3(chi): can dang // ngan sngags nye bar bsnyen pa'o// dngos grub ye shes lha dang ni// dgra la tshe lung khrus lung dang // sgo bzhi'i phur pa mtsho bzhi ste// yum
485a4(chi): brgyad lus kyi rten brgyad dang // khro rlu tshogs brgyad zhar byung gnyis// gnyis kyi dge sdig cha mnyam gdab// mtshon gyis gtub dang thun gyis brab//
485a5(chi): gnas skabs dag gis shes par bya// mnan pa sbyin sreg blun dang gsum// las kyi 'jug ni bsdu bar bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud
485a6(chi): las gdams ngag gi khog don bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// dkyi la'akhor rnam gsum ro mi
485a7(chi): par zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shag
485b1(chi): snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// hUM phu ra nA phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ ba e/ yAM ra suM kro raM d+b+ha/ b+hu bi sha bI shud+d+ha dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la e b+h+yA/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ hUM s+pha ran
485b2(chi): phaT/ sa hA ra na hU~M/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas/
485b3(chi): rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// hU~Mrdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub
485b4(chi): par mdzod// hUM hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi hUM ka ra hUM/ gar+dz+dza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dan Da hU~M/ da hud
485b5(chi): ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsA pa tsa hUM paT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ b+hur+tha b+hAr+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ba hUM/ hu lu hu lud+b+ha
485b6(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsit+taM hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin d+hA tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha tai lo kya bi dza yaM hUM
485b7(chi): bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM bi hau/ bin d+ha ya bing bing hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta tr-i tri phaT/ su ru su ru pra
486a1(chi): su ru hU~M phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi zad pa// U yi
486a2(chi): dbyig tu bdag bskyed cig/ hU~M sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn/ oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya badz+ra na na/ dza la dza la pra dza la sarba na sa sa na ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya bA ka badz+ra
486a3(chi): non/ sarba duSh+Ta hri shod ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la yaM tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ tsIt+ta tsitu hUM phaT/ be ta lis man ta la rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ ma gu la tA la tA la/ rba
486a4(chi): la ta la ni hUM phaT/ ma hA rak+Sha dzo la na hA phaT/ rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rnam gsum bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
486a5(chi): / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// srog dang ye shes dbang bskur zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs kyis spyod pas 'gro
486a6(chi): don du/ byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsol cig/ hU~M pra na hUM phaT/ saM ha ra ni
486a7(chi): hU~M pa ra na phaT/ sa ha ra na hUM/ a nri su tri pri du/ ba ra na phaT/ sa ha ra na hUM/ oM pa ra na phaTaM/ sa ha ra na hUM/ A ba ra na phaT/ sa ha ra na hUM/ hUM bar
486b1(chi): na phaT/ sa ha ra na hU~M/ zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las/ khams gsum srog la dbang bskur ba dang / srog ye shes su dbang bskur
486b2(chi): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// spyan drangs mchod pa'i
486b3(chi): rim pa sogs/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang
486b4(chi): dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro ba klushegs su gsol// khro ba chen po ku shugs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan mya bstan pa dang // kI la ya'i dza
486b5(chi): grub sbrul du gsol// dzaHhUM ba ho/ a ti puho/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya pU dza me \u0f7f sa myA tra s+phA ra Na sa ma ye / d+hu pe/ A ma kaM/ r+b+he
486b6(chi): dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// ba ling gtor ma bzhes su gsol// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// ba long gtor ma bzhes su gsol// phyag brnyan chen tshon
486b7(chi): pa'i dus la bab// ba ling gtor ma bzhes su gsol// shon// / sa bdag/ bdag nyid// khyed kyi// / mthu rtsa la// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bag/
487a1(chi): bdud ni sman gyi mchod pa bzhes// sprul pa// phyag brnyan// / sho na// / sa bdag/ bdag nyid// / khyed kyi// mthu rtsal/
487a2(chi): bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa bzhes// dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra// bdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob
487a3(chi): cig rnam par chings// rtogs shing grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang //
487a4(chi): bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par gyis// ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ bran dang bka' nyan po nya'i tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// ma
487a5(chi): spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// ma hA rak+Sha khA hi/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang
487a6(chi): rdzu 'phrul med par gyis/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// kha taM kha taM/ dam
487a7(chi): tshig chen po'i dus la bab// tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// sprul pa// phyag brnyan// / sho naH// sa bdag/ bdag nyid// / khyed kyi
487b1(chi): mthu rtsa la Da// tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes su gsol// sho na mu kha'i dus la bag/ lhag ma'i gtor ma bzhes su gsol// bka' yi ga tor ma 'dri bzhes la/
487b2(chi): rnal 'byor bar chad bsrung du gsol// sa bdag// lhag ma'i// / bka'i// rnal 'byor bar chad bsrung du gsol// bdag nyid// / lhag ma'i
487b3(chi): ba ka'i tshe// rnal 'byor// / zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ spyan drangs shing mchod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
487b4(chi): / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// bsnyen pa'i don rnams zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// snying rjes bsgral ba'i
487b5(chi): dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtams nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/
487b6(chi): oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ ka tang ka ta ye dza ye bi dza ya/ a tsid te a pa ra tsit+ta ma/ ra sa na pra ma ra ta na ye hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra hr-i da ya na hUM phaT/
487b7(chi): A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ shi krin a na ya hU~M pha Ta/ dzA la pa ya dzA la la ya hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta thA ya hU~M phaTa?/ bin d+ha ya bin d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i
488a1(chi): rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// ces gsungs so// rdo rje
488a2(chi): phur pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa rnam pa gsum bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// sgrub
488a3(chi): pa chen po'i don rnams zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dusA la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la
488a4(chi): bab/ sho na mu kha'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// mthu rtsal 'byung
488a5(chi): ba'i dus la bab// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung gso ba pa'i// rigs 'dzin bdag
488a6(chi): cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs
488a7(chi): kyis/ yud tsam gyis ni 'dir khug la// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du ba shig nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod//
488b1(chi): oM la hUM laM staM pa nan/ mo ha b+ha ya b+ha ga bA na/ shrI kri bi kri/ badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dzAHhUM baM ho/ sarba big+h+nA na/ badz+ra kI li kI la
488b2(chi): ya hU~M phaT/ badz+ra hUM ka ra a a/ A be sha ya a a/ zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las tshe lung khrus lung gi dgongs
488b3(chi): pa phul du phyung ste gdab pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i don rnams zhus//
488b4(chi): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shar nas zhi ba'i 'phrin las mdzad// skya ka'i mgo can dus la bab// dgra bgegs kun gyi rus pa'i mtsho// klad
488b5(chi): pa'i rgyas su kI la ya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya bin d+ha ya bing bing hUM hUM phaT/ lho nas rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzad// srin bya'i mgo can du sa la bab// dgra
488b6(chi): bgegs kun gyi dbugs kyi mtsho// glo ba'i dkyil du kI la ya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya nA ma sa man ta hriM hriM hU~M hUM phaT+Ta/ nub nas dbang gi 'phrin las
488b7(chi): mdzad/ khra yi mgo can dus la bab// dgra bgegs kun gyi khrag gi mtsho// mchin pa'i dkyil du kI la ya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ su ru su ru pra su ru
489a1(chi): hUM phaT/ byang ras drag po'i 'phrin las mdzad// pu shud mgo can dus la bab// dgra bgegs kun gyi sha yi mtsho// ma khal ma
489a2(chi): gA nyis la mA ra ya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rdo rdza phu ra pa nu ba man ngag gi rgyud las/ 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i phur pa'i
489a3(chi): le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// lus kyi rten lnga gdab pa zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
489a4(chi): sku la pa/ dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// dngos grub par chad byed pa'i dgra// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig
489a5(chi): rnam par chings// rtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar byos// nga yi dbang du gyur nas
489a6(chi): kyang / bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par gyis// hU~M ba ra bi da tan/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/
489a7(chi): ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ khro mo brgyad kyi gdab pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas thugs kyi sras
489b1(chi): mchog des// tshogs brgyad dag la gdab pa zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig du sa la bab/
489b2(chi): sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur bar mdzod// ha na ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/
489b3(chi): su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ ka ta daM ka ye dza ye bi dza ya/ a tsit+te a pa tsaM te/ ma ra sa na pra mar+ha na ye hUM pa Ta/ rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud
489b4(chi): las khro bo bcu'i phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// dge sdig tsha ba snyam ga dab pa zhus//
489b5(chi): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu
489b6(chi): 'phrul med par byos// sarba a na ya hU~M phaT/ tad+ya thA tad+ya thA hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ yum gnyis gdab pa'i
489b7(chi): rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// thun gyis brab pa'i las rnams zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis
490a1(chi): bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa
490a2(chi): baN+Da ru khos// kon cig bag gas dang lag 'dren tshogs// nga yaM bka' las 'da' ba byed// rdul pa pa sha~M ku ru ma tA nya kar oM nar d+ha tImA ma kam
490a3(chi): krang ka ra ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ des 'dre'o// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ thun gyi le'u ste bcu
490a4(chi): gsum pa'o// // de nas krugs kyi sras mchog des// man ngag gab pa'i don zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das kyisi bka' stsal pa// de ltar de
490a5(chi): lnga dag la yang // dang po lha dang dpral ba dang // gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi rnams ni// kun gyi mgo la gdags par bya// lnga pa rdul du rlag pa dang // mtshon
490a6(chi): gyis gtub dang thun gyis brag/ kun gyi khong khrag gdags par bya// 'jug tu zhal du gdab bya ba// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang
490a7(chi): bsgo ba'i bka' ni nyan par gyis// bin d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha hi/ ha ha/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// chos nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs so// gsang
490b1(chi): sngags kyi mthu'o// a bi tsAr+ya'i dus la bab pa rnams kyi brnag pa'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// hUM hUM zhes pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
490b2(chi): bar bya'o// dkar nag ni mtshams su'o// kI li kI la ya/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// dkar nag gi mtshams su'o// hUM hUM phoT phaT/ ces
490b3(chi): bzlas pa bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ gab pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
490b4(chi): / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// dbang rnams bskur ba'i ra mi pa zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje slob dpon ra ba mchog
490b5(chi): gis/ bkra shis gzhung mthun nyams dga'i gnas// bshags skong la sogs sa cho ga dang // dkyil 'khor mchod bum la brtan pa'i// gzhung srang
490b6(chi): bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya// sta gon lha bskyed cho ga gzhung srang // gsol gdab snang zhing maN+Dal 'bu la// so shing dor nas chos bshad cing // bsrung skud gdags
490b7(chi): dang ku sha rmi lam brtag/ de nas thig dang tshon bri zhing // rgyan dang rdzas dgod las gzhung srang // gdong g.yogs gsoladab 'jug par zhu// lha la
491a1(chi): gsol gdab me tog dbu la// dris lan yon kyang khas su blang // dkyil 'khor bskor la bgegs bskrad cing // dam chu blud nas dam
491a2(chi): tshig dpog/ me tog dor la lha dbog cing // gsang ba'i mtshan gdags bri bar bya// bstim dang ye shes dbab grol bstan// dbang gi stegs 'dug gus dang
491a3(chi): ldan// dbang bskur ba ni bum pa dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje dril bu ste// sangs rgya so yab yu ma la sogs lha// dur khrod chas brgyad 'dod yon lnga// ye shes
491a4(chi): lA dbang byin gyis brlabs// bkra shis brjod cing smon la ma gdab// yon dbu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsol 'gyur// zhes
491a5(chi): gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ rin chen dbang gi 'phreng ba'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o// // de nas thugs kyi sras
491a6(chi): mchog des// 'dzab dgongs rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kI la ya yi bsnyen pa dang // mtshan ma rtags kyi bsnyen pa ste//
491a7(chi): bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim gnyis las// rdzogs pa'i rim pa rnam bzhi'i don// rmugs na chos nyid a dkar la// gtad la rang sems bzung ba bzlas// des ni/
491b1(chi): ting 'dzin zin par 'gyur// rgod na skye med bde ba che// dbugs dang shes pa yig 'brur 'grogs// par 'phros yul songs 'dus pa bde// 'phro na bde chen bskor
491b2(chi): bzlog cing // bya 'phur mkha' la bde ba ltar// tshur bstim bskor shing zlog ste bzlas// bying na khro bo'i bzlas pa ni// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas bzlas// 'chal
491b3(chi): ma tsam gyis bzlas pa ni// mgal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa dang // bung tshang ba shig pa ji bzhin du// mgar gyi tsha tshwa brdabs
491b4(chi): ba ltar/ yang na dbyangs dang 'phrin las dang // chos nyid nus pa ldan par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba man ngag gi rgyud las/ 'dzab kyi dgongs
491b5(chi): pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// mnan bsregs 'phang ba'i don rnams zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis
491b6(chi): bka' stsal pa// sbyin sreg zlab khung gru gsum du// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams brtser// mchod pa'i rdzas dang bsreg pa'i rdzas// gtor ma dag dang ling gar
491b7(chi): bcas/ drag po'i cha lugs rdzogs byas te// mtshams gcad dragug gzhug bstim nas ni// hom khung mthing nag gzhal yas su// ma lha dmar sar phur pa 'dzin//
492a1(chi): dgug cing mchod dang bstod byas la// lto bar rtsibs brgyad gzhal yas khang // lha tshogs bskyed pa'i cho ga gzhung bya// spyan drangs
492a2(chi): mchod dang bsreg rdzas dbu la// gshegs shing 'jug gi las rnams bya// sbyin sreg dag gi sa rim pa'o// mnan pa'i 'khor lo bcas nasau ni// ting 'dzin cho
492a3(chi): ga gong ltar te// lha rnams kun kyang rta mgrin bsgyur// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ha yi gr-i ba hu lu hu lu sarba big+h+nAn paM hUM phaT/ 'od 'phros bsam gyis mi khyab pas/
492a4(chi): dgug dang bstim ste bcing byas nas// mtshan ngan thod par bcu gu la ba ta ba/ thun sngags brabs te ma ni na byas la// rim par g.yogs te sngags kyis mnan//
492a5(chi): 'phang ba thun gyi las rnams ni// rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// de ldan pas ni bya bar bshad// gzhan yang nA ga gru 'dul dang // tshe dang byin rlabs
492a6(chi): la sogs pa// kun kyang 'di yis grub par byed// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur paM rtsa ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las/ las kyi 'jug bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu
492a7(chi): bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la rab bstod pa// e ma ho/ chos kyi dbyings las 'bar
492b1(chi): ba'i skur snang zhing // sangs rgyas kun dang ye shes rdzogs pa'i sku// rgyal ba'i sprul sku 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad cing // dpa' sgeg 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag
492b2(chi): 'tshal 'dud// ces bstod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sdud pa po la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig kI la ya// snying po bsdus pa man ngag rgyud// rdo rje
492b3(chi): phur pa gsang ba'i don// khyod nyid la ni gtad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba man ngag gi rgyud las/ ston pa la bstod pa dang // sdud pa
492b4(chi): bo la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba man ngag gi rgyu da gdams ngag bcud ston par byed pa rdzogs so// /
492b5(chi): / rgya ga ra skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya dz+nyA na da du dI na hri tan+na rA dza d+harma sarba gu h+ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i don
492b6(chi): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar sangs rgyas pa'i dus na/ bcom
492b7(chi): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba kun gyi gtso bo/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag
493a1(chi): nyidachos kyi dbyings/ ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa/ bde ba chen po mya ngan las 'das pa/ ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku/ skye
493a2(chi): ba med pa las/ 'gag pa med cing rol pa chen po'i sku/ snang ba la rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis 'og min chen po'i gnas/ gsang ba'i mchog dam
493a3(chi): pa mkha' da byings rnam par pa'i gzhal yas khang / dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa/ gnas kyi mchog/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi pho brang /
493a4(chi): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las/ skya ba dang 'gag pa'i tshul gyis/ ye shes la ye shes rol pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa
493a5(chi): dang sku skye ba med pa dang / gsung 'gag pa med pa dang / thugs mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzan gyi sgo 'bu ma phrag mang po dang / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
493a6(chi): gsal ba rtog pa med pa dang / gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid dang / ma 'dres pa so sor rtogs pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje dang / stobs
493a7(chi): bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / rigs lnga dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / snang ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis thabs gcig
493b1(chi): tu bzhugs so// de'i rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ chos kyi sku la bskul ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma skyes gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku// ma nor ma bcos chos
493b2(chi): dbyings spros dang bral// brdal ba chen pos yongs la rang bzhin gnas// de nyid ma rtogs ma ri ko 'khor ba las// thabs mkhas thugs rje chen pos bstan du
493b3(chi): gsol/ zhes pa'i tshul gyis zhus pas/ chos kyi sku las rang byung du gsungs pa/ a ma ye nas sangs rgyas rang bzhin ka dag kyang // 'on kyang ma rig rtog
493b4(chi): ba'i blo 'khrul pas// gzung 'dzin log rtog sdug bsngal 'khyams pa las// le dag ye grol ye sangs rgyas pa'i don// ma rtogs blo la brjod med don nyid
493b5(chi): bstan/ zhes gsungs so// phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rig pa ye shes kyis/
493b6(chi): chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba 'di lta ste// ya nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang // 'jig rten khams kun ye nas dag pa'i gnas// bzang ngan gnyis med
493b7(chi): dus shes rtogs pa po// sems ni yid bzhin dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung // rnam shes sna tshogs ye shes rtogs pa'i 'khor// bdag nyid sangs rgyas snang la rang
494a1(chi): bzhin med// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par ro la// kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin sna tshogs rol// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid
494a2(chi): sems la byung // mi rtog ye shes rnam rtog bgegs rnams sel// chos kun rang bzhin rnam dag 'od gas la dag/ chos rnams thams cad ye nas stong zhing dben//
494a3(chi): dang ngam shugs kyis rang bzhin thugs rje 'byung // sems nyid rgyu med cho 'phrul yi ger shar// 'byung ba lnga ni chos nyid yum gyi mkha'// nyon mongs lnga dag ye shes
494a4(chi): lA wAn zhing // srid pa gsu ma sto na rdo rje phur pa'i lha// le shas khro bo ngang dang drashu ga sa las gra ba// ga nyi sa med tshul gyi sa ma ga she ga sa srid par byo na// bla ma da
494a5(chi): dbyings kyi ngang du ro gcig thim// chos nyid bde chen skye med brjod dang bral// tha bas kyi spyod pas 'gro kun dbyings su sdud// ma btab bzhin du ya nas lhan
494a6(chi): gyis grub// kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'og min gnas su sbyor// de tshe khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las bsgral// de ltar don shes rig cing rtogs pa'i tshe//
494a7(chi): sku gsung sa la nges par phyin// phur pa gsang ba'i don rgyud las/ ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rig pa la
494b1(chi): shes kyis// chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba las// chos nyid ngang las rang sgrar shar ba'o// e ma ho/ rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// tshig dang yi
494b2(chi): ger bstan med brjod dang bral// skye med chos de sna tshogs ston par byed// brjod med de nyid brjod pa kun gyi mchog/ tshig kun gsal byed ye shes las byung ba//
494b3(chi): byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu rtogs par byed// dngos po'i chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa ma yin sems kyi snang ba shar// de la rang bzhin med de chu zla
494b4(chi): bzhin/ tasnang stong gnyis med lta ba rnam par dag/ rang bzhin 'od gsal nyon mongs ngang gi sa dag/ spros pa'i mtha' bra la rnam yeng sa cir ma yin// rig pa 'gag
494b5(chi): med sna tshogs rol pa che// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog sdug bsngal dbyings su shar// de la mtshan ma'i skyon gyis ma gos pa// sgo skur bral ba'i ye shes chen po ste//
494b6(chi): lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen kun spyod kyang // log rtog 'khrul po'i dbang gis so sor sha ra// ma rig log rtog de nyid gnas su dag/ gnyis med chos sku mi rtog ye shes
494b7(chi): yi ni/ rigs 'dzin skal ba can gyis rtogs par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa ma nyam// rgyun gyi khyad par gyis kyang 'phags pa yin// don dam
495a1(chi): phur pa'i rang bzhin byang chub sems// ngo bo chos sku skye mde rnam par dag/ mtshan nyid gnyis med bde chen zug rngu zhi// nges tshig dag pa'i
495a2(chi): mgo phur kun las pa// dbye na don dom rnam grangs ma yin dang // dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid chos kyi sku// skye med bde che na ma skyes dmigs med bral//
495a3(chi): ye nyid ji bzhin zab pa yang dag don// lhun grub la sogs rnam grangs mtshon te bstan// zhes byung ngo // phur pa'i gsang ba'i don rgyud las/ de kho na
495a4(chi): nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang rig pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings las bskul ba rang byung ba 'di skad
495a5(chi): do// ta blog ma ra shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs pas// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dbab pa dang // lta ba'i sgro 'dogs gcad cing la bzlas te// ting 'dzin nyams kyis
495a6(chi): drod tshad shugs las byung // byang chu ba sems kyi don la 'dris par bya// ma nyam pa nyid kyi don la blo ga na ga ste// gzung 'dzin bag rlags mtshan ma dag par
495a7(chi): bya// dngos po thams cad mi rtog zil gyis mnan// nyon mongs kun kyang dbang du bya zhing blang // sgom du med pa'i don nyid rtogs par bya// yang na sangs rgyas
495b1(chi): dgongs pa rnal du dbab// mnyam nyid dang la dus gsum rgyun du gnas// phyi rol yul gyi zhen pa gcad byas la// don dam skye med chos kyi dbyings su bsgom//
495b2(chi): chos nyid rig pa'i ye shes dag la ni// shes pa spangs bstod ji zhing ji gsal bsgom// rnam par mi rtog yo nas skye med las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang
495b3(chi): shar/ cir yang ma yin cir snang chos kyi sku// stong nyid snang ba snang ba stong pa nyid// so so ma yin tha dad med par bslab// mnyam pa'i tshe na lus ngag bcos su
495b4(chi): med/ sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra ste rnam rtog bral// rtog pa'i gdeng ldan chos nyid gtan la dbab// gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su dag/ rig pa byang
495b5(chi): chub sems nyid rtogs nas kyang // rang bzhin ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku// snang la rang bzhin med de 'ja' tshon 'dra// chu zla lta bu'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ldan//
495b6(chi): thugs kar dpal be'u yi ge 'bru dgu ni// gse ra la 'phra bkod bzhin du gsal bsgoms te// rdzogs pa'i rim pa gdams dag tshul bzhin bsgom// rgod na skye
495b7(chi): mid rmugs na chos nyid las// 'phro na bde chen bying na khro bo ste// ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin// 'dzab kyi dgongs pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin no// chos
496a1(chi): nyid dang las sngags kyi sgra dbyangs blangs// sems 'dzin bsam ga ta na ting 'dzin ma yang sa sgo ma// dbyings kyi ngang la sa rang byung rang drag
496a2(chi): bsam// de tshe rnam rtog sgra chen thams cad kun// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su phur// gdeng ldan rnal 'byor nyes pas ma gos pa sa// snying
496a3(chi): rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig gsung bcad pa// zhe sdang rang rgyud sems kyi ma yin te// byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtogs pa klong du gyur pas
496a4(chi): dbyings su sgrol// ting 'dzin drod tshad las su rung gyur na// nam yang nyes pa'i skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur// sgrol ba rang rgyud las kyi srin por skye// rnam
496a5(chi): par smin pa dmyal khams bco brgyad du// bskal pa grangs med gsum du sdug bsnga la myong // de bas rnal 'byor phal gyis byar mi rung // phur pa gsang
496a6(chi): ba'i don rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das chos dbyings dam pa'i sku la/ rig pa ye shes
496a7(chi): kyis bskul bas/ rang byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa phur pa'i don// rgyu 'bras gnyis las 'das pa'i byang chub sems// don dam
496b1(chi): chos nyid rang byung phur pa ni// phur ni chos dbyings pa ni mya ngan 'das// phur ni ye shes pa nyid byang chub sems// thugs rje chen po'i phur pa bla ma'i don// nam
496b2(chi): mkha'i mtshan nyid sems kyi sems nyid yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi bla ma de// man ngag nges pa'i ngo bo kun dang bral// don ni brjod med lta ru med pa yin//
496b3(chi): skye dang 'gag med gzung dang 'dzin pa med// gsal la 'grib med 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don// mtha' bral sgro skur 'khor 'das gnyis su med// snang stong dbyer
496b4(chi): rmed tha dad med pa'i don// thebs shol med cing gsal la rnam rtog bral// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzung 'dzin gnyis la gdab// mya ngan 'das pa 'khor ba'i chos
496b5(chi): la gdab// ye shes chen po mnyam pa nyid la gdab// byang chub sems kyi shes rab blabs la gdag/ thugs rje'i phu ra pa 'gro drug kun la gdag// bla mi
496b6(chi): chen pos snod dang ldan la gdab// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog la gdab// sems kyi sems nyid rtogs pa'i blo la'o// dbyings la btab pas
496b7(chi): don rnams rdzogs par byed// sems la btab pas rig pa'i ye shes shar// chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gdab// de lta ba'i don gyis thebs par
497a1(chi): gyur pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mya ngan 'das par zla// sdug bsngal de nyid chos nyid byang chub sems// rnam rtog las ni ye shes skye
497a2(chi): 'gyur zhing // dmyal ba'i gnas nyid 'og min bla med gnas// de tshe ma lus phur pa gdab ces bya// don dam nges par gyur pa lta ba yin// gsal ba rnam rtog
497a3(chi): bral ba sgom pa yin// bya bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa 'bras bu yin// zhe na chags 'dzin pa med pa spyod pa yin// 'khor 'das gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin//
497a4(chi): thugs rjes gzung gyis 'dzin na sgrol ba yin// don gnyis lhangs kyis rtogs na thebs pa yin// gang du mi rtog 'dzin pa dam tshig yin// thebs shol med
497a5(chi): pa'i don rtogs man ngag yin// mngon du gyur na mngon sum dkyil 'khor yin// don nyid nyams su len na ting 'dzin yin// gnas su stobs pa mchod pa
497a6(chi): chen po yin// byar med lhun gyis grub po 'phrin las yin// rig pa gdeng du gyur pa dbang mchog ste// des na thams cad ma lus phur pa'i don// phur
497a7(chi): ni skye med pa ni 'gag pa med// phur ni gzung med pa ni 'dzin med don// phur ni ye shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings// phur ni thabs chen yab kyi mkha'// pa ni shes
497b1(chi): rab pha rol phyin pa yum gyi glong // chos nyid dbyer med phur pa'i don nyid kyis// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thams cad dbyings su bsgra la// stong gsum 'jig
497b2(chi): rten khams kun bsgral ba'i zhing // ba sgral byA sgrol byed chos nyid gnyis su med// de yi don ni rang byung phur pa'i don// zhes 'byung ngo // phur pa gas
497b3(chi): ba don gyi rgyud las/ rang byung phur pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i don gyi rgyud rdzogs so//
497b4(chi): rgya gar skad du sa mrin a ti yA ri tan+na/ bod skad du/ sbas pa zab mo mdung rtsi'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la
497b5(chi): ya'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la yi'i rgyal po de/ karma he ru ka la sogs
497b6(chi): pa'i he ru ka rnams dang / rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa'i yum rnams dang / de bzhin khro bo dang khro mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i khro bos bskor ba'i gnas/
497b7(chi): phyi ltar na dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba dang / nang ltar na rang bzhin gyi dur khrod dang / gsang ba ltar na b+ha ga'i dbyings dang / de nas 'phra man pho mo dang / sgo ba rnams
498a1(chi): dang srung ma bcu gnyis dang / 'khor thams cad kyis/ phyi'i dur khrod chen por nyid kyi thugs las sprul nas/ gdug pa can tshar gcod
498a2(chi): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las/ dbu dang phyag bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur to// de nas ru tra na ga
498a3(chi): po bsgral ba'i 'phrin las/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa la bos nas/ drag po ha ha dang hI hi'i sgra sgrogs pa/ gom pa'i stabs kyis sa gzhi gnon pa/
498a4(chi): de lta bu gcig tu gyur na sa/ de'i tshe ru tra nag po rab tu 'dar/ sa gzhi ni rab tu g.yo/ he ru kra thams cad ni mdang sa dang ldan// de nas ri gA
498a5(chi): kyi he ru ka rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ru tra zhes bya lta ba log/ las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir skyes// bdud rnams btu la na bar chad nyung // med par
498a6(chi): byas na bstan pa gnyan// mtho ris 'phel dang dmyal khams stongs// bsgral ba'i gnas ni dam pa bdun// srog don bka' dam las kyis nyams// 'dod pas
498a7(chi): nyams dang mtshan mas nyams// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha ma dang ni slob dpon gsod// 'di dag bsgral ba dam par bshad// don las nyams pa'i
498b1(chi): mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ma yin spyod pa mtho// 'di yang ba sgral dmigs dam pa'o// bka' las nyams pa 'di lta bu'o// dam pa'i gsang ba 'chol par spyod//
498b2(chi): dam tshig nges don ming gis kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig 'das// de yang bsgral ba'i dmigs yin no// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'chi bar nges
498b3(chi): kyang rnal 'byor 'tshe// dug tu shes nas lto ru za// las kyis nyams te myur bar bsgral// 'dod pas nyams pa brku 'phrog sogs// mtshan mas nyams pa
498b4(chi): mtshan med spong // 'di bdun shin tu brtson byas la// drag po'i las nyid brtsam par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid sbas pa zab mo las/ rmeng
498b5(chi): gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas dpal kI la ya'i bdag po des/ dbang sgyur dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ karma
498b6(chi): he ru ka la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phur pa bsgrub pa'i gnas de ni// ma mo'i gan sau bsam shing gaM cig drung // 'byung po mang po gang yod par//
498b7(chi): byas na las la phan 'dogs yod// bkra mi shis par byas gyur na// grims 'byin shugs kyis ting 'dzin 'grub// sa la g.yul ni skye ba ru// bya bar shin
499a1(chi): tu bzang po'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo dag la// mig dmar bya ba'i dus dag tu// sa la stegs bu che 'am chung // brtsams te 'phrin las
499a2(chi): ba ni bro brdung // sgra gon nyid kyang bya bar shis// da ni rdzas gsum tshogs par bya// 'tshe ba'i zas su dug 'joms sman// nag po rigs kyi phur pa dag/ tshogs
499a3(chi): brdzas mA~M rlom pa'o// many+dzamA sa sngar ba'i rdzog pargyas// sku mdu dang bAbA~M kA na la yas su// rigs lnga'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// spyi dang rtsen ya
499a4(chi): yu ma gnyis// rgya mdud 'og ma'i ga zha la yas nas// steng 'og khro bo 'khor dang bcas// zur brgya da khro bo 'phra ma na ma// btsu ga his srangs ma zur
499a5(chi): gsum sogs// sgom bzhi ni rtsibs mtshan la// de ltar gru gsum yum gnyis la// phur pa'i rdzas rnams dgod par bya// de yang 'khor lo rtsabs bcu la//
499a6(chi): stobs po che dang hUM ka ra// shar stod nub smad gnyis su dgod// gzhan rnams rim par dgod par bya// byang chub sems kyi phur pa ni// phur pa kun gyi rgyu ru
499a7(chi): grags/ phur pa phur pa zhes bya ba// phur pa thugs kyi phur pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ rdzas kyi ro ma
499b1(chi): pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas karma he ru ka la sogs pas/ kI la ya'i bdag po la gsol pa dbang sdud phur pa ji lta
499b2(chi): lags// mnan pa'i phur pa ji ltar lags// dgug pa'i phur pa ji lta ra lags// gdab pa'i phur pa ji ltar lags// dpung da bral phur pa ji ltar lags//
499b3(chi): kI la ya yis bka' skul pa// dgra bgegs dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// nag po'i rigs kyis bya bar bshad// mnan pa'i phur pa skyer pa drag/ 'dren cing
499b4(chi): 'gugs pa mchog phur drag/ gdab pa'i phur pa lcags phu ra te// dpung dang dbral bar bya phur drag/ nag po'i rigs kyi shing dag la// so bzhi pa 'am
499b5(chi): sor brgyad pa// mkhas pas legs par tshad dang ldan// skyur pa lo mig sa 'og gi/ sor bzhi brkos pa bkra shis rdzas// mchog phur rje ngar gnyis la'o//
499b6(chi): gnam lcags sa lcags khro chu dang // mi rta mang po bsad pa dang // rang tang pha la pa'i lcags nA lnga// bya rgo da ga shog pa'i dang ru'o// de ltar byas te yu ma la
499b7(chi): dgod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ phur pa rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
500a1(chi): de nas kI la ya'i bdag po de chos nyid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bka' stsal pa/ byang chub snying po zhes
500a2(chi): bya ba// sems can kun la yod kyis kyang / mthong bar bya ba yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni phur pa'i rgyud// de ltar chos nyid don rdzogs pa// rang bzhin med pa
500a3(chi): zhes bya'o// raM yaM khaM gyi 'bru gsum gyis// bsreg gtor sbyang ba gong ma tshig/ byang chub sems kyi rtsa dag las// byang chub sems ni gzung dbab bya// dang po
500a4(chi): gser gyi sgo mo la// byang chub sems ni rab dga' dang // sems de yongs su 'dus pa las// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ru// mkhas pas hUM las khro bo rnams//
500a5(chi): zhi bas mi 'dul rnams la bya// rnam par shes pa khugs pa ni// mchog tu gces pas rab tu bsgrags// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// phyogs bcu/
500a6(chi): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsal// hUM zhes pa ni nyi shu las// khro bo khro mo rnams kyang gsal// dza zhes pa ni nyi shu las// 'phra men rnams kyang de bzhin gsal//
500a7(chi): dzaHhUM baM ho bzhi nyid las// sgo ma bzhi ni rab tu gsol// hUM zhes pa ni gsum nyid las// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog gsum// e baM ma ya bzhi nyid las//
500b1(chi): sho na mu kha bzhi nyid gsal// dza dza bya ba bzhi nyid las// sa bdag bzhi ni gsal ba'i don// b+h+yo zhes pa ni bzhi las kyang // bdag nyid bzhi ru rab tu bsams//
500b2(chi): b+h+yo zhes nyi shu n+ya brgya da las// dbang phyug ma na bsam pa bya// dbus kyi zla gam sgo can la// bcom ldan bdud 'dul ya ba yu ma dgod// mi 'gyur bstan
500b3(chi): pa'i rdo rje dang / sku gsung ldan pa'i thod pa dang // dbus kyi gru gsum thod pas brgyan// rgyas 'debs ma yi steng nyid du// gru ga sum la ni sras
500b4(chi): mchog gsum// khro bo 'khor lo rtsi bas bcu la// mthing kha'i steng du dgod par bya// rtsi bas mtshan la ni 'phra man ma// gong ma bzhin du mthing kha
500b5(chi): la/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsam// de nas slob ma gzud par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/
500b6(chi): rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor gsal bAr bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i bdag po de/ thams cad
500b7(chi): zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ de dag rnams ni rgyu yi don// da ni rab
501a1(chi): tu bshad par bya// rang gis gsal ba'i ting 'dzin no// sbyor ba dang po zhes su sbyor// shin tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang / las kyi
501a2(chi): rgyal ba mchog dga' dang // dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dag go/ ting 'dzin rim pa de rnams dang // rnal 'byor rim pa'i sgo dag dang // rnal 'byor dang
501a3(chi): ni rnal 'byor che// rjes su rnal 'byor shin tu rnal 'byor// de rlung stong pa'i 'phyong sa ni// kun gzhi'i rnamo shes yin pa ste// langs yang de la
501a4(chi): ba sti ma yau nga go/ ga zha na la ba sti ma pa ma yi na te// ga na sa pa de nyi da kho na la'o// bas+t+ri ma pa rang gi ma na da ga go/ de na sa ga nyi sa pa'i R+Ya da de ni// phywa na
501a5(chi): lus dang shes pa la// gnas pa rlung gi ga na sa yin te// g.yas g.yon ring po dal ba rnams// ting 'dzin dre la sgrib mi sgrib// sems kyis sems
501a6(chi): la ba lha sa pa na// phu ra pa byang chu ba sa mas su ma thong // de yang rlung gi sa che ba sa// gdab pa ra bya ba yod ma yin// rlung zhes pa ni la sa kun byed//
501a7(chi): rnam shaMs de yang zhon pa'i rta// kha btsu ma lU yi da pu sa su ni// rlung gi 'khor lo mtshon gang ba// tshe'u 'am dung rgya'i tshul du bas ma// de nas cha
501b1(chi): mnyam srad mda' 'dra// sems kyi skad cig rim pa brtags// de goms red pa lam gyi mchog/ rnam par thar pa'i lam yang stor// mi 'jigs sa yang de'o
501b2(chi): na'o// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ rlung sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor
501b3(chi): gyis gsol pa/ kI la ya yi bdag po mchog/ ru tra sdang dgra ba sgral dmigs la/ ming dang gzugs la brten lags sam// chos nyid tsam la bsam
501b4(chi): lags bsam// rang kha'i dngos pos bsgral lags sam// 'on te thams cad rang bzhin gzhag/ kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jigs
501b5(chi): byed he ru ka/ ru tra dang 'dra sgral dmigs la// kun tshogs sgo nas bsgra la par bya// dang po de ltar byas pa dang // nu ba ga sum pa la 'jug par bya//
501b6(chi): ming rus zlo dang zla ba dang // khrag chen gyis ni bris nas su// rdzu tshe srub lo rkang rjes sa// yang na rdo phye dug la bya// de ltar ling ga byas la ni// ma ngos
501b7(chi): 'brub khung la khyer sum brtsegs can// nyi shu rtsa brgyad srin mo 'gros// yang na 'brub khung phyogs ngan sar// rang kha'i dngos po ma yin te// rnam shes ling gar khung
502a1(chi): pa'o// de yang bdag nyid bzhi dang ldan// the tshom med dang yang dag zhugs// dam la gnas dang le lo spangs// 'di rnams 'grub pa'i rgyuru
502a2(chi): grags/ yang na bya ba thams cad spangs// rdza sa mchog dgra rngams med pa ru// shes ra ba gsu ma dang ldan pas bya// de nas phur pa'i ro mi pa ni//
502a3(chi): rdo rje gzhon nu khro bo bcu// bsgrub phur dngos grub nod pa'o// 'phra rer srungs ma'i phur pa ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi pho nya yin// des kyang gdab par
502a4(chi): bya ba min// sku gsung thugs la sa byung ba yis// sras mchog kI la ya gsum ni// gdab pa'i phu ra pa dam pa ste// gu gul tshil chen dag dang ni//
502a5(chi): go ro tsa na'i du de pas bdug/ dbyings dang lhums su gzi byin pa skyed// nag po dug gtor byas la rI// skyes kyang dang po las ngan dbang gis skyes//
502a6(chi): 'jigs kyang tha mar las ngan dbang gis 'jig/ oM las skyes pa'i hU~M nyid ni// bskyed pa rkyen gyis sngags yin no// da ni bzlas pa rgyun gyi sngags//
502a7(chi): rab tu ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de// legs par goms shing 'dres pa dang // shin tu brjod la rab tu bzlas// da ni sbas pa zab mo yi// nges pa'i drag
502b1(chi): sngags brdeg par bya// yungs kar nyid la sngags byas la// snying khwa lte ba gsang ba ru// nyi ma dro dang dmar thag chad// shin tu dag par bzlas pa byA/
502b2(chi): oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya ma ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT/ sgying la ya/ sarba bi g+h+nA na baM mar ba phaT/ lte ba la ya/ ti ba ta tsakra tiSh+Tha lhan/ mA ra ya che ge mo
502b3(chi): phaT phaT// gas nga ba la ya/ 'di ni sngags mchog rgyal po ste// khro bo 'phra men kun gyi sngags// zhe sdang rdo rje bsam byas la// me dpung 'bar ba rang
502b4(chi): rtags can// me dpung I la su ma nA rub// 'jigs su rung ba'i sras gsum gyis// sngags ni kI li ki la ye// a ko To ni bzlas pa bya// de bzhin
502b5(chi): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ sras kI la la ston pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas kI lA ya'i rgyal gro/
502b6(chi): rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bka' stsal pa/ sngags pa'i rgyun gyi chas kyi rdzas// glang chen gro rlon zhing gi shun/
502b7(chi): thal chen zhag dang rok+Shas brgyan// stag ga sham bu sbrul gyi chun// 'di dag 'jigs pa dpa' bo'i chas// rnam rgyal la sogs go rims bzhin/
503a1(chi): / shar stong nub smad gnyis su ni// stang 'og khro bo snga ma bzhin// rtsibs mtshan gnyis la 'phra men ma// sho na la sogs re ma ti//
503a2(chi): ro mdza// pho byin dril bu byang nyid du// de ltar srungs ma bcu gnyis dang // sgo ma bzhi ri spe la mAr dgod// de nas sras mchog kI la ye// lag tu blangs
503a3(chi): te gdab par bya// de yang a ko ta yas so// de nas gdab pa zin pa dang // dgra bgegs gang yin phyogs ngan du// ling ga de ni bsreg par bya// de
503a4(chi): nas shin tu rdol 'byor bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ las ngan bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
503a5(chi): de nas 'khor gyis gsol pa// kI la ya yi dbang dam pa// de ring khyod kyis rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ ba rdza
503a6(chi): kI la ya'i rgyal po de dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te baM ka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka/ sems
503b1(chi): tsan+da dbang po'i dbang gis na// dbang mchog ces ni rab grags pa// phyi dang rang dang gsang ba dang // de la dbye ba gsum gsum dang // yang na nyi shu rtsa
503b2(chi): gcig dbang // bzhi bcu phur pa re re la// dbang ni bskur du yod pa ste// de yang dbang mchog bzhi ru bshad// bum pa'i dpung dang gsang pa'i dbang //
503b3(chi): shes rab ya shes bde chen dang // shin tu rnal 'byor ba zhi pa'o// de ltar mkhas pas gang rtogs pa// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'o// 'khor gyis gsol
503b4(chi): pa de don rgyas par ba ka' stsal 'tshal// kI la yau yis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin sdang ba'i mi dag la// bsgrubs na chags pa'i srungs ma ni// bcu
503b5(chi): gnyis dag tu shes pa la// sho na mu kha lkugs spyang mo// sho na mu kha lcags khyi mo// sri la mu kha zangs 'phar ma// sri la mu kha zangs wa mo// sa bdag
503b6(chi): bzhi ni 'grub par nges// bdag nyid bzhi ni dpyid dbyar dang // ston dgun bzhi yi rgyal mo ste// bzhi tshan gsum po rtag tu ni// bstan cing ba ling sbyin par bya//
