503b7(chi): de la dngos grub myur bar 'ong // dbang mchog bzhi las bskur bya ba// bum pa byed pa'i mkhan po des// rgya mdud nyid ni bum pa'o// 'phrin las rnam bzhi dbang
504a1(chi): dus su// dkar dang dmar dang nag dang ser// de dang bu'i dbang nyid ni// spyi yi dbang du 'gro ba'o// 'khor ba rgyas 'debs gdung brgyud 'dzin//
504a2(chi): btsun mo de la khro bo bcu// ston pa nang gi dbang nyid do// yum nyid mkhas nas sras sum mo// b+ha grar dbang bskur gzi byin bskyed// de ni gsang ba'i dbang du
504a3(chi): 'gro/ dbang mchog bka' stsa la nyan pa la// phan dang nus pa gang 'dod sbyin// gal te dam tshig med pa lo// byin na glang snar mtshon btags 'dra// byang
504a4(chi): chub sems kyi bsti gnas sa// lus la 'khor lo bcu gcig go// stod na lnga ste smad na lnga// 'di la khro bo bcu bkod pa// de bzhi ni dbang po lnga dag la// 'phra
504a5(chi): mun zung re dgod pa dang // rkang lag bzhi la bcu drug pa'o// rim pa bzhin du bzhi bzhi gnas// de ni nang dbang dam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi btsun mo
504a6(chi): yi// mkha' nas thams cad ston pa ni// gsang ba'i dbang du gzhag par bya// shin tu mi dmigs bzhi pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang
504a7(chi): bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ dbang gi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor la bos nas/ dbyings zab mo zhes bya
504b1(chi): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bka' sprul pa/ thams cad thams nad med mthong ba// dkyil 'khor khro tshul ma lus pa// ma mthong rmongs la bstan
504b2(chi): pa'o// yang dag don ni stong pa ste// mtshan ma'i bag chags spangs pa'o// sems la sems kyis bltas pa na// mthong ba med pa mthong ba'i mchog
504b3(chi): de ni nges don mchog yin no// bde bar gshegs pas de ma gzigs// de ni smra phyir sla ba ste// dka' ba shin tu mthong bar dka'// de bzhin gshegs pa
504b4(chi): thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ shin tu rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// sbas pa zab mo mdung rtsi'i rgyud
504b5(chi): ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi ban de bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// zur pa'i dpe la brgyar zhus
504b6(chi): dgargya kar skad du/ nA ma karma ku ru dan dA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phrin las phun sum tshogs
504b7(chi): pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po
505a1(chi): dges pa chen po'i snying po da/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur nas/ yum gyi b+ha ga la rtag tu bzhugs so// de nas mdo
505a2(chi): par byang chub pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ longs spyod par mdzad pa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad/ zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan nas/ gzugs bzang po zhal gsum
505a3(chi): phyag drug pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum gyi mdog mnga' ba/ so so'i lag cha la sogs pa'i phyag cha dang dpe byad 'dzin pa de/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi
505a4(chi): dang snying po me tog dkar stis brgyan pa na/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin rin po che sna snga las grub pa/ tshad med po'i gzhal yas khang de dbyings dang ldan pa/
505a5(chi): khwa dog dang ldan pa/ gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ gru chad dang bcas pa/ rta babs dang brem slas dang bcas pa/ ka bA brgyad dang gdung bcu drug
505a6(chi): gis rnam pade smras pa/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis grubs pa'o/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni/ nyid las mi zhun pa'i 'khor rnams dang thabs
505a7(chi): gcig tu bzhugs pa ni/ 'di ltar bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen
505b1(chi): mchog dang / tshed dpag med dang / don yod grub pa dang / btsun mo rnams dang bzlas pa dang / kuzhan yang 'khor rtswa lha mo du mas bskor ba 'dis smra
505b2(chi): sgeg mo dang / 'phreng ba ma dang / dbyangs len mo dang / gar sgyur ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar ma ma dang / dri chab ma dang / lcags
505b3(chi): kye ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen
505b4(chi): dga' ba'i mdog de/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhugs nas/ 'od kyi bye brag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po snang bar byas so// de nas stong gi dkyil
505b5(chi): 'khor gyi nang du gzigs nas/ zang khar bltas sam gsol bar byas nas/ mnyam pa chen po las mi snang bar gyur to// e ma'o// thugs rjes ma bzung
505b6(chi): sems can gcig kyang med// de yi stobs kyis byams pa ngo ma shes// kun la brtse bas dga' ba mchog tu 'gyur// thams cad skyobs pas btang snyoms
505b7(chi): chen por bzhengs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dga' mchog de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal gsum par kun gyis gzigs so// de nas de
506a1(chi): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang / d+hu pe la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa
506a2(chi): dang / me tog kar ti ka la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa sa mchod de/ pu sa mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol te/ spyan ras/
506a3(chi): dri med kun gyis gzigs// rab dges rgyal po khyod nyid la// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams// dang por gang gi sgo nas zhugs// khyed kyis
506a4(chi): dga' ba bskyed par gsol// zhes brjod pas/ nyid kyi sa nyid la gzigs nas/ chos thams cad dbugs 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
506a5(chi): so// tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang // byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// bsgrub pa po sa ni nan tan bya// gang gis stong
506a6(chi): nyid mi shes pa// stong pa nyid kyang 'di ltar bya// stong pa nyid kyi don nyid kyang // yi ge'i ming tsho ga sa sgra la gragaso// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa
506a7(chi): At+ma ko&hraM/ ye nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin lo// dngos med stong pa'i chos rnams ni// bdag dang chos dang rnam rig dang // gzung dang 'dzin dang stong pa'o//
506b1(chi): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// ye shes rnams kyi rtse mo ste// shes pas mthong ba'i yul med do// gang gis mthong na ye shes skyes// zhes gsungs
506b2(chi): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des rnal 'byor gyi tshul 'di gsungs so//
506b3(chi): ye nas chos nyid rang bzhin la// snying n+d+he thams cad khyab par bsgom// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// don gyi rtsa ba yin par gsungs// rnam kun mkhyen
506b4(chi): pa'i ye shes dang // kun la khyab pa'i snying rje ni// thun mong theg pa'i rang bzhin no// drang ba don gyi sangs rgyas kyis// byams dang dga' dang btang
506b5(chi): snyoms sogs// rnal 'byor pa yis bas ma par bya// gzhan gyi don la dmigs pa dang // chos rnams la ni dmigs pa dang // mi dmigs pa la
506b6(chi): dmigs pa ni// tshad medo bzhi po bsgom pa'o// stong nyid na ma mkhar ye ba sgoms las// rgyu yi sa bo na hAM du gsal// de las gnas bsrung ba ni ra ba
506b7(chi): tu brtsam// rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor yang dag don las skyes// de ru yi ge'i bru bsam mo// yaM raM pAM lAM tAM bru~M hUM/
507a1(chi): de nas yang dag dpa' bo des// sku gsung thugs dang ma nyam sbyor bas// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// bdag nyid dbus kyi gtso bor ni//
507a2(chi): rang gis rang la byin gyis brlabs// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu yang // zhal gsum phyug ni drug par gyur// mA hA yo ka'i tshul gyis su// rnal 'byor ma ni
507a3(chi): dga' bya ste// 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// snyoms zhugs 'khor ni sku la bsdus// de nas dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i sngags// nyid kyi nyid la gdon pa ni
507a4(chi): 'di'o// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// rim pa bzhin du bkod de gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams/
507a5(chi): ldan par byas nas gdon par bya// de nas thugs rje'i bdag po yis// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi gtso bor gyur// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lte ba dang // rtsi bas dang rtsi bas
507a6(chi): mtshan gro chad dang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rim par bsam// de yang rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen dpal dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
507a7(chi): don thams grub pa rnams dang / yu ma rnams dang / sgo ma bzhi rnams dang ngo // de dag rnams kyang / dkar po dang / mthing kha dang / dmar po dang / ser po
507b1(chi): dang / ljang khu'i mdog tu snang ba/ rang rang gi lag cha 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri rnams phyag dang por 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rang
507b2(chi): dang 'dra ba'i rig ma rnams la 'khyud pa/ chos kyi phyag rgyas dbang sgyur ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ so so'i mdog dang / lag chas brgyan pa ni dkyil 'khor
507b3(chi): rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus/ rdo rje 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
507b4(chi): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba'i snying po de/ dpa' bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
507b5(chi): 'tshams kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu gsungs so// ye nas dngos med dngos po'i tshogs// dngos por byung bas dngos po'i gnas// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la// dngos
507b6(chi): por brtags kyang dngos med pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin las// rgyu yi ngo bo gsal ba las// gnas bsrung ba ni rnam par bsam// gnyis pa yis ni
507b7(chi): rnam brgyan la// bcu bzhi pa yi sprin stengs su// bco lnga'i gdan dang thig ler bcas// de nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// rim pa cung zad 'khor ba las// nyi
508a1(chi): ma'i dkyil 'khor ma nor bsam// de stengs pad+ma lha chen dang // thabs kyi dbus su bsam bya ba// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// zhal
508a2(chi): gsum phyag ni drug pa'o// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// rtsa ba'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// phyag gnyis hUM gi rgyas bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin//
508a3(chi): lhag ma zhi ba'i tshul du bya// sems dpa'i gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// bgegs rnams kun gyi snying kho nas// 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po ni// thugs ka drag nas
508a4(chi): phyung ba ni// khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes ni// spyan sngar sras kyi tshul du bzhugs// hUM bzhi las kyi phyag na ni// g.yas pa rdo rje tho ba ste// g.yon pa 'dzin pa'i
508a5(chi): zhogs pa'o// oM suM b+ha nI suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i hU~M hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga ban bid+yA rA dzA hU~M phaT/ bgegs rnams kun ni rab bkug
508a6(chi): ste/ dkyil 'khor rnams kyi gdan du byas// A ko Ta ya mud ga ra hU~M/ tho ba lcags kyu khrigs pa yis// rdo rje phur pa'i khro bo ni// sku stod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste//
508a7(chi): dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu la// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra la// rdo rje phur pa phyag na bsnams// smad ni gsal zhing lta bu la// 'od zer
508b1(chi): rnam par 'phro bar bsams// rdo rje phur bu nges btab nas// bgegs lus shin tu mi g.yo yis// oM na ma sma man+ta kA ya wA ka tsat+tit+ta badz+rA nAn/ b+ha g+ha/ b+hU ta ya
508b2(chi): g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+mAn hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAn kA ya wa ka tsit+ta/ badz+ra nA na kI la
508b3(chi): ye hUM phaT/ sems dpa' 'phra mo'i rang bzhin gyis// snying kha'i chu skyes nyid gzugs gsal// hU~M yig rnam par phyung nas ni// khro bo bcu yi gzugs su
508b4(chi): gyu ra/ tab skyed dang bzlas pa las kyi sngags// thun mong gcig tu bsgrags pa'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha hAM ka ra hU~M/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+re kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/
508b5(chi): ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dan+ta hU~M/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mA na ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa le hU~M/ b+ha na d+ha b+han d+ho hU~M
508b6(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM
508b7(chi): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ gsal bar blta sa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/
509a1(chi): mi g.yo lta bu'i 'khor ba yi// me stag mang po 'phro ba can// phyogs bcu rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje
509a2(chi): phur bur byin brlabs nas// phyogs bcu rnams su rnam par bsam// de nas rgyu yi sa bon las// lasna dang mthun pa'i 'od zer 'phros// 'od las sprul
509a3(chi): pa'i khro bo ni// yan lag byin gyis brlabs bya ste// stan g+han zab mo'i sbyor sgrol gyis// rang rang rigs la sogs pa yis// rang rang lag cha la gro
509a4(chi): char 'phros// de ni spos mo thag tu yang // bar gcod bgegs rnams gzhom pa dang // gnas bsrung ba ni yang drag go// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa yi//
509a5(chi): gur dang sa gzhi ra prar bsam// rten gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par// stang du ma yi dkyil 'khor dang // chu yis rnam par g.yogs par bsgom//
509a6(chi): las kyi phyag rgya de yis ni// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // nga rgyal phrag dag mchod pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs la// yon tan 'phrin
509a7(chi): las rnams kyis brgyan// bgegs rnams rnam par 'tshig par 'gyur// me dpung rgyal po ri rab kyis// myos shing gaun bu ba 'bros pa dang // ba mo'i
509b1(chi): mdog dang mtshungs pa la// rdo rje la sogs gur lngar gsal// gur dang sa gzhi bla rI dang // rgyal mtshan bdun rtsigs par bcas// dga' dang dga' yi
509b2(chi): mtshams rnams ni// thun mong dbang chen mtshams rnams dang // thun mong ma yin ka ba'i mtshams// rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yi ge hUM las bskyed/
509b3(chi): par bya// de lus a rnamus skyo zhing 'du// rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan 'phyar// de bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis// gcig la gcig bstan rgyu 'bras
509b4(chi): tshu la// de yi steng du yi ge au// rdo rje gunyis dang yang dag ldan// de yi steng du yi ge raM// dbyibs dang kha drog rdo rjes mtshan// de yi stang na yi ge au//
509b5(chi): de byibs dang rdo rje gnyis dang ldan// de yi steng na yi ge paM// ma mo'i mdog lA bum pas brgyan// de yi stang na yi ge hUM// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan//
509b6(chi): de yi steng du yi ge suM// kha dog da byibs can gru bzhir gnas// de yi steng du yi ge oM// rdo rdza gnyis dang yang dag ldan// de yi stang na yi ge laM// de las
509b7(chi): byung ba'i yon tan ni// rin chen gru bzhi 'phreng bas brgyan// gzhal gyis mi lang gzhal yas ni// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
510a1(chi): cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ gzhi'i dkyi la 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
510a2(chi): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dga' ba chen po des/ bya sgom chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bya byed sdig pa'i 'khor
510a3(chi): lo 'di bshad do// ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor po rnams la ngas bshad par bya'o// yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ yang dag par sbyin pa'i sdig pa dang /
510a4(chi): yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par bsam gtan gyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par bzod pa'i sdig pa dang / yang dog par brtson 'grus kyi
510a5(chi): sdig pa dang / yang dag par snying rje'i sdig pa da / yang dag par sto bas kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par spod pa'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i sdig pa
510a6(chi): dang yang dag par ting nge 'dzin gyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par drod kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par bzang po'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par sman pa'i sdig pa
510a7(chi): dang yang dag par tshul gyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par grol ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag par thabs kyi sdig pa dang /
510b1(chi): yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang / yang dag par mthong ba'i sdig pa dang / yang dag pa'i sdig pa ma yin pa'i sdig pa thams cad ni/ shes bzhin ma yin pa'i sdig
510b2(chi): ba ste/ yang dag par spang bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba de
510b3(chi): thob par bya ba'i don to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ de bzhin ma yin pa'i sdig pa'i 'khor lo bshad
510b4(chi): pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
510b5(chi): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dga' ba'i mchog des/ dpal gdeng chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// yang dag par gsungs
510b6(chi): so// dpal chen po sbyin pa'i gdeng dang / dpal chen po brtson 'grus kyi gdeng dang / dpal chen po bsam gtan gyi gdeng dang / dpal chen po shes rab kyi
510b7(chi): gdang dang / dpal chen po bzod pa'i gdang dang / dpal chen po tshul khrims kyi gdeng dang / dpal chen po snying rje'i gdeng dang / dpal chen po stobs kyi
511a1(chi): gdeng dang / dpal chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi gdeng dang / dpal chen po spyod pa'i gdeng dang / dpal chen po lta ba'i gdeng dang / dpal
511a2(chi): chen po mthong ba'i gdeng dang / dpal chen po yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i gdeng dang / zhes gsungs nas mnyam par gzhag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
511a3(chi): cad kyi sadeng rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad b+h+ya ka srang b+ha kAswA/ karma k+sha las/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gdeng gi la skye
511a4(chi): pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog des/ bzhi dang rnam bzhi rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
511a5(chi): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// de ltar na 'di lta ste/ byang chub snying po can rnams kyis// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// sa zin a
511a6(chi): 'thas ma yin te// rten 'byor chos tsam rang bzhin no// dngos su brtags pa ma yin pas/ brtags na chos sku bde ba che// yang dag par ni rnam thar gsum//
511a7(chi): rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i sgo rnams kyis// stong pa'i sgo rnams shes par bya'o// de ltar shes pa'i sgo rnams kyis// rten cing 'brel par shes par bya// de nyid shes
511b1(chi): pa ma yin pa// tha dad ma yin don gcig min// 'gag pas med pa skye ba med// rtag pa ma yin chud pa min// 'ong ba med pas 'gro ba med// de bas rgyu yi rang
511b2(chi): bzhin ni// ngo bo nyid kyis ma grub pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// yod pa ma yin med pa min// bdag las skye ba med pas na// gzhan las skye
511b3(chi): kha ga la yod// de ltar dngos po dngos shes nas// bsgom par bya ba yod pa yin// de nyid rnam par thar pa'o// de nyid rkyen gyis rang bzhin ni// rgyu las 'bras bu
511b4(chi): rgyas ma btab// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar ro// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// 'bras bu rang nyid mi skye bas// smon par bya ba'i/
511b5(chi): nges 'brel te// smin par bya ba rna ma thar ro// de nyid zil gyis gnon pa ni// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na ba dz+ra swa b+hU wa at+sa ko&haM/ yang dag don du bsgom pa ni//
511b6(chi): don dam pa'i sems bskyed la// 'gro ba'i don gyi sangs rgyas bskyed// de ni kun rdzob bden pa ste// kun rdzob par yang sems bskyed de// byams dang snying rje la
511b7(chi): sogs bya// stong pa nyid kyi yang shas ni// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mi mthong // de la tshad med bzhi po bstan// da ni breg pa'i rang bzhin ta// theg pa'i nang nas chen
512a1(chi): por grags// 'brel par byed pa gang bsgrub pa// shes rab snying rje ldan pa'o// dug gsum lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// gang rnams sdug bsngal
512a2(chi): nyen pa la// 'dod pa'i don gyi snying rje 'byung // bsgrub pa'i 'dod pa byams pa ste// kun gyi don byed byams pa yin// dga' ba rab tu dga' ba ste// don dam
512a3(chi): 'dun pa'i 'dod pa'o// chags dang zhe sdang rnam bral ba// don dam par ni sems nyid do// de bas don dam btang snyoms so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
512a4(chi): kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ nges par 'brel ba rnam par thar pa dang / de nyid spros pa'i mtha' dang tshad med pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
512a5(chi): pa'o// ta nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten dang rten can gyi sngags 'di thugs las phyung ngo // oM yaM ra su raM kaM/ bruM bi sha bi shud+d+he/ oM la
512a6(chi): hAM muM[:]sa maM/ aM pyaM/ ha taM/ dzaHhU~M paM ho/ oM dzi na dzi ga l-i ste sha ra s+t+ri/ hAM pa dz+ra d+hi ka mr-i d+hA ta shA ri/ sa ra tA d+hi ka maM ho ha ra ti/ aM A ro la ki pyaM ra ga ra
512a7(chi): tiM ha pradz+nyA d+h+ri ka taM badz+ra ra ti/ badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ badz+ra pA sha hUM/ badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ badz+ra g+haN+Da hau/ phyogs bcu bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// rang byung gdod
512b1(chi): nas dag pa yi// phyogs cha med pa'i gzhal yas nas// thugs rje'i 'od zer rab spros nas// 'od zer char pa phab pa bzhin// mdun nas thad khar dmigs pa
512b2(chi): las/ tha dad ma yi ni gnyis med bsti ma// e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya stAM/ sa ma ya ho/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa pu swA hA/
512b3(chi): e A ra li ho/ dza dza dza oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya oM/ hU~M badz+ra sa ma~M ya hUM/ swa badz+ra sa ma ya sa/ ha badz+ra sa ma ya ha/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa pu a hUM/
512b4(chi): dzaHhU~M baM ho/ kha ra sAh+ma/ de nas skra gsung thu kas kyi dngos gra ba gsol pa 'di gsungs so// ska gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor
512b5(chi): lo ste/ ta sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur nas// dngos grub ra ba mchog blang bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya phaT/
512b6(chi): de nas dngos grub rab blangs nas// bdag dang gzugs brnyan dbyer med phyir// tha dad ma yin gnyis su med// de ltar ye shes phebs pa dang // nyid la nyid spyod
512b7(chi): nyid la rol// bdag gis bdag la mchod pa ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa yin// de phyir dngos grub gsol bar bya'o// oM badz+ra A be sha a a a
513a1(chi): de ltar gnyis su med pa dang // nyid kyis nyid la spyod pa dang // nyid la nyid kyis rol pa dang // nyid la nyid kyis bstod pa dang // nyid la
513a2(chi): nyid kyis dbang bskur nas// de yis theg pa chen po mthong // gzhan du bstan par bya ba min// 'gro ba rnams kyis sems bskyed la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba
513a3(chi): la/ mthar thug mngon pa'i dbang rnams bskur// rnam par dben don mi shes na// spyod pa'i las rnams bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa mthar phyin ni// gsang
513a4(chi): ba'i don la 'jug par bya// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtags pa// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// gdol pa mo yang mi dor te// bcu ga nyi sa bco lnga nyi
513a5(chi): sha ga nyis// yang na nu lnga dag la bya// byang chu ba sams pha ba sa p+la ma sta// nu dang rlung gi las shes na// dga' ba bzhi yang brten par bya// sa dang rmu dang me
513a6(chi): dang rlung // drod la phebs dang byang chub sems// gnas bzhi dag tu zil par bya// de nas phra mo'i thig la dang // na da'i rtags dag byung ba na// byang chub sems
513a7(chi): dang blta bar bya// de dag rtags dang dbyung ba na// smigs bu srin bu me khyer dang // du ba lta bu mthong bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
513b1(chi): rdo rje karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ snying po sngags dang / spyod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag
513b2(chi): po dgos pa chen po de bzhin rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhi ba las khro bo'i ngang tshul du bzhengs na sa/ sku 'bar ba
513b3(chi): las drag po'i chas kyis kun tu brgyan nas/ ha ha dr-i / hUM hUM dang / b+h+yo b+h+yo dang / ru lu ru lu la sogs pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji gu gyi khams
513b4(chi): kun thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis gang nas/ 'gro ba'i don byas slar 'dus paM las/ 'dus ma thag tu 'khor gyi gtso bo khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rigs kyi lha
513b5(chi): mo du ma dang / stag dang / khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / wa dang / lce spyang dang / de la sogs te ye shes las grub pa'i dur bya sna tshogs pa dang / gzhan
513b6(chi): yang ye shes kyi ma mo chen mo khro mo mi 'pham mo dang / ral gcig ma dang / 'phel byed ma la sogs pa'i khro mo rnams dang lhan cig tu 'khod de bzhugs pa las
513b7(chi): ston pa dpal kI la yas 'khor rnams la ya mtshan bskyed pa dang / 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma'o e ma'o ngo mtshar chos// skye ba
514a1(chi): med las thams cad skyes// skyes bu 'dul ba chos bzhin te// zhi khror ston pa ngo mtshar che// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rgyu// stong pa
514a2(chi): chen po'i byang chub sems// gzugs rnams nyid kyi rgyu ru grags// zhes bka' stsal pas/ 'khor rnams kyis ya mtshan skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol
514a3(chi): to// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// gang zhig me yis tshig pa la// ma yis gso ba ya mtshan che// gang zhig chu yis 'gags pa la// chu rnam
514a4(chi): dag gis dbyung bar bya// de yis 'byin pa ya mtshan che// de ltar stong pa chen po la// stong pa'i bya byed la mtshan che// zhi bas mi 'dul gdug pa la// khro
514a5(chi): bos 'dul ba ya mtshan che// zhes gsol pa dang / gleng bslang ba dang / gleng slong ba las/ yo mtshan rma da du chos du ma sa/ ma 'ongs pa thams cad
514a6(chi): yod ces pa dang / 'dul bar byed pa de dag dang gang lam du khyer ba dang / chos thams cad rang gis ye nas sangs rgyas pa la/ kun rdzob tu gang ltar
514a7(chi): 'dul ba'i chos la ji ltar 'dul ba ltar 'dul bas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ltar/ ya mtshan rmad du byung nas/ ston pa dang 'khor rnams tha mi dad pa
514b1(chi): gzhung gis 'dul ba'i don du bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyud/ karma ku ru las/ drag po'i gleng gzhi'i le'u
514b2(chi): ste bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgras po chen po de/ gzhi rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
514b3(chi): zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor mtshams sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// zhi ba shin tu zhi ba las// khro bo'i ngang tshul gsungs pa dang // dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi mtshams
514b4(chi): sbyar dang // gang gis mi 'dul gang gis 'dul// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis//
514b5(chi): khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// ces gsungs nas/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par gzhag go/ de nas dgyes pa chen po des/ dpal kI la ya'i
514b6(chi): rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gcig tu gyur nas/ dbyings drang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ched du brjod
514b7(chi): do// khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa 'di// ye shes rtse mo mchog yin te// hU~M gsum las ni bzlas pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// zhes
515a1(chi): ched du brjod do// de nas da pa la kI li ya'i rgyal po des/ 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i grwa zhi gsungs so// de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs
515a2(chi): dang // bzlas brjod dang ni 'phrin las dang // dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid do// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// btab pa ci 'dod sbyin no zhes//
515a3(chi): dam tshig bdag pos rab gsungs te// 'das na lha yang rlag pa'i phyir// rang gri bka' las rang mi 'do'u// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
515a4(chi): karma he ru kas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ de ni rgyal po'i tshig yin te// rje'u yi tshig gcig bka' stsal dang // sdom dang yan
515a5(chi): lag bcas pa ni// gse ra mig ga yu yis spus pa 'dra// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ba ka 'a s+yA la pa// nyon cig kaR+Ya he ru
515a6(chi): ka snga ma smras pa rgyal po na// lhag pa rje'u yi tshig yin te// zhes gsungs nas brtag pa'i rgyal po phyi ma 'di gsungs so// 'di lta ste/ de la phun
515a7(chi): sum tshogs pa bdun yod de// de la bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang / dus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs
515b1(chi): phun sum tshogs pa dang / byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa dang / bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so//
515b2(chi): de nas karma he ru kas/ yod dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rje'u dang rgyal pos bka' stsal pas// dmangs kyi tshig
515b3(chi): gcig bka' stsol dang // zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal pos ba ka' stsa la pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rje'u yi tshig ni de 'dra na/
515b4(chi): dmangs kyi tshig rnams bdag gis ba shad// ces gsol nas/ bshad pa'i rgyal po 'di bshad do// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa ni/ byang chub la gzhol
515b5(chi): zhing mang du thos pa dang / las la mkhas pa dang / lha nye bar gyur pa dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ldog pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa dang
515b6(chi): phrag dog dang 'bras bu gzhan la re ba mi 'jog pa dang / dam tshig ma nyams pa 'di rnams ni/ bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa zhes gsungs so// sku gsung thugs
515b7(chi): mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ sdom dang yan lag kun tu bcas pa/ gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas
516a1(chi): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dus phun sum tshogs pa 'di bshad do// tshes bcu bdun man chad mar gyi ngo dang / nyin mtshan gyi gung dang /
516a2(chi): bsnyen pa tshang ba dang / rtags byung ba la sogs te/ 'di ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gnas phun sum tshogs pa 'di
516a3(chi): bshad do// gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni/ gnas chen po dang / shing rkang gcig pa dang / gnod par nges pa ste/ 'di ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes
516a4(chi): bshad do// de nas yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa bshad de/ de la gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ni/ thugs kyi phyag rgya'i dbyibs la bya ste/ phur pa ni
516a5(chi): skabs 'dir lcags sam/ sngags lcags sna lnga 'am/ seng ldeng la sogs tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam/ sor bcu gnyis byas la/ mgo mju/
516a6(chi): ma nor bar byas la/ rtsa ba'i ngos la mgo bya/ sor gcig la rgya mdud bya/ stod zur brgyad/ smad zur gsum/ ri rab ltar brjid par 'dug pa ni/
516a7(chi): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bshad do// de nas yang byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa 'di bshad do// byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni/
516b1(chi): thog ma nyid du sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dang po kho nar stong pa nyid du bsgom ste/ chos skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu rgyu mdud gzhal
516b2(chi): yang khang du dmigs te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar hU~M bsgril ma lnga gzhag ste/ dbus su ha ru ka/ shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje
516b3(chi): gshe da/ nub tu rta mgrin/ byang du stobs po che/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te/ gzugs dang gnyis su med par 'khod pa dang
516b4(chi): 'khor ba rgyas btab par dmigs te ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bskal nas// gnyi so su rgyan rdzogs pa ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis/
516b5(chi): brlabs pa'o// de la sras phur pa khro bor bskyed pa ni/ lte ba yan chad mthing nag la/ dbu skra kham pa zur gsum gyi thabs su bgreng po/ brang gis 'gro ba chen
516b6(chi): po dang / thod rlon gyis bcings shing bzhad pa/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgrad pa/ spyan g.yon phur bu la gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ rab tu
516b7(chi): rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi me dpung gi nang na/ lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa/ phyag bzhi pa ste/ g.yas
517a1(chi): kyi gong ma na sta re kha yar bstan te lhag pas rdeg par byed pa/ 'og ma na rdo rje ri rab kyis gnon pa'i thabs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang /
517a2(chi): na rdo rje kha T+wAM 'khrol zhing bdud kyi khams su ma 'jig pa/ 'og ma na phur pa zur gsum pa 'debs pa'i thabs su gzas shing / ngan song gsum 'jig pa/
517a3(chi): stobs dang mthu dpung la sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pa bas lhag par che ba gcig 'og tu phyung ba ste/ rtag pa chen por bzhugs par bsam pa ni/ sprul pa'i
517a4(chi): skur byin gyis brlab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ dus dang / gnas dang / rdzas la brtan nas
517a5(chi): mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang dpa la kI la ya'i rgyal pos byin gyis brlab pa 'di gsungs so// de la rigs
517a6(chi): lngar byin gyis brlabs te/ 'bra lnga gnas lngar byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas yang dpal kI la ya'i rgyal pos bshad do// de nas yang sku gsung thugs su byin gyis
517a7(chi): brlab par bya ste/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu au/ rkengad par hri/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo// de nas yang dpal kI la ya'i rgyal pos 'di skad bshad do// de'i 'og tu thugs
517b1(chi): ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du pha Ta gsum/ ngos gsum du hU~M gsum gzhag pa'o// de nas yang skra gsung thugs kyi brtag pa
517b2(chi): dang rigs kyi khro bo'i byin gyis brlabaso pa 'di bshad do// de nas yang skra brtag pa dang / rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab cing dbang
517b3(chi): bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid/ phyogs bcur 'phros nas slar 'dus pa ste/ hUM hUM dang phaT phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing/ de nyid sku la bstim
517b4(chi): sted ba ngo dang byin rlabs thams cad kyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas yang 'di bshad par bya ste/ de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
517b5(chi): gshegs pa thams cad kyang stongs grogs mdzad par snang ngo // zhal gyis bzhes pa la gos pas/ de'i stongs grogs mdzad cing / de'i sku la 'jug pa dang /
517b6(chi): bdag nyid dang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing / byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ lag mthil g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du
517b7(chi): / hUM/ g.yon pa'i lag mthil du Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du a bsams la/ gung mo la oM/ mthe bong la hUM/ mdzub mo la traM/ srin
518a1(chi): lag la hri/ mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag ste/ su ra te staM zhes brjod/ thal mo ma nyam por sbyor/ badz+ra
518a2(chi): any+dza li hU~M/ zhes brjod nas ser mo cung zad bsnol/ badz+ra ban d+ha hAM/ zhes brjod nas/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gdam mo// sa ma ya staM/ zhes brjod
518a3(chi): la/ phur pa blangs te chad pa'i bar du bcug nas lag pa'i rting pa phye la/ mthe bong srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi bar du phur pa bcug la/ mthe bong gis cung zad
518a4(chi): bskul zhing dril lo// oM badz+ra A be sha a a/ zhes pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa ya ba yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su
518a5(chi): dran pa'i ska shu ga 'bra tsam par mtshams med par phur pa la bsnga zhing bstim mo// de nas yang kI la ya'i rgyal po des bshad pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid bshad do//
518a6(chi): skra gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs par byin gyis brlab cung dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sor mo rgya ba bsnol la/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa'i bar tu
518a7(chi): phur pa bzung nas/ oM badz+ra satwa rA dza hUM/ zhes bzlas/ de nas sor mo rnams puk+ka pug por byas la/ lag pa'i rting par phur pa bzung la/ oM hrI b+hur b+hu ba
518b1(chi): phaT/ ces brjod/ de nas sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol te/ mthe bong gzhibs pa'i bar du phur pa bcug la/ ha na ha na/ ti b+ha tsa kra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas
518b2(chi): dril te/ bdag nyid chen por thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i ska la zhugs pas stong kham s+yA cad gang bar me stag 'phro
518b3(chi): zhing dmigs pa thams cad nges par 'grub pa'i byin rlabs dang / dbang chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs su
518b4(chi): gsol nas/ yungs kar gyi rgyal pos rdeg cing / gu ga la sbar bas bdug pa la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o// de nas yid
518b5(chi): la brnag pa'i 'phrin las bcol te/ 'di ni byin brlabs phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes yang dag par bshad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
518b6(chi): skrasku gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phur pa nyid la dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la
518b7(chi): thogs chags med par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la 'di
519a1(chi): skad ces gsol to// kye kye rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// 'phral la rgyas pa ma yin te// ye nyid nas ni rdzogs sangs rgyas//
519a2(chi): dmangs rigs bzlas brjod ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis paka' stsal pa// bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs ma ni// bdag
519a3(chi): nyid las ni lhar bsgoms la// snying kha nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// hUM mthing nag gcig gzhag nas/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo zhig mA ra ya phaT/
519a4(chi): ces brjod pas// phur pa'i khro bo'i ci 'dra ba Ti ga byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don bya sa nas phar pa la bri ma mo ba sngam mo// 'di
519a5(chi): 'dra ba 'bum man// bdun 'bum bye ba 'am/ sa ya yan chad bzlas pa bya ste/ bstan pa gtong bar 'dod na/ phur pa snying kha'i hU~M la bsdus te/ 'di ni bzlas
519a6(chi): brjod phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes bshad do// de nas yang karma smA kas// kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mgon po chen
519a7(chi): po khyod// 'phrin las gang lags bshad du gsol// bdag gzhan las gnyis bshad du gsol// sngon gyi las dang gzhung gi las// dgug dang bcing dang
519b1(chi): dgrol ba rnams// ji ltar lags pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa ni// thog ma nyid du brtags pa'i
519b2(chi): sa rnyed nas// bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa bya ste/ skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bos sdang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang / rdo rje
519b3(chi): gnod sbyin la sogs pas bgegs bskrad la/ phur pa bcu khro bo bcu ru byin gyis brlabs te/ phyogs bcur btab nas/ ci tsam 'dod pa bsrung bar mtshams
519b4(chi): gcod do// dang po rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par byas la/ de nas las lha mnyes par bya ste/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas 'byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rnams tshang
519b5(chi): nas gnas chen po gru gsum la/ rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ske tshe dang / lany+dza dang / zhing chen gyi rak+ta dang / srub ma'i
519b6(chi): lo ma dang / khre dang rngu tsho'i phub ma dang / grog mo khar gyi sa dang / bong bu'i bdud rtsi las sbrus te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na/ til nag po la gzhi blangs
519b7(chi): te/ gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mor bris te mdog skrag nag tu byas te/ shun la sogs pa la zhing gi rak+ta sa hUM/ che ge mo mA ra ya pa Ta/ bris nas snying khar
520a1(chi): glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du gzhag nas/ mgo lho phyogs su bstan te/ gdon de nyid dgug pa ni/ mngag gzhug gam
520a2(chi): khro bo suM b+ha ni'i sbyor ba yang rung / gsang ba'i thugs kha'am/ rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dza dza/ 'di 'dra ba dkar po gcig gzhag la/ dzaHhUM baM ho/
520a3(chi): badz+ra oM ku sha dzo che ge mo zhig hUM dza/ zhes brjod nas/ lha mo lcags kyu can grangs med pa rgyud mar byung nas/ bgegs kyi snying kha nas bzung ste/ der 'ongs
520a4(chi): pa dang dzaHhUM baM ho/ badz+ra che ge mo pra be sha hUM/ zhes ci ran brjod nas/ gzugs sam/ ri mo la phab ste/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ zhes brjod/ lcags kyu
520a5(chi): dang zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang / bsdams pa dang / de'i sems 'khrugs par byas pa dang / e'i nang du rtse mo'i 'og tu song bar
520a6(chi): bsams la/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pa cung zad cig bska la la/ thal mo sbyar thabs kyis gsol te/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas
520a7(chi): la ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur kyi bar du dril nas/ ting nge 'dzin khugs pa dang / mnad kyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam gyis ma rag par gzas la/ khro bo'i rked
520b1(chi): pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ rdo rje tho ba 'am/ sta re'i lhag pas rdeg cing / rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum mam/ lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas
520b2(chi): shing btab ste/ seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying khar gdab/ gcig dpral bar gdab/ bzhi dpung mgo gnyis dang / brla'i nang rol gnyis su gdab/
520b3(chi): lte ba khung du'ang ga dab bo// rdo rje sder mo'i sngags ni/ na ma sra man ta kA ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra nAn/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya che ge mo phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn kI li kI la ya sarba pA paM
520b4(chi): phaT swA hA/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya tI kA ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces drag tu brjod do// phur pa de dag ba ta ba zin nas/ de'i steng du
520b5(chi): las kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags kyis mnan te/ lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol te/ mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis ngos sbyar te brkyang la/ gzhan ma ni rgyab drang por
520b6(chi): bsrang de'i sngags la/ oM karma badz+ra kro d+ha hAM phaT swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsu gcig bzlas te g.yas nas bskor la/ kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum du gtug go/ de nas
520b7(chi): yang phur pa slar mi dbyung zhing / sus kyang mi phyin par slar mi dbyung zhing / lhag par yang mi phyin par/ lhag par yang zug cing thal phyin par bsam mo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag
521a1(chi): rgya bstan par bya ste/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol te bcangs la/ gung mo gnyis sbyar la/ rtse mo bsgrengs la rnon por bya ste/ bur pa'i slad
521a2(chi): du mnan// phur pa'i sgra dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing / sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas so// oM badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya~M hUM phaT/ ces brjod
521a3(chi): do// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam/ de nas sor mo rnams nang du bsnol te/ mthe bong mthe'u chung
521a4(chi): gnyis ngos sbyar la sgreng/ khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed de/ phur pa'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra kro d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha/
521a5(chi): da ha/ paM tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ rba narba na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang
521a6(chi): phyag rgya ste/ gong du ba ka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyu ra na sa/ ci bsgo ba brams cad bdag gi bran bzhin las byed par 'gyur ro// de nas yungs kar rgya
521a7(chi): pos brdeg/ gu gu la sbar ba'i bdug pa gzhag/ de nas lag pa gnyis rgyab sbyar/ mthe bong mthe'u chung gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha 'gram
521b1(chi): g.yas gson du bzung ste/ yid mgu bar byas/ lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la/ mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te/ rkang pa g.yon pa dgra bgegs kyi snying khar mnanas/
521b2(chi): sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi dz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha kha ha ha hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ ces brjod do// de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag pa sor mo lu gu rgyud du
521b3(chi): bsnol lo// mthe bong g.yas pa g.yon gyi steng du gzhag la/ mdzub mo gnyis ngos sgyur te bsgreng nas/ sdang mig bgrad cing brdeg pasngags 'di lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa
521b4(chi): ga cig gam// brgya rtsu brgyad bzlas so// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da haM pa tsa bid tan sa ma ya dza ti laM bo da ra u tsus ma kro d+ha hU~M pha Ta/ ces brjod do//
521b5(chi): de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal po sa brdeg cing / gu gul gyis bdugs la gzhag go/ las 'di shin tu brtan zhing / grub par gyur cig par bsam mo// cung zad
521b6(chi): byin chung ba 'dra na/ rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan pa bya ste/ khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo bsdus pa'i steng du hUM mthing nag la rdo rje ljang khu rgya gram
521b7(chi): mi lce'i 'phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi steng du yi ge suM gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba cig bsams la/ oM badz+ra su ma hU~M hU~M sa ma ya ste/ zhes brjod pas/
522a1(chi): gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa gcig tu gyur pa'i stang du/ bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu dbu gsum phyag drug
522a2(chi): pa g.yas kyi dang po na 'khor lo 'bar ba phyur te bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi dang po na rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bstan pa/ 'khor dedapag tu med pa dang bcas pa'i pho brang
522a3(chi): btab pa/ khro bo rnams kyang shin tu gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa'i bar du'ang mnan par bsam mo// 'phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol
522a4(chi): te ga zhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag po bsham// gtor ma nag po cha gcig bsha ma// dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams
522a5(chi): cad la bsngo zhing las bcol// drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gdon de nyid bkug ste gzar gzhug go/ 'phrin las 'di'i dus su 'phra me na ma dang / gnod
522a6(chi): sbyin mo dang / srin mo rnams kyang spyan drang / gtor ma dbu la/ las bcol te/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gdab par bya'o// dza hUM baM ho/ e h+ye
522a7(chi): hi b+ha ga bAn/ bi d+hi ya kra dza b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM/ zhes lan gsum brjod pas spyan drang ngo // oM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ zhes brjod pas gtor ma dbul lo//
522b1(chi): oM sa ma ya a mr-i ta ar+g+ha pra tits+tsha swA hA/ zhes bzlas te/ a mr-i ta phul nas ci 'dod pa'i las bcol lo// 'di ni 'phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes bshad pa'i rgyu la
522b2(chi): bos yang dag par bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyud/ karma ku ru las/ rten dang rten can du gyur pa'i 'phrin las 'jig rten
522b3(chi): 'di nas pha rol tu sgrol ba'i las kyi rgyal po ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka sa
522b4(chi): gsol pa/ e ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang // las kyi sham bu'i hom khung rnams//
522b5(chi): dpa' bos yang dag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dpa' bo nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka// rje'u dmangs dang rgyal po'i tshul/
522b6(chi): yang ni bdag gis bshad par bya// zhi ba'i gnas dang drag po'i gnas// snga ma nyid las brtag par bya// de lta bu yi gnas rnyed nas// sngon gyi las
522b7(chi): rnams rab brtags nas// maN+Dal 'dom gang mda' gang ngam// che chung tshad ni ma nges te// dpangs su khru gang brtsig par bya// cha mnyam chag chag mgo
523a1(chi): ma yang / bdud rtsi dag gis rab bya ste// bcu gnyis rtsa lnga rtsa gnyis te// bu mos legs par bkal ba yi// thig skud ma nyams bkal ba yi//
523a2(chi): / dkyil 'khor cha ni bsnyam par bya// zur bzhi tshangs thig btab nas ni// snam bu brgyad du bgo bar bya// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// lte ba mu khyud dag gis bskor//
523a3(chi): de yi phyi rim snam bu la// srungs ma rnams kyi khyam dag bya// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgom bzhi yi rang bzhin te// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// de yi lcags ri gtang bar bya//
523a4(chi): lte ba dag ni nag po ste// de la gru gsum gru gsum bya// 'khor lo bzhi ni ser po ste// de yi gong ra sa nag pos byas// ma khyams dmar la sgo khyams sar// gru
523a5(chi): tshad ljang khu lkugs ri nag/ de bzhin mtshan gyis bkye ba la// dbus su karma yab yum ste// shar nas brtsams nas khro bo bzhi// rim pa bzhin du dgod par
523a6(chi): bya/ de yi phyi rim snam bu la// srungs ma rnams ni spel mar dgod// sgo la sgo ma bzhi rnams te// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma// don gyi sangs rgyas
523a7(chi): yin mod kyang // 'gron gyi tshul du mu ran bzhugs// dbus kyi gtso bo'i mdun nyid du// sras mchog bdun po de bzhin gzhag/ de ltar don gyi lha bkod nas/
523b1(chi): mchod pa rnams kyang de bzhin gzhag/ de nas mchod pa'i las bya ba// rgyal po rgyal po de bzhin te// rgyal thebs karma ging gis bya// de nas las
523b2(chi): rnams mtha' ru bskyal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bcu' gzhi dang lha bkod
523b3(chi): pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye sangs rgyas bcom
523b4(chi): ldan 'das// drag po las kyi sham bu ste// me yi cho ga bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor dbus
523b5(chi): sem shar lho mtshams// me yi dkyil 'khor khru gang bya// de la kha khyer gsum dang ldan// zabs dang rgyar yang ma nyam pa la// ho khung sor ni bzhi pa bya//
523b6(chi): dang po la yang thod pa gsum// par ma dag la mtshon cha lnga// bla ma rtsa nga dmar dag gis bskor// yang na dkyil 'khor chen po dang // 'brel pa nyid du
523b7(chi): bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rdzogs pa dang // gang la dmigs pa'i ling ga la// dgug gzhug las rnams tshang bar bya// gcad dang gtu ba dang
524a1(chi): gdab pa rnams// rdo rje sder la sogs pas bya// de nas me lha spyan yang drang // dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/
524a2(chi): 'byung po che// me lha'i drang srong bram ze che// sum cu rtsa lnga'i lnga tshogs ni// lnga pa maM lha zhes kyang bya// rab tu spun la sku mdog ser// mgrin pa ring la
524a3(chi): gsung yang snyan// blugs rje'i dbang gis spyan drangs te// 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni// sra gau blugs zhal zas bzhis su gsol// khyod la 'phrin
524a4(chi): las bcol ba ni// hU~Mm khung ma nyams dam pa 'dir// drongs shig drongs shig me drongs shig/ spor ci ge spor cig ma spor cig/ zur phud can gyis ma gsol
524a5(chi): la/ kha 'bar ma yis ma bus shig/ bram ze'i bu mo lnga brgya yang // khyod kyi g.yog dang bran dang 'khor// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod//
524a6(chi): dzaHhU~M baM ho/ na mo badz+ra pa Ni b+ha/ na mo ag+na yaM/ kI li kI la ya dan ta la si/ a hA A gats+tsha hUM/ ban d+hi swA hA/ de nas bzhugs su gsol/
524a7(chi): dzaHhU~M baM ho/ e h+ye hi ma hA bu taM be ba ri shi/ had sa dan ti me ra hid ta u ti ma hA raM sa ma san ti siM ti ba ba/ oM a ga na ye ha bya ka bya/ ma hA na ya swA hA/
524b1(chi): de nas yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// yang dag bden pa'i snying po 'di/ dzaHsgrub to/ oM badz+rA ak+Shir/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas sbar ba'i
524b2(chi): rig pa 'di gsungs so// tsi ri shag raM/ hi par shag raM/ yaM ro yaM ro ya ra/ zhes lan bdun brjod do// de nas yang rig pa 'di gsungs so// mgyen raM byi ra/ he la
524b3(chi): he shu raM thed khyel se na raM/ ma raM ma raM/ zhes bya'o// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// he la byi lam ma byi la/ rarna rmi byi la/ zhes gsungs so// de nas srog rdzas
524b4(chi): dbul bar bya// ling+ga ming rus bcas pa dang // taul nag dug sA shasna rnams// drag po'i sngags ni mthar brjod do// lha rnams dga' mgu bsrang ba'i phyir/
524b5(chi): mchod pa phul nas rgyal thabs bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku'i rgyud las/ me'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste
524b6(chi): bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// hU~M hU~M hUM hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hA~M hu~M hU~M/ dza hU~M
524b7(chi): na na rdzun/ nas 'ad sa sums/ ma ma tha // zhibakyis pa su
525a1(chi): sid+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA trai lo kya bi dza ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM pha TA/ kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/
525a2(chi): oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M paM Ta/ kro d+hi shwa ri hUM/ oM ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ kro d+hi shA ri hUM/ zhes yang dag par thugs las phyung ngo // de nAs yang 'di
525a3(chi): gsungs so// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa yi// ya ba yum sku ni gsal bar bskyed// oM dang muM dang hUM rnams kyis// 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya yi// gnas
525a4(chi): bzhi dag tu rgya yis gdab// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub pa che// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
525a5(chi): spyan yang drang // dzaHhUM baM ho/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa na bi na d+ha ya ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha hUM/ ru lu ru lu a ra li hr-i hri/ de nas mnyes pa dang / dgug pa'i phyir na 'di gsungs
525a6(chi): so/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe A hU/ na ma shri he ru ka hU~M/ d+hu pe An+tu/ A lo kI hrI A hUM/ gan d+haM A hU~M/ ni bi ti A hUM/ na ma shrI hU~M ka rA tsU/
525a7(chi): zhes phyi'i mchod pa gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa 'khor lo dbul ba 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA shA he ru ke/ sa ma ya a mra ta/ ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho
525b1(chi): karma shri he ru ka/ karma kro d+hI shwa ri kha raM khA hi/ zhes gsungs so// de nas bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// hUM khams gsum thugs rjes 'dren pa'i yak+kha
525b2(chi): he ru ka/ srid gsum sngangs par byed pa'i yak+ka he ru ka/ sa gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i yak+ka he ru ka/ 'gro ba mthar phyin sku gsung thugs mnga' ba// sku yi chas
525b3(chi): kyis gdug byed zil gyis gnon// gsung gi nga ros bdud dgra rlag par byed// thugs kyi 'od zer bkye bas nyon mongs 'joms// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag
525b4(chi): 'tshal lo// de nas yang bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// rigs lnga rgyal ba khrag 'thung mang po'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog kI la ya//
525b5(chi): chos sku mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing na ga la// zhe sdang bdud 'dul kham nag gyen du 'khyil// 'khror ba mi spong thod rlon 'phreng bas bcings// gdug pa'i
525b6(chi): klu 'dul sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// spyan gsum bgrad pas 'khor ba zhe la gnon// mche ba gtsigs pas skye shi rtsa ba gcod// rdzu 'phrul phyag bzhi g.yas
525b7(chi): kyi gong ma no// ye shes khams gsu ma nyon mongs rdul du rlog/ g.yas 'og rgya gram 'khor ba zil gyis gnon// g.yon gyis rdo rje kha T+wAM bdud khams
526a1(chi): 'dul// g.yon 'og phur pa ngan song gnas gsum 'jig/ bskal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// lte ba man chad sku smad ni// ut+pal/
526a2(chi): sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// chos nyid rig pa'i ye shes rtswa gcig po// shes rab yum gyi mkha' yi pho brang nas// stobs dang mthu dpung khro bo 'bum pas lhag/
526a3(chi): chos sku longs spyod rtag par sku sprul pa// ye shes kI la ya la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// las kyi rigs mchog bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i gtso//
526a4(chi): bdud kyi rigs rnams rdul du rlig mdzad cing // bla med byang chub gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// karma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs
526a5(chi): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang / bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
526a6(chi): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la/ bdag dang khyed du bcas pas rgyud 'di nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don byos shig/ ces gsungs nas mi snang bar
526a7(chi): gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis/ rgyud 'chad pa'i skyes bu la bstod pa/ hUM/ khro la khros pas zhi mdzad rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa// khro zhi che
526b1(chi): la phyag 'tshal te// zhi bas mi 'dul khro bor ston// khro bos 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to// karma
526b2(chi): ku ru'i rgyud las// yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba A tsaR+Ya dz+nyA nas gtan la
526b3(chi): phab pa las/ rtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ ki l-i ya bi ta sa maM ya tri ta tan+t+ra
526b4(chi): bod skad du/ phur pa yak+Sha za byed 'bar ba dam tshig gi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das yak+ShA he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig da/ 'og min gyi
526b5(chi): gnas mtha' dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa na/ rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor nyid las ma zhen pa bzhis bskor te/ de'i dus su gdul bya'i rgyud
526b6(chi): gang la gzigs nas chos ston pa ni/ bskal pa mnyam par gnas pa zhes bya ba la dur khrod chen po rab tu rtsub mo zhes bya bar/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mo las bskyeng
526b7(chi): pa'i srin po ma traM ka ru dra zhes bya ba dang / yum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyas byed ces bya ba la/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad dang / lha chen po bcu dang / zhe sdang gdog
527a1(chi): pa'i gcan gzan drug dang / 'dod chags gdug pa'i 'dab chags drug dang / gti mug gdug pa'i za gsod drug dang / mtshams sbyor gyi mche ga shog
527a2(chi): gnyis dang / las mdzad kyi srin po lcam dral drug dang / 'jigs pa'i sgo ma bzhis bskor te/ sems can thams cad la sna tshogs kyi gnod pa ni byed/ log pa'i lam
527a3(chi): la 'jug cing byang chub kyi myu gu skams par byed do// phur bu za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas dus
527a4(chi): gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa la/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya'i tshogs//
527a5(chi): 'khor tshogs sdug pa'i sdug bsngal 'khyams pa la// thugs rjes thabs kyis drang bar mdzad du gsol// ces ched du brjod pa las/ dus gsuM gyi bde bar
527a6(chi): gshegs pa thams cad bka' ba gros te/ rta mchog grub pas btul yang ma thul te/ chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las brtags kyi skar bzhengs te/ des kyang ma
527a7(chi): thul dam tshig la rbad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skra ni khro bor rab bzhengs te/ lha srin sde chen po brgyad 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'jigs byed kyi ska la dpal gyi chas
527b1(chi): brgyad kyis brgyan te/ zhe sdang gi bdud thom yor nag po btul ba'i phyir/ thal chen gyi tshom bu dpral ba'i sme ba gsum ni btab/ 'dod chags mdzes pa'i lha bdud dmar
527b2(chi): po btul ba'i phyir/ mkhur ba sna dang gsum la rak+Sha'i rme ba brtsegs ma ni btab/ gti mug dregs pa'i bdud 'phar ba mgo gsum bsgyur smug nag btul ba'i phyir zhag
527b3(chi): gi sme ba gsum brtsegs ni thugs kar btab/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i sta ba brtsegs pa des/ gza' nyi ma'i bu mo stag gi sham thabs can gidul ba'i phyir/ dpa' gtum
527b4(chi): za byed kyi stag gi rgyal thabs ni gsol/ klu bdud nag po saM sha can gdul ba'i phyir/ rigs bzhi sbrul gyi chun pos ni thod pa dang yan lag brgyan/ 'byung po
527b5(chi): tshogs bdag glang sna can gdul ba'i phyir/ theg pa mchog gi glang chen ko bas brgyan/ srin po ma traM ka ru dra btul ba'i phyir zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi ni gsol/
527b6(chi): khams gsum srid gsum gyi bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gdul ba'i phyir/ thod pa tshar gsum ni sku la brgyan pas yum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyas byed
527b7(chi): 'dul ba'i phyir/ stong nyid dbyings las sdug bsngal rgyas 'debs pas// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la 'khril bar byed// 'khor lha srin sde brgyad 'dul
528a1(chi): ba'i dpal zhes grags// de yi don rtags sku la brgyan pas na// dpal gyi chas brgyad ces su grags par bstan// srin po'i 'khor tshogs
528a2(chi): de dag thams cad kyang // zas su sha za skom du khrag 'thung las su sreg gcod pas// yak+Sha khrag 'thung srin por grags pa'o// chos kyi dbyings las 'jigs byed
528a3(chi): kyi skur bzhengs nas/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis ni de ltar brgyan/ gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa ni/ g.yas kyi dang por rdo rje rtse dgu pa bsnams pa ni/ srin po gtso 'khor
528a4(chi): btul bas rgyal byed pa'i rtags so// yum gyi ban+d+ha rak+ta sa bkang ba'i nang na/ me tog mdangs dang ldan pa bsnams pa ni/ 'khor ba'i 'dod chags khrag zhal du gsol
528a5(chi): bas thabs shes rab bde ba chen pos rgyas 'debs pas/ rig pa rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// me dang kha T+wAM ga dang phur pa 'dril ba ni/ 'phrin las don
528a6(chi): rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// za byed sam+b+ha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ru dru gtso bo btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang gsang bal
528a7(chi): bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ kye badz+ra kI la ya/ sde brgyad lha srin btul nas kyang // phyogs skyong lha chen bcu po rnams// thugs rjes ma lus gdul du
528b1(chi): gsol// zhes brjod nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa las khro bo yab yum bcu bton nas btul te/ kun gdan du bting ste/ rig pa rang rtags ni rdo rje dang
528b2(chi): dmar gyis bkang ba'o// skye med 'dus ma byas ni rdo rje ste// srid rtsa sdug bsngal rak+ta zhal du gsol// zhes brjod nas/ gnyis med bde chen sbyor ba'i lam la bkod/
528b3(chi): phyogs skyong bcu btul te phyag mtshan bar ma rnams// rgyal byed dpa' rtags zhes su de la grags// ri rab phur pa tha mar 'drol ba ni// 'phrin las don rtags zhes 'byin
528b4(chi): pa'i phyag mtshan no// srin po lha chen po bcu btul ba'i phyi rol na/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i gcan gzan drug gnas pa ni/ za byed za bar byed pa'i stag dang / rngam pa'i
528b5(chi): gzig dang / myur mgyogs kyi byi la dang / gsod la dga' ba'i sbrang ki dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i seng ge dang / gtum pa'i dom dang drug gnas te/
528b6(chi): de drug ni ya ba zhe sdang las skyed de/ zhe sdang gi snyigs ma rus pa/ rus pa mthar rgyas pa 'tshabs te/ ya ba las bskyed pa'i za byed mche ba can zhes bya'o//
528b7(chi): de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ khro bo rnams kyi sprul pa kho nas bskyed de/ yum drug dang sbyor ba mdzad pas/ pha ye shes kyi khro bo yin pas lus lhar byas/
529a1(chi): ma sdug pa'i byol song du byung ste/ sprul pa'i 'phra men ma zhes grags so// bu de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ stag la nyon mongs pa'i
529a2(chi): / sdug bsngal dpa' bar 'dzem pa dang / gzig gi mgo can ni shes bya thogs med kyi ye shes gsal ba dang / byi la'i mgo can ni rtsol sgrub thams cad zil gyis gnon
529a3(chi): pa dang / spyang ki'i mgo can ni sbyor sgrol dbyings su dag pa'i ye shes dang / seng ge'i mgo can no zhe sdang skyon gyis mi 'jigs pa'i ye shes dang / dom gyi mgo can ni gdug
529a4(chi): gtum thams cad byams pas sbyar ba'i ye shes dang / khyad par drug gis zhe sdang gnas su dag cing / khyad par du 'joms par byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim ni//
529a5(chi): 'dod chags sdug bsngal 'dab chags brgyad gnas te// 'jug skems sha zan gyi bya rgod dang // rmang rtse rol pa'i bya rog dang // 'jigs byed rtsa la mchog 'bar ba'i
529a6(chi): 'ug pa dang // sgrib g.yogs bag la snyol ba'i khwa ta dang // 'jol 'phur god nas 'jab kyi pu shud dang // bya ga can thams cad 'dul ba'i hor khra dang // drug gnas te/
529a7(chi): de drug ni yum 'dod chags la bskyed pa de/ 'dod chags kyi snyigs ma khrag/ khrag mthar rgyas pa shog pa ste/ yum las gsod byed gshog pa can zhes bya'o// de
529b1(chi): rnams 'dul ba'i phyir sbyor ba mdzad pas/ thugs kyi sprul pa sras drug byung ste/ ba ye shes kyi khro ba yin pas lus ltar byung / ma 'dod chags 'dul ba'i byol song
529b2(chi): pas mgo byar byung ba'o// de la sprul pa'i 'phra men ma zhes grags so// bu de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ 'gro ba'i don la thog pa med pa bya rgod mgo can dang // chos
529b3(chi): nyid mi 'gyur bya rog mgo can dang // mi shes mun pa sel ba'i 'ug pa'i mgo can dang // sdug bsngal dbyings su snyol ba'i khwa ta dang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel
529b4(chi): ba'i pu shud dang // nyon mongs dbyings su spol ba'i tor khra dang // ye shes khyad par drug gis 'dod chags gnas su dag/ khyad par du 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o//
529b5(chi): dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rim na/ gti mug gi dur phag khra mo sa sems can thams cad gsod par byed pa'o// nyon mongs gtsor 'dzin gyi mche ba can dang / gti mug gi
529b6(chi): dug sha nag po ltas ngan don la 'dzin pa'i mche ba can dang / ga ti mug gi dug g.yag kham pa ro la rtags pa'i mche ba can dang / ga ti mu ga gi dug bya dmigs
529b7(chi): su rtags 'dzin thob pa gshog pa can/ gti mug gi dur bya sre mo dug tsam che ba'i gshog pa can dang / gti mug gi dug bya ba skra la dga' ba'i las byed
530a1(chi): gshog pa can dang / de drug ni gnyis med gti mug las bskyed pa ste/ gti mug gi snyigs ma sha mthar rgyas pa las byed mi shes pa ni/ yab yum las
530a2(chi): bskyed pa'o// de rnams gdul ba'i khro bo rnams kyi thugs las sprul pa mkha' nas bskyed de/ yum drug la sbyor ba mdzad de yab lha yin pas lus lha mor byung / ma byol song yin pas mgo/
530a3(chi): byol song du gnas te/ de la sprul pa'i 'gra min ma zhes grags so// de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni bag ni ye shes gtsang rma med par rnam rtog 'joms/ g.yag ni chos nyid
530a4(chi): 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don la 'joms/ sha ba ni ye shes rgyas pas mtshan ma'i bag chags 'joms/ smig bu ni ye shes thogs med 'khor ba'i zhen pa 'joms/ sre mong
530a5(chi): ni rnam rtog bya rlag skye med dbyings su grol/ byil cir snang thams na gzung 'dzin mkha' las grol/ ye shes khyad par drug gi gti mug gnas su dag/ khyad par gti mug
530a6(chi): gi gnyen po'o// dug gsum cha mnyam pa'i dred dang pha wang gnyis ni/ shar dang nub kyi mtha' na gnas te/ zhe sdang rus pa'i mtha' la mche ba rgyas/ 'dod chags khrag
530a7(chi): gi mtha' la ba shog rgyas// gti mug sha'i mtha' la smra mi shes// de'i cing dug gsum 'joms pa'i dred mo la// shes bya ma rmongs rtogs pa'i ye shes mnga' 'o//
530b1(chi): zhe sdang rus pa'i mtha' la mche ba rtse mo rno// 'dod chags khrag dragu gzhan la sman du che// / gti mug lam gtor nyin par rgyu mi shes// dag gsum 'jom sa mdzad gshog
530b2(chi): rlabs pa wang la// ma rig mun pa sel ba'i ye shes mnga' 'o// phur ba yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ lha chen pa dang / gdug pa za byed btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
530b3(chi): / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra ki la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ lha chen gdug pa za byed btul
530b4(chi): nas kyang // gdug pa sri can rnam ga su ma 'khrags pa la// thugs rje chen pos/ ma lus gdul du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ rab tu rtsub pa'i tshogs kyis dur khrod
530b5(chi): na/ phung sri khyi mo 'dod chags dmar l+h+wam ni// sems can rnams kyi srog la za zhing mgus// dam sri lte phur nag mo ni sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog cing skems
530b6(chi): rgyas srid dun+tang nag mo ni sems can rnams la nad gtong zhing srog gcod par byed pa la/ de gsum ni dug gsum mthar rgyas kyi sri can gsum yin te/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la
530b7(chi): yas thugs kyi yi ge 'bru gsum khar bcug pas/ shA na ma bzhi dang / bdag nyid ma bzhi dang / rgyal mo bzhi 'khrungs te/ bu mo bcu gnyis pas kyang rang
531a1(chi): rtags srog gi snying po phul te// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni shA na mas thugs rje nyi ma'i 'od rgyas pa lta bu mkhyen/ bdag nyid mas sbyor ba lcags cha tsha lta bu
531a2(chi): mkhyen/ ba se'i lhums srog spu gri'i so lta bu mkhyen/ de rnams kyis kyang dur khrod rab rtsub ma ru rtse'i sgo 'gram der/ ma ra se na/ pra marda d+ha na yo hUM phaT/ ces
531a3(chi): rang rtags srog gi snying po rnams phul te/ bka' 'khor bsrung bar rang dam rang gis bcas so// dpal chen pos gsang mtshan btags pa/ shA na mu kha dang / shwa
531a4(chi): na ma sri ba dang / sha na ma rag dang / shA na la sa mkhan no// bdag nyid ma re ma ti dang / re ma de dang / ri ma dza dang ka re ma dzu'o// ba se dun+ti nag mo dang / ba se ba
531a5(chi): ti na ga mo dang / tsha be ko ti nag mor btags so// phur pa ya kla 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdug pa'i sri can btul ba dang / thul ba'i bu mo dam la btags pa'i le'u
531a6(chi): ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra ki la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra ki la ya/ gdug
531a7(chi): pa'i sri can de ltar btul nas kyang // srin pa'i tshogs bdag btul ba'i bka' 'khor rnams// byi rabs grub pa'i dngos grub ster 'gyur ba// thugs rjes thabs kyis
531b1(chi): mdzad srol bstan du gsol// ces brjod pas/ bar chad bsrung ba mtshams kyi las// rten du rung ba tshogs sog lha// byin gyis brlabs pa dam rdzas gsum// su
531b2(chi): gsum sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom// dpal chen yum lnga gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rten pa'i lha// dam can bco lnga bsgrub pa'i grogs//
531b3(chi): rgyal po'i las bzhi'i cho ga'i khrigs// 'di brgyad bstod khog yin gyi byang chub lam// che ba'i yon tan yin gyi 'byung gnas sa// lha rnams bdud rtsis mchod pa dang //
531b4(chi): thugs dam bskang dang tshogs mtshams gcad cing bshags// dngos grub 'bru gsum blangs la mchod pa sbreng // dngos grub tshogs kyi mchod pa phul ba dang //
531b5(chi): dri ma dag pa lha la dri ba dang // slob mas gsol ba btab ste de la bslab// lha tshogs rnams ni gsal bar bskyed// spyan drangs te dbul ba skang sogs
531b6(chi): rdzas rnams brdeg la bya// phung po bshig ste mchod pa rnam gsum dbul// dngos grub pa spangs nas bcu gsum las rnams rdzogs// nyi shu grangs la
531b7(chi): mkhas na dngos grub blangs pa las// dkyil 'khor bri dang mchod rdzas dgram// lhag ma byin brlabs mgron spyan drang // las dang dbang sdud kha chu btag
532a1(chi): thugs dam bdar dang mchod mtshon bshag pa las// 'phrin las bcol dang phur pas gdag/ tha ma smon lam bro brdung la bzhir bsdu//
532a2(chi): las chen bcu gsum rdzogs pa lhag ma'i las// bdun la mkhas na tha ma mthu chen 'gyur// bcu bzhi he ru las kyi bzlas pas te// bsgrub pa'i las tshogs//
532a3(chi): ces ni bstan pa'o// phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor tshogs byang chub lam la bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gas
532a4(chi): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra ki la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ 'khor tshogs byang chub bsgrub pa de lags na// mtshams
532a5(chi): spru la dkyil 'khor chags pa sags mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phun sum tshogs
532a6(chi): ldan mnyam nyid du// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang gcad// byi ni rgyal chen phyogs skyong gi/ bcu bzhi mtho yis gcad par bya// nang ni las kyi mtshams
532a7(chi): gsum gcad// gsang ba sgo gsum dam sri ma trang mnan// bar mtshams las bcu rgyas pa'i go rims ni// lus ngag bsrung ba bdag nyid sgom pa'i mtshams//
532b1(chi): bden pa bdar ba sgom pa las kyi mtshams// gnas pa bsrung ba gzhan gyis khang gi mtshams// de yang mi shig mtshon cha'i kur dang sa gzhi las// dmar nag
532b2(chi): dmar spug me yi 'du 'phro 'khyil// ye shes khro bo bcu yang dbyings nas bzhengs// khrag 'thung rol pa'i lha ni nang na bzhugs// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor
532b3(chi): ma lus lhun gyis grub// mtshams kyi khang pa'i nang du ni// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams te// sku gsum yan tan 'phrin las lnga'i// zhi khro lnga rnams sngags
532b4(chi): kyis sprul// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs pa yang // gtor ma las rang kun gyi mchog/ las rnams kun gyi sna la 'gro// gzhong pa bruM las gzhal ya sa
532b5(chi): khang / rdzas rnams lha yi rang bzhin las// rgya gram rdo rje kha ga cad de// gA las gsang ba'i yum bzhi gnas// gsung bdag dpal gyi zhabs kyis
532b6(chi): sbyong // thugs kyi 'od kyis lha rnams bskul// snyoms par 'jug pa'i byang chub sems// brda yi spyir zhugs yum gyi mkha'// gtor ma thim
532b7(chi): pos dbyer med su// sngags 'dis bskul la byin gyis brlabs// te tso ba ling ta te tso ba la ba ti gu h+ya sa ma ya/ ban+do brgyad nyi shu rtsa gcig byin brlabs sngags
533a1(chi): dbul ba'i las ni 'jug la ched du brjod// bdud rtsi ye shes lnga ldan pas// byin rlabs gzhung nas byung ba'i rdzas// phul na dam bskongs lan
533a2(chi): gnyis rdzogs// byin brlabs bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM sarba brgya a mr-i ta hU~M hriH/ dgug pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// byin gyis brlabs te dbul ba yin/
533a3(chi): rak+Sha chags pa'i rang bzhin 'di// dbang du 'dus shing las rnams byed// rmad byung ngam rdzas kun gyi mchog/ sngags 'di bzlas la byin gyis brlabs// ra rag
533a4(chi): ti pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bcu pas byin brlabs dbul bar bgyi// gtor ma lha'i maN+Da la// bdud rtsi dkar po te// rak+ta chags shing dmar la gdangs// byin
533a5(chi): brlabs phungs la gshegs pa'i las// bskyed dang mchod dang sgom las rnams// mtshan ma dus dang grangs su byas// phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las
533a6(chi): mtshams bsrungs tshogs bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / bsnyen pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
533a7(chi): yis badz+ra kI la yal 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ bsnyen pa skyel ba'i rim pa de lags na// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa
533b1(chi): mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang po sa brtag blang zhing sbyang ba dang // byin gyis brlabs te bzung ba
533b2(chi): der// sta gan mchod pa rgyas shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la 'jug/ mthing nag gru gsum nag po la// zla gam dmar po dbang gis spras//
533b3(chi): zlum po zhi ba dkar pos bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing nag la// gong ras dmar la 'dra skar dkar// zod pa dgra bos brgyad pa bri// rgyas pas
533b4(chi): gru chad ser po la// bar khyams phyogs mtshams sgo bzhi rigs// bcu drug cha las bgos pa yi// sgo yang brgyad kyi tshad du bya// sgo khyud ra ba bcu drug
533b5(chi): chad// zhing gi ka ba de yi phyed// rtsig pa dri dang bany+tsa e// yang na che ba'i yon tan rgyas// rin pa che yi phung po bya// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang //
533b6(chi): dbang drag thod pa'i khol mas brgyan pa bri// ye shes spos dang bral bas na// e ni ra ga rkyang pas te// rab thod skam pa gu rlon// rdo rje 'phreng ba me 'od
533b7(chi): dmar// badz+ra yak+Sha maN+Dal// tsakra tri ti sa ma ya// thal mo drug rgol ba ni sbyar la// blang zhing nam mkhar bteg par bya// pho brang rdo rjer brgyad la// rin
534a1(chi): chen lta ba 'phrin las bzhi// 'khor lo'i rtse mo ka ba brgyad// zhing chen 'dus pa'i rgyan gyis spras// mchog chen bral btab zhing chen 'bas/
534a2(chi): chen su ts+tshin ki mA ts+tsha ste// steng kr-i d+ha sgyur gnas dgu par// 'ag kyang de sbyar gsal bar bri// sna zang mapa la phyi la dpa'// kA stegs cur
534a3(chi): gnas par bri// gtso bo'i ga da nA dang ba se mo'i thug sa// thad dkar gnas pa tsam du bsgom// nang gi dur khrod ga zhal yas la// byi ni rin chen gzhal
534a4(chi): sa su ni du ra bsgom// bu d+ma byed par hU~M b+h+ya mas/ thugs sa ba sus pa'i yod mi snyan pa/
534a5(chi): / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra kA la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ dkyil 'khor
534a6(chi): bri ba de lags na// lha rnams dgod pa mi 'tshal las// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru ka sa 'di skad ces gsungs so// skye med
534a7(chi): byang chub sems nyid las// ru dra lha chen gdan stengs su// rig pa hU~M las khro bor bskyed// yum dang 'khril bas longs spyod rdzogs// za thabs sprul
534b1(chi): pa dug gsum 'joms// bar khyams shA na bdag nyid bskyed// hUM traM hri dang a las bskyed// sgo bzhir gsang ba'i bse mo bzhi// yi ge hU~M phaT ta las bskyed//
534b2(chi): bo sa la mchod pas las rnams bya// dbang dang byin brlabs byas nas kyang // sgom bzlas bsgrub pa rdzogs pa dang // pho nya rnam gsum dgug 'dren bya// thugs
534b3(chi): rje sprul pa'i pho nya las// gzhi yi dngos po ngo bo 'phrin las gsum// mgyogs byed ye shes pa nyal/ gzhi dang ngo bo 'phrin las dang // bka' nyan 'phrin
534b4(chi): la so pho nya la// gzhi dngos 'phrin las dgur ldan na// 'gugs pa'i las la bsgrub par bya// de la gdab pa'i las brgyad bya// rig pa sems kyi phur pa de//
534b5(chi): skye med chos kyi dbyings la kad // byang chub sems kyi phur bu de// yum gyi mkha' lnga gdab pa yin// tshad med snying rje'i phur pa de// khams gsum sdug
534b6(chi): bsngal rgyud la gdab// rdzas kyi phur po dgra dang bgegs la gdab// dang po tshe gso'i khrus kyang bya// gnyis pa rnam rtog sgro lnga dgag/ tshogs brgyad dang po
534b7(chi): byin gyis brlabs// rten gnyis bcad dang 'khor rtsabs bcad// phur bu za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa'i 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
535a1(chi): pa'o// tade nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI la ya/ lha dgod pa'i 'phrin
535a2(chi): las de lags na// gdab pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin bstan du gsol// zhes brjod pa las/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru ka sa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// a b+hi
535a3(chi): tsar+ya'i dus la bab// brnag pa'i las ni 'di nyid la'o// a ni chos dbyings skye ba med// sgyu ma dngos med kyi bden pa'o// bi ni gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs/
535a4(chi): thugs rje 'gags med kyi phur pa shar// brtan te 'khor ba'i sgo yang dgag/ rtsa ni gnyis su med pa ste// bdag dang bur pa gzas pa'o// rig pa rtsa bcud
535a5(chi): sha khrag drug/ gnyis med gcig pas sangs rgyas mthu// rgya ni sku gsum rgya ma chad// byang chub sems ni rin po che// phyi ni kun gzhi'i nyon mongs yin// yid
535a6(chi): kyi rnam shes gsum du shar// nang ni he ru sku gsung thugs// gsang ba yab yum byang chub sems// dkar dmar gnyis su med dang gsum// rgya ma chad na sgrib gsum
535a7(chi): bya rtog pa bral na sems zhes bya// nyams su lon na rin po che// mtshon drug gong bu gyur pa la// mi lta don du bden bzhi brdar// da ltar bya ba'i dus la bab// lus kyi brnag
535b1(chi): pa gdab pa yin// ngag gi brnag pa sngags bzlas bya// yid kyi brnag pa rnam gsum po// dang sa ma rnam gsum sbyang ba dang // dkar nag dri ma bkru ba dang // sems nyid rig
535b2(chi): pa'i dbyings byung na// brnag pa mtha' ru byin pa'o// thugs rje gzhan du mi spro'i don// 'di nyid kho na'i dus la bab// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa mthar
535b3(chi): byiphyin pa'i dgongs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sa/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kI lA ya/
535b4(chi): gdab pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin pa de lags na// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba mi 'chal lam// dngos grub blang ba'i don du bka' stsal pa// la shes lha yi dngos grub
535b5(chi): dang kha don gyi gnas pa'i tshul du blang // rdo rje 'khar lo rin po che// pad+ma 'phrin las rgya gram ste// gang la gnas pa de la blang // dam can rgya mtsho'i dngos grub de// thob pa'i
535b6(chi): dus la rten te blang // rtse lnga me ri 'bar rtse dang // ti rtse gang la nyi shar dang // 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma brdal// mthing nag grib rtse nyil dus su// sku gsung thugs dang yon
535b7(chi): tan dang // 'phrin las lnga yi dngos grub blang // ting 'dzin lam pa'i dngos grub de// thob pa'i tshul du brten te blang // 'tsho ba zas kyi dngos grub de// thams cad thob pa'i tshul du blang // de la dbang
536a1(chi): bskur bya ba yang // phyi ni bum pa'i dbang bskur te// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis bya// gsang ba a mr-i ta dang rdo rje che'o// byi ni shes dbang ye shes ni// lhag
536a2(chi): pa'i byang chub sems so// nang gi bum pa'i da te lus dag ste// lha yi sku snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// nang gi gsang ba ni ngag drag par byed pa ste// lce la dbang bskur
536a3(chi): sngags bklag pa'o// nang gi shes rab ye shes te// yid dag par byed pa ste/ sems las su rung ba'o// gsang ba'i bum po'i dbang ni phyis te 'khyud
536a4(chi): sprug pa'o// gsang ba'i gsang ba ni bde rtse la smin pa'o// gsang ba'i shes rab ye shes ni// gnyis kaung gnyis mnyam pa'o// phyag rgya ma'i rgyu 'khrungs na// rdo rje slob
536a5(chi): dpon bka' byung na// yi ge na yang rked par chod// bla mas pad+ma mtshan ldan de// bu la gtad de sbyor bas bskul// bde bas ye shes byang chub sems// mkha' nas blangs
536a6(chi): te rang bden na// dbang dang dngos grub kha ru btung // de nas blangs te pu la bskur// mkhas pa gtsang rme smad rtogs na// grol zhing mi ldog bla ma yin// bus pa'i chung ma
536a7(chi): mdza' sde ma// 'phangs par blangs la de la 'bul// dngas grub yon tan dam par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'gram du longs spyod kyang // nyam nga bag tshe med par bya// ma byin brkus na
536b1(chi): dmyal bar ltung // sems kyi thongs na sbyin pa'i mchog/ bla mas ye shes gtor zhes bya// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// /
536b2(chi): / de nas yang gsong ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badz+ra kaM la ya/ dbang dang dngos grub bstan pa de lags na// rgyud dang dgongs
536b3(chi): pa'i khyad par bye brag rnams// phra mar byas te bstan par mi 'tshal lam// bye brag so so'i bstan pa bka' stsal pa// rgya shug tsan dan dkar po dang // skyer ba yang na gla ba dang // seng
536b4(chi): ldeng 'jo mo dmar pa dang // sher shing nag mo tsher ma can// 'di brgyad phur pa'i rgyu yin te// yang na shing gi rgyu bstan pa// zhi rtse rgyas pa rtsa ba dbang // drag pa sa yi gting la bya// dur khrod rus
536b5(chi): pa'i rgyu bstan pa// bya pur dkar po 'gugs byed pa// mgyogs pas zhi ba'i phur ba bshad// glang chen gzhon pa ser po la// dngos grub rgyas pa'i phur par bshad// bya rgod
536b6(chi): mchog gi phur pa de// dbang sdud las kyi phur par bshad// gcan gzan rkang gi phur pa de// drag po las kyi phur par bshad// dngul la zhi ba rgyas pa ser// dbang sdud dmar
536b7(chi): thabs zangs yin no// lnga bdun tshar na drag po lcags// phur pa'i rgyud chen bco brgyad po// mkhas pas bye brag shes par bya// rgyu la don gyi tshad bstan pa// skye ba rnam bzhi'i sgo bgag pa/
537a1(chi): @##/ tshad ni sor bzhi bstan pa yin// rnam shes brgyad kyi sgo bkag pas// tshad ni sor brgyad bstan pa yin// rten 'brel bcu gnyis rgyun gcad
537a2(chi): phyir/ 'bring tshad sor ni bcu gnyis bstan// khams chen bco brgyad rtsa gcad phyir// sor ni bco brgyad ring tshad bstan// rnam lnga'i dgongs ldan par bya//
537a3(chi): pur ni rig pa'i ye shes te// pa ni sna tshogs dngos po'o// sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul du// rtogs na phur pa zhes su grags// dbyibs ni zlum po ni ba la/
537a4(chi): rgyas pa rtse mo gru bzhi pa// dbang ni zla ga ma gsum du bshad// rgyu mdung cung shog brgyad dang ldan// de yi byin brlab de bzhin no// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin
537a5(chi): dang / lag pa'i 'du byed thabs shes rab// grub pas byin gyis brlab par bya// rig pa'i ye shes byang chub sems// tshad med snying rje gdab par bya// sgo
537a6(chi): bzhi don gyi tshad ma'o// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud don dgongs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
537a7(chi): phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
